column1: comments
column5: comments

column1: Koselig praktisk leilighet i et fantastisk område av Paris! Trygt og godt og stille! Veldig hyggelige restauranter i nærmiljøet! Flott base for en herlig helg i Paris! Hit kommer vi gjerne tilbake!!
column5: Cosy, convenient apartment in a fantastic area of Paris! Safe and nice and quiet! Very nice restaurants in the neighborhood! Great base for a wonderful weekend in Paris! Here we come gladly back!!

column1:
Min søn og jeg boede 3 nætter i Nolwenn og Didiers lejlighed. Fra jeg bookede opholdet gik der meget kort tid før jeg modtog en positiv og informativ respons, som var meget betryggende, idet det var første gang jeg selv skulle benytte Airbnb på en rejse.
Lejligheden så fuldstændig ud som på billederne og der var rent og pænt. Vi fik en grundig indføring i de praktiske ting af Didier, som var venlig og imødekommende. Lejligheden lå helt perfekt med kort afstand til metro og de vidunderlige seværdigheder på Montmartre. Det var også en stor hjælp at kunne lade bagagen stå noget af afrejsedagen, da vi skulle afsted om aftenen. Vi håber en dag at kunne vende tilbage.
column5:
My son and I stayed 3 nights in Nolwenn and Didier apartment. From the time I booked the stay went there a very short time before I received a positive and informative response, which was very reassuring, as it was the first time I even had to use Airbnb on a trip.
The apartment is as complete as in the pictures and was clean and neat. We got a thorough grounding in the practical things of Didier, who was friendly and welcoming. The apartment was perfect with short distance to the metro and the wonderful sights in Montmartre. It was also a great help to be able to leave your luggage something the day of departure since we were leaving in the evening. We hope one day to be able to return.

column1: Dette er en skjult perle. Nydelig leilighet, rent og pent og i ett koselig nabolag. Nærhet til kollektivtransport og verten svarte raskt og tydelig. Tommel opp!
column5: This is a hidden gem. Lovely apartment, clean and tidy, and in a cosy neighbourhood. Proximity to public transport and the host responded quickly and clearly. Thumbs up!

column1:
Fik en fin velkomst efter aftalt tidspunkt. Rigtig dejligt sted - fantastisk tagterrasse og masser af shoppe og spise muligheder i nærheden. her kunne det fremlagte kort ikke bruges - kunne simpelhen ikke tyde det. Desværre var der ikke helt så rent som man kunne ønske sig - især køkkenet trængte. Manglende en del småting, toiletpapir, opvasketabs, håndsæbe, ting som jeg havde forventet bare var der.
Stadigvæk en rigtig god oplevelse!
column5:
Got a nice welcome after the agreed time. Really nice place - fantastic roof terrace and plenty of shopping and dining options nearby. here could be the presented card can not be used - could simply not decipher it. Unfortunately there was not quite as clean as one could desire - especially the kitchen needed. The lack of a part of little things, toilet paper, it, hand soap, things that I had expected was just that.
Still a really good experience!

column1: Et skønt sted kun 100m fra Notre Dame, og i gåafstand til mange lokaliteter. Værtinden Lisa, er utrolig sød og hjælpsom.
column5: A great location only 100m from the Notre-Dame, and within walking distance to many sites. The hostess, Lisa, is incredibly sweet and helpful.

column1: Ett fint boende i mysigt område!
column5: A nice accommodation in a cosy area!

column1: Jeffs lejlighed var skøn og hjemlig, den gav en fantastisk følelse, og gjorde vores ophold i Paris til en bedre oplevelse! Jeff vag god til at give os tips til nærliggende spisesteder, metroer og seværdigheder og dette sætter vi stor pris på! 10/10
column5: Jeff's apartment was great and homely, it gave a great feeling, and made our stay in Paris for a better experience! Jeff vague good to give us tips for nearby eateries, the metro and the sights and this appreciate very much! 10/10

column1: ...as being at home...(or perheps better...)
column5: ...as being at home...(or perheps better...)

column1: Havde et fantastisk ophold i Michels lejlighed. Michel var den perfekte vært, han startede vores ophold med en guided tur i lokalområdet. Beliggenheden var perfekt, vi følte os som lokale. Kan varmt anbefales, vi kommer selv gerne igen.
column5: Had a great stay in Michel's apartment. Michel was the perfect host, he started our stay with a guided tour in the local area. The location was perfect, we felt like locals. Highly recommended, we even like again.

column1:
Fik i forbindelse med lejeaftalen en fremragende service, da vi havde private forhold, der gav lidt udfordringer. Axel og Michelle var her meget flexible og forstående.
Modtog inden rejsen en fin og fyldestgørende beskrivelse af lejligheden, transport hertil og med personlige anbefalinger om seværdige steder og oplevelser i Paris. 
Meget hurtig respons på alle henvendelser.
Axel og Michelles lejlighed er hyggelig og meget velbeliggende i et roligt område med kort afstand til Latinerkvarterets centrum. Uden for den """"værste"""" turisme og med en meget lokal stemning i en typisk boligopgang for området. 10 minutters gang derfra er man for enden af Rue Muffetard, som blev vores daglige indgang til at gå på opdagelse i Latinerkvarteret og det øvrige Paris.
Lejligheden er vel udstyret og vi følte os meget hurtig hjemme.
En god seng at sove i med en dejlig dobbeltdyne.
Vi kunne bestemt have lyst til et gensyn med stedet - og selvfølgelig Paris!
column5:
Received in connection with the lease agreement an excellent service, when we had personal issues, who gave a little challenges. Axel and Michelle was very flexible and understanding.
Received within the journey a fine and full description of the apartment, transportation therefor, and with personalized recommendations of touristic places and experiences in Paris. 
Very quick response to all inquiries.
Axel and michelle's apartment is cozy and very well located in a quiet area with short distance to the Latinerkvarterets centre. Outside of the """"the worst"""" tourism and with a very local atmosphere in a typical boligopgang for the area. A 10-minute walk away is the one at the end of the Rue Muffetard, which was our daily entrance to go and explore the Latin quarter and the rest of Paris.
The apartment is well equipped and we felt us very fast at home.
A good bed to sleep in with a nice duvet.
We could certainly have a desire for a reunion with the place - and of course Paris!

column1: Netter Kontakt
column5: Nice Contact

column1:
Jeg har en meget positiv oplevelse af The apartment. Beskrivelsen og de viste fotos svarede fuldt ud til virkeligheden. Det er en optimal lejlighed  - der er alt hvad du behøver ifht. køkkenudstyr etc. Virkelig fedt indrettet og man havde lyst til at tilbringe tid der. Placeringen var også super ifht. metroen, som lå lige overfor. Kvarteret  hvor lejligheden ligger var ikke specielt spændende, men det gjorde ikke noget når man så let kunne hoppe på offentlig transport.
Amélie var en super vært - hun var hurtig til at svare på beskeder og meget venlig.
Klart anbefalelsesværdig - vi ville gerne bo der igen!
column5:
I have a very positive experience of The apartment. The description and the photos shown corresponded fully to reality. It is an optimal apartment - there is everything what you need compared to. kitchenware etc. Really cool decorated and you had the urge to spend time there. The location was also super compared to. the metro, which was just across the street. The neighborhood where the apartment is located was not particularly exciting, but it did not do anything when you could easily hop on public transport.
Amélie was a super host - she was quick to reply to messages and very friendly.
Clearly recommendable - we would gladly stay there again!

column1:
De bedste anbefalinger til Brigitte-Maries bolig i Paris.
Meget tjekket før og under ophold.
Meget venlig og hjælpsom uden at være påtrængende.
column5:
The best recommendations for Brigitte-Marie's home in Paris.
Much checked before and during the stay.
Very friendly and helpful without being intrusive.

column1: Lejligheden ligger i et dejligt område med masser af cafeer, butikker og restauranter. Der er roligt og ingen gadestøj, da lejligheden ligger inde i en lille gård. Der er hyggeligt og alt fungerer perfekt i lejligheden.
column5: The apartment is located in a nice area with lots of cafes, shops and restaurants. There is quiet and no street noise as the apartment is inside a small farm. There is cosy and everything works perfectly in the apartment.

column1:
Min kæreste og jeg var en forlænget weekend i Paris og landede 21.30 i Orly-airport vi tog en taxa til lejligheden ca. (€35) og ca. 25min. Lejligheden ligger i et virkelig dejligt område tæt på restauranter, shopping og barer (dog ingen larm i lejligheden). Mami viste os lejligheden og fik et par tips ift. spisning. 
Afgangen tilbage til København var kl. 21.30 og vi fik lov til at blive i lejligheden hele dagen indtil vi skulle af sted- virkelig dejligt!
Alt i alt en god oplevelse!
column5:
My girlfriend and I had a long weekend in Paris and landed after 21: 30 in Orly airport we took a taxi to the apartment approx. (€35) and ca. 25min. The apartment is in a really nice area close to restaurants, shopping and bars (but no noise in the apartment). Mami showed us the apartment and got a few tips ift. dining. 
Exit back to Copenhagen and was at. 21: 30 and we were allowed to stay in the apartment all day until we were leaving - really nice!
All in all a good experience!

column1: Vi havde en meget positiv oplevelse! Lejligheden ligger helt perfekt - midt i Le Marais i okay gåafstand til Notre Dame, Place des Vosges, Bastillen, Louvre osv. Derudover ligger den tæt på metroen og masser af shoppingmuligheder. Lejligheden ligger i en baggård, så det er minimalt med larm fra gaden om natten. Der ligger et supermarked i stueetagen, perfekt når man som os gerne selv vil lave morgenmad, drikke lidt vin og have lidt mad i køleskabet. Smuk udsigt over Paris' tage. Meget rummeligt badeværelse med badekar. Lejligheden ligger på 5. sal uden elevator, så det skal man lige tage med i overvejelserne. Rent, pænt og virkelig perfekt til et par eller to venner. Mami er en rigtig god værtinde. Vi havde virkelig god kommunikation hele vejen igennem. Vi fik lov at tjekke ind sent (omkring midnat) og lade vores bagage stå i lejligheden til vi skulle i lufthavnen om aftenen. Vi har kun positivt at sige om hele opholdet og har intet at udsætte på Mami som vært. Vi vil helt sikkert  booke denne lejlighed en anden gang.
column5: We had a very positive experience! The apartment is absolutely perfect - in the heart of Le Marais in okay walking distance to Notre Dame, Place des Vosges, the Bastille, the Louvre, etc. In addition to that are the close to the subway and plenty of shopping. The apartment is located in a backyard, so it is minimally with the noise from the street at night. There is a supermarket in the ground floor, perfect if you like us like yourself will make breakfast, drink some wine and have some food in the fridge. Beautiful views over Paris' rooftops. Very spacious bathroom with a bath. The apartment is on the 5. floor without elevator, so you need to just take into consideration. Clean, neat and really perfect for a couple or two friends. Mami is a really good hostess. We had really good communication the whole way through. We were allowed to check in late (around midnight) and leave our bags in the apartment until we were in the airport in the evening. We have only positive things to say about the entire stay and have no complaints at Mami as the host. We will definitely book this apartment another time.

column1: Hyggelig lille lejlighed, centralt, tæt på Bastille-pladsen og Metro og i livligt kvarter.
column5: Cozy little apartment, centrally located, close to the Bastille square and the Metro and in a lively neighbourhood.

column1:
Vi er en familie på 2 voksne og 3 børn og boede hos Sophie i fem nætter. 
Sophie var yderst imødekommende og gæstfri og har hele vejen igennem været nem at komme i kontakt med. Der ligger en mappe i lejligheden med gode råd til blandt andet restauranter og seværdigheder, men Sophie vil også meget gerne hjælpe, hvis der er noget, man har specielt brug for. Fx bestilte hun taxi til lufthavnen til os, hvilket er helt rart, når ens fransk ikke ligefrem er flydende. 
Lejligheden er super hyggelig og meget charmerende. Her bor en ægte pariserinde :-). Der er hvad man har brug for, og det er nemt at føle sig hjemme. Den ligger centralt på Montmartre - meget tæt på et super hyggeligt butiks- og cafékvarter, som absolut er et besøg værd.
Vi vil helt sikkert komme igen, hvis vejen nogensinde kommer forbi Paris en anden gang!
column5:
We are a family of 2 adults and 3 children and stayed with Sophie for five nights. 
Sophie was extremely welcoming and hospitable and has been easy to come in contact with. There is a folder in the apartment with the good advice to, among others, restaurants and attractions, but Sophie would also like to help, if there is something you specifically need. Fx ordered the she taxi to the airport for us, which is quite nice when one's French is not exactly fluent. 
The apartment is super cozy and very charming. Here lives a true pariserinde :-). That is what you need, and it is easy to feel at home. The hotel is centrally located in Montmartre - very close to a super nice shopping and cafékvarter, which is definitely worth a visit.
We will definitely come again, if the road ever come by Paris another time!

column1:
Sophie er den perfekte værtinde. Alt var lagt til rette til vores besøg med info og lokale tips. Lejligheden ligger centralt og var en god base, hvor vores børn kunne slappe af, når vi ikke var ude i byen. Lejligheen er personlig og godt indrettet. Som et ekstra plus var børnene begejstrede for at der er et pokestop i lejligheden.
Vi kan kun anbefale Sophie som en fleksibel og kompetent værtinde og hendes lejlighed som et godt alternativ til et hotelværelse. Kim
column5:
Sophie is the perfect hostess. Everything was laid right for our visit with info and local tips. The apartment is centrally located and was a good base, where our children could relax when we were not out in the city. Lejligheen is personal and well decorated. As an extra plus was the kids excited about there is a pokestop in the apartment.
We can only recommend Sophie as a flexible and competent hostess and her apartment as a great alternative to a hotel room. Kim

column1: Laures skønne lejlighed gjorde vores ophold i Paris super skønt. Den er pæn, ren, lækkert indrettet og med gode faciliteter. Og især har den en fantastisk udsigt ud over hele Paris! Laure var god at kommunikere med, og hun sørgede for, at det var let for os at finde lejligheden, få nøglen og begynde vores eventyr!
column5: Laures wonderful apartment made our stay in Paris although super. It is neat, clean, nicely furnished and with good facilities. And especially, it has a fantastic view over Paris! Laure was good to communicate with, and she made sure that it was easy for us to find the apartment, get the key and begin our adventure!

column1: Skøn lejlighed centralt i Paris i den rigtigt hyggelige Rue Montorgueil. Lejlighed er tæt på Metro og man er i gå afstand til mange steder i Paris. Lejligheden var meget let at finde ud fra den beskrivelse og de billeder vi havde modtaget af Jean-Francois. Vi havde en rigtig god kommunikation med Jean-Francois og da vi havde brug for hans hjælp under vores ophold var han meget hurtigt til at svare. Vi kommer gerne igen og anbefaler gerne denne skønne lejlighed til jer som vil bo godt og centralt.
column5: Great apartment in central Paris, in the true cosy Rue Montorgueil. Apartment is close to Metro and in walking distance to many sites in Paris. The apartment was very easy to figure out from the description and the pictures we had received of Jean-Francois. We had a really good communication with Jean-Francois and since we needed his help during our stay he was very quick to respond. We will gladly come again and recommend this lovely apartment to you will stay good.

column1: Marais er fantastisk og leiligheten ligger perfekt til.
column5: The Marais is fantastic and the apartment is perfectly located.

column1:
Vi tilbragte en uge i Eiffel Tower Tradition nær Montparnasse tårnet. Og vi nød det i fulde drag.

Vores vært Brandan er professionel, meget venlig og utrolig hjælpsom. Han har gjort sig stor ulejlighed for at gæsterne kan få en god oplevelse. I lejligheden forefandtes en ”Housemanuel” med alle praktiske informationer.

Lejligheden er en ca. 35 m2 stor Studio på 9 sal i en pæn Parisisk ejendom bestående af stor stue, en pænt badeværelse, med badekar og et fint køkken med alt, hvad der behøves. Ideel for 2 personer. 

Lejligheden er pænt møbleret i gammel parisisk empire-stil, med en sofa, et spisebord, 4 stole og så med en seng, der kunne slås op mod væggen, så den ikke tog plads, når den ikke var i brug.

Det bedste var imidlertid den ca. 10m2 store ugenerte altan. Wow, sikken en udsigt over de parisiske tage og ikke mindst Eiffeltårnet og de andre spændende seværdigheder, som Triumf Buen og Panteon – selv Sacre Coeur på den anden side af Seinen kunne ses i klart vejr. En vidunderlig følelse at spise morgenmad på den kølige nordvestvendte altan og at se solnedgangen og Eiffeltårnet lyse.

WiFi var der også i lejligheden og det fungerede hurtigt og stabilt.

Lejligheden ligger lige over for den store Montparnasse station med både RER- og 4 metrolinjer. I området er en masse spændende restauranter for enhver smag.  Rundt om hjørnet lå flere supermarkeder. 

Den kun 120 cm brede seng var lige lovlig smal til 2 personer. Havde der blot været en ekstra seng eller en sovesofa.

Vi var der på nogle dejlig varme sommerdage. Det betyder også varme nætter, og da kunne vi godt have ønsket os en bedre aircondition end den meget larmende ventilator og en lige så larmende aircooler/varmepumpe.

Lejligheden er som udgangspunkt i fin stand og nydeligt rengjort, men går man lidt tættere på, virker den lidt træt. Flere steder trængte til en opstramning, f.eks. stak der søm ud af panelet og dørhåndtag sad løst. Ting som let kan løses ved en gennemgang. Rykkede man lidt på sofaen kunne man se, at rengøringen havde glemt et støvsuge der.    

Alt i alt en pragtfuld oplevelse, selv på grund af de små skønhedsfejl. Og vi ville ikke være bange for at anbefale stedet og Brandan som vært.
column5:
We spent a week in the Eiffel Tower Tradition near the Montparnasse tower. And we enjoyed it to the full.

Our host Brandan is professional, very friendly and incredibly helpful. He has done a great deal of trouble in order that guests can get a good experience. In the apartment appeared a ”Housemanuel” with all practical information.

The apartment is a approx. 35 m2 Studio on 9 floor of a nice Parisian property, consisting of large living room, a nice bathroom, with a bath and a nice kitchen with everything needed. Ideal for 2 persons. 

The apartment is nicely furnished in old parisian empire style, with a sofa, a dining table, 4 chairs and a bed that could be turned up against the wall, so it does not take space when not in use.

The best, however, was the ca. 10m2 large secluded balcony. Wow, what a view over the parisian roofs and, not least, the Eiffel tower and the other fascinating sights, such as the Triumph Arch and the Pantheon – even the Sacre Coeur on the other side of the Seine river could be seen in clear weather. A wonderful feeling to have breakfast in the cool nordvestvendte the balcony to watch the sunset and the Eiffel tower light up.

WiFi was also in the apartment and it worked fast and stable.

The apartment is located right across the large Montparnasse station with both the RER and 4 metro lines. In the area are a lot of exciting restaurants to suit every taste. Around the corner lay several supermarkets. 

The only 120 cm wide bed was just legal narrow for 2 people. There had just been an extra bed or a sofa bed.

We were there on some nice hot summer days. It also means warm nights, and since we could well have wished for a better air conditioning than the very noisy fan and a just as noisy aircooler/heat pump.

The apartment is in good condition and nicely cleaned, but if you go a little closer, it seems a little tired. Several places needed a shakeup, f.ex. pricked nails out of the panel and the door handle was loose. Things that can be easily resolved by a review. Moved it a bit on the couch you could see that housekeeping had forgotten a vacuum there. 

All in all a wonderful experience, although because of the small blemishes. And we would not be afraid to recommend the site and Brandan as the host.

column1: To voksne og tre tenåringsbarn hadde det helt supert i Aurore sin flotte leilighet - vi var overveldet over fantastisk service og topp beliggenhet for å utforske Paris
column5: Two adults and three teenage children had it completely great in Aurore's lovely apartment - we were overwhelmed by the awesome service and top location for exploring Paris

column1:
Meget fin lejlighed , levede flot op til forventningerne. Nød rigtig meget gårdhaven i sommervarmen. 
Gårdhaven var delt med andre beboere, de var meget venlige og imødekommende. 
Værtsfamilien havde vi rigtig fin kommunikation med , de svarede meget hurtigt tilbage på mails . De var meget imødekommende og fleksible.
Fin og dejlig åben gade, ikke langt til skønt grønt område, fantastisk cafe lige overfor , hvor der var god stemning og rimelige priser.
column5:
Very nice apartment , lived well up to expectations. Enjoyed very much the patio in the summer heat. 
The patio was shared with other residents, they were very friendly and accommodating. 
The host family we had really nice communication with , they responded very quickly back to e-mails . They were very accommodating and flexible.
Fine and nice open street, not far to the wonderful green area, great cafe just across the street , where there was a good atmosphere and reasonable prices.

column1:
Rachael and Fabians lejlighed er en god rummelig lejlighed, og den direkte udgang til den lille gård giver en hyggelig spisekrog.
Det er nemt at kommunikere med Rachael og Fabian inden ankomst og vi fik grundig information om lejligheden og gode tips om cafeer, restauranter og indkøbs muligheder i nærområdet. Beliggenheden er fin i forhold til sightseeing og området spændende at lære at kende.
column5:
Rachael and fabian's apartment is a great spacious apartment and direct access to the small courtyard gives a cozy dining area.
It is easy to communicate with Rachael and Fabian prior to arrival and we got thorough information about the apartment and great tips on cafes, restaurants and shopping opportunities in the surrounding area. The location is fine in relation to sightseeing and the area interesting to get to know.

column1: Fin lejlighed med ok beliggenhed, en del af Paris man sjældent ser gode grønne områder og parker.
column5: Nice apartment with ok location, a part of Paris you rarely see good green areas and parks.

column1: I kan forvente en dejlig lejlighed i et område som emmer af liv, forskelligheder, forskellige minoriteter og atmosfære. Vi følte os på intet tidspunkt utryg eller lignende. Vi sætter pris på at opleve Paris fra flere sider - byen har mange lag. Ude området er et kæmpe + her indtog vi hver morgen morgenkaffen inden vi jagtede turistmålene.
column5: You can expect a nice apartment in an area full of life, diversity, different minorities and atmosphere. We felt at no time in the creepy or the like. We appreciate to discover Paris from several pages - the city has many layers. The outside area is a big + here, we took every morning a coffee before we chased the tourist destinations.

column1: vlotte samenwerking, nette kamer, rustige buurt, kleine badkamer met goede douche, goed bed, positieve ervaring, danku!
column5: good collaboration, nice room, quiet area, small bathroom with good shower, good bed, positive experience, thank you!

column1: Rigtig hyggelig lejlighed centralt i Marais. Helt perfekt til en forlænget weekend i Paris. Ren og pæn. Eneste minus var, at rengøringsdamen troede vi først ankom dagen efter, så der gik et par timer fra ankomst indtil vi kunne få nøgler.
column5: Really nice apartment centrally located in the Marais. Absolutely perfect for a long weekend in Paris. Clean and neat. Only minus was that the cleaning lady thought we first arrived the day after, so there went a few hours from arrival until we could get the keys.

column1: Vi synes lejligheden var charmerende og funktionel - alt var simpelthen i orden og vi kunne bruge ALT i lejligheden bl.a det det store musikudvalg. Værten Philippe var venlig, faktuel og saglig i sine informationer og desuden var alt praktisk beskrevet i en mappe. Vi satte stor pris på tagterrassen både morgen, middag og aften og vi nød den store stilhed når man trådte ind i gården væk fra al trafik. Nabolaget var spændende med både Les Canals og med Science center parken. Desuden var der let adgang til Metroen.
column5: We think the apartment was charming and functional - everything was simply alright and we could use EVERYTHING in the apartment bl.a it the great song selection. The host Philippe was friendly, factual and unbiased in its information and in addition everything was conveniently described in a folder. We appreciated the rooftop terrace both for breakfast and dinner and we enjoyed the great silence when the man stepped into the yard away from all the traffic. The neighborhood was exciting with both the Les Canals, and with the Science center park. In addition, there was easy access to the Metro.

column1: Stedet var meget hyggeligt og passer meget godt til et par. En rigtig flot indretning, især i stuen og soveværelset. Ligger meget tæt på indkøb, bager, gode spisesteder og metro (som fører dig til centrum på kort tid). For at vende fokus tilbage til lejligheden, så havde den desværre nogle mangler, som blandt andet var renligheden. Lejligheden føltes ikke særlig ren, med et ødelagt toiletsæde, forkalket brusehoved, beskidt bestik og tallerkener og køkken. Alt dette forværres af de mange fluer (bananfluer?) som sværmede i hele lejligheden, hvilket selvfølgelig forværre oplevelsen. Men jeg siger tak til Mattis for at lade os bo i hans lejlighed og stor tak til Mariano for hans varme velkomst!
column5: The place was very cozy and fits very well to a few. A really nice decor, especially in the living room and the bedroom. Located very close to shopping, bakery, good restaurants and the metro (which takes you to the centre in a short time). In order to turn the focus back to the apartment, so had the unfortunately, some shortcomings, which among other things was the cleanliness. The apartment felt not very clean, with a broken toilet seat, calcified shower head, dirty cutlery and crockery and kitchen. All of this is compounded by the many flies (fruit flies?) which swarmed in the entire apartment, which, of course, worsen the experience. But I say thank you to Mattis for letting us stay in his apartment and a big thank you to Mariano for his warm welcome!

column1: Som sagt: hun møtte meg ved ankomst og avreise. Beliggenheten, leiligheten svarte til beskrivelsen. Den var nøktern men komfortabel.
column5: That said, she met me upon arrival and departure. Location, the apartment matched the description. It was sober but comfortable.

column1:
Lejligheden var indbydende og hyggelig og passede fint til vores forventninger i forhold til beskrivelsen. Der var en god atmosfære, lyst og venligt, og det var dejligt at vende hjem til den lille oase efter lange ture i byen med kunstudstillinger. Soveværelse og badeværelse meget fint, også dejligt sofahjørne. Der var ikke så meget plads i køkkenet, og det var lidt klemt for os at spise, men vi klarede den.
Fin lille mappe med forslag til gode spisesteder og indkøbsmuligheder, den brugte vi.
Viceværten var venlig og hyggelig at snakke med.
Nabolaget er en blanding af velfungerende gader og snuskede, meget beskidte gader, så vi oplevede begge sider af det 18. arrondissement.
column5:
The apartment was welcoming and cosy and fitted perfectly to our expectations in relation to the description. There was a good atmosphere, bright and friendly, and it was nice to return home to the little oasis after long walks in the city with art exhibitions. Bedroom and bathroom very nice, also nice couches. There was not much space in the kitchen, and it was a little squeezed for us to eat, but we made it.
Nice little folder with suggestions for great dining and shopping options, the we used.
The caretaker was friendly and pleasant to talk with.
The neighborhood is a mix of smooth streets, and seedy, very dirty streets, so we saw both sides of it 18. district.

column1: Bernadette tog meget venligt imod os og gav os mange værdifulde oplysninger om nabolaget. Området er fint og ligger kun 5-10 minutter væk fra Sacra Cæur. Lejligheden fungerede godt for os. Vi var især glade for patioen, hvor vi hilste på venlige naboer hver dag.
column5: Bernadette took very friendly towards us and gave us many valuable information about the neighborhood. The area is fine and is just 5-10 minutes away from the Sacra Cæur. The apartment worked well for us. We were especially excited for the patio, where we greeted the friendly neighbors every day.

column1:
Det var en fantastisk oplevelse! Cristina og Matteo var begge super dygtige til at holde os opdateret omkring rejsen og boligen etc. Vi blev budt på kaffe da vi ankom og mødte Cristina, hvilket var dejligt. Værelset har det hele på lille plads, hvilket er meget imponerende - og havde den bedste beliggenhed mulig! Havde vi nogle spørgsmål skulle vi bare kontakte dem, og det hele fungerede problemfrit :) 
Min første rejse til Paris og det kunne ikke være et bedre sted at bo <3
column5:
It was a fantastic experience! Cristina and Matteo were both super skilled at keeping us updated about the journey and the tabernacle, etc. We were offered coffee when we arrived and met Cristina, which was nice. The room has it all in the small space, which is very impressive - and had the best location possible! We had some issues we should just contact them, and it all worked smoothly :) 
My first trip to Paris and it could not be a better place to live <3

column1: Vi havde en rigtig god oplevelse hos Sam. Lejligheden havde en super beliggenhed, meget centralt i forhold til seværdigheder, samt det offentlige. Det er helt sikkert ikke sidste gang vi er der!
column5: We had a very good experience with Sam. The apartment had a super location, very central to sights, as well as the public. It is definitely not the last time we are there!

column1:
Lejlighedens beliggenhed er fantastisk i midten af Marais kvarteret. Lejligheden er udstyret med alt det nødvendige køkkenudstyr til at man selv kan lave mad, vi brugte dog de omkringliggende cafeer og restauranter som der er masser af.
Der er en del larm fra nattelivet i gaden, som dog kun kan høres hvis vinduerne mod gaden er åbne.
Lejligheden er beliggende helt oppe under taget, og er svært tilgængelig hvis man er dårligt gående.
column5:
The apartment location is great in the middle of the Marais district. The apartment is equipped with all the necessary kitchen equipment to preparing food, we spent, however, the surrounding cafes and restaurants of which there are plenty of.
There is a part of noise from the nightlife in the street, which, however, can only be heard if the windows are facing the street is open.
The apartment is located right up under the roof, and is difficult to understand if one is bad walking.

column1:
Virkelig lækkert sted og meget centralt i Marais kvarteret. Der er en super god mad/cafe gade i den ene ende af Rue Mandar og i en anden ende er der barer, butikker og restauranter for alle budgetter.
lejligheden er fint indrettet og der er alt hvad man skal bruge - der er rent og pænt indrettet.
Eneste minus er at lejligheden ligger på 6 etage og kan være lidt hårdt efter en hel dags vandring i Paris, men til gengæld slipper man for larmen i gadeniveau og gør også lejligheden lysere.
column5:
Really nice place and very centrally located in the Marais district. There is a super good food/cafe street at one end of Rue Mandar and in a other end, there are bars, shops and restaurants for all budgets.
the apartment is nicely decorated and there is everything you need, clean and nicely decorated.
Only minus is that the apartment is on 6 floor and can be a little hard after a full day of hiking in Paris, but in return, you can avoid the noise of street level and also makes the apartment brighter.

column1: Super oplevelse... Dejlig lille lejlighed. Dejligt lokalt sted med massere af gode cafe'er og spisesteder. Kan anbefales
column5: Great experience... Lovely little apartment. Nice local place with lots of good cafe's and eateries. Can be recommended

column1: Boligen var fint beskrevet og billederne svarede fint overens med, hvordan lejligheden faktisk ser ud.
column5: The accommodation was very well described and the pictures were very consistent with how the apartment actually looks like.

column1: Lejligheden ligger i et fantastisk område. Her vil vi gerne tilbage til
column5: The apartment is located in a great area. Here we would like to return to the

column1:
Min datter og jeg har lige tilbragt nogle vidunderlige dage i Paris og boede i denne skønne lille penthouse lejlighed på Mont Marte hos Guillaume.
Beliggenheden er perfekt, med blandt andet Sacre Cour og Moulin Rouge lige i nærheden. En dejlig caffe latte og croisant er altid inden for rækkevidde. Lækkert bageri 2 minutters afstand.  Vinbarer, barer, restauranter af alle slags er i nærheden.
Det tager 7 minutter at gå fra Gare du Nord. Metro er også få minutter derfra.
Lejligheden havde det vi havde brug for. Den er lys, og skønt at kunne åbne ud til de franske altaner. Udsigten over tagene med deres flotte skorstene er vidunderlig. Der var rent og pænt overalt.
Guillaume var hele vejen meget informativ, om hvilke transportmuligheder der var, hvor man kan spise etc. Værten selv var udenlands, men havde arrangeret at en ven kom og lukkede os ind.
Undervejs mailede han flere gange for at høre, om nu alt var som det skulle. Guillaume er en omsorgsfuld vært, og vi vil rigtig gerne bo hos ham igen. 
Vi giver Guillaume de bedste anbefalinger :)
column5:
My daughter and I have just spent some wonderful days in Paris and stayed in this lovely small penthouse apartment in Mont Marte with Guillaume.
The location is perfect, among other things, the Sacre Cour and the Moulin Rouge nearby. A nice caffe latte and croisant is always within reach. Delicious bakery 2 minutes away. Wine bars, bars, restaurants of all kinds are nearby.
It takes 7 minutes to walk from the Gare du Nord. Metro is also few minutes away.
The apartment had what we needed. It is light, and great to be able to open, in addition to the French balconies. The view over the roofs with their beautiful chimneys is wonderful. It was clean and comfy.
Guillaume was all the way very informative, about what transportation options were, where to eat etc. The host himself was abroad, but had arranged that a friend came and closed us in.
Along the way, emailed several times to hear, for now everything was as it should. Guillaume is a caring host, and we would really like to stay with him again. 
We give Guillaume the best recommendations :)

column1: Alt var som beskrevet, eller ligefrem bedre. Sebastien er en god og opmærksom vært, som gør sit yderste for, at vi som gæster skal føle os velkomne. Den perfekte vært. Jeg vil særligt fremhæve kommunikationen med Sebastien; vi kommunikerede pr mail før, under og ved afslutning af ophold, og det fungerede perfekt og gjorde os trygge. Sebastien havde masser af god information at dele med os, bl.a. om restauranter og indkøbsmuligheder i kvarteret. Vi fik tilsendt user guide til lejligheden, og det var meget nyttigt. Vi fandt lejligheden hyggelig, lys og behagelig at være I. Vi nød vores ophold i lejligheden og vil helt bestemt forsøge at bo i Sebastiens lejlighed, næste gang turen går til Paris. Kvarteret er perfekt at bo i for os. Mange restauranter, cafeer, specialbutikker og modebutikker. Alt hvad vi kunne ønske os og i rolige omgivelser uden støjende trafik. Vi har kun gode ting at sige om lejligheden, Sebatien og kvarteret.
column5: Everything was as described or even better. Sebastien is a good and attentive host, who will do their utmost to ensure that we as guests need to feel welcome. The perfect host. I will highlight in particular the communication with Sebastien; we communicated via email before, during, and at the end of the stay, and it worked perfectly and made us comfortable. Sebastien had plenty of good information to share with us, bl.a. restaurants and shopping facilities in the neighbourhood. We were sent a user guide to the apartment, and it was very helpful. We found the apartment bright, cozy and comfortable to be I. We enjoyed our stay in the apartment and will definitely try to stay in Sebastiens apartment, next trip to Paris. The neighbourhood is perfect to stay in for us. Many restaurants, cafes, specialty shops and boutiques. Everything we could wish for and in a quiet environment, without noisy traffic. We have only good things to say about the apartment, Sebatien and the neighborhood.

column1:
Rigtig fin parisisk lejlighed, der ligger rigtig fint i forhold til seværdigheder. Lejligheden er hyggelig og rummelig.

Området føles en smule usikkert, men vi oplevede dog intet ubehageligt. Der er til gengæld masser af lækre cafeer og restauranter i gå afstand.

Siriac var hurtig på tasterne og svarede altid hurtigt på vores henvendelser.
column5:
Really nice parisian apartment, located very well in relation to the sights. The apartment is cozy and spacious.

The area feels a bit unsafe, but however, we saw nothing unpleasant. In contrast, there are plenty of delicious cafes and restaurants in walking distance.

Siriac was quick on the keys and responded always promptly to our inquiries.

column1: Alains ven Omar viste os lejligheden og var meget venlig. Beliggenheden var perfekt, og lejligheden var hyggelig, men meget lille. Der er ikke dør imellem køkken og wc. Prisen var lidt i den høje ende.
column5: Alains friend Omar showed us the apartment and was very friendly. The location was perfect and the apartment was cozy, but very small. There is no door between the kitchen and the wc. The price was a little on the high end.

column1: Lejligheden levede fuldt op til forventninger ifht beskrivelse og billeder. Kommunikationen med udlejer var rigtig god og alt forløb som ønsket. Lejligheden super med børn men turen til centrum var en smule lang. Alt i alt en super oplevelse og vi kan kun anbefale dette sted til andre.
column5: The apartment fully lived up to expectations compared to description and pictures. Communication with the landlord was really good and everything went as desired. The apartment is super with children, but the trip to the center was a bit long. All in all a super experience and we can only recommend this place to others.

column1: Super service fra Virginie. Pæn, ren og rummelig lejlighed til 4 personer. Centralt beliggende - vi kunne gå til mange af attraktionerne, så som Louvre, Notre Dame, Triumfbuen mm. Restauranter, cafeer, supermarked og bager lige uden for døren. Få hundrede meter til 3 forskellige metrostationer. Lejligheden kan meget anbefales, hvis man kan klare at gå op på 4. sal.
column5: Super service from Virginie. Nice, clean and spacious apartment for 4 persons. Centrally located - we could walk to many attractions such as the Louvre, Notre Dame, arc de Triomphe etc. Restaurants, cafes, supermarket and bakery just outside the door. A few hundred metres of 3 different metro stops. The apartment can be highly recommended if you can manage to go up to 4. floor.

column1: Vi ble møtt av Adele, som viste oss rundt i Studioet. Koselig, med alt du trenger for å være en uke i Paris, og en kjempegod seng. Hyggelig område med masse småkafeer. Kort veg til Temple metrostasjon, og Republic med mange linjer. Gå-avstand til til Notre Dame,ca. 10 min. Rolig område, men litt støy fra Bistroen i samme bygget, i helgen. Alt i alt et flott opphold. Paris er en koselig by som kan by på mye. Da vi låste oss ute fra leiligheten, kom Adele og Benoit for å låse oss inn igjen, og var blide og hyggelige.
column5: We were met by Adele, who showed us around in the Studio. Cosy, with everything you need to be a week in Paris, and a great bed. Nice area with lots of småkafeer. A short way to the Temple metro station, the Republic with many lines. Walking distance to Notre Dame,ca. 10 min. Quiet area, but a bit of noise from the Bistro in the same building, in the weekend. All in all a great stay. Paris is a nice city that can offer much. When we locked us out from the apartment, came Adele and Benoit to lock us in again, and was cheerful and pleasant.

column1:
Denne lejlighed er lille, men utroligt velindrettet, så den virker langt større og er helt perfekt for 2 personer. Derudover ligger lejligheden i et af de bedste kvarterer i Paris. Masser af små hyggelige butikker og ikke mindst gode og rimelige restauranter lige rundt om hjørnet. Et perfekt udgangspunkt for nogle gode dage i Paris.
Vi mødte ikke Benoit, da det var Sheila (rengøringshjælp) der tog imod, men det fungerede helt fint, og Benoit var hurtig til at svare via Airbnb's hjemmeside. Alt i alt et perfekt ophold i Paris :-)
column5:
This apartment is small, but incredibly well-appointed, so it seems much bigger and is absolutely perfect for 2 persons. In addition, the apartment in one of the best neighbourhoods in Paris. Lots of small shops and, not least, good and reasonable restaurants just around the corner. A perfect base for some great days in Paris.
We did not meet Benoit, as it was Sheila (cleaning services) who rail against, but it worked perfectly fine, and Benoit was quick to respond via Airbnb's website. All in all a perfect stay in Paris :-)

column1: Praktisk og fin leilighet for to, i et veldig fint og sentralt område! Godt renhold og lett å komme i kontakt med verten. Anbefales!
column5: Convenient and nice apartment for two, in a very nice and central area! Good cleaning and easy to get in contact with the host. Recommended!

column1: God lejlighed med en meget central beliggenhed i et spændende kvarter. Lejligheden er lille, men utroligt godt indrettet. Lejligheden har alle nødvendige faciliteter (selvom der efterhånden er lidt service, der mangler). OBS: Der kan godt være lidt gadestøj i weekenden, da der er mange gode restauranter og cafeer i nærheden. Vi vil absolut anbefale Benoits lejlighed til skønne smutture til Paris.
column5: Good apartment with a very central location in an exciting neighborhood. The apartment is small, but incredibly well decorated. The apartment has all necessary facilities (although there is some service that is missing). NOTE: There may well be a little street noise in the weekend, because there are many good restaurants and cafes nearby. We would definitely recommend the Benoits apartment to lovely smutture to Paris.

column1:
Denne charmerende lejlighed har en perfekt beliggenhed. At man kan bo så fredeligt - endda med egen have - midt i Paris, var for os en fantastisk oplevelse. Vi nød vores ophold i fulde drag.
Humfred er en god vært, særdeles hjælpsom og nem at kommunikere med.
column5:
This charming apartment has a perfect location. That one can live so peacefully - even with private garden in the heart of Paris, was for us a great experience. We enjoyed our stay to the full.
Robert is a good host, very helpful and easy to communicate with.

column1: En forlænget weekend i Paris med teenage datter, fik hos Nancy og Massimo en skøn base, dels at tage udgangspunkt i om morgenen, og dels vende tilbage til efter en oplevelsesrig dag i Paris's gader. Begge følte vi os meget godt tilpas i stuen i Nancy og Massimos lille lejlighed. Som at være hjemme. De er afsindig rare og meget umiddelbare mennesker. Området omkring lejligheden er hyggeligt med både gode restauranter og indkøbsmuligheder. Tak for denne gang. Vi vender meget gerne tilbage igen.
column5: A long weekend in Paris with a teenage daughter, was at Nancy and Massimo a wonderful base, partly to take the starting point in the morning, and partly to return to after a busy day in the Paris's streets. Both we felt us very comfortable in the living room of Nancy and Massimos small apartment. Like being at home. They are incredibly rare and very choice people. The area around the apartment is cozy with good restaurants and shopping. Thank you for this time. We will very much like to return again.

column1:
Lejligheden er perfekt beliggende i et roligt kvarter med et lille torv og masser  af små bistroer, vinbarer og unikabutikker 2 min væk. Tæt på metro og ren og ryddelig. Køkkenet er mere end godt udstyret.
Vittorio sørger for at alt er klart, er punktlig og klar i sin kommunikation og sørger for, at det er nemt at finde vej helt fra lufthavnen. Perfekt.
column5:
The apartment is perfectly located in a quiet neighborhood with a small square and lots of small bistros, wine bars and unikabutikker 2 min away. Close to the metro and clean and tidy. The kitchen is more than well equipped.
Vittorio makes sure that everything is clear, punctual and clear in his communication and to ensure that it is easy to find the way from the airport. Perfect.

column1:
Vittorio sendte rigtig god information information vedr. lejlighed, hvordan man kommer dertil, telefonnr. til Taxi og pris til/fra lufthavn.
Desuden var det helt ukompliceret at ankomme sent, hvilket var dejligt.
Lejligheden er rigtig hyggelig og var godt rengjort og den er meget veludstyret, hvilket gør at man føler sig velkommen.
Vi boede 4 veninder og Vittorio havde sørget for at rede op i 4 'single-beds'. Det fungerer godt med 2 værelser til 4 personer.
Lejligheden ligger virkelig godt ift. restauranter, indkøb og meget kort til metro, men også i gå-afstand til centrum.
Vi kan virkelig anbefale lejligheden :-)
column5:
Vittorio sent really good information for information regarding. apartment, how to get there, phone number. to Taxi and the price to/from airport.
Moreover, it was completely uncomplicated to arrive late, which was nice.
The apartment is really nice and was well cleaned and it is very well equipped, which makes you feel welcome.
We were 4 girlfriends and Vittorio had arranged for the nest up into 4 single-beds'. It works well with 2 rooms for 4 persons.
The apartment is really nice clean. restaurants, shopping, and very short to metro but also within walking distance to the city centre.
We can really recommend the apartment :-)

column1: Sensatinell
column5: Sensatinell

column1: Virkelig dejlig autentisk fransk lejlighed i super dejligt område. Gode anbefalinger fra værten. Alt i alt et perfekt ophold.
column5: Really nice authentic French apartment in a super nice area. Good recommendations from the host. All in all a perfect stay.

column1: Vittorios lejlighed er meget autentisk og charmerende. En lille taglejlighed med en meget smal trappe op. Hyggeligt indrettet med bøger og postkort.  Man sover fint, der er utrolig stille, fordi den ligger langt inde i en gård. Beliggenheden er i top tæt på charmerende torv med restauranter, tæt på metro og i gåafstand til rigtig mange seværdigheder. Vittorio er en rigtig god vært: hurtig til at svare, hjælpsom og med mange gode tips. Vær opmærksom på, at der ikke er andre steder at slappe af end i sengene. Ved spisebordet sidder man på skamler. Jeg vil varmt anbefale Vittorios lejlighed pga. charme og beliggenhed.
column5: Vittorios apartment is very authentic and charming. A small penthouse with a very narrow stairway up. Decorated with books and postcards. You sleep fine, that is incredibly quiet because it is located far inland in a farm. The location is top-close to the charming square with restaurants, close to metro and in walking distance to many sights. Vittorio is a great host: quick to respond, helpful and with many good tips. Please be aware that there are other places to relax than in the beds. At the dining table sitting on stools. I would highly recommend Vittorios apartment pga. charm and location.

column1: Lille simpel og kompakt lejlighed i et dejligt område. Lejligheden er ren og relativ stille. Den er en smule for lille men den er billig og ligger rigtigt godt.
column5: Small simple and compact apartment in a nice area. The apartment is clean and relatively quiet. It is a bit too small but it is cheap and is really good.

column1: 이곳은 위협적인 분위기의 좁고 더러운 거리에 위치해있다. 사진과 다르게. 실제 집은 좁고 청결하지 않다. 엘리베이터가 없이 5층까지 좁은계단을 올라가야 하고, 화장실문은 제대로 닫히지 않으며, 보일러소음으로 잠들기 힘들었다. 소파베드는 낡아서 부러질듯 위태로왔다. 거실창문은 잘 잠궈지지않아서 바람에 계속 열리고, 주방의 식기와 컵은 세척이 제대로 안되어 얼룩이 묻어있고 깨어진게 많았다. 버려진 식기를 가져다놓은 느낌이 들었다. 호스트는 직접 오지않았고 동료가 왔다. 친절하긴 했지만 체크인 약속시간보다 늦어서 우리는 위협적인 거리에서 기다려야했다.
column5: This is a threat to the atmosphere of the narrow and dirty streets. The photo differently. The actual house is narrow and not clean. There is no Elevator in this 5 floor up narrow stairs to climb, the bathroom door does not close properly, and the boiler noise with falling asleep was hard. Sofa bed is old but I be at risk. Living room Windows are well locked, not from the wind, keep in heat, and kitchen utensils and cups are washed properly and the inside is stained and broken so many did. Abandoned restaurant to bring your felt. The host comes directly not and colleagues. Friendly, but check-in time late in the game we are a threat in the street had to wait.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed endnu pænere i virkeligheden end på billeder! Det hyggeligste kvarter og ca 1-2 minutters gågang fra metroen!
column5: Lovely apartment-even nicer in reality than on the pictures! The friendliest neighbourhood and about 1-2 minutes walk from the subway!

column1: Fantastisk beliggenhet i Montmartre! Og rolig og stille strøk. Leiligheten ligger rett ved privat eiendom med egne porter.
column5: Fantastic location in Montmartre! And calm and quiet neighbourhood. The apartment is located right next to private property with own ports.

column1:
Vi havde fået en god beskrivelse af, hvordan vi fandt lejligheden, og hvordan vi skulle komme ind med koder til dør og nøgleboks. Det var vores første erfaring med Airbnb, så vi var lidt nervøse. 
Christophe kom og hilste på os den første aften og viste os hvordan tv-et virkede, fortalte lidt om lejligheden og kvarteret, og vi havde en fornemmelse af at vi kunne kontakte ham, hvis der var spørgsmål. Folk vi mødte i opgangen var venlige og imødekommende. 
Lejligheden var lille, men der var rent og pænt, og stort set hvad vi skulle bruge. Vi manglede en stegepande og kunne ikke få komfur og emhætte til at fungere. Som Christophe ganske rigtigt fortalte, var kvarteret fyldt med delikatesseforretninger med mad lige til at putte i mikroovnen, så det benyttede vi os af. Vaskemaskine og opvaskemaskine som var i lejligheden havde vi ikke brug for, da vi kun var der 5 overnatninger.
Det var dejlig fleksibelt med ind- og udtjekningstidspunkter. Vi kunne sætte bagagen på et loftsrum og lægge nøglen i postkassen ved afrejsen. 
Sengen var god, hvilket vi satte stor pris på.
At lejligheden lå på 5. sal uden elevator, tog vi som en udfordring og jokede med at vi fik ekstra motion. Det kunne dog være en vigtig oplysning for nogen at kunne tage med i overvejelserne. 
Vi var meget glade for kvarteret, og lejlighedens beliggenhed var perfekt til det vi gerne ville opleve i Paris. Vi kunne gå til det meste.
column5:
We had gotten a good description of how we found the apartment, and how we should come in with codes for door and key safe. It was our first experience with Airbnb, so we were a little nervous. 
Christophe came and greeted us the first evening and showed us how the tv worked, talked a bit about the apartment and the neighborhood, and we had a feeling that we could contact him if there were questions. The people we met in the hallway was friendly and accommodating. 
The apartment was small, but was clean and neat, and basically what we should use. We were missing a frying pan and could not get the stove and hood to work. As Christophe has quite rightly told, was the neighborhood filled with delis with the food just to put in the microwave, so it took we us of. Washing machine and dishwasher which was in the apartment, we had no use for, since we were only there 5 nights.
It was nice, flexible with check - in and check-out times. We could put the luggage in an attic and put the key in the mailbox upon departure. 
The bed was good, which we appreciated.
That the apartment was on the 5. floor without elevator, we took as a challenge and joked that we got the extra exercise. However, it could be a important information for anybody to take into consideration. 
We were very happy for the neighborhood, and the apartment's location was perfect for what we wanted to experience in Paris. We could go to the most.

column1: Benedicte er en fantastisk værtinde. Hun havde sørget for at alt var helt i top. Boligen ligger i et skønt område af Paris, hvor man oplever det autentiske Paris. Vi vender meget gerne tilbage til denne bolig.
column5: Benedicte is a great hostess. She had made sure that everything was absolutely top notch. The residence is located in a wonderful area of Paris where you can experience the authentic Paris. We will very much like to return to this accommodation.

column1:
Super Studielejelighed centralt beliggende i Paris! Alain var venlig og imødekommende - og kom forbi morgenen efter vi var ankommet, hvor vi fik en masse gode råd om Paris.

Kan klart anbefale denne lejlighed til andre!
column5:
Super Studielejelighed centrally located in Paris! Alain was friendly and accommodating and came by the morning after we had arrived, where we got a lot of good advice about Paris.

Can clearly recommend this apartment to others!

column1: Marie-Pierre er en god og venlig vært. Marie- Pierre havde lavet en nøjagtig beskrivelse, hvordan vi fandt fra lufthavnen til lejligheden og hvordan vi fik nøgle, hvilket var nemt. Hun var ivrigt åben for spørgsmål. Lejligheden ligger perfekt i centrum af Paris, men på en stille gade. Lejligheden var ren og hyggelig på 5 etage, hvilket også betød at vi havde en frisk brise. Vi nød at være i lejligheden og slappede af, som var vi hjemme. Vi vil helt klart anbefale Marie-Pierre og hendes lejlighed til andre.
column5: Marie-Pierre is a good and friendly host. Marie - Pierre had made an accurate description of how we took from the airport to the apartment and how we got the key, which was easy. She was eagerly open to question. The apartment is perfectly situated in the centre of Paris, but on a quiet street. The apartment was clean and cozy on the 5 floor, which also meant that we had a fresh breeze. We enjoyed being in the apartment and relaxed, as we were at home. We will definitely recommend Marie-Pierre and her apartment to others.

column1: Skøn lejlighed. Beliggende i det bedste og mest hyggelige kvarter i Paris. Alt fungerede optimalt, og Charlie tog godt imod os og gav gode tips, så bastilledagen blev en rigtig sjov festdag for os.
column5: Great apartment. Located in the best and most pleasant neighbourhood in Paris. Everything functioned optimally, and Charlie took good care of us and gave good tips, so bastilledagen was a really fun day of celebration for us.

column1:
Vores vært fik os til at føle os godt tilpas med det samme.
Vi fik en fin og udførlig introduktion til Paris og især Marais kvarteret og dets museer, butikker, restauranter og hyggelige steder. Denne introduktion havde vi meget glæde af under opholdet. Vi nød Place des Vosges, Picassomuseet, gaderne og de gratis museer mm. 
Vi kommer gerne igen og kan bestemt anbefale stedet og Charlie som vært.
Hanne og Bent
column5:
Our host made us feel comfortable with the same.
We got a fine and comprehensive introduction to Paris, especially the Marais district, its museums, shops, restaurants and cosy places. This introduction had we much to the delight of during your stay. We enjoyed the Place des Vosges, the picasso museum, the streets and the free museums etc. 
We will gladly come again and can definitely recommend the place and Charlie as the host.
Hanne and Bent

column1: Celine fikk meg og min søster til å føle oss velkomne fra første stund, med hyggelige og gjestfrie mails fra start til slutt. Celine hadde ikke mulighet til å være tilstede da vi ankom leiligheten, grunnet vår sene ankomst, men takket være hennes meget grundige og velbeskrevne veibeskrivelse var vår vei fra lufthavn til leilighet ingen problem. Beliggenheten var enda mer perfekt enn hva vi hadde forestilt oss. Leiligheten ligger i en veldig hyggelig sidegate til Rue Beaubourg, en større hovedgate hvor man lett kan finne både metro og blant annet Pompidou. Man kan på få minutter gå til turistede områder og se alle de nydelige attraksjonene i Paris, vi gikk nesten til alt - tok kun metroen hjem om aftenen da vi var slitne etter en hel dag med aktivitet. Metrosystemet er veldig enkelt, og det er metrostasjoner overalt, som tar deg hele veien hjem til leiligheten. Vil kun gi min varmeste anbefalning - Celine, leilighetens beliggenhet og nydelige Paris gjør kun at vi allered lengter tilbake.
column5: Celine made me and my sister to feel welcome from the first moment, with a pleasant and hospitable mails from start to finish. Celine had not the opportunity to be present when we arrived at the apartment, due to our late arrival, but thanks to her very thorough and velbeskrevne directions was our way from the airport to the apartment no problem. The location was even more perfect than what we had imagined. The apartment is located in a very pleasant side street of Rue Beaubourg, a larger main street where one can easily find both the metro and including the Pompidou. One can in minutes go to turistede areas and see all of the beautiful attractions in Paris, we walked almost to all - only took the metro home in the evening when we were tired after a full day of activity. Metrosystemet is very simple, and there are metro stations everywhere, which takes you all the way home to the apartment. Will only give my warmest anbefalning - Celine, apartment, the location and the lovely Paris doing just that, we allered long back.

column1: Lejligheden har en fantastisk placering i skønne Montmatre tæt på cafeer, butikker og metro. Helt fantastisk charmerende lejlighed med udsigt over Paris tage og de største seværdigheder.
column5: The apartment has a fantastic location in beautiful Montmartre, close to cafes, shops and metro. Absolutely amazing charming apartment with view over Paris roofs and the main sights.

column1: Vi har kun positive ting at fortælle om vores ophold. Kommunikation med værten foregik via SMS og mail, og overdragelse af nøglen til lejligheden gik uden problemer. Lejlighedens stand er ok, det eneste man kunne savne var en bedre udsigt, da lejligheden ligger med alle vinduer til baggården. Lejligheden ligger godt placeret i det centrale Montmartre og kun 3 minutters  gang fra den nærmeste metrostation. Tætteste seværdighed er Sacré-Cœur. Området er ikke særligt turistet og der er masser af indkøbs muligheder.
column5: We have only positive things to tell about our stay. Communication with the host was via TEXT message and email, and the transfer of the key to the apartment went without any problems. The condition of the apartment is ok, the only thing you could miss was a better view, as the apartment is with all the windows to the backyard. The apartment is located in the centre of Montmartre and only a 3-minute walk from the nearest metro station. Closest attraction is the basilica of the Sacré-Cœur. The area is not particularly touristy and there are plenty of shopping opportunities.

column1:
Fantastisk beliggenhed midt i latinerkvarteret i Paris!
Meget bolig for pengene!!
Lejligheden ligger i en stille sidegade, men lige rundt om hjørnet har du adgang til latinerkvarteret og metro.
Rigtig fin og detaljeret beskrivelse af, hvordan man fandt frem til lejligheden.
Alvin var super fleksibel mht. ankomst og afrejsetidspunkt og svarede meget hurtigt på forespørgsler om restauranter, caféer osv. undervejs.  Anbefaler denne bolig og vil selv booke her, næste gang vi skal til Paris.
column5:
Great location in the heart of the Latin quarter in Paris!
Much home for the money!!
The apartment is located in a quiet side street, but just around the corner you have access to the Latin quarter and the metro.
Very fine and detailed description of how they found the apartment.
Alvin was super flexible mht. arrival and departure and responded very quickly to queries about restaurants, cafes, etc. along the way. Recommend this accommodation and will even book here the next time we go to Paris.

column1: Vores vært var super venlig og hjælpsom både før og under opholdet! Lejligheden er helt fantastisk og vores forventninger blev indfriet i langt større grad end vi havde troet muligt! En perle i den mest fantastiske bydel i Paris!
column5: Our host was super friendly and helpful both before and during the stay! The apartment is absolutely fantastic and our expectations were met to a far greater extent than we had thought possible! A gem in the most amazing town in Paris!

column1: Dette var anden gang vi lejede lejligheden. Opholdet var fedt, beliggenhed perfekt, tjah, alt er perfekt i denne lejlighed. Ikke sidste gang vi tager derned.
column5: This was the second time we rented the apartment. The stay was great, location perfect, well, everything is perfect in this apartment. Not the last time we visit.

column1: Stor fin leilighet med godt lys og fine luftemuligheter. Velutstyrt kjøkken og baderom, rolige soverom mot bakgården og fin stor stue. Vi likte at hjemmet så bebodd ut - det ga en koselig og varm atmosfære. Veldig hyggelig og imøtekommende vertinne og ingen problemer eller vanskeligheter. Fint kvartal og nært til busser og metro.  Vi er veldig fornøyde med vårt oppehold.
column5: Big, nice apartment with good light and fine luftemuligheter. Well-equipped kitchen and bathroom, quiet bedroom facing the backyard and nice large living room. We liked that the home so inhabited out - it gave a cosy and warm atmosphere. Very nice and attentive hostess and no problems or difficulties. Nice quarter and close to buses and metro. We are very pleased with our oppehold.

column1: Fabrices lejlighed ligger super godt i gå-afstand fra Marais og meget tæt på metrostationer. Lejligheden er ren og hyggelig og kan klart anbefales til dem, der ikke har tænkt sig at opholde sig så meget i lejligheden under deres ophold. Døren til badeværelset er i soveværelset, så der er  lidt gennemgang en gang imellem, men Fabrice er rigtig god til at tage hensyn.
column5: Fabrices apartment is very nice, within walking distance from the Marais and very close to metro stations. The apartment is clean and cosy and is definitely recommended for those who do not intend to reside so much in the apartment during their stay. The door to the bathroom is in the bedroom, so there is a little review from time to time, but Fabrice is really good to take into consideration.

column1:
Vi havde en rigtig god ferie i Paris denne sommer - en hyggelig lille hybel, hvor vi straks følte os hjemme. Beliggenheden er rigtig fin på en lille, stille sidegade i et godt kvarter, med alt hvad man behøver lige i nærheden. Alt kommunikation med Cerise foregik rigtig fint, vi mødtes ikke, men alt fungerede godt. Good value for Money, kan anbefales!
Tip: Forvent ikke at kunne parkere i nærheden, vi lejede en plads i en parkeringskælder i nærheden i en uge for ca. kr. 350, og kom rundt med metro. Det kræver lidt ommøblering, når man skal spise, når man er 4 - men det går. NB: Undgå (Website hidden by Airbnb) de tager overpriser.
column5:
We had a really good holiday in Paris this summer - a nice little digs, where we immediately felt at home. The location is really nice on a small, quiet side street in a good neighborhood, with everything you need right nearby. All communication with the Cerise was going on really fine, we did not meet, but everything worked well. Good value for Money, recommended!
Tip: don't Expect to be able to park nearby, we rented a space in an underground car park nearby in a week for approx. kr. 350, and getting around with the metro. It requires a bit of rearrangement, when to eat, when you are 4 - but it is. NB: to Avoid (Website hidden by Airbnb) are overpricing.

column1: Helt unik lejlighed i det centrale Paris, dejlig stille om aftenen, kan varmt anbefales!
column5: Unique apartment in central Paris, lovely quiet evening, highly recommended!

column1: Hyggelig lejlighed i et fantastisk kvarter! Helt sikkert en lejlighed, vi vil komme tilbage til. Jeff gjorde meget ud af at sikre, at vi fik en god start på vores ferie - og ankomst og afgangstidspunkterne blev bestemt ud fra VORES ønsker og behov.
column5: Cosy apartment in a fantastic neighbourhood! Definitely an apartment we will come back to. Jeff did much to ensure that we got a good start on our holiday and arrival, and afgangstidspunkterne was determined OUR wants and needs.

column1: Jeff var god til at sende instrukser om metro, tog og gode spisesteder, så snart man bookede værelset. Værelset ligger rigtig centralt og indeholder alt det, man har brug for. Eneste minus er, at den ligger højt oppe (6. sal), og det er langt, når man har gået rundt i byen hele dagen.
column5: Jeff was good to send instructions on the metro, trains and good restaurants, as soon as you booked the room. The room is located really centrally located and contains everything you need. Only minus is that it is high up (6. floor), and it is far when you've gone around the city throughout the day.

column1: 房子在小巴黎老城区,周围安静,离地铁200米的样子,交通方便,距离中国城belleville很近｡房东人很好,晚上9点多等我们入住,还帮我们调中国台｡房子很漂亮很干净,值得再次入住
column5: House in Little Paris of the Old Town,quiet surrounding,away from the Metro 200 meters to look,the traffic is convenient,the distance from China Town belleville is near the House. The landlord people are very nice,the evening 9 points and so we stay,also to help us tune in China. The house is very nice and very clean,worth to stay again

column1: Dejlig autentisk lejlighed i et skønt og meget centralt kvarter.
column5: Nice authentic apartment in a lovely and very central neighbourhood.

column1: Vi havde 5 dejlige dage i Florence og Massimos lejlighed, hvor vi blev meget varmt modtaget og rundvist. Florence havde mange gode tips til at udforske området. Noget var allerede fremsendt inden afrejsen og andet hørte vi om. Lejligheden var ren, meget rummelig til os 5 personer og med dejlig lys indretning, veludstyret køkken og ikke mindst masser af rejsebøger og kunstbøger til inspiration i Paris. Lejlighedens beliggenhed kan ikke være bedre med få minutters gang til metro på centrale linjer og med masser af hyggelige og forskelligartede restauranter indenfor 500 meters afstand. Meget hyggelig gade med rigtig pariser stemning. Vi kan på det varmeste anbefale denne bolig.
column5: We had 5 lovely days in Florence and Massimos apartment, where we were very warmly received and rundqvist. Florence had many good tips to explore the area. Something was already transmitted before departure and in the second we heard about. The apartment was clean, very spacious for us 5 persons and with a lovely bright décor, a well-equipped kitchen and, not least, plenty of travel books and art books for inspiration in Paris. The apartment's location can't be better with a few minutes ' walk to metro on central lines and with plenty of friendly and varied restaurants within 500 meters distance. Very nice street with a great parisian atmosphere. We can warmly recommend this accommodation.

column1: 房子的位置非常好,街区安全,交通便利,周围各式商店一应俱全｡lsabelle漂亮又暖心,给我们提供了很多建议和帮助,一周的巴黎之旅非常顺利!
column5: The House location is very good,the neighborhoods safe,the transportation is convenient,the surrounding shops galore and great views. lsabelle nice and warm heart,gave us many advice and help,one week trip to Paris went very smoothly!

column1: 很高兴的可以住在Isabelle的Studio｡这个八月的20天里,我和我8岁的儿子一直都住的十分习惯而舒适｡这是一个去巴黎任何博物馆或者景点或者机场火车站都十分便捷的住所｡我和我儿子经常就是步行到城市的各个景点和博物馆｡附近的M7可以让你快速到达任何地方｡住所门口的27路可以让你一辆公车就直接到塞纳河,奥赛博物馆,卢浮宫,火车站等等｡所以这次,我和儿子可以第一批进入卢浮宫参观,可以顺利坐上早上7点多的火车｡住所附近吃的也十分多｡偷懒可以楼下挑一家猫途鹰推荐的餐馆吃,知名的可丽饼店就在出门左手边的路上,不过每天都是排长队哟,附近中餐馆也是性价比很高的｡如果是中国胃,那也是很方便在住所附近的集市或者超市或者鱼店肉店买到最合适和美味新鲜的食材,自己带回家烹饪｡住所内部可以这样形容吧:麻雀虽小,五脏俱全｡在20天巴黎的日常生活中,我们就是感觉住在家里,睡觉的沙发床很舒服,厨房设备齐全,洗手间干净明亮｡总之,很感谢Isabelle的Studio,让我和儿子在巴黎的每一天都觉得很舒适而温馨｡另外,入住十分方便^* 下次在巴黎,我会仍然选择这里!
column5: Glad to be a stay at Isabelle's Studio apartment. This August the 20 day,me and my 8-year-old son have been living very accustomed and comfortable apartment. This is the one to go to Paris, any Museum or attractions or the airport train station are very convenient in the shelter house. Me and my boy often is a walk to the city's various sights and museums and great views. In the vicinity of the M7 allows you to quickly reach any place of the House. Accommodation the entrance of the 27 road can get you a bus direct to the Louvre,the Orsay Museum,the Louvre,the train station etc. apartment. So this time,my son and I can be the first batch to enter the Louvre to visit,you can successfully get on in the morning 7 points more than the train's. Accommodation near eat is also very much available. Slacking can be the downstairs to pick a cat Great Eagle recommended restaurants to eat,the famous crepes store in the out the left hand side of the road,but every day is a long queue Yo,near the Chinese restaurant is also very high. If China is the stomach,it is also very convenient in the neighborhood Bazaar or supermarket or fish shop, meat shop to buy the most suitable and tasty fresh ingredients,their own home cooking area. Shelter interior can thus describe it:a Sparrow is small,perfectly formed apartment. In 20 days the Paris of everyday life,we feel a stay at home,sleep on a sofa bed very comfortable,kitchen fully equipped,bathroom clean and bright apartment. In short,very grateful for Isabelle's Studio,so my son and I in Paris every day but very comfortable and cosy apartment. In addition,check-in is very convenient^* next time in Paris,I will still choose here!

column1:
Vi syntes vældig godt om lejligheden og dens indretning og nød at opholde os i dette område tæt på Canal St. Martin. Vi vil gerne komme tilbage på et andet tidspunkt.
Venlig hilsen
Marianne, Lasse og Ib - Denmark
column5:
We thought very well about the apartment and its interior design and enjoyed to stay in this area close to the Canal St. Martin. We would like to come back at another time.
Kind regards
Marianne, Lasse and Ib - Denmark

column1: Super lækker beliggenhed. Fin lille lejlighed med det man skal bruge. God vej beskrivelse fra lufthavn til lejlighed fra udlejer og mange gode nyttige informationer omkring transport generelt. Rigtig god og nem løsning med nøgle til lejligheden. Alt i alt - en rigtig god oplevelse.
column5: Super nice location. Nice little apartment, with it one must use. A good route description from the airport to the apartment from the landlord and many good useful information about transport in general. Really good and easy solution with the key to the apartment. All in all - a really good experience.

column1:
Min kæreste og jeg boede i lejligheden i 4 nætter. 
Marie var super let at få fat i inden rejsen. Da vi ankom var der ingen problemer og hun havde endda hængt danske flag op! Vi følte os meget velkomne. Lejligheden var pæn og ren, samt hyggelig. Perfekt til to personer. 
Området omkring lejligheden er det hyggeligste i hele Paris! Vi var tæt på gode restauranter, hyggelige barer og ikke mindst Sacre Cæur.
Marie var virkelig hjælpsom undervejs i opholdet, selvom hun endda var ude og rejse.
Varmeste anbefalinger herfra
column5:
My girlfriend and I stayed in the apartment for 4 nights. 
Marie was super easy to get hold of before the trip. When we arrived there were no problems and she had even hung a Danish flag up! We felt us very welcome. The apartment was neat and clean, and cozy. Perfect for two people. 
The area around the apartment is the coziest in all of Paris! We were close to good restaurants, cosy bars and, not least, the Sacre Cæur.
Marie was really helpful along the way in your stay, even if she even was out and travel.
Warmest recommendations from here

column1: Virkelig en dejlig og hyggelig lejlighed med små opstillinger der gør hjemmet personligt. En skøn altan hvor der er skygge om aftenen.
column5: Really a nice and cosy apartment with a small still-lifes that make the home personally. A lovely balcony where there is shade in the evening.

column1: Vi havde fået god information om området og transporten dertil inden ankomst, så ankomsten var smertefri. """"Det lille Hus"""" var både rent og hyggeligt, og ligger helt ugenert inde i et gårdrum. Hele tiden forud og under opholdet var Segire opmærksom på, om alt var ok for os. Selvom hun bor lige ved siden af, fik vi lov til at være os selv, hvad der, alt efter temperament, er rart. Det lille Hus ligger rigtig godt lige ved Canal Saint-Martin og har rigtig gode indkøbsmuligheder lige ved. Og rigtig mange gode spisesteder, der både er hyggelige og absolut rimelige i pris.
column5: We had received good information about the area and the transportation thereof, prior to arrival, so arrival was painless. """"The little House"""" was both clean and cozy, and is completely secluded in a courtyard. The whole time prior and during the stay was Segire attention to whether everything was ok for us. Even though she lives right next door, we were allowed to be ourselves, what, according to temperament, is nice. The small House is really good right by the Canal Saint Martin, and have really good shopping right at the. And many really good restaurants which are both cosy and definitely reasonable in price.

column1: Perfect. Recommend for everyone
column5: Perfect. Recommend for everyone

column1: Fantastisk bolig og en endnu mere fantastisk udlejer. Loca var god til at kommunikere og hjælpe os med diverse spørgsmål. Selve området var hyggeligt, og så ligger lejligheden dejligt tæt på monumenter
column5: Great home and an even more amazing landlord. Loca was good to communicate and help us with various issues. The area itself was nice, and so is the apartment near the monuments

column1:
Dejlig lejlighed, som ligger lige i hjertet af Paris. Og søde værter! 
Kan klart anbefales. /Trine
column5:
Nice apartment, located right in the heart of Paris. And sweet hosts! 
Can be clearly recommended. / /

column1: Fantastisk dejlig lejlighed til to i hjertet af Paris. Beliggenheden var i top, på en stille vej midt imellem to livlige gader fyldt med caféer og restauranter. Lejligheden er i gåafstand til Louvre, Notre Dame, St Martin, Moulin Rouge, Marais-kvarteret og meget andet, og der er desuden et bredt udvalg af metrostationer lige om hjørnet. Lejligheden har alt hvad man har brug for, inklusiv elevator og tre smukke franske altandøre som fører ud til den smalle men solrige balkon. Félicité var sød og hjælpsom, og ventede endda på os i lejligheden til kl 23 da vores fly var forsinket. Jeg har kun positive ting at sige om Félicités lejlighed!
column5: Lovely apartment for two in the heart of Paris. The location was at the top, on a quiet road in between two lively streets filled with cafes and restaurants. The apartment is in walking distance to the Louvre, Notre Dame, St Martin, Moulin Rouge, the Marais district and much more, and there is also a wide choice of metro stations just around the corner. The apartment has everything you need, including an elevator and three beautiful French balcony doors leading out to the narrow but sunny balcony. Félicité was sweet and helpful, and waited even to us in the apartment until 23 when our flight was delayed. I have only positive things to say about Félicités apartment!

column1:
Meget vel udrustet, rar og hyggelig lejlighed i lille stille gade med nem adgang til gode små butikker (fisketorv- bagere -vinhandel - grønthandel m.m.) og  bistroer.
Fine bus og metro forbindelser.
Ideel for to voksne evt. med et barn.
Venlig og omsorgsfuld værtinde.
Bente og Peter.
column5:
Very well equipped, nice and cosy apartment in a small quiet street with easy access to excellent small shops (fisketorv - bakers -liquor store - grønthandel m.m.) and bistros.
Fine bus and metro connections.
Ideal for two adults possibly. with a child.
Friendly and caring hostess.
Bente and Peter.

column1: 우리는 4명이 사용 했어요. 위치는 아주 좋았고 주위에 까르푸 시티, 과일가게, 피자 모두 있어서 편리 했어요. 집은 사진보다는 작지만 있을건 다 있네요. 집기도구도 부족하지 않아서 좋았어요. 다만 에어컨이 없어서 낮에는 더웠네요. 프랑스는 에어컨문화가 아닌가봐요~
column5: We 4 were used. The location was very good and around the Carrefour city, fruit, pizza, all in. House photos rather than the right. Home make lack don't. Just in the day more were. France air conditioning and culture is not me~

column1:
Det er nemt at komme til lejligheden fra de Gaulle lufthavnen.
Lejligheden ligger på rigtig hyggelig gade og der er lækre butukker: brød, ost, lille købmand, kineser takeaway ,caféer osv.
Forstår ikke hvor for vi skulle betale 40 euro kontant ved ankomst for rengøring, er de ikke inkluderet i prisen?
Max var hurtig til at svare ved henvendelser.
Max satte os ind i tingene, men sørgede feks ikke for at Tv'et duede selvom han vidste det. Der var ikke pærer i lampe over køkkenbord og spejl i badeværelse, heller ikke i køleskabet.
Lejligheden er nusset, og der trænger til oprydning i køkkenet.
Sengene er meget dårlige, fjedrene er gået i sengen og sove sofaen er ikke horisontal i enderne.
Trods ovenstående er det hyggeligt at befinde sig i lejligheden.
column5:
It is easy to get to the apartment from the de Gaulle airport.
The apartment is located on really nice block and there are delicious butukker: bread, cheese, small grocery store, chinese takeaway ,cafes, etc.
Do not understand where we had to pay 40 euro cash on arrival for cleaning, they are not included in the price?
Max was quick to answer requests.
Max put us into things, but the provided info is not for that the Tv was worthless even though he knew it. There were no light bulbs in the lamp over the kitchen table and the mirror in the bathroom, not in the fridge.
The apartment is dingy, and in need of cleanup in the kitchen.
The beds are very bad, the springs has gone in the bed and the sleeping couch is not horizontal at the ends.
Despite the above, it is nice to be in the apartment.

column1:
Lejlighed levede desværre ikke op til forventninger. Vi havde booket til 5 personer, men lejligheden kunne slet ikke rumme 5 personer! Meget dårlige senge og soveforhold. 
Herudover var lejligheden annonceret med terrasse, dette vise sig at være baggården, hvor skraldespandene til hele boligblokken stod foran, desuden var der hverken bord, stole eller blomsterkrukker som annoncen ligeledes viste;( 
Vi kan desværre ikke anbefale denne bolig til andre og vil ikke selv benytte den igen. 
Ærgerligt da vi havde håbet på noget helt andet ifht hvad billederne og beskrivelsen havde vist.
column5:
Apartment living is unfortunately not up to expectations. We had booked for 5 people but the apartment could not accommodate 5 persons! Very bad beds and soveforhold.
