In addition, the apartment is advertised with a terrace, this proves to be the backyard where the garbage cans to the whole of the apartment block stood in front of, moreover, there was neither table, chairs or pots of flowers as the ad also showed;( 
Unfortunately, we can't recommend this accommodation to others and will not even use it again. 
Too bad since we had hoped for something else entirely compared to what the pictures and the description had shown.

column1: Ankomst forløb fint, og vi blev mødt i lejligheden af Agathe
column5: Arrival went well, and we were met in the apartment of Agathe

column1:
Nina er en rigtig god værtinde. Allerede inden vi kom til Paris følte vi os velkomne, da Nina havde givet os gode og relevante oplysninger om lejligheden og transportmuligheder.
Lejligheden ligger meget centralt og er meget velfungerende, og et fantastisk udgangspunkt for at udforske Paris.
column5:
Nina is a great hostess. Already before we came to Paris, we felt us welcome, because Nina had given us good and relevant information about the apartment and transportation.
The apartment is very centrally located and is very well functioning, and a great base for exploring Paris.

column1:
Nina havde lavet en fin rutebeskrivelse over, hvordan vi kom til lejligheden fra lufthavnen og var rigtig imødekommende.
Lejligheden stemmer fint overens med billederne, og den ligger perfekt i en dejlig del af Marais med masser af specialbutikker for de shoppingglade og små lækre spisesteder. Vi nød opholdet i fulde drag og kunne bestemt godt overveje at bo samme sted, næste gang, vi skal til Paris.
column5:
Nina had made a fine route, how we got to the apartment from the airport and was very accommodating.
The apartment is well consistent with the pictures, and perfectly located in a lovely part of the Marais with lots of specialty shops for the shoppingglade and small delicious eateries. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there and would definitely consider to stay in the same place the next time we go to Paris.

column1:
Det har været en fornøjelse at bo hos Alex og Bianca. Stedet har en fantastisk beliggenhed, det var helt perfekt i forhold til spisesteder, shopping og de turist sted vi gerne ville opleve. Vi boede der i 3 nætter og det passe godt til vores behov. Vil helt sikker gerne bo der igen, ⎌når jeg kommer til Paris. 
Mvh Betina & Randi
column5:
It has been a pleasure to stay with Alex and Bianca. The place has a great location, it was absolutely perfect in terms of restaurants, shopping and the tourist place we wanted to experience. We stayed there for 3 nights and it fit well with our needs. Will sure like to stay there again, ⎌when I come to Paris. 
Regards Betina & Randi

column1: Stor lys lejlighed med morgensol i stuen og med to gode soveværelser med dobbeltsenge i et af de hyggeligste kvarterer midt i Paris. Trods den centrale placering er der ingen støj i lejligheden, lige bortset fra natten mellem lørdag og søndag, hvor forbipasserende kunne høres fra soveværelset ud mod gaden. Mange indkøbsmuligheder på markeder, bagere mm, så hvis man vil proviantere, er det nemt og en kulinarisk oplevelse. Victoria's anbefalinger i forhold til restauranter og indkøb gjorde vi brug af med stor succes. Lille velbesøgt grønt område/park i gaden, hvor man kan finde ro efter en hel dag i Paris' mylder.
column5: Big bright apartment with morning sun in the living room and two good bedrooms with double beds in one of the friendliest neighbourhoods in the heart of Paris. Despite the central location there is no noise in the apartment, except for the night between Saturday and Sunday, where passers-by could be heard from the bedroom out onto the street. Many shopping on the markets, bakers mm, so if you want to stocking up, it's easy and a culinary experience. Victoria's recommendations in relation to restaurants and shopping, we made use of with great success. Small popular green area/park in the street, where you can find peace after a full day of Paris' bustle.

column1: Charming!  Delightful!  Perfect!
column5: Charming!  Delightful!  Perfect!

column1: Fantastisk beliggenhed, men stadig roligt. Meget hyggligt. Hjælpsom vært. Mange trapper, ikke for dårligt gående.
column5: Great location, but still quiet. Very hyggligt. Helpful host. Many stairs, not too bad walking.

column1: Vi havde et rigtig dejlig ophold i Francoises skønne, stilfulde og meget parisiske lejlighed. Kan varmt anbefale den til alle. Med venlig hilsen Esben
column5: We had a really lovely stay in Francoises beautiful, stylish and very parisian apartment. Can highly recommend it to all. With kind regards, Esben

column1: Rigtig fin modtagelse og beskrivelse af området omkring Pigalle, ift. Moulin Rouge, Absesses (shopping, cafe, bistro etc.) og Sacré Coeur. Oven i det var der lidt lækkert i køleskabet, samt kaffe og the, så man ikke skulle ud handle som det første. Hyggelig Paris lejlighed, tæt på Metro og lige i Montmartre området.
column5: Really nice reception and description of the area around Pigalle, ift. Moulin Rouge, Absesses (shopping, cafe, bistro, etc.) and the Sacré Coeur. On top of that, there were some goodies in the fridge, as well as coffee and tea, so I was not going to act like it first. Cozy Paris apartment, close to Metro and right in the Montmartre area.

column1: Vi havde et godt ophold i lejligheden - og nød den lidt afsides beliggenhed, men kort derfra var alt hvad man behøvede.
column5: We had a nice stay in the apartment and enjoyed the somewhat remote location, but short drive away was everything you needed.

column1:
Jeg fik et hurtigt og positivt svar ved første henvendelse. I dagene op til ankomsten var det ikke muligt at få kontakt, så der var lidt forvirring  i forhold til nøgler og modtagelse. 
Armelle gav os en grundig orientering om det praktiske i lejligheden og gode tips i forhold til kvarteret. Vi følte os meget velkomne. Hvis vi havde haft brug for hjælp, kunne vi helt sikkert have kontaktet Armelle.
Kvarteret var roligt og hyggeligt med små butikker og restauranter og levede fuldt ud op til forventningerne.
column5:
I got a quick and positive response on first contact. In the days leading up to the arrival, it was not possible to get in touch, so there was a little confusion in relation to the keys and the receipt. 
Dev gave us a thorough briefing on the practical in the apartment and great tips in relation to the neighborhood. We felt us very welcome. If we had needed help, we could certainly have contacted Dev.
The neighborhood was quiet and quaint with small shops and restaurants and it fully lived up to expectations.

column1:
der var intet udsyn fra lejligheden, skodderne var lukket til, fordi der var anbragt et stort stillads op ad muren. altsaa heller intet dagslys indenfor.
rummet forekom os derfor noget raat og koldt, men alligevel hyggeligt. vi benyttede os ikke af el/ovnen, da vi desvaerre oplevede, at en gruppe sikringer sprang.
lejligheden meget lille til 4 personer
column5:
there was no view from the apartment, the shutters were closed, because there was placed a large scaffold up on the wall. thus no daylight inside.
the room seemed to us, therefore something that's crude and cold, but still cozy. we took care of the power to the furnace, since we always saw a group of fuses jumped.
the apartment is very small for 4 persons

column1: Lille lejlighed for to. Roligt beliggende. I vintertiden ingen vinduer pga skodder. Gode omgivelser.
column5: Small apartment for two. Quietly located. Drive no windows because of the shutters. Good surroundings.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed og virkelig imødekommende vært.
column5: Lovely apartment and really helpful host.

column1: Super oplevelse i Marcs lejlighed. Meget autentisk og unik. Rent og pænt alting. En super vært.
column5: Super experience in marc's apartment. Very authentic and unique. Clean and neat everything is. A super host.

column1:
Superskøn og authentisk pariserlejlighed med top beliggenhed. 
Hyggelig og praktisk indretning med alle moderne bekvemmeligheder.
column5:
Superskøn and small authentic parisian apartment with top location. 
Cosy and practical décor with all modern comforts.

column1: Det var en dejlig lejlighed og vi blev vel modtaget ved ankomst. Lejligheden lå super centralt så vi kunne gå til mange ting direkte fra lejligheden. Vores vært havde givet os nogle fif til gode spisesteder og dem var vi meget glade for - det var rigtig gode steder og med masser af stemning og ikke overrendt af turister. Hvis vi kommer tilbage vil vi klart gerne leje den igen :-)
column5: It was a lovely apartment and we were well received upon arrival. The apartment was super centrally located so we could walk to many things directly from the apartment. Our host had given us some hints for good restaurants and the ones we were very happy - it was really good locations and with plenty of atmosphere and not crowded by tourists. If we come back, we would clearly like to rent it again :-)

column1:
Opholdet i Anne Valéry´s loft 4. - 14. maj 2013 har været en virkelig positiv oplevelse:

1. Den varme modtagelse af Anne Valéry, der over en kop kaffe informerede om lejligheden og de nærmeste, praktiske indkøbsmuligheder.
2. Indretningen af lejligheden: personlig, smukt farvevalg, hyggelig, gennemtænkt - vi følte os hjemme. 
3. Roen og freden, selv om vi var midt i Paris - tæt på Bastillepladsen.

Vi nød at bo i Anne Valéry´s loft og kommer meget gerne igen.
column5:
The stay in the Anne Valérys ceiling 4. - 14. may 2013 has been a really positive experience:

1. The warm reception of Anne Valery, who over a cup of coffee and informed about the apartment and the nearest, convenient shopping.
2. The decor of the apartment: personal, beautiful color selection, pleasant, thoughtful - we felt us at home. 
3. Calm and peace, even though we were in the heart of Paris - close to place de la Bastille.

We enjoyed to stay in Anne Valérys ceiling and come very gladly again.

column1:
Vi havde en dejlig ferie i Arséne´s charmerende, kreative, lyse lejlighed, med skønne farver.
Der var god plads til os alle: mor, far og to børn på henholdsvis 10 og 13 år.
Lejligheden rummer en dejlig stor stue med flotte gamle gulve, to soveværelser, et køkken, badeværelse med badekar og særskilt toilet. Gode vinduer, som tager det meste af larmen fra Paris´ livlige aften/natte liv.
Der er gode indkøbsmuligheder, shopping, cafeer, restauranter og gode transportmuligheder med bl.a. metrostationer næsten lige ude foran døren.
Der var de faciliteter vi skulle bruge. Et enkelt køkken, med få redskaber - men der var det man skulle bruge. Desuden var der Wi-fi, tv, aircondition blæser (og vaskemaskine som desværre ikke fungerede).
Nabolaget er meget livligt (også nattelivet). Ligger lige ved siden af Porte Saint-Martin og Porte Saint-Denis, og tæt på Montmartre, centrum, Louvre etc. 
Både Arséne og hans ven Marco var super søde og venlige til at byde os velkommen og besvarer på de spørgsmål vi måtte have.
Vi kan klart anbefale at bo i Arséne´s lejlighed. 
Tusinde tak for denne gang og på gensyn :-)
column5:
We had a lovely holiday in Arsénes charming, creative, bright apartment, with beautiful colors.
There was good space for all of us: mother, father, and two children, respectively 10 and 13 years.
The apartment contains a nice large living room with beautiful old floors, two bedrooms, a kitchen, a bathroom with bath and separate toilet. Good windows, which takes up most of the din of Paris's vibrant evening/night life.
There are good shopping facilities, shopping, cafes, restaurants and good transport options, with the fol.a. metro stations almost on the doorstep.
There were all the facilities we would use. A simple kitchen, with few tools - but there it was. In addition, there was Wi-fi, tv, air conditioning, fan (and a washing machine which unfortunately has not worked).
The neighborhood is very lively (also nightlife). Located right next to the Porte Saint-Martin and Porte Saint-Denis, and close to Montmartre, the centre, the Louvre etc. 
Both joined arsène and his friend Marco were super sweet and friendly to welcome us and answer to the questions we may have.
We can clearly recommend to stay in Arsénes apartment. 
Thank you so much for this time and see you soon :-)

column1:
할머니 그리고 8개월 아기와 여행하였습니다. 번화가에서는 조금 떨어져있지만 지하철역과 무척 가깝고 사방에 있는 버스정류장을 이용하면 어느 곳이든 손쉽게 이동할 수 있습니다. 숙소 앞 대로로 버스도 지나가지만 Courtyard 안쪽에 숙소가 위치하여 매우 조용합니다. 
그리고 걸어서 1분 거리에 슈퍼와 3분 거리에 Eric Kayser가 있어 편리했습니다. 저희는 구성원 특성상 종종 요리를 해먹었는데 가까운 거리에 아시아 마트가 있어 유용했습니다.
 숙소는 2층(프랑스식 1층)에 위치하였고 제 기준으로 조금 가파른 계단이 20개 가량되지만 충분히 유모차 등을 소지하고 이동가능했습니다. 숙소 내에는 세탁기, 식기세척기 등이 있어 아기 세탁물을 언제든지 해결할 수 있었습니다. 화장실을 비롯한 실내 난방도 잘 되서 훈훈하게 생활할 수 있었습니다.
하지만 무엇보다도 군더더기없고 친절한 오너 Pascal이 있어서 이번 숙박이 더욱 쾌적했던 것 같습니다. 같은 건물에 금요일 저녁에 파티가 있어 조금 소란스러울수 있다고 미리 친절히 안내도 해줬습니다. 다음에 다시 파리에 방문하게 된다면 꼭 다시 찾고싶은 숙소입니다.
column5:
Grandma and 8 month baby and travel. In a little off, but the subway station and very close to everywhere in the bus to anywhere you can move effortlessly. Stay in front as the bus may need, but the Courtyard inside the hostel is located is very quiet. 
And walk 1 minute from a supermarket and 3 minutes from Eric Kayser has made. Our member properties more often to cook the hammock was close to the Asian Mart is useful.
The hostel is on the 2nd floor(French 1st floor)location was and based a little steep stairs 20 the amount is not enough to stroller, etc and go. Place inside washing machine, dishwasher, etc baby Laundry anytime you can solve. The bathroom, including the indoor heating may well be in a warming life.
But more than anything, an afterthought and friendly owner Pascal at this time, the stay even more pleasant. In the same building on Friday evening, the party got a little loud. and kindly guided me. Then back to Paris to come back looking like the place to stay.

column1: Stedet var velbeskrevet og levede op til forventningerne. Ganske småt men dejligt centralt. Mødte udlejer en enkelt gang, men denne var positiv og hjælpsom. Hurtig respons ved online kommunikation.
column5: The place was well described and lived up to the expectations. Quite small but nice location. Met the landlord once, but this was positive and helpful. Fast response for online communications.

column1: Perfekt beliggende lejlighed lige ved Metro med gode linjer. Super velkomst med masser af gode råd om kvarteret. Hyggelig lejlighed med gode senge og dyner og fin spiseplads i køkken/stue.
column5: Perfectly located apartment right by the Metro with good lines. Super welcome with lots of advice about the neighborhood. Cosy apartment with good beds and duvets and fine dining area in the kitchen/living room.

column1:
Lejligheden levede fuld ud op til vores forventninger. Alt var rent og pænt og selvom vi var 5 personer var den meget rummelig. Beliggenheden er perfekt men kun 2 min gang til metro og til Jardin des Plantes og mange spisesteder og butikker i området. 
Ved ankomst fik vi en meget fin gennemgang af lejligheden af Pascal. Lejligheden er meget veludstyret og vi manglede ikke noget. Desuden meget rolig beliggenhed  og dermed god nattesøvn.
I lejligheden er der en mappe med en masse gode tips, desuden diverse kort, guidebøger mm. over Paris. Pascal var også god til at fortælle om området, transportmuligheder mm. 
Vi vil klart vælge Christine og Pascals lejlighed igen hvis vi kommer tilbage til Paris og har også allerede anbefalet den til andre.
column5:
The apartment lived fully up to our expectations. Everything was clean and tidy and even though we were 5 persons was very spacious. The location is perfect just 2 min walk to the metro and the Jardin des Plantes and many eateries and shops in the area. 
Upon arrival we got a very nice review of the apartment of Pascal. The apartment is very well equipped and we lacked nothing. Also very quiet location and thus the good night's sleep.
In the apartment there is a folder with a lot of good tips, in addition, various maps, guidebooks, etc. of the city of Paris. Pascal was also good to tell about the area, transportation options etc. 
We will clearly choose Christine and Pascals apartment again if we come back to Paris and have already recommended it to others.

column1:
Virkelig centralt beliggende lejlighed , men nok den mest ulækre lejlighed jeg nogensinde har set.

Billeder på Airbnb hjemmeside er fup og svindel .

Alt lugter og er møgbeskidt.

Føler mig virkelig svindlet af Airbnb
column5:
Really centrally located apartment , but probably the most disgusting apartment I've ever seen.

The pictures on the Airbnb website are bogus and scams .

Everything smells and is mucky.

Feel really defrauded of Airbnb

column1:
Hyggelig lille lejlighed i et roligt område. Lejligheden ligger tæt på Rue Mouffetard som er noget helt særligt med sine specialforretninger.
Vi var dog mest rundt i Paris, og tilbragte derfor ikke meget tid i selve lejligheden.
Lejligheden var veludstyret med store håndklæder, sæber og andre gode småfornødenheder. Meget bedre og mere charmerende end et hotelværelse!
column5:
Cosy little apartment in a quiet area. The apartment is close to Rue Mouffetard which is something quite special, with its specialty shops.
We were, however, most around Paris, and spent, therefore, not much time in the apartment itself.
The apartment was well equipped with big towels, soaps and other good småfornødenheder. Much better and more charming than a hotel room!

column1: Lejligheden er lillebitte men hyggelig og optimalt indrettet. Var der en uge sammen med min 8-årige søn i vinterferien. Det fungerede perfekt.
column5: The apartment is tiny but cosy and optimally decorated. There was a week with my 8-year-old son during the winter holidays. It worked perfectly.

column1: Koselig leilighet i vakker del av Paris. Veldig hyggelige restauranter i umiddelbar nærhet og kort vei til både t-bane og lokale attraksjoner.
column5: Cosy apartment in the beautiful part of Paris. Very nice restaurants in the immediate vicinity and a short distance to both the metro and local attractions.

column1: Studio très bien situé, très agréable. A recommender
column5: Studio very well located, very pleasant. In recommending

column1: Det kan varmt anbefales at bo i Pablos lejlighed. Fantastisk beligenhed tæt på to metrostationer, cafeer og supermarked. Pablo svarede hurtigt og gav uden opfordring rejse- og ankomstinstruktioner samt lokale tips. Fin minilejlighed med alt vi behøvede. Jeg havde mine to børn  på 6 og 9 med, og det gik også fint i Pablos lejlighed.
column5: It is highly recommended to stay in pablo's apartment. Good location close to two metro stations, cafes and supermarket. Pablo responded quickly and gave no call travel and arrival instructions and local tips. Fine four start hotel which with everything we needed. I had my two children 6 and 9, and it also went fine in pablo's apartment.

column1: Vi (to voksne og to børn) havde to overnatninger i Pablos lille lejlighed i hjertet af Paris. Lejligheden var ren og fint indrettet og lå et stenkast fra Marais-kvarterets lækre butikker og gode spisesteder. Kan varmt anbefales.
column5: We (two adults and two children) had two nights in pablo's small apartment in the heart of Paris. The apartment was clean and nicely decorated and was a stone's throw from the Marais neighbourhood's world-class shops and good restaurants. Can be highly recommended.

column1:
Dejlig, lille pariserlejlighed med en fantastisk tagterrasse, hvor vi både spiste morgenmad og drak vin om aftenen. På trods af, at lejligheden ligger rimeligt centralt var der overraskende stille og fredeligt i nabolaget og lejligheden.
Nærmeste metro-stop ligger meget kort fra lejligheden, så det er nemt at komme rundt.
Vi var to voksne og to børn (2 og 5 år), og det fungerede helt fint.
Vi kommer gerne igen!
column5:
Lovely, small parisian apartment with a fantastic rooftop terrace where we ate breakfast and drank wine in the evening. In spite of that the apartment is reasonably central, there was a surprisingly quiet and peaceful in the neighborhood and the apartment.
The nearest metro stop is very short from the apartment, so it is easy to get around.
We were two adults and two children (2 and 5 years), and it worked perfectly fine.
We will gladly come again!

column1: Jeg følte mig rigtigt godt taget imod. Jeg fik god instruktion af brugen af lejlighedens muligheder. Nabolaget var inspirerende, her var en masse at opleve. Restauranter, kunst, shopping og et broget folkeligt liv.
column5: I felt very well taken against. I got good instruction of the use of the apartment's options. The neighborhood was inspiring, here was a lot to experience. Restaurants, arts, shopping, and a variegated public life.

column1: Total fed lejlighed lille,men perfekt for to. Ualmindelig god beliggenhed når man som os gerne vil befinde os ude i blandt lokal befolkningen. Kan absolut anbefales...men vent til bygningen er færdig i standsat.
column5: Total fed apartment small,but perfect for two. Very good location if you like us want to find ourselves out in the among the local population. Can definitely recommend...but wait until the building is finished in the standsat.

column1: Vi var glade for at bo i lejligheden. Den ligger godt. Trapperne er stejle, men er du normalt gående er det intet problem. Rummet er sparsomt indrettet, men der er nødvendigheden. Generelt pænt og rent. Billigt centralt sted for unge og studerende.
column5: We were happy to stay in the apartment. The is a good. The stairs are steep, but you are usually walking it is no problem. The room is sparsely decorated, but there is the necessity. Generally neat and clean. Cheap central place for young people and students.

column1: Meget venlige mennesker. Perfekt beliggenhed. Meget venlig og informativ vært
column5: Very friendly people. Perfect location. Very friendly and informative host

column1:
Jeg fik rigtig god skriftlig information, som passede godt på det jeg/vi oplevede.
Skøn beliggenhed i hjertet af Paris. Levende nærmiljø.
Dejligt med god plads, og adskilte rum.
Der var alt, hvad man behøver. Jose er virkelig god til grundig information. Ikke luksus, men dejligt. Mit barnebarn kom til at svine sit tøj, så dejligt at kunne komme det i vaskemaskine og tumbler. Jeg har intet at klage på. Tak for et dejligt ophold. 
Hilsen Grethe
column5:
I got very good written information, which fit well on what I/we experienced.
Superbly located in the heart of Paris. Living environment.
Nice with ample space and separate rooms.
There was everything you need. Jose is really good for detailed information. Not luxury, but nice. My grandson came to mess her clothes, so nice to be able to get it in the washing machine and tumbler. I have nothing to complain on. Thank you for a wonderful stay. 
Regards Grethe

column1:
Fin og skinnende ren leilighet. 
Flott sentral beliggenhet.  Stille og tilbaketrukket, men midt i sentrum!
column5:
Nice and spotlessly clean apartment. 
Great central location. Quiet and secluded, but right in the centre!

column1:
Lige fra vi bestilte lejligheden, til vi kom derned, og i de 5 dage dernede, fik vi stor hjælp af Lea. Hun svarede hurtigt og venligt på alle spørgsmål, og var hjælpsom med bla taxa bestilling. 
Lejligheden ligger på 3. Sal, og der er ikke ringeklokke på gaden, men først inde i opgangen så det er vigtigt at aftale hvordan første kontakt foregår. Lejligheden er super lækker, dog er opvaskemaskinen helt slidt. Beliggenheden, bydelen og gaden er SÅ dejlig. Der er alt omkring en, tæt på metro i den ene ende af gaden, og tæt på en lille kanal i den anden ende. Her imellem og overalt, små lækre butikker, restauranter og cafeer. I lejligheden var vi 6 piger, og boltrede osi hhv. 2 soveværelser med dobbeltsenge, og 2 værelser med sovesofaer, 3 badeværelser og 1 toilet. Total luxus.
column5:
From the time we booked the apartment until we arrived, and in the 5 days down there, we got great help from the Lea. She responded quickly and friendly on all questions, and was helpful with bla taxi booking. 
The apartment is on the 3. Floor, and there is no doorbell on the street, but the first cash machine in the entryway so it is important to agree on how first contact takes place. The apartment is super nice, however the dishwasher completely worn out. The location, the neighbourhood and the street is SO lovely. There is everything around one, close to the metro in one end of the street, and close to a small channel at the other end. In between and everywhere, small fab shops, restaurants and cafes. In the apartment we were 6 girls, and frolicking osi respectively. 2 bedrooms with double beds and 2 rooms with sofa beds, 3 bathrooms and 1 toilet. Total luxus.

column1: Et bra sted med god beliggenhet. Vær forberedt på at det bare er 2 soverom med ordentlige senger. Ellers er det sovesofa
column5: A good place with good location. Be prepared that there are only 2 bedrooms with real beds. Otherwise, there is a sofa bed

column5: ... Once, the host is very friendly and contact is humble. The hostel is safe.

column1: Good house, even better owner.
column5: Good house, even better owner.

column1:
En virkelig fin lille lejlighed med god udnyttelse af pladsen. Der var rent og pænt i både bad og køkken. Placeringen af lejligheden er rigtig god, hvor alt synes nemt at komme til med enten metro eller i gåafstand.
Claire var hurtig til at svare på spørgsmål, så der var ingen tvivl om husregler eller lignende inden afrejse. Alt i alt et godt sted at opleve Paris fra, og jeg ville helt sikkert have lyst til at bo der igen.
column5:
A really nice little apartment with good use of space. It was nice in both the bath and the kitchen. The location of the apartment is really good, where everything seems easy to reach by either metro or in walking distance.
Claire was quick to respond to questions, so there was no doubt about the house rules or similar before travelling. All in all a good place to explore Paris from, and I would definitely like to stay there again.

column1: Kjempefin leilighet med veldig god beliggenhet. Christine var superhyggelig og delte masse god informasjon om nabolaget. Superkort vei til både Metro og RER og et bra supermarked like rundt hjørnet. NB! 5 etg. uten heis.
column5: Great apartment with very good location. Christine was superhyggelig and shared lots of good information about the neighbourhood. Superkort way to both Metro and RER, and a good supermarket just around the corner. NB! 5 etg. without the lift.

column1:
Fin lejlighed - hvor billeder og tekst beskriver ganske fint hvad man får.
Perfekt beliggenhed hvis man er til Moulin Rouge, Montmartre osv.

Pæn og ren - trygt beliggende i en stille sidegade.

Vi boede 5 personer i lejligheden - enkeltsengen var ikke i top, da den efter vores smag var for hård. Ellers kun ros og tommelfingre op.

4 stjerner for beliggenhed, hygge, lejligheden i øvrigt, og for at leve op til hvad der loves. Den sidste stjerne røg på grund af at lejligheden ligger på fjerde sal - mange trapper, betalingsparkering 56 euro for 3 dage og den hårde single seng.

Vi vil meget gerne komme tilbage til denne lejlighed :-)
column5:
Fine apartment - where images and text describes quite nicely what you get.
Perfect location if you are up to the Moulin Rouge, Montmartre, etc.

Neat and clean - safely located in a quiet side street.

We stayed 5 persons in the apartment - the bed was not in the top, for our taste was too tough. Otherwise only praise and thumbs up.

4 stars for the location, the coziness, the apartment in the way, and to live up to what it loves. The last star smoke because of that the apartment is on the fourth floor - many stairs, paying parking 56 euros for 3 days and the hard single bed.

We would very much like to come back to this apartment :-)

column1:
Vi havde fin mail  korrespondance forud for opholdet og fik en meget venlig velkomst samt hjælp til at finde adresse. Lejligheden ligger centralt hvilket og som beskrevet meget tæt på Eiffeltårnet. 
Dog kunne køkkenudstyr godt trænge til en opgradering samt stuens sovefaciliteter.
column5:
We had a fine mail correspondence in advance of the stay and got a very friendly welcome and help to find the address. The apartment is centrally located which and as described is very close to the Eiffel tower. 
However, could be the kitchenware really need an upgrade, as well as its sleeping arrangements.

column1:
Fantastisk oplevelse! 

Vi modtog præcise ankomstinformationer to dage før afrejse fra Mathilde, hvilket gjorde at vi fandt lejligheden nemt. Dejlig indrettet lejlighed med velfungerede faciliteter og god location tæt på Eiffel-tårnet. Stille kvarter med shoppingmuligheder samt bussestoppested lige rundt om hjørnet. 

Lejligheden kan anbefales til alle og Mathilde var et dejlig bekendtskab.
column5:
Amazing experience! 

We received accurate ankomstinformationer two days before the date of departure of Mathilde, which meant we found the apartment easily. Lovely furnished apartment with well facilities and good location close to the Eiffel tower. Quiet neighborhood with shopping, as well as bussestoppested just around the corner. 

The apartment can be recommended to all, and Mathilde was a lovely acquaintance.

column1:
호스트를 직잡 보지는 못했지만,
메세지를 통해 정확하고 친절하게 설명해 주었답니다. 답신도 매우 빨랐고요.

아파트는 크지 않지만 필요한 대로 갖추어져있었고요, 감사하게 아기침대도 챙겨주었답니다.
교통도 편리한 편이었고 조용하고치안이 좋은동네라 마음 편히 다녔습니다.

날이 추웠는데 히터도 잘 작동하였어요

더 길게 있고 싶은 집이었습니다.
column5:
Host a did not see,but
The message through accurately and kindly explain. Reply also very fast.

The apartment is not large, but necessary-and, thanks to the baby bed and also patronize.
Transportation is also convenient, hotel was quiet and located in a good neighborhood mind still wandered.

The day was cold but the heater also works well.

Longer want to be home.

column1: Vi boede fantastisk centralt:-) småt men der var det vi havde brug for:-) super service i forhold til fleksibel ankomst og afrejse tidspunkter:-) kan anbefales.
column5: We lived in a great location:-) small but that was what we needed:-) super service in relation to the flexible arrival and departure times:-) can be recommended.

column1: Central beliggende lejlighed lige midt i Marais tæt på Vieille de Temple. Meget Flexibel mht ind- og udtjekning. Konmer hekt dikkert igen:-))
column5: Central located apartment right in the heart of the Marais close to Vieille de Temple. Very Flexible mht check - in and check-out. Konmer hekt dikkert again:-))

column1: Overordnet okay, dog plads til forbedringer uden de store anstrengelser fra værten. Lejligheden byder på en fin seng for en person, eller to slanke  personer. Der er et lille køleskab og værten byder på en tallerken og bestik, the og instant kaffe . Desværre er der ikke taget højde for man som gæst ønsker at vaske servicen af efter brug, da adgang til køkken er no-go! Man er også nødsaget til at spise på sengen da der  hverken er bord,   eller sengebord, ikke optimalt.  Meningen med   kniv og gaffel er god spise stilling. Døren til soveværelset binder voldsom. Bruger man toilettet om natten  kan alle høre  man åbner døren.  Sikkert noget der let kan udbedres med justering af døren. Generelt er ejendommen  temmelig lyt og vinduerne er dårligt isoleret. Bygningen bærer flere steder præg af at trænge  til et facelift. Poolen er ok, men også 'træt'. Fin udsigt fra pool området.  På grund af  de dårligt isolerede vinduer måtte jeg sove med tøj på 2 af de 3 dage, på grund af lave natte temperaturer  de dage jeg besøgte Paris. Det var  kun   en tynd dyne til rådighed.  Havde været fint med et alternativ til køligere nætter.  Vær desutten opmærksom på, at der er en skole  lige uden for lejligheden så forvent meget larm i frikvartererne,  også med lukkede vinduer. Der er en  stikdåse med flere stik til at lade elektriske apparater. Desværre kan man kun oplade når lyset er tændt. Meget upraktisk. Alternativet er et frit stik ved køleskabet. Værten var flink og vise mig  hvordan man kom til poolen. En sikkerheds info, bed værten låse den øverste lås, der er mekanisk. Den nederste lås i entre døren kræver at nøglen sidder i. Sidder der ikke nøgle i nederste lås kan det være en forhindring ved evt brand.
column5: Overall okay, however, room for improvement without the great efforts from the host. The apartment offers a nice size bed for one person, or two slim persons. There is a small refrigerator and the host offers a plate and cutlery, tea and instant coffee . Unfortunately, there are not taken into account you as a guest want to wash the service of after use, since the access to the kitchen is a no-go! You are also forced to eat on the bed since there is neither table, or bedside table, is not optimal. The meaning of knife and fork is good eating position. The door to the bedroom bind violent. Use the toilet at night can all hear you open the door. Surely something that can easily be rectified with adjustment of the door. In general, the property is pretty listen and the windows are poorly insulated. The building bears several places the imprint of the to penetrate to a facelift. The pool is ok, but also 'tired'. Fine view from the pool area. Because of the poorly-insulated windows, I had to sleep with clothes on 2 of the 3 days, because of low night temperatures on the days I visited Paris. It was only a thin quilt available. Had been fine with an alternative for cooler nights. Please desutten aware that there is a school just outside the apartment so expect much noise at recess, also with the windows closed. There is a power strip with multiple sockets that allow electrical appliances. Unfortunately you can only charge when the light is turned on. Very impractical. The alternative is a free plug by the fridge. The host was nice and show me how you came to the pool. A security info, ask the host to lock the top lock which is mechanical. The bottom lock in the entrance door requires that the key sits in. Sitting there not key in the bottom lock can be an obstacle in the evs brand.

column1: Odile har en lille guide til lejligheden og Paris..
column5: Odile has a small guide to the apartment and Paris..

Unfortunately, she's our length of stay in the United States to stay at work for once did not have the chance to meet, the errands when there is e-mail contact with her is a pattern I downloaded and would like to feel like in the US. The rooms are on 6 floors, of app compact space up on the top floor of｡ Certainly bright and pleasant room in the US. Or walk 15 minutes by Buss you can't download the 2nd Chinatown of Belleville a story in the delicious I I man fine die-tie cuisine･Chinese food and enjoy it.

column1:
Kristin er en meget betænksom vært, der på eget initiativ sikrede, at vi var helt trygge ved at skulle ankomme og bo i hendes lejlighed. Hun sendte os en lang række anbefalinger på alt fra restauranter og shopping til gåture og gode oplevelser.

Det har været let og uproblematisk at komme i kontakt med Kristin.

Lejligheden er pæn og ren - lille, men perfekt til to. Fint køkken og bad. Kvarteret er helt fantastisk med smukke træer, hyggelige lokale butikker som slagtere, grønthandlere og ostehandlere, og der er også et udendørsmarked to dage om ugen.

Alt i alt et rigtig dejligt udgangspunkt at udforske Paris fra.
column5:
Kristin is a very considerate host, who, on his own initiative ensured that we were completely confident that should arrive and stay in her apartment. She sent us a variety of recommendations on everything from restaurants and shopping to walks and good experiences.

It has been easy and uncomplicated to get in contact with Kristin.

The apartment is neat and clean - small, but perfect for two. Fine kitchen and bath. The neighbourhood is absolutely stunning with beautiful trees, quaint local shops such as butchers, greengrocers and cheesemongers, and there is also a udendørsmarked two days a week.

All in all a really nice base to explore Paris from.

column1:
Didier tog imod os, da vi ankom til lejligheden med en virkelig grundig gennemgang af alt det praktiske i lejligheden - og en guide til de fine pladser og bistroer i området. Didier var også meget pålidelig at koordinere med inden rejsen. 
Lejligheden er lige som den ser ud på alle billederne, og den lille kat er meget rolig og sød at have i lejligheden. Området er tæt på begge kanaler, på metro og på den hyggelige Sainte Marthe plads, Buttes Chaumont parken og Belleville-kvarteret. Kan meget varmt anbefales!
column5:
Didier welcomed us when we arrived to the apartment a really thorough review of everything in the apartment and a guide to the fine places and bistros in the area. Didier was also very reliable to coordinate with before the journey. 
The apartment is just as it looks in all the pictures, and the little cat is very calm and sweet to have in the apartment. The area is close to both channels, on the metro and on the pleasant Sainte Marthe place, the Buttes Chaumont park and the Belleville district. Can very highly recommended!

column1: Dejlig stille lejlighed. Lige midt i det hele. Vi følte os meget hjemme . og vil komme tilbage.
column5: Lovely quiet apartment. Right in the middle of it all. We felt very much at home . and will come back.

column1: Fin lille lejlighed med Metrostation for enden af gaden. Lejligheden havde alt, hvad vi behøvede og var smagfuldt indrettet. Debora var meget sød og hjælpsom.
column5: Nice little apartment with a Metro station at the end of the street. The apartment had everything we needed and was tastefully decorated. Debora was very sweet and helpful.

column1: 주요 관광지와 떨어져있지만 깨끗하고 조용해서 좋았다.
column5: The main attractions are away but we enjoyed the hotel.

column1: Perfekt, liten leilighet. Sabrina svarte fort på meldinger.
column5: Perfect, little apartment. Sabrina replied fast on messages.

column1: Vi hadde 4 fine dager i Frederisk leilighet. Det var god plass til oss, 5 voksne mennesker.  Alle trivdest godt  og bor gjerne i leiligheten også ved senere besøk til Paris.
column5: We had 4 nice days in Frederisk apartment. There was plenty of space for us 5 adults. All trivdest well and staying happy in the apartment on future visits to Paris.

column1: Centralt beliggende, stor gæstfrihed. Lejligheden indeholder det mest nødvendige.
column5: Centrally located, great hospitality. The apartment contains the most necessary.

column1: Super lejlighed i multikulturelt kvarter med dejlige parker og tæt på metro.
column5: Super apartment in the multicultural neighbourhood with lovely parks and close to the metro.

column1: Couldn't be better.
column5: Couldn't be better.

column1: Pierre´s lille studio var super hyggeligt og lå rigtig godt placeret i La Marais. Man fik fornemmelsen af at bo i Paris, og dejligt med de lyse lokaler. Nøglen i boksen fungerede rigtig fint og altid besked med det samme når vi kontaktede værten. Jeg kan varmt anbefale dette sted til andre!
column5: Pierre's small studio was super nice and was really well located in La Marais. You got the feel of living in Paris, and lovely with the bright premises. The key in the box, worked really nicely and always be notified immediately when we contacted the host. I can highly recommend this place to others!

column1: Flott leilighet! Vi kommer gjerne tilbake!
column5: Great apartment! We will be back!

column1:
Skøn lille lejlighed, med perfekt beliggenhed og alt hvad du skal bruge i Paris. Morgenkaffe langs kanalen, lækre cocktails og god mad lige rundt om hjørnet. I gåafstand til store dele af Paris, og ellers med flere metro linier lige om hjørnet.

Emma er en super host, hurtig respons og meget fleksibel. Og havde med en lille hjemmelavet guide gjort det nemt at finde de gode steder lokalt.

Jeg kommer igen.
column5:
Lovely little apartment, with perfect location and all what you need in Paris. Coffee in the morning along the canal, delicious cocktails and good food just around the corner. Within walking distance to major parts of Paris, and otherwise, with several metro lines just around the corner.

Emma is a great host, quick response and very flexible. And had a small homemade guide made it easy to find the good places locally.

I come back again.

column1: Super lejlighed med plads til mange og med alt det nødvendige
column5: Super apartment with room for many and with all the necessary

column1: Fin lejlighed meget centralt placeret. Vi kunne gå rundt til mange seværdigheder i Paris, samtidig med at selve lejligheden var placeret i en hyggelig gyde i et dejligt kvarter. Vi var meget glade for at bo i lejligheden, der havde alt hvad man har brug for når man rejser som familie.
column5: Nice apartment very centrally located. We could walk around to many sights in Paris, while at the same time the apartment itself was located in a cosy alley in a nice neighborhood. We were very happy to stay in the apartment which had everything you need when travelling as a family.

column1: Vi boede en uge i lejligheden med vores to børn (7 og 9 år). Placeringen er uovertruffen i forhold til både transport (RER direkte fra CDG lufthavnen) og seværdigheder. Alt fungerede fint.
column5: We stayed one week in this apartment with our two children (7 and 9 years). The location is unbeatable in relation to both the transport (RER direct from CDG airport) and the sights. Everything worked fine.

column1: Beskrivelse, billede og hidtidige anmeldelser passer 100% - så alt er godt. Særligt beliggenheden er exceptionel - med kort afstand til mange mega-sightseeing, metro, RER (direkte til CdG) og samtidig en fin kombination af masser af liv og alligevel en relativt rolig placering af selve lejligheden uden støjgener. Lejligheden er ikke stor til 4 personer (men sælges også som studio), men alt fungerer.
column5: Description, picture, and previous reviews fit 100% - so all is well. Especially the location is exceptional - with a short distance to the many mega-sightseeing, metro, RER (direct to CdG), and at the same time, a fine combination of lots of life and yet a relatively quiet location of the apartment itself, without the noise. The apartment is not big for 4 persons (but may also be sold as studio), but everything works.

column1: Fantastisk beliggenhed. Vildt mange lækre restauranter tæt på. Charmerende lejlighed. Super kommunikation med vært. Små minusser: Ikke så rent som ønsket f.eks. i skabe og på borde. Køkken svært at holde rent pga bordplade. Utæt loftsvindue med skimmelsvamp og manglende gardin, så man tog bad med potentielle """"tilskuere"""". Vært har lyttet opmærksomt på disse minusser og lovet at få dem i stand fremover. Tak for det.
column5: Great location. So many delicious restaurants close by. Charming apartment. Super communication with the host. Small minuses: Not as clean as desired f.ex. in cabinets and on tables. Kitchen difficult to keep clean due to the counter top. Leaking a sky window with mold and missing the curtain, so you took the bad with potential """"spectators"""". The host has listened carefully to these minuses and promised to get them in the future. Thank you for it.

column1: Vi var 4 unge piger, der boede i Charles' lejlighed, som var rigtig fin. Hyggelig lille loftlejlighed der indebar alt det vi havde brug for. Rigtig god beliggenhed og god kommunikation.
column5: We were 4 young girls who lived in Charles's apartment, which was really nice. Nice little loft apartment which included everything we needed. Really good location and good communication.

column1:
Meget fin og venlig modtagelse, hvor vi blev vist rundt. De var meget hjælpsomme.
Lejligheden fungerede perfekt. Vi var 6 voksne i lejligheden og det var fint med 3 soveværelser og 2 badeværelser.
Kvarteret var super hyggeligt med små delikatessebutikker. Lørdag foriddag blev der spillet jazz i gaden - mere Parisisk kan det ikke blive.
column5:
Very nice and friendly reception, where we were shown around. They were very helpful.
The apartment worked perfectly. We were 6 adults in the apartment and it was fine with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.
The neighborhood was super cozy with small luxury food shops. Saturday foriddag to play jazz in the street - more Parisian can it not be.

column1: Svært bra område, fantastisk mat i butikkane. Rask og profesjonell utleigar, hadde alt me trengte. Fin leikeplass like ved, kort veg til metro. Stille i leilegheita og livleg i gata. Svært barnevenleg. Velutstyrt og romsleg.
column5: Very good area, fantastic food in the local shops. Fast and professional utleigar, had everything we needed. Nice leikeplass close by, a short way to the metro. Set in leilegheita and livleg in the street. Very barnevenleg. Well-equipped and romsleg.

column1: God og nøyaktig beskrivelse av leiligheten. Fin og veldig praktisk leilighet i et vernet, gammelt hus.  Lite trafikkstøy i et koselig nabolag. Svært sentral beliggenhet med gangavstand til mange severdigheter som Pompidou senteret, Louvre og Notre Dame. Kort vei til flytoget.
column5: Good and accurate description of the apartment. Nice and very convenient apartment in a listed, old house. Little traffic noise in a cosy neighbourhood. Very central location with walking distance to many sights such as the Pompidou centre, the Louvre and Notre Dame. A short way to the airport.

column1: Had a great stay for one beautiful spring evening.
column5: Had a great stay for one beautiful spring evening.

column1:
Dårlig rengøring, men skøn beliggenhed og den billigste toværelses lejlighed, jeg har kunnet finde i Paris. 

Køkkenet er lille og mangelfuldt, men ok til at smøre madpakker i til parisiske eventyr. Jeg ville ikke lave mad i det.

De fotos der er af lejligheden er meget misvisende. Lejligheden bærer præg af, at Alexis er ved at flytte, med en dobbeltmadras på gulvet og et adskilt skab i soveværelset - det virker ikke som et beboet hjem.

Grunde til at vælge denne lejlighed alligevel: 
- venlig og fornuftig vært
- fantastisk beliggenhed
- fleksibel indtjekning/udtjekning
- to rum, så man kan putte et barn i det ene rum og være vågen i det andet
- Montmartre :)
column5:
Bad cleaning, but great location and the cheapest one bedroom apartment, I have been able to find in Paris. 

The kitchen is small and imperfect, but ok to prepare packed lunches in to the parisian adventure. I would not cook in it.

The photos of the apartment are very misleading. The apartment bears the imprint of that Alexis is about to move, with a double mattress on the floor and a separate closet in the bedroom - it does not work as an inhabited home.

Reasons to choose this apartment anyway: 
- friendly and reasonable host
- great location
- flexible check-in/check-out
- two compartments, so you can put a child in one room and be awake in the second
- Montmartre :)

column1:
Boligen var som beskrevet. Dog var der problemer med aircondition, som ikke virkede. Justine var yderst hjælpsom og skaffede en ventilator som fungerede fint. Lejligheden var ren og pæn og meget hyggelig og der var god hjælp fra Justine, som havde lavet god beskrivelse, og havde lagt anbefaling til restauranter, brochurer til diverse seværdigheder. Toiletforholdene var minimalistiske men OK
Lejligheden passede fint til 2 voksne og en teenager. Vi skulle sent afsted fra Paris og fik lov til at opbevare bagagen til vi skulle af sted
column5:
The home was as described. However, there were problems with the air conditioning which did not work. Justine was extremely helpful and provided a fan which worked fine. The apartment was clean and tidy and very cosy and there was plenty of help from Justine, who had made good description, and had to put recommendation for restaurants, brochures for various attractions. Toilet conditions were minimalist but OK
The apartment is ok for 2 adults and a teen. We had left late from Paris, and were allowed to store luggage until we were leaving

column1: Anne Bouviers lejlighed ligger på 5.sal uden elevator i en gammel beboelsesejendom, men er man bare i nogenlunde form er det ikke noget problem. Værelset er fint for én person med en hyggelig lille altan. Det er Paris i en nøddeskal. Beliggenheden i et parisisk boligområde er fin. Nær Place de la Republique og Canal Saint Martin. Mange cafeer i området med gode priser Super bagerbutik, ostebutik og et par minimarkeder. Kom ikke i bil! Fra Metro Republique (linie 9 og 11) er der gode forbindelser til de kendte seværdigheder.
column5: Anne Bouviers apartment is on the 5.floor without elevator in an old apartment building, but if you are just in roughly the form it is no problem. The room is fine for one person with a nice little balcony. It is Paris in a nutshell. Its location in a parisian residential is fine. Near the Place de la Republique and Canal Saint Martin. Many cafes in the area with good prices Super baked goods shop, ostebutik and a few mini-markets. Came not in the car! From Metro Republique (lines 9 and 11) there are good connections to the well-known sights.

column1: God beliggenhed og fair til prisen. Alexandra er meget hjælpsom.
column5: Good location and fair for the price. Alexandra is very helpful.

column1:
Det er vores 3. rejse til Paris, men 1. gang via airbnb.
Oplevelsen af selv at være en del af Paris var helt unik, og vi vil rejse på samme måde igen.
Lejligheden var præcis så skøn og indbydende som beskrevet og som set på fotos.
Det bedste var dog den varme modtagelse fra Isabelle og Francois. De var virkelig flinke, og havde en masse gode råd til at få det bedste ud vores ferie.
Vi fik altid meget hurtigt svar på vores spørgsmål på mail eller SMS.
column5:
It is our 3. travel to Paris, but the 1. walk through airbnb.
The experience of being a part of Paris was quite unique, and we will travel in the same way again.
The apartment was exactly as beautiful and welcoming as described and as seen on the photos.
The best though was the warm welcome from Isabelle and Francois. They were really nice, and had a lot of good advice to get the best out of our holiday.
We always got very fast answers to our questions on email or SMS.

column1: A recommander.
column5: A recommander.

column1: Tæt på metro, Montmatre, Moulan Rouge, tæt på bager, supermarked og restauranter
column5: Near metro, Montmatre, Moulan Rouge, close to bakery, supermarket and restaurants

column1: Vores korrespondance inden turen var rigtig god, Renaud var rigtig god til at besvare mine spørgsmål.  Vi blev modtaget af Renaud´s ven som var vældig sød til at fortælle os (på dårligt engelsk) om reglerne i lejligheden og om hvordan de forskellige ting foregik, m.h.t. affald, opvaskemaskine, vaskemaskine. Der lå ligeledes en beskrivelse på Engelsk vedr. lejligheden, anbefaling af restauranter, parker, indkøbscentre o.s.v. Da vi skulle hjem kom Renaud´s ven igen og tog imod nøglen og tjekkede det hele igennem. Super godt ophold, der kommer vi gerne igen.
column5: Our correspondence before the trip was really good, Renaud was very helpful to answer my questions. We were received by the Renauds a friend who was very sweet to tell us (in poor English) about the rules of the apartment and on how the various things going on, m.h.t. waste, dishwasher, washing machine. There was also a description in English subject. the apartment, the recommendation of restaurants, parks, shopping malls o.p.v. When we were home com Renauds friend again and took the key and checked it all through. Super nice stay, we are happy again.

column1: Super lejlighed, præcis som fotos. Fint nabolag med lokalbefolkning, gode cafeer og nogle fantastiske restauranter. Også en rigtig god bager. Trappen til 4. sal var ikke noget problem.
column5: Super apartment, exactly like the photos. Fine neighborhood with locals, great cafes and some fantastic restaurants. Also a really good baker. The stairs to the 4. floor was no problem.

column1: Dejligt central beliggenhed kan stærkt anbefales
column5: Great central location, highly recommended

column1: Velbeliggende lejlig i Paris
column5: Well-located apartment in Paris

column1: Lejligheden var en perfekt base for et ophold i Paris. Fint indrettet og gode faciliteter for en børnefamilie.
column5: The apartment was a perfect base for a stay in Paris. Nicely decorated and good facilities for a family with children.

column1: Ima,tres belle piece,et personne tres gentille
column5: Ima,very beautiful piece,and person very nice

column1:
Vi havde nogle dejlige dage i Odiles lejlighed, som lå skønt små 10 minutters gang fra Sacre Coeur og få minutter fra to metrostationer. 
Vi traf ikke Odile, men en """"vikar"""", men fik fin hjælp bl.a. forslag til transport fra lufthavnen fra Odile i vores korrespondance med hende før besøget. Lejligheden er lille, men meget velfungerende for to-tre personer. Fint køkken og bad.  
Kan varmt anbefales til andre, der vil opleve Paris!
column5:
We had some lovely days in Odiles apartment, which was, although short 10-minute walk from the Sacre Coeur and a few minutes from two metro stations. 
We did not Odile, but a """"relief""""but was fine using the bl.a. the proposal for a shuttle service from the airport from Odile in our correspondence with her before the visit. The apartment is small, but very smooth for two to three persons. Fine kitchen and bath. 
Can be highly recommended to others who want to experience Paris!

column1: Très gentil
column5: Very nice

column1: Imødekommende og informativ vært. Behagelig og afslappet atmosfære. Lejligheden som beskrevet. God morgenmad. Beliggenheden fin.
column5: Welcoming and informative host. Pleasant and relaxed atmosphere. The apartment as described. The breakfast was good. Location.

column1: Enjoyed staying here.
column5: Enjoyed staying here.

column1: Budget lägenhet med många rum, nära flera Metro stationer.
column5: Budget apartment with many rooms, and close to several Metro stations.

column1: Perfekt beliggenhed! Super altan, med god plads. Meget god og professionel korrespondance med god vejledning. Fantastiske anbefalinger til restauranter, seværdigheder, shopping, tog/metro osv. Alt i alt et rigtig godt ophold!
column5: Perfect location! Super balcony with plenty of space. Very good and professional correspondence with good guidance. Fantastic recommendations for restaurants, sights, shopping, train/metro, etc. All in all a really nice stay!

column1: Vi hadde et veldig fint opphold i Thierry sin leilighet. Perfekt beliggenhet for å utforske Paris til fots (og rett ved Metro'en). Bakeri, matbutikk og restauranter, samt shopping rett utenfor døren. Leiligheten er komfortabel med god plass og behagelig seng på soverommet. Takk for lånet, vi kommer gjerne tilbake.
column5: We had a very nice stay in Thierry's apartment. Perfect location for exploring Paris on foot (and right by the Metro). Bakery, grocery store and restaurants, as well as the shopping right outside the door. The apartment is comfortable with plenty of space and comfortable bed in the bedroom. Thank you for the loan, we will be back.

column1: 房东不在巴黎,交代Oliver与我们沟通,但在过程中,遇到任何问题,都用钱衡量,会要求住客额外费用｡而且用侮辱性词语形容中国人｡
column5: The landlord is not in Paris,confessed to Oliver to communicate with us,but in the process,encounter any problems,all with the money measure,ask at an additional cost as well. And using insulting words to describe the Chinese as well.

column1: Vi havde et dejligt ophold i Thierry's lejlighed, som har alle de nødvendige fornødenheder, er stille beliggende på 4 sal i den stille ende af Rue Saint Honere med utrolig let adgang til alt, hvad Paris kan byde på. Lejligheden har elevator lige til døren - kun een lejlighed på hver etage - og hele opholdet var ganske behageligt, hyggeligt og easy going;)
column5: We had a nice stay in Thierry's apartment, which has all the necessary necessities, is quietly located on the 4th floor at the quiet end of Rue Saint Honere with incredibly easy access to everything Paris can offer. The apartment has an elevator right to your door - only one apartment on each floor and the entire stay was quite comfortable, cozy and easy going;)

column1: 최고의 위치이다. 파리에서 갈만한 곳은 어디나 걸어갈수 있다. 주변에 레스토랑 카페 및 까르푸도 있어 편의시설도 편리. 그리고 빈티지한 감성을 느낄 수 있었다. Oliver는 무척 친절했다.
column5: Best location. In Paris where to go anywhere or walk. Around restaurants cafes and Carrefour you will enjoy your stay in comfort. And a vintage feeling could feel. Oliver is very friendly.

column1:
Vi blev meget venligt modtaget af vores værts moder, idet Oliver selv var i USA. Hun forklarede alt for os, både angående lejligheden og nabolaget. I øvrigt havde Oliver informeret os grundigt om alt pr. mail.
Lejligheden er meget velindrettet, smuk og smagfuld og der var alt hvad vi overhovedet kunne få brug for - køkkenudstyr, vaskemaskine, hårtørrer, strygejern - bøger, brochurer, TV, lydanlæg osv. Glimrende badeværelse. 
Nabolaget er yderst charmerende, med dejlige specialforretninger og gode restauranter lige om hjørnet.Bus-metro og RER  forbindelser bragte os let vidt omkring. 
Vi kan absolut anbefale Next to the Eiffel Tower og vil gøre det til venner og bekendte. Når vi næste gang sætter næsen mod Paris vil vi forsøge at booke Olivers lejlighed.
column5:
We were very kindly received by our host mother, while Oliver himself was in the UNITED states. She explained everything to us, both regarding the apartment and the neighborhood. In addition, had Oliver informed us thoroughly about everything per. mail.
The apartment is very well appointed, beautiful and tasteful and there was everything we could possibly need - kitchen utensils, washing machine, hairdryer, iron books, brochures, TV, audio set, etc. Excellent bathroom. 
The neighborhood is extremely charming, with lovely stores and good restaurants just around the corner.Bus, metro and RER connections brought us the light far around. 
We can definitely recommend Next to the Eiffel Tower and will make it to friends and acquaintances. When we next time put your nose against Paris we will try to book Oliver's apartment.

column1: Vi var helt igennem tilfredse med lejligheden og dens beliggenhed. Beskrivelsen af lejligheden passede fint med virkeligheden. Det fungerede fint med et soveværelse og toilet på begge etager.
column5: We were totally satisfied with the apartment and its location. The description of the apartment seemed to fit with reality. It worked fine with a bedroom and toilet on both floors.

column1: Delphine var en alletiders vært på trods af, at vi aldrig mødte hende personligt. Værelset, toilettet og lejligheden var ren og vi følte os hjemme under vores ophold. Rolig, hyggelig gade tæt på alle faciliteter i Paris. Delphine sendte os gode instruktioner inden vores ankomst, hvilket gjorde det hele let og overskueligt! Den bedste omtale herfra!
column5: Delphine was a great host, despite we never met her personally. The room, the toilet and the apartment was clean and we felt at home during our stay. Quiet, cosy street close to all facilities in Paris. Delphine sent us good instructions prior to our arrival, which made it all easy and manageable! The best publicity here!

column1: Det var en super fin lejlighed. Adam kom og mødte os, da vi tjekkede ind. Og fortalte om området.
column5: It was a super nice apartment. Adam came and met us when we checked in. And told about the area.

column1: Anne's lejlighed er super fin og beliggenheden helt i top. Området byder på mange cafeer, gode restauranter og så er det et område, hvor folk faktisk bor. Vi nød at handle på det lokale marked og hos den lækreste bager, lige så vel som vi nød at spise ude og hver gang fik vi super lækker mad. Anne er en sød og omsorgsfuld værtinde, vi vil elske at bo i hendes lejlighed igen.
column5: Anne's apartment is super nice and the location is absolutely top notch. The area offers many cafes, great restaurants, and so it is an area where people actually live. We enjoyed shopping at the local market and at the most delicious bakery, just as much as we enjoyed eating out and each time we got super delicious food. Anne is a sweet and caring hostess, we would love to stay in her apartment again.

column1:
Vi fik hurtigt en god kontakt til vores vært Marthe, som også var hjælpsom under opholdet. 
Lejligheden levede fuldt og helt op til beskrivelse og forventninger, og der var god information om de praktiske ting og om området i en særlig vekomstmappe.
Bestemt en lejlighed vi kunne vende tilbage til.
column5:
We quickly got a good contact with our host Marthe, which was also helpful during the stay. 
The apartment lived fully up to description and expectations, and there was good information on the practical things and about the area in a special vekomstmappe.
Definitely an apartment we would return to.

column1: Hyggelig lejlighed med super beliggenhed kun 300 meter fra metrostationen Abbesses. Kommunikationen med Marthe fungerede upåklageligt - både før og under opholdet.
column5: Cosy apartment with super location, just 300 metres from Abbesses metro station. Communication with Marthe worked flawlessly - both before and during the stay.

column1: Boligen levede fuldt ud op til vores forventninger:-)
column5: The accommodation fully lived up to our expectations:-)

column1: Pierres bolig er et rigtig fint sted at opleve Paris fra. Det er en hyggelig, renlig, dog lille, lejlighed. Beliggenheden er også rigtig fin, tæt på supermarkeder, metrostationer og diverse restauranter. Der kan være lidt langt ind til nogle af seværdigheder, men så ligger metroen heldigvis tæt på. Lejligheden føles sikker at være i, og området er også fint. Set fra to unge pigers synspunkt er det er en god bolig at opleve Paris fra.
column5: Pierre's home is a really nice place to experience Paris from. It is a pleasant, less harmful to the environment, however small, apartment. The location is also very fine, close to supermarkets, metro stations and various restaurants. There may be a little far for some of the sights, but so is the metro thankfully close. The apartment feels safe to be in, and the area is also fine. Seen from two young girls ' point of view, it is a good place to experience Paris from.

column1: Jeg anbefaler stærkt Monicas lejlighed, fordi den er let at finde. Tæt på metro og ved siden af lejligheden er der et supermarked og masser af gode spisesteder. Det er en ren og velholdt ,  hyggelig lejlighed. Værten er meget hjælpsom, hun gav os mulighed for at sætte vores bagage i hendes anden lejlighed, da vi skulle flyve hjem sent om aften. vi kommer snart igen.
column5: I highly recommend Monica's apartment, because it is easy to find. Close to the metro and next to the apartment there is a supermarket and plenty of good eateries. It is a clean and well-maintained , cozy apartment. The host is very helpful, she gave us the opportunity to put our luggage in her apartment, when we had to fly home late in the evening. we'll come back soon.

column1:
Fantastisk sted 

Denne lejlighed i Paris er stedet at bo når turen går til Paris.

Den ligger centralt i forhold til at komme rundt i Paris og alligevel ligger den i et roligt område så når du har været på rundtur i Paris om dagen så er det retur til lejligheden og hente ny energi på en super dejlig terasse inden aftensmaden nydes ude eller hjemme.

Der er mange gode restauranter, cafeer og butikker i området.

Det føles rart at være i lejligheden og vi følte os virkelig tilpas.

Yveline har været super responderende og en stor hjælp både før og under vores ophold - den perfekte vært.

Næste gang reserverer vi helt klart lejligheden før vi bestiller flybilletterne.

Yveline - tak fordi du var med til at give os en dejlig oplevelse i Paris.

Vi
column5:
Great place 

This apartment in Paris is the place to stay when going to Paris.

It is centrally located for getting around Paris and yet in a quiet area so when you have been on the tour in Paris on the day then it's back to the apartment and retrieve new energy in a super nice terrace before dinner be taken out or at home.

There are many good restaurants, cafes and shops in the area.

It feels nice to be in the apartment and we felt really comfortable.

Yveline has been super responsive and a great help both before and during our stay - the perfect host.

The next time booking, we completely clear the apartment before we book airline tickets.

Yveline - thank you for giving us a wonderful experience in Paris.

We

column1: Dejlig lejlighed, perfekt beliggende i Marais området. Virkelig mange gode og hippe cafeer og restauranter i nærheden. Lejligheden er præcis som beskrevet, sød lille pariser lejlighed, med alt hvad der skal bruges til 2-3 personer. Ruben er virkelig god vært, som sikrede god ankomst til lejligheden og gode guidelines.
column5: Lovely apartment, perfectly located in the Marais area. Really many nice and hip cafes and restaurants nearby. The apartment is exactly as described, cute little parisian apartment, with everything required for 2-3 persons. Ruben is really good host, which guaranteed the good arrival to the apartment and good guidelines.

column1: Charmerende lejlighed i rolige og dejlige omgivelser. Kan anbefales.
column5: Charming apartment in quiet and lovely surroundings. Can is recommended.

column1: Super placering og super fin lejlighed. Odile er meget flink og venlig. Jeg vil bestemt bo der igen.
column5: Super location and super nice apartment. Odile is very nice and friendly. I would definitely stay there again.

column1: Katrin var super imødekommende - selvom vi besluttede os i sidste øjeblik, fik hun tingene til at virke og det var dejligt. Alt det praktiske fungerede tiptop. Dejligt lille hus med egen lille have i lukket gård og en stor balkon på 1. sal. Alt levede op til beskrivelsen af huset og beliggenheden kan ikke blive bedre.
column5: Katrin was super accommodating - even though we decided at the last moment, she got things to work and it was great. Everything worked tiptop. Nice small house with a small private garden in a closed yard and a large balcony on the 1. floor. Everything lived up to the description of the house and the location could not be better.

column1:
En jättemysig liten lägenhet! Bra läge nära kanalen, Belleville, Republique, metron..
Allt funkade smidigt, bra kommunikation med Mathilde!
column5:
A very nice little apartment! Good location near the canal, Belleville, Republique, the metro..
Everything worked smoothly, good communication with Mathilde!

column1: Temmelig lille, men meget funktionel og ordentlig, tæt på metro og byliv. Værtinden er meget venlig og imødekommende.
column5: Pretty small, but very functional and decent, close to metro and city life. The hostess is very friendly and welcoming.

column1: Paula er en meget venlig og hjælpsom vært. Lejligheden ligger i et fantastisk område, og er - selv om den ligger i et livligt kvarter - meget stille. Lejligheden ligger i gåafstand til det helt centrale Paris. Kan kun anbefales.
column5: Paula is a very friendly and helpful host. The apartment is located in a great area, and although it is located in a lively district - very quiet. The apartment is located within walking distance to central Paris. Can only be recommended.

column1: Lejligheden ligger et fantastisk sted i Paris og meget centralt. Det var meget nemt at finde og meget nemt at tjekke ind. Alle informationer var sendt. Havde lidt problemer med at finde den rigtige dør, da der ikke var navn på døren. Der er kun dobbeltdyner, hvilket gav os udfordringer, da vi var mor og 2 voksne døtre. Meget fransk og autentisk
column5: The apartment is a great place in Paris and very central. It was very easy to find and very easy check-in. All the information was sent. Had a bit of trouble to find the right door, since there was no name on the door. There is only dobbeltdyner, which gave us challenges when we were mother and 2 adult daughters. Very French and authentic

column1:
Vi var heldige at overnatte i Arianes hyggelige lejlighed. Indretningen med et værelse og en udtræksseng i stuen fungerede fint for os, da vi var to mødre med hver sin datter. 
Lejligheden var fin og ren. Der var alt, hvad vi havde brug for på en forlænget weekend i Paris; incl. håndklæder og sengelinned. Metroen, supermarkedet og caféer lige omhjørnet og en super hyggelig og rolig lokal-stemning neden for vinduerne.
Ariane var hurtig til at svare på vores henvendelser, gav os ide om forudbetalt taxa via (Website hidden by Airbnb) (fungerede super!) og lod os have rådighed over lejligheden helt til om aftenen den sidste dag, så vi kunne lade kufferterne stå og lige nå tilbage, pakke færdig og blive klar til hjemrejsen.
Modtagelsen af Arianes """"house-keeper"""" var super; engelsktalende og intet problem, at flyet fra DK betød 1 times ventetid for ham.
Helt klart et godt sted at bo; vi kommer gerne tilbage!
column5:
We were lucky to stay in Arianes apartment. The interior design of a room and a fold-out bed in the living room worked fine for us, since we were two mothers, each with her daughter. 
The apartment was fine and clean. There was everything we needed for a weekend in Paris; incl. towels and bed linen. The metro, supermarket and cafés just omhjørnet and a super cozy and quiet, local ambiance at the bottom of the windows.
Ariane was quick to respond to our requests, gave us the idea about the prepaid taxi via (Website hidden by Airbnb) (worked great!) and allowed us to have disposal of the apartment completely to the on the evening of the last day, so we could leave the suitcases stand and just reach back, package finished and get ready for the return journey.
The receipt of the Arianes """"house-keeper"""" was super; English speaking and no problem, the flight from the UK meant 1 hour of waiting for him.
Definitely a good place to stay; we'd love to come back!

column1:
Lejligheden havde alt, hvad vi behøvede: Et værelse med en rigtig god seng og med spisebord. Rummeligt badeværelse og et lille køkken. Her først i november var det stadig så lunt, at vi kunne nyde vores morgenmad på altanen.
Lejligheden ligger næsten lige overfor metroen Richard Lenoir, og også tæt på Bastillepladsen, så det var nemt at komme omkring. Vi gik meget rundt og kan anbefale lidt længere gåture i området, f.eks. langs St. Martin kanalen, tur ad Promenade Plantée, Belvilleparken. Desuden er der mange fine, små caféer og restauranter, hvis man går ned ad Rue Froment og ad Rue de la Roquette, som er meget tæt på.
Der ligger et supermarked lige rundt om hjørnet, og torsdag og søndag er der marked midt på boulevarden ned mod Bastillepladsen.
column5:
The apartment had everything what we needed: A room with a great bed and with dining table. A spacious bathroom and a small kitchen. Here the first of november it was still so warm that we could enjoy our breakfast on the balcony.
The apartment is located almost right across from the metro Richard Lenoir, and also close to place de la Bastille, so it was easy to get around. We walked around a lot and can recommend the slightly longer walks in the area, f.ex. along the St. Martin canal, stroll down the Promenade Plantée, Belvilleparken. Moreover, there are many fine, small cafes and restaurants, if you walk down the Rue Froment and onto Rue de la Roquette, which is very close.
There is a supermarket just around the corner, and on Thursday and Sunday there is a market in the middle of the boulevard down towards the place de la Bastille.

column1: Fin sted I centrum af Montmartre, meget stille selv om lige på en stor vej. Fantastisk brasserie på den anden side af vejen. Perfekt til 2 eller 3 mennesker.
column5: Nice place In the centre of Montmartre, very quiet even though right on a major road. Great brasserie on the other side of the road. Perfect for 2 or 3 people.

column1:
제롬의 아파트는 에어비앤비 사진 그대로
완벽에 가까웠습니다. 파리에 도착해서
숙소를 찾는 건 너무 쉬웠고, 제롬은 친절하게
방 구석구석을 설명해 주었습니다.
아파트의 위치는 지하철 6분 거리 하나, 12분 거리
하나, 10분 거리 하나 총 3개의 가까운 역이
있어 다니기 매우 편했습니다. 동네에는

카페, 세탁실 등 실생활에 필요한 건 모두 있었습니다. 무엇보다 안전하고 조용한 동네에 위치하고
있어 테러가 발생한 후에도 아무 무리 없이

column1: Vi har haft et fantastisk ophold i Francks lejlighed, perfekt til to voksne og to teenagere. Dejlig beliggenhed.
column5: We have had a fantastic stay in Franck's apartment, perfect for two adults and two teenagers. Nice location.

column1: Lucies lejlighed er en klassisk Pariser-lejlighed med en fantastisk udsigt over byen og til Sacre Coeur. Kvarteret er klassisk livligt og det tager 20 min at gå til Sacre Coeur. Lucie er sød og kommunikerende.
column5: Lucies apartment is a classic Parisian apartment with a fantastic view over the city and to the Sacre Coeur. The neighborhood is a classic lively and it takes 20 min to go to the Sacre Coeur. Lucie is sweet and communicative.

column1:
Vanvittig lækker lejlighed i en let tilgængelig og meget sikker bygning-mængder af køkkengrej og andet brugbart.
Måske bedste placering i Paris. Spise, indkøb, slentre og transport i alle retninger - også ud af Paris ( banegård, metro og lufthavnsbus).
Og så et stenkast fra Montparnasse Kirkegården ( et must).
column5:
Crazy lovely apartment in an easily accessible and very secure building-quantities of kitchenware and other useful.
Perhaps the best location in Paris. Eating, shopping, strolling and transport in all directions - also out of Paris ( train station, metro and airport shuttle).
And so a stone's throw from Montparnasse Cemetery ( a must).

column1: Meget venlig, imødekommende og hjælpsom.
column5: Very friendly, welcoming and helpful.

column1: Skønt sted, rigtig god beliggenhed - stille og roligt.
column5: Great place, really good location - quiet and calm.

column1: Anderledes lejlighed i gammelt butikslokale. Lejligheden ligger i en fin gammel arkade, der er aflukket. Området er perfekt. Tæt på metro og centrum af Marais. Det er en lille lejlighed, men der er alt hvad man skal bruge - et veludstyret køkken, en fin seng og et godt badeværelse. Lejligheden er indrettet med gamle møbler, store spejle og masser af malerier.
column5: Different apartment in the old shop. The apartment is located in a fine old arcade, which is enclosed. The area is perfect. Close to the metro and the centre of the Marais. It is a small apartment, but there is everything you need - a well-equipped kitchen, a nice bed and a good bathroom. The apartment is furnished with old furniture, huge mirrors and lots of paintings.

column1: Meget venlig vært, der svarede hurtigt på henvendelser. Vi følte os meget velkomne. Rar lille lejlighed med fantastisk udsigt over byen. Hyggeligt kvarter, ikke turistet, tæt på metro direkte til centrum. Mange indkøbsmuligheder. Enkelte ting, skydedøre og blandingsbatterier fx.trænger til vedligeholdelse.
column5: Very friendly host, who responded quickly to inquiries. We felt us very welcome. Nice little apartment with a fantastic view over the city. Pleasant neighbourhood, not touristy, close to metro direct to the centre. Many shopping opportunities. Individual things, sliding doors and mixer taps for example.need for maintenance.

column1: Decline
column5: Decline

column1: Perfekt vært
column5: Perfect been

column1: Good place for Paris trip
column5: Good place for Paris trip

column1:
Det var rigtig fint at bo ved Cyril. Der var dejligt pænt og rent, og vi havde plads i køleskab og skabe til vores ting. Han var meget venlig og hjælpsom, specielt mht. guide hjælp omrking metro, cykler, spisesteder, indkøb osv. 
God oplevelse og kan klart anbefales.
column5:
It was really nice to stay at Cyril. There was a nice neat and clean, and we had space in the refrigerator and cabinets for our stuff. He was very friendly and helpful, especially the mht. guide help around the metro, bikes, restaurants, shopping, etc. 
Good experience and can clearly be recommended.

column1: Vi har meget tilfredse med lejligheden, som passede perfekt til vores familie på 3 - mor, far og teenagesøn. Cyril er en virkelig god vært, og vi følte os meget godt informeret. Lejligheden er indbydende og ren. Vi var også meget begejstrede for området med kanalen og cafeerne og den fantastiske Parc de la Villette, som vi brugte flittigt.
column5: We have been very satisfied with the apartment, which was perfect for our family of 3 - mom, dad, and teenage son. Cyril is a really good host and we felt us very well informed. The apartment is welcoming and clean. We were also very excited for the area with the canal and the cafes and the fantastic Parc de la Villette, which we used extensively.

column1:
Velkomsten af min vært da vi kom til lejligheden var over al forventning. Lejligheden blev vist frem, og der blev forklaret om området hvor lejligheden lå i.
Lejligheden levede mere end vi regnede med op til vores forventninger, og var for os en super base til at få set Paris. Kunne ikke ligge mere centralt i forhold til alt hvad der skal opleves i Paris. Lokal området med masser af cafeer m.m., og så til de store boulevarder.
En alt i alt fantastisk lejlighed, med en skøn vært.
column5:
The welcome by my host when we got to the apartment was beyond all expectations. The apartment was shown and was explained about the area where the apartment was in.
The apartment lived more than we bargained for, up to our expectations, and was for us a super base to see Paris. Could not be more centrally located in relation to everything that has to be experienced in Paris. The local area with lots of cafes m.m., and so to the big boulevards.
An all in all fantastic apartment, with a wonderful host.

column1: Superhyggeligt lille hus. Meget stille om natten, og hyggelig lille gårdhave. Varm anbefaling
column5: Very up market small house. Very quiet during the night, and the cozy little patio. Warm recommendation

column1: Great place for exploring Paris. A++
column5: Great place for exploring Paris. A++

column1: Det er en rigtig hyggelig lejlighed og meget pæn ren. Den ligger i et rigtig hyggeligt kvarter med mange små cafeer og butikker, om søndagen er der marked lige ude for døren. Sandra er en meget sød og hjælpsom vært.
column5: It is a really nice apartment and very tidy. It is located in a really nice neighborhood with many little cafes and shops, on Sundays there is a market just out the door. Sandra is a very sweet and helpful host.

column1: Det var en helt fantastisk lejlighed med en helt fantastisk beliggenhed! Lejligheden havde alt hvad man havde brug for, og Celine var den sødeste vært.
column5: It was a fantastic apartment with an amazing location! The apartment had everything you needed, and Celine was the sweetest host.

column1: dejligt centralt ophold i Paris - dejligste tag-terrasse med super udsigt.  Jean Jacques giver en rigtig god service
column5: nice location, stay in Paris - beautiful roof terrace with super views. Jean Jacques offers a very good service

column1:
Fantastisk sted for to personer.
Tæt på offentlig transport, indkøb og spisesteder.
column5:
Great place for two people.
Close to public transport, shopping and eateries.

column1: Det lille studio var det perfekte sted at bo for min kæreste og jeg på vores korte tur til Paris. Lejligheden er hyggelig og har et dejligt lille badeværelse og toilet. Beliggenheden kunne ikke være bedre - tæt på smukke Canal Saint Martin, en kort gåtur til fantastiske restauranter og butikker i Marais, 5 minutter fra Du Pain et Des Idées, der laver Paris' bedste croissanter, og tæt på mange metrostationer, hvilket gør det let at komme rundt. Har man mod på det, kan man også gå til Notre Dame, Louvre og Centre Pompidou. Grégory og Arnaud var behjælpelige og nemme at komme i kontakt med.  Jeg kan klart anbefale at bo her!
column5: The small studio was the perfect place to stay for my girlfriend and I on our short trip to Paris. The apartment is cozy and has a nice, small bathroom and toilet.
