The location could not be better - close to the beautiful Canal Saint Martin, a short walk to amazing restaurants and shops in the Marais, 5 minutes from Du Pain et Des Idées, which makes Paris' best croissants, and close to many metro stations, making it easy to get around. Are on it, you can also go to Notre Dame, the Louvre and the Centre Pompidou. Grégory and Arnaud was helpful and easy to get in touch with. I can clearly recommend to stay here!

column1:
Vi følte os velkomne fra starten. Hyggelig lille værelse og lige midt i de små gader ved St. Germain med cafeer, restauranter og små sjove butikker.
Vi kommer gerne igen og besøger stedet.
column5:
We felt us welcome from the start. Cozy small room and right in the middle of the small streets of St. Germain with its cafes, restaurants and small funny shops.
We would be happy to come again and visit the site.

column1:
Meget søde og venlige værter. 
Stedet er under renovering, så der var ikke meget plads. 
Toilet og bad deles med 4-6 personer, men det gik nu meget godt. 
Egner sig bedst til kortere ophold og par der kan klare en relativ lille dobbeltseng.
column5:
Very cute and friendly hosts. 
The site is under renovation, so there was not much space. 
Toilet and bath shared with 4-6 people, but it went very well. 
Best suited for a short stay and the few that can cope with a relatively small double bed.

column1: Værten stod og tog imod os, da vi ankom til lejligheden, selvom vi 1 time forsinket i lufthavnen. Værten var utrolig sød og hjælpsom til at vise lejligheden frem. Der var sat en velkomst vin, som vi kunne gøre brug af. Lejligheden er helt perfekt til 2 mennesker. Folk i nabolaget hilste pænt og var meget imødekommende. Et rigtigt rart sted at være. Vi kunne sagtens være der i en længere periode.
column5: The host stood and welcomed us when we arrived to the apartment, even though we are 1 hour delayed at the airport. The host was incredibly sweet and helpful to show the apartment. There was a welcome wine which we could make use of. The apartment is absolutely perfect for 2 people. People in the neighborhood greeted nicely and was very accommodating. A really nice place to be. We could easily be there for a longer period of time.

column1:
Værten var ikke tilstede da vi ankom så vi har ingen oplevelse af hende direkte, men der var fin beskrivelse af hvorledes vi kom ind.
Lejligheden lå dejligt i Paris, tæt på Park Luxemburg. Køkkenfaciliteterne var ikke så gode i forhold til prisniveauet.
column5:
The host was not present when we arrived so we have no experience of her directly, but there was a fine description of how we came into.
The apartment location is great, in Paris, close to Park Luxembourg. The kitchen facilities were not as good compared to the price level.

column1:
Lejligheden ligger rigtig godt, få meter fra Metro og busser. Godt kvarter med mange gode spisesteder. Gode indkøbsmuligheder i nærheden.
Vi var 4 voksne i en uge. Det var for meget til den lejlighed. Der var ingen udluftningsmulighed-ingen vinduer-det gav problemer med det knapt tildelte håndklæder- de kunne ikke tørre. Sengene var meget ukomfortable. Køkkenudstyr mangelfuldt.
column5:
The apartment is located very good, few meters from Metro and buses. Good neighbourhood with many good restaurants. Good shopping facilities nearby.
We were 4 adults for a week. It was too much for the apartment. There was no udluftningsmulighed-no windows-it gave problems with the barely allotted towels - they could not dry. The beds were very uncomfortable. Kitchen utensils lacking.

column1:
Særdeles venlig og præcis kommunikation med imponerende svartider fra Thierry før rejsen. 

Lejligheden indeholdt det, den skulle - lidt slidt, men velfungerende.

Dejligt roligt kvarter med gode restauranter og indkøbsmuligheder. Behageligt tæt på Metro.
column5:
Very friendly and precise communication with impressive response times from Thierry before the journey. 

The apartment contained it, it should - a little worn, but functioning.

Nice quiet neighborhood with good restaurants and shopping. Pleasant close to the Metro.

column1: Min kæreste og jeg havde fem skønne dage i Giangs dejlige lejlighed. Vi må klart fremhæve den skønne altan, hvor vi med udsigt til Eiffeltårnet spiste vores morgenmad og nød et glas vin. Lejligheden ligger tæt på en metrostation, så det var let at komme ind i hjertet af Paris. Vi vil klart anbefale Giang som vært og lejligheden er et rigtig godt udgangspunkt for et besøg i Paris.
column5: My girlfriend and I had five lovely days in Giangs lovely apartment. We must clearly highlight the lovely balcony with view to the Eiffel tower, ate our breakfast and enjoyed a glass of wine. The apartment is located close to a metro station, so it was easy to get into the heart of Paris. We will definitely recommend Giang as host and the apartment is a very good starting point for a visit in Paris.

column1: Giangs lejlighed er virkelig et dejligt sted at komme til. Der er en hjemlig atmosfære, som man føler sig rigtig godt tilpas i. Flere beskrivelser af alt man har brug for at vide. En dejlig modtagelse. Man bliver hurtig kendt med kvarteret og kan let komme til en metro. Der var intet, som kunne have været bedre.
column5: Giangs apartment is really a nice place to come to. There is a homely atmosphere which you will feel really comfortable in. More descriptions of everything you need to know. A lovely reception. One will be quick well-known with the neighborhood and can easily get to a metro. There was nothing that could have been better.

column1:
Virkelig lækker lejlighed. Ren og pæn. Ligger i et rigtig hyggeligt område.
Christine var meget hjælpsom, og tog meget godt imod os.
column5:
Really nice apartment. Clean and neat. Located in a really nice area.
Christine was very helpful and took very good against us.

column1: Vi var glade for at bo i det lille studio. Det er mindre og mørkere end man oplever på billederne - badeværelset er i top, og der er alt hvad man behøver. Kvarteret er det bedste af det hele, og lejligheden ligger i en smøge, så der også er roligt. Alt i alt en god oplevelse.
column5: We were happy to stay in the small studio. It is smaller and darker than those experienced in the pictures - the bathroom is in the top, and there is everything you need. The neighborhood is the best of it all, and the apartment is located in an alley, so also is quiet. All in all a good experience.

column1: Christines bolig er placeret perfekt, lige ved siden af bastille pladsen, omringet af gode cafeer, shoppemuligheder og en masse liv! Hendes lille lejlighed er hyggelig og egner sig perfekt til en kort ferie i en storby. Sengen er en smule hård, ellers var alt perfekt.
column5: Christine's home is located perfectly, right next to the bastille square, surrounded by good cafes, shopping areas and a lot of life! Her small apartment is cozy and lends itself perfectly to a short holiday in a big city. The bed is a bit hard, otherwise everything was perfect.

column1:
Lejligheden ligger rigtig godt, og man får præcis det man ser på billederne. Det er ikke en kæmpe penthouse lejlighed, men den fungerer helt fint til 2 personer - ret hyggeligt. 
Værten er hurtig til at svare og der var generelt ingen problemer. 
Alt i alt et godt ophold!
column5:
The apartment is really good, and you get exactly what you see in the pictures. It is not a big penthouse apartment, but it works perfectly fine for 2 persons - right cozy. 
The host is quick to respond and there were generally no problems. 
All in all a nice stay!

column1:
Vi blev modtaget af en yderst venlig værtinde - og det til trods for at vi først ankom til midnat.
Lejligheden var smuk, ren og indbydende. Der var alt hvad vi kunne ønske.  Beliggenheden var perfekt - lige midt i Marais.
column5:
We were greeted by a very friendly hostess - and this despite the fact that we only arrived at midnight.
The apartment was beautiful, clean and inviting. There was everything we could wish for. The location was perfect - right in the middle of the Marais.

column1: En hyggelig lejlighed som er børnevenlig. Vi nød vores ophold.
column5: A cosy apartment which is child-friendly. We enjoyed our stay.

column1: Leiligheten er fantastisk! Alle detaljene, maleriene på veggene, høyden under taket. Den er like vakker i virkeligheten som på bildene. Nabolaget føltes trygt og godt. Det tok ca 15 minutter å gå til Latinerkvarteret, og 30 minutter til Marais. En fantastisk restaurant lå like om hjørnet: Les Papilles.
column5: The apartment is fantastic! All the details, the paintings on the walls, the height under the roof. It is as beautiful in reality as on the pictures. The neighborhood felt safe and good. It took about 15 minutes to walk to the Latin quarter, and 30 minutes to the Marais. A wonderful restaurant was located just on the corner: Les Papilles.

column1: Tolle Unterkunft!!!!
column5: Great Place To Stay!!!!

column1:
Vi havde en absolut topklasses oplevelse. Hyggelig og meget personlig lejlighed i hele tre plan. Emma var fantastisk sød og hjælpsom og kvarteret er fuld af autentisk pariserstemning, dejlige restauranter og en café på hvert hjørne. Det kunne ikke være meget bedre. 
Varm anbefaling!
column5:
We had an absolute topklasses experience. Cozy and very personal apartment in the entire three level. Emma was great-sweet and helpful, and the neighborhood is full of authentic parisian atmosphere, lovely restaurants and a café on every corner. It could not be much better. 
Warm recommendation!

column1: Pæn og hyggelig lejlighed, hvor man følte sig velkommen. Roligt kvarter. Dejligt med altan til stille gård.
column5: Nice and cozy apartment, where you felt welcome. Quiet neighborhood. Nice with balcony to the quiet courtyard.

column1:
Virkelig dejlig lejlighed med fantastisk udsigt.
Alt fungerede perfekt.
column5:
Really lovely apartment with great views.
Everything worked perfectly.

column1: Hyggeligt område i en rigtig pariser lejlighed. Roligt kvarter men tæt på hyggelige restauranter. Lejligheden har alt hvad man har brug for til en forlænget weekend i Paris.
column5: Nice area in a real parisian apartment. Quiet neighborhood but close to quaint restaurants. The apartment has everything you need for a extended weekend in Paris.

column1: Super.
column5: Super.

column1: 메세지로 위치를 알려줬으나 찾기 조금 어려웠다.
column5: Message location informed, but find a little difficult.

column1:
Maries lille værelse med bad,  køleskab og kaffemaskine ligger ganske ideelt og tæt på en lang række seværdigheder i Paris, specielt hvis man finder ud af Metro -systemet. Værelset er behageligt og fordi det ligger væk fra passagen, er der stille og roligt ingen  larm fra gaden.
Værtesfolket er ukompliceret og blander sig ikke.
column5:
Marie's small room with bath, fridge and coffee machine is quite ideal and close to a variety of sights in Paris, especially if you find out the Metro system. The room is comfortable and because it is located away from the passage, it is quiet and quiet, no noise from the street.
Værtesfolket is uncomplicated and does not interfere.

column1: Min datter og jeg havde et skønt ophold i Zannes lejlighed der ligger fantastisk placeret i vores yndlings Marais kvarter, meget fint i en lille stille sidegade, og utrolig tæt på metro, shopping og fine cafeer og restauranter lige om hjørnet. Zanne tog selv imod da vi kom og alt i lejligheden fungerede perfekt ! Vi vil helt sikkert spørge Zanne om lov til at leje denne skønne plet næste gang vi besøger byernes by ! Katja/DK
column5: My daughter and I had a wonderful stay in Zannes apartment is fantastically positioned in our favorite Marais district, very fine in a small quiet side street, extremely close to metro, shopping and fine cafes and restaurants just around the corner. Zanne took from when we arrived and everything in the apartment worked perfectly ! We will definitely ask Zanne for permission to rent this beautiful spot the next time we visit the city ! Katja/DK

column1: Great location.  Beautiful light.  Comfortable beds. Good kitchen.  Lots of great local information left for us from Zanne.
column5: Great location.  Beautiful light.  Comfortable beds. Good kitchen.  Lots of great local information left for us from Zanne.

column1:
Vi blev modtaget af en veninde til værten da han melde fra i sidste øjeblik, men det var en god modtagelse og vi blev hurtigt sat ind i lejlighedens funktioner etc. (på fransk).
Beliggenheden kan der måske sættes lidt på da lejligheden vender ud til en gade hvor der måske ikke er så meget velstand at spore :-) men ellers fungerer det fint og er tæt på Place de la Bastille (10 min gang).
Lejligheden er slidt og de billeder der er på nettet er ikke opdateret og giver derfor ikke det helt rigtige billede af standen. Men lejligheden fungerer og vi havde plads nok til os alle 5.
column5:
We were received by a friend to the host when he sign at the last moment, but it was a good reception and we were quickly plugged into the apartment's features etc. (in French).
The location may maybe be put a little on since the apartment faces out to a street, where perhaps there is not as much wealth to track down :-) but otherwise it works fine and is close to the Place de la Bastille (10 min walk).
The apartment is worn and the pictures that are on the network are not updated and therefore does not give the right picture of the booth. But the apartment works, and we had enough space for us all 5.

column1: Vi havde et fantastisk ophold i Paris. Jérôme var sød og behjælpsom. Lejligheden var ren og lækkert indrettet og lokationen var super!
column5: We had a great stay in Paris. Jérôme was cute and rustic. The apartment was clean and nicely furnished and the location was super!

column1: Stanislas var hele vejen igennem en sympatisk fyr og en særdeles hjælpsom vært, der lyttede til vores behov fra først til sidst. Han sørgede for vi fik lejligheden helt for os selv i de 4 døgn vi var der. Jeg vil varmt anbefale dette charmerende sted til alle.
column5: Stanislas was all the way through a likeable guy and a very helpful host, who listened to our needs from the first to the last. He made sure we got the apartment all to ourselves in the 4 days we were there. I would highly recommend this charming place to all.

column1: Alles tippi-toppi! Gerne wieder :)
column5: Everything tippi toppi! Happy again :)

column1: Boligen lever til fulde op til billederne. Det er en meget personlig og hyggelig lejlighed. Beliggenheden er i top. Området er levende og klart et beboelsesområde og ikke overtaget af turister. Derfor er der mange gode spisesteder, som ikke er turistfælder. Og interessante butikker i området. Det ligger centralt. Andre interessante områder er i gåafstand fra lejligheden. Der er kortbgåafstand til flere metrostationer.
column5: Dwelling living to the fullest up to the pictures. It is a very personal and cosy apartment. The location is in the top. The area is vibrant and clearly a residential area and not taken over by tourists. Therefore, there are many good restaurants which are not tourist traps. And the interesting shops in the area. It is centrally located. Other interesting areas are within walking distance from the apartment. There is kortbgåafstand to several metro stations.

column1: Vi havde et rigtig dejlig ophold i Francesca's bolig. Beliggenheden er super, tæt på cafeer, restauranter og metro. Lejligheden er lys og rummelig og perfekt til par eller venner.
column5: We had a really lovely stay in Francesca's home. The location is super, close to cafes, restaurants and the metro. The apartment is light and spacious and perfect for couples or friends.

column1: Lejligheden har en super god placering. Det er ikke muligt, at lave mad i lejligheden, der mangler kogegrej og kogepladerne fik vi ikke til at fungere. Grim lugt fra kloakken.
column5: The apartment has a super good location. It is not possible to cook in the apartment, missing cooking utensils and plates, we were not to work. Nasty smell from the sewer.

column1: Super lejlighed perfekt beligenhed...
column5: Super apartment, perfect location...

column1: En hyggelig lejlighed, med god udsigt over byen. Fair pris og ikke mindst, i rolige omgivelser. Et rigtig godt sted.
column5: A cozy apartment, with good views over the city. Fair price, and not the least, in tranquil surroundings. A really good place.

column1:
Emmanuel skrev en mail en uge inden ankomst og fortalte at der ville være klart med rene håndklæder og sengelinned.
Han gav i samme mail info omkring ting som adresse, wifi, gode restauranter, nærmeste supermarked, hyggelige caféer osv. så man fra start havde lidt lokal kendskab med i baghånden - mega udførligt og mega god stil fra hans side af!
column5:
Emmanuel wrote an email a week before arrival and told that there would be clear with clean towels and bed linen.
He gave in the same email info about things like address, wifi, good restaurants, supermarket, cozy cafes, etc. so from the start had a little local knowledge in the backhand - mega detail and mega good style from his side of the!

column1: Det var nemt at tjekke ind i lejligheden, da nøglen ligger i en boks på døren. Vi var tilfredse med området lejligheden ligger i, da der er mange metroer nær og gode cafeer, med mere. Selvom lejligheden ligger i stueetagen, er man ikke påvirket særlig meget af gadelarm. Lejligheden er fin, dog med enkelte mangler; en opvaskebørste, viskestykker og klud. Vi opdagede første aften at sovesofaen var i stykker, så vi måtte bære madrassen derfra nedenunder. Dette fungerede super fint. Dog manglede der er også et lagen til denne seng. Der var et skilt på døren til opgangen omkring rotter, og der var myrer enkelte steder på gulvet. Lejligheden var ikke skinnende ren da vi ankom, men det var ok. Alt i alt en fin oplevelse.
column5: It was easy to check in in the apartment, since the key is in a box at the door. We were satisfied with the area the apartment is located in, as there are many metros close by and great cafes, with more. Though the apartment is located on the ground floor, one is not affected very much by not far from the river. The apartment is fine, however, with a few gaps; a adults with two bathrooms, kitchen linen and cloth. We discovered the first evening that the sofa bed was in pieces, so we had to carry the mattress away underneath. This worked super fine. However, missing is also a sheet for this bed. There was a sign on the door to the stairwell around the rats, and there were ants in a few places on the floor. The apartment wasn't spotlessly clean when we arrived, but it was ok. All in all a fine experience.

column1: 房子很不错 ,房东特别gentil~!
column5: 房子很不错 ,房东特别gentil~!

column1: Fin lille lejlighed til 2 personer. Meget samarbejdsvillig omkring tider for indtjekning. Generelt et hyggeligt sted tæt på offentlig transport og Paris' centrum.
column5: Nice little apartment for 2 persons. Very cooperative about times for check-in. In general, a cozy place, close to public transport and the centre of Paris.

column1:
Vi havde en rigtigt god oplevelse. Domonique tog godt i mod os - der manglede ingenting. Fint værelse og meget rent og pænt. Der var alting på værelset. 
Han var sød at snakke med og opbevarede vores bagage sidste dag inden vi skulle afsted til lufthavnen. Alt i alt en virkelig god oplevelse og jeg vil helt sikkert anbefale stedet til andre.
column5:
We had a really good experience. Domonique took well against us it was nothing. Great room and very clean and neat. There was everything in the room. 
He was sweet to talk with and stored our luggage the last day before we were leaving for the airport. All in all a really good experience and I will definitely recommend the site to others.

column1: Charles var der til at tage imod os og sætte os ind i lejligheden, og han var sød til følge op på, om alt var som det skulle være. Lejligheden er lidt mindre i virkeligheden end på billederne, men stor nok til os 4 kvinder. Det er et hyggeligt og fint kvarter i Paris.
column5: Charles was there to greet us and put us into the apartment, and he was sweet to follow up on whether everything was as it should be. The apartment is a little smaller in reality than on the pictures, but big enough for us 4 women. It is a cosy and fine neighbourhood in Paris.

column1:
Et fantastisk ophold i en skøn skøn lejlighed. Udlejer var så søde at gøre det til en god oplevelse at komme til Paris. Der var redt op, lagt en sød besked og sat en flaske vin til velkomst.
Lejligheden ligget simpelthen fantastisk i den mest fantastiske bydel, vi kunne ikke have boet bedre.

Tusind tak for en skønt ophold, vi kommer igen næste år, måske før;O)

Mvh Iben + co
column5:
A great stay in a wonderful great apartment. The landlord was so sweet to make it a good experience to come to Paris. That was made up, posted a sweet message, and set a bottle of wine to welcome.
The apartment been simply amazing in the most amazing town, we could not have lived better.

Thank you for a wonderful stay, we will come again next year, maybe sooner.; O)

Sincerely Iben + co

column1: Vi havde lyst til selv at bo i hendes excentriske, dog hypermoderne, hjem! Der er lækkert lys i lejligheden, masser af plads og den ligger i gåafstand til ALT!
column5: We wanted to stay in her eccentric, however, cutting-edge, home! There is nice light in the apartment, plenty of space and it is located in walking distance to EVERYTHING!

column1: Fantastisk belikkenhed super modtagelse meget Fransk med knirkende gulve og afskallet maling samt huller i møbler .
column5: Great warm super reception very French with creaky floors and husked paint and holes in the furniture .

column1:
God lejlighed, tæt beliggende på metro, barer, cafeer og indkøbs muligheder. Lejligheden er godt indrettet med 2 store værelser, stort badeværelse samt stue og lille hyggeligt køkken med alt du har brug for. Lejligheden var ren og indbydende da ved ankomst. Hovedsageligt en positiv oplevelse om de få negative ting ved lejligheden er, gulvet er meget knirkende samt luftfugtigheden er meget høj. 
Mange tak til Nicolas og Yann for en meget behagelig oplevelse.
column5:
Good apartment, centrally located to the metro, bars, cafes and shopping opportunities. The apartment is well furnished with 2 large rooms, large bathroom, and a living room and a small cosy kitchen with everything you need. The apartment was clean and inviting as upon arrival. Mainly a positive experience on the few negative things about the apartment, the floor is very creaky, and the humidity is very high. 
Many thanks to Nicolas and Yann for a very pleasant experience.

column1: Meget hyggelig familie lejlighed ejet af et sødt ægtepar - ligger i et fantastisk kvarter og alt i lejligheden fungerede fint .
column5: Very cosy family apartment owned by a sweet married couple - is located in a great neighbourhood and everything in the apartment worked fine .

column1:
Frank gjorde alt hvad der er muligt for, at vi kunne finde boligen og få et fantastisk ophold. 
Vi var en gruppe på 9 voksne og 2 babyer. Det kunne ikke blive bedre.
column5:
Frank did everything possible that we could find the home and get a great stay. 
We were a group of 9 adults and 2 babies. It could not be better.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed i populært og chamerende kvarter. Gode transportmuligheder. Fine indkøbsmuligheder og mange spisesteder.
column5: Nice apartment in the popular and charming neighborhood. Good transport options. Fine shopping and many eateries.

column1: Helt igennem fantastisk sted. Kan kun varmt anbefale denne lejlighed.
column5: Absolutely fantastic place. Can only highly recommend this apartment.

column1:
Vi havde et fantastisk ophold i lejligheden. Lejligheden fremstod præcis som på billederne og beliggenheden var perfekt. 
Stéphane gav os lov at tjekke sent ud, så det passede bedre med vores fly hjem til Danmark.
Vi kan klart anbefale denne lejlighed til alle der ønsker at bo i en hyggelig lejlighed med central beliggenhed i Paris.
column5:
We had a great stay in the apartment. The apartment appeared exactly as in the pictures and the location was perfect. 
Stéphane allowed us to late check out, so it was fitting better with our flight home to Denmark.
We can clearly recommend this apartment to all who want to stay in a cosy apartment with a central location in Paris.

column1: Meget fin beliggenhed. Fin lille lejlighed, hvor alt nødvendigt var at finde. Fin kommunikation med Francois, som var meget behjælpelig
column5: Very good location. Nice little apartment, where everything necessary was to find. Fine communication with Francois, that was very helpful

column1: Vi fik en grundig information  vedr. lejligheden og nabolagets, turiskatraktioner, cafeer og indkøbsmuligheder. lejligheden er hyggelig, pæn og ren.
column5: We got a thorough information regarding. the apartment and the neighborhood, turiskatraktioner, cafes and shopping facilities. the apartment is cozy, neat and clean.

column1:
Vi har haft booket Jacques lejlighed i 12 dage og har kun positive ting at sige. Vi blev godt taget imod af Jacques som havde sørget for en flaske kold hvidvin i køleskabet og friske crossainter. Lejligheden var fin og ren og yderst velfungerende. Den lå i et dejligt kvarter tæt på masser af oplevelser og skønne cafeer og restauranter. Vi kan klart anbefale denne lejlighed og ønsker at booke denne lejlighed igen hvis vi igen kommer til Paris.
De bedste anbefalinger fra Martin og Bettina fra Danmark.
column5:
We had booked Jacques apartment in 12 days and have only positive things to say. We were well taken against Jacques had arranged for a bottle of cold white wine in the fridge and fresh crossainter. The apartment was nice and clean and extremely smooth functioning. It was in a nice neighborhood close to lots of experiences and wonderful cafes and restaurants. We can clearly recommend this apartment and want to book this apartment again if we come to Paris.
The best recommendations from Martin and Bettina from Denmark.

column1: Det var en virkelig god beliggenhed og et hyggeligt sted. Kort til alt man gerne vil se, og julien var god til at skrive al info man havde brug for
column5: It was a really good location and a cosy place. Map for everything you want to see, and julien was good to write all the info you need

column1:
Lejlighed med en fantastisk udsigt, kan kun anbefales. Du har Paris foran dig, og du kan drømme dig væk i Paris´s historie, blot ved at se ud over alle tagene, skorstene. Magisk.

Lejligheden ligger tæt på butikker og restauranter. Du har alt hvad du skal bruge, lille praktisk køkken hvor du kan lave din egen mad. Vi var der i en vintermåned, det må være fantastisk i forår, sommer og efterår, hvor balkonen kan bruges fuldt ud.

Martine gav os god beskrivelse af lejlighed og vejen dertil. Dog mødte vi hende ikke i person. Tak til Martine for at lade os bo her, i denne dejligt lille perle.
column5:
Apartment with a fantastic view, can only be recommended. You have Paris in front of you, and you can dream yourself away in paris's history just by looking out over all the roofs, chimneys. Magical.

The apartment is close to shops and restaurants. You have everything you need, small practical kitchen where you can cook your own food. We were there in a vintermåned, it must be stunning in spring, summer and autumn, where the balcony can be used fully.

Martine gave us a good description of the apartment and the path to it. However, we met her not in person. Thanks to Martine for letting us stay here, in this lovely little gem.

column1:
Meget dejlig lejlighed! Der var rent og pænt, med alt klar da vi kom. Fantastisk udsigt ud over hele Paris. Man skal helst kunne lide lidt høje altaner ;-)

Vi fik god besked om alt fra Martine - super anbefalet til alle, som skal have en hyggetur  til Parismed base i Montmatre
column5:
Very nice apartment! It was clean and neat, with everything ready when we arrived. Fantastic view over Paris. You should be able to suffer a little high balconies ;-)

We got the good message about everything from Martine - super recommended to all, which must have a fab trip to Parismed base in Montmatre

column1:
Min datter og jeg tilbragte 3 nætter i denne helt fantastiske lejlighed med en helt ENESTÅENDE udsigt over Paris. Alt fungerer så fint, og vi nød det i fulde drag. Lejligheden ligger i et kvarter med en masse små hyggelige spisesteder og fine butikker. 

Vi spiste morgenmad på terrassen og nød den fantastiske panoramaudsigt. Retur om aftenen sad vi der igen - og kunne nyde Eiffeltårnet lyse i det fjerne. 

Martine stod som aftalt klar foran bygningen, da vi ankom. Vi fik herefter en fin intro til stedet og omgivelserne, og vi kunne tage hul på vores Pariserdage. Vi kan anbefale denne bolig 100% og kommer meget gerne igen.
column5:
My daughter and I spent 3 nights in this absolutely fantastic apartment with a UNIQUE view over Paris. Everything works so fine and we enjoyed it to the full. The apartment is located in a neighborhood with a lot of small cozy eateries and fine shops. 

We ate breakfast on the terrace and enjoyed the stunning panoramic views. Return in the evening we sat there again and could enjoy the Eiffel tower light in the distance. 

Martine stood, as agreed, ready in front of the building when we arrived. We were then given a fine intro to the site and the surroundings, and we could take the hole in our Pariserdage. We can recommend this accommodation 100% and come very gladly again.

column1: Fantastisk lejlighed, super beliggenhed. Meget venlig og hjælpsom vært
column5: Great apartment, super location. Very friendly and helpful host

column1:
Martines lejlighed er på alle måder perfekt. Der er alt, hvad der skal være: Fantastisk udsigt, en seng, man sover dejligt i. 
Vi skulle vænne os til, hvordan fjernsyner fungerede, men det bruger man jo ikke så meget på ferien. Meget svag lyd fra gaden, lejligheden ligger også på 7. sal. elevatoren er meget lille, så to personer med bagage kan den ikke klare. Men det tog vi i etaper. Martine var der pludselig, da vi ankom til ejendommen. Koderne til indgangen står på vedhænget til nøglen, så allerede på tredjedagen turde vi at lægge nøglen under måtten, som Martine havde foreslået os. Balkonen er fantastisk at sidde og spise morgenmad på, mens man nyder udsigten.
 Hvis man skal til Gare du Nord kan det bedst betale sig at gå.  Alt i alt den perfekte lejlighed for 2 i Paris. 
Vi kommer helt sikkert igen.
column5:
Martines apartment is in all ways perfect. There is everything, what there should be: Great views, a bed, you sleep great in. 
We had to get used to how fjernsyner worked, but it uses not so much on the holidays. Very weak sound from the street, the apartment is also at 7. floor. the elevator is very small, so two people with luggage can not clear. But we went in stages. Martine was suddenly there, when we arrived to the property. The codes for the entrance on the pendant for the key, so already on the third day we could to put the key under the mat, as Martine had suggested us. The balcony is great to sit and eat breakfast while enjoying the view.
If you need to Gare du Nord, it can best pay to go. All in all the perfect apartment for 2 in Paris. 
We will definitely go again.

column1: Fantastisk gæstfrihed og god praktisk information fra værten Arno
column5: Great hospitality and good practical information from the host Arno

column1:
Kære Emma! 
Det var en fornøjelse at bo i din fine lejlighed. Vi følte os så godt som hjemme! 
Lejligheden ligger dejligt tæt på metroen og området er helt fint. Vi fik en rigtig god behandling og kan bestemt anbefale dette sted. 
Tak for gæstfriheden, på gensyn.
column5:
Dear Emma! 
It was a pleasure to stay in your fine apartment. We felt as good as home! 
The apartment is conveniently located close to the metro and the area is perfectly fine. We got a really good treatment and can definitely recommend this place. 
Thank you for the hospitality, see you soon.

column1: Lia var en gæstfri og venlig vært, og vi fik gode og udførlige instruktioner inden afrejsen. Kvarteret og lejligheden var flot, men desværre oplevede vi under opholdet at blive angrebet af bed bugs. Lia tacklede dog situationen glimrende, og hjalp os med at formidle kontakten til airbnb, og vi fik derfor mulighed for at flytte på hotel i stedet. Lia har allerede gjort antrit for at rense lejligheden for bed bugs, og hvis disse udryddes ville jeg anbefale Lia's sted til andre.
column5: Lia was a hospitable and friendly host, and we got good and detailed instructions prior to departure. The neighborhood and the apartment was nice, but unfortunately we experienced during the stay to be attacked by bed bugs. Lia tackled, however, the situation is excellent, and helped us convey the contact to airbnb, and we therefore had the opportunity to move on in the hotel instead. Lia has already made antrit to clean the apartment for bed bugs, and if these be cut off, I would recommend Lia's place to the other.

column1:
Vi havde nogle dejlige dage i Carolines lejlighed. Lejligheden stemte fint overens med billederne. Beliggenheden var perfekt i et hyggeligt kvarter og i gåafstand fra Sacre Coeur.  Meget bekvemt m metro lige nedenfor  og et sent åbent lille supermarked hvor vi kunne få de basisvarer vi havde brug for.
Vi nød at spise morgenmad på balkonen og følge med i  livet på pladsen - overværede flere bryllupper på rådhuset overfor fra første parket, hvilket var ret underholdende.
køkkenet var lille, men passede til vores behov. og toilettet også fint.
Kontakten med Caroline var behagelig og venlig. 
Vi vil bestemt anbefale stedet
column5:
We had some wonderful days in caroline's apartment. The apartment voted well consistent with images. The location was perfect in a nice neighbourhood and in walking distance from the Sacre Coeur. Very convenient m metro just below and a late open a small supermarket where we could get the basic groceries we needed.
We enjoyed eating breakfast on the balcony and observe life in the square - attended several weddings at the town hall, opposite from the first flooring, which was quite entertaining.
the kitchen was small, but suited our needs. and the toilet is also fine.
The contact with Caroline was pleasant and friendly. 
We will definitely recommend the place

column1: En dejlig rummelig lejlighed med en god beliggenhed. Hyggeligt roligt nabolag, hvor man sagtens kan gå ude om aftenen. Metro, indkøbs- og spisesteder lige rundt om hjørnet. Søde værter, der er lette at få kontakt med, hvis der er behov. Alt i alt et sted der varmt kan anbefales, perfekt for en familie med teenagere eller mindre børn.
column5: A lovely spacious apartment with a good location. Nice quiet neighborhood, where you can easily go out in the evening. Metro, shopping and dining options just around the corner. Sweet hosts, that are easy to get in touch with, if there is a need. All in all a place highly recommended, perfect for a family with teenagers or smaller children.

column1:
Vi hadde en hyggelig uke i Philippes studio. Perfekt beliggenhet, med gangavstand til det meste. Metro finnes rett ned i gaten, men vi foretrakk å gå. 
Hver morgen kom Philippe på døren med frokost. En perfekt start på dagen. 
Studioet er lite (spesielt dusjen), men vi hadde det vi trengte. 
(Sengen var dårlig, men Philippe planlegger å kjøpe ny).
Alt i alt hadde vi det strålende
column5:
We had a nice week in Philippes studio. Perfect location, walking distance to most things. The Metro is right down the street, but we preferred to go. 
Every morning, Philippe at the door with breakfast. A perfect start to the day. 
The studio is small (especially the shower), but we had what we needed. 
(The bed was bad, but Philippe is planning to buy new).
All in all, we had the brilliant

column1: Vi boede i Philippes lille studio en uge i august. Philippe er en meget venlig og hjælpsom vært, der bringer morgenbrød om morgenen og er tilgængelig med hjælp og vejledning, hvis man har behov for det. Selve lejligheden ligger dejligt og relativt stille i nærheden af den botaniske have. Den er meget lille - især badeværelset/brusenichen, men den fungerede perfekt for os som base for en skøn uge i byernes by.
column5: We stayed in Philippes small studio for a week in august. Philippe is a very friendly and helpful host, who brings bread in the morning and is available with help and guidance if you need it. The apartment itself is nice and relatively quiet in the vicinity of the botanical garden. It is very small - especially the bathroom/shower stall, but it worked perfectly for us as a base for a wonderful week in the capital city.

column1: Jeg boede i lejligheden i 3 uger. Dejlig lejlighed - men en utrolig gæstfrihed fra Philippe, som kom med morgenbrød hver morgen. Roligt kvarter tæt på universitetet. Lejligheden er lidt lille, men ellers er den i top. Kan anbefales. En god ting at den ligger på 1. Sal.
column5: I lived in the apartment for 3 weeks. Lovely apartment - but the incredible hospitality from Philippe, which came with breakfast every morning. Quiet neighbourhood close to the university. The apartment is a little small, but otherwise it is in the top. Can is recommended. A good thing that it is on 1. Floor.

column1:
Lejligheden ligger i et dejligt område, med masser af butikker og små cafeer. Lejligheden er rigtig hyggelig og man får følelsen af at være en del af Paris historie, når man befinder sig i denne 600 år gamle bygning. 
Værten er super sød og hjælpsom. Han har været hurtig til at svare når vi har haft spørgsmål, og er generelt bare rigtig hjælpsom. Det er bestemt ikke sidste gang vi besøger lejligheden i Paris, og kan klart anbefale det til alle der vil opleve Paris på den bedste måde.
column5:
The apartment is located in a nice area, with lots of shops and small cafes. The apartment is really cosy and you get the feeling of being a part of Paris history, when one finds oneself in this 600 year old building. 
The host is super sweet and helpful. He has been quick to respond when we had questions, and are generally just really helpful. It is certainly not the last time we visit the apartment in Paris, and can clearly recommend it to all who want to discover Paris in the best way.

column1:
Dejlig lejlighed i en meget hyggeligt kvarter. 
Lejligheden passede perfekt til et par. Der var god plads i stuen og køkkenet til at slappe af efter en lang dag i Paris. Soveværelset havde en fin størrelse, med rent sengetøj osv. 
Lejligheden ligger øverst i en flot og charmerende gammel ejendom, som er yderst velholdt.

Thierry har arrangeret det hele meget fint. Da vi ankom til Paris kunne vi komme ind i lejligheden med det samme, det var godt beskrevet hvordan vi nemt kunne komme ind i lejligheden. Ved afgang var det ikke noget problem at lade vores bagage blive i lejligheden indtil vi skulle mod lufthavnen.

Så alt i alt en god oplevelse, og jeg kan varmt anbefale denne lejlighed.
column5:
Lovely apartment in a very cozy neighborhood. 
The apartment was perfect for a couple. There was good space in the living room and the kitchen to relax after a long day in Paris. The bedroom had a good size, with clean bedding, etc. 
The apartment is at the top in a nice and charming old property, which is extremely well maintained.

Thierry has arranged it all very nicely. When we arrived to Paris, we could get into the apartment with the same, it was well described how we could easily get into the apartment. At departure it was no problem to let our luggage stay in the apartment until we were at the airport.

So all in all a good experience, and I can highly recommend this apartment.

column1: Lejligheden ligger i en stille gade og ser ud som på billederne. Jeg havde et godt ophold i fire dage på en forretningsrejse. Jeg kan anbefale denne airbnb til andre gæster. Tak
column5: The apartment is located in a quiet street and seems like in the pictures. I had a good stay for four days on a business trip. I can recommend this airbnb to other guests. Thank you

column1:
Lejligheden var helt i overensstemmelse med forventningerne. Der var rent og pænt og vi blev modtaget af hushjælpen, som gav os introduktion til lejligheden. Området er fantastisk, lidt tilbagetrukket men alligevel midt i et område med masser af hyggelige restauranter og cafeer med liv til langt ud på aftenen.
Den lille gårdhave nød vi og var helt perfekt til lidt afslapning efter en lang dag i byen. Lejligheden er lille, men velfungerende til os, 4 personer. Vi vil helt sikkert leje denne lejlighed igen, hvis muligheden byder sig.
column5:
The apartment was fully in line with expectations. It was nice and we were received by the domestic work, which gave us the introduction to the apartment. The area is great, a little withdrawn but still in the middle of an area with lots of cosy restaurants and cafes with life until late at night.
The small patio we enjoyed and was absolutely perfect for a little relaxation after a long day in the city. The apartment is small but functional for us, 4 persons. We will definitely rent this apartment again if the opportunity presents itself.

column1: Min kæreste og jeg havde et fantastisk ophold i Clementines lejlighed, som er fuldstændig som vist på billederne. Clementine var nem at kommunikere med og meget hjælpsom, både før og under vores ophold. Lejligheden ligger i et dejligt kvarter på en stille vej, hvilket var enormt dejligt. Jeg ville bestemt anbefale andre at bo her og håber på at komme tilbage snart igen!
column5: My boyfriend and I had a great stay in Clementines apartment, which is complete as shown in the pictures. Clementine was easy to communicate with and very helpful, both before and during our stay. The apartment is located in a nice neighborhood on a quiet road, which was very nice. I would definitely recommend others to stay here and hope to come back soon again!

column1: Vi boede i Lilas lejlighed i fire dage og var meget tilfredse med opholdet. Lejligheden var hyggelig med gode faciliteter, og vi følte os meget velkomne. Lila var altid klar med et hurtigt svar og var meget hjælpsom, også selvom vi tjekkede ind meget sent på dagen. Vi vil anbefale lejligheden til alle, der ønsker en billig men hyggelig bolig i et dejligt område af Paris!
column5: We stayed in Lilas apartment in four days and was very satisfied with the stay. The apartment was cosy with good facilities and we felt very welcome. Lila was always ready with a quick answer and was very helpful, even though we checked in very late in the day. We would recommend the apartment to anyone who wants a cheap but pleasant accommodation in a lovely area of Paris!

column1: Patrick er meget imødekommende og gæstfri - frit check in og check ud tidspunkt. Han havde sågar købt en fantastisk fødseldagsgave til min datter. Lejligheden har super belligenhed lige ved metroen og Moulin Rouge. Vidunderlig udsigt.
column5: Patrick is very accommodating and hospitable - free check in and check out time. He had even bought an amazing fødseldagsgave for my daughter. The apartment has a super location right by the metro and the Moulin Rouge. Wonderful view.

column1:
Lejligheden var rigtig fin. God plads, så man også kunne sidde og hvile fødderne lidt inden turen gik ud i fantastiske Paris igen.
Linh svarede hurtigt på både bookinganmodning og på beskeder vedr. check-in osv. Han havde nogle fine tips sat op på en computer i lejligheden - vi kan især anbefale Chez Paul - en meget god fransk bistro, som ligger 5 minutters gang fra lejligheden.
Kvarteret omkring Place de la Bastille er i hele taget ganske skønt at være i, og jeg er ikke i tvivl om at ville booke Linhs lejlighed en anden gang.
column5:
The apartment was really nice. Good space, so you could also sit and rest your feet a bit before going out in the fantastic Paris again.
Linh responded quickly on both the booking request and messages regarding. check-in, etc. He had some nice tips set up on a computer in the apartment - we can especially recommend Chez Paul - a very good French bistro, which is a 5-minute walk from the apartment.
The neighborhood around the Place de la Bastille is in the whole, quite wonderful to be in, and I have no doubt that would book Linhs apartment a second time.

column1: Præcis som billederne. Charmerende lille lejlighed med alt hvad et par behøver for et par dage i Paris. Ligger i en stille baggård i et livligt kvarter med cafeer og gode resturanter. Kan på alle måder anbefale Linh og lejligheden.
column5: Exactly as the pictures. Charming little apartment with everything a couple need for a few days in Paris. Located in a quiet courtyard in a lively neighbourhood with cafes and good restaurants. Can in every way recommend Linh and the apartment.

column1: Internet
column5: Internet

column1:
Meget lille lejlighed med en meget lille balkon. Ikke velegnet til egen madlavning.
Mange trapper - ingen elevator. Rigtig god og central beliggenhed.
column5:
Very small apartment with a very small balcony. Not suitable for own cooking.
Many stairs - no elevator. Very good and central location.

column1:
Jeremy的公寓是在聖路易島上,島上的都是風情獨具的百年以上建築
以這種價格住在巴黎的真真正正市區最中心,實在讓人驚訝
雖然地處觀光景點的核心,但卻鬧中取靜,更是難得

走路10分鐘距離內就有4-5個地鐵站,要去哪裡都很方便,走路範圍內就可以到達聖母院､巴士底､孚日廣場等景點

房間很大,還包含沙發,餐桌,住起來就像在家裡一樣

雖然沒有見到屋主Jeremy, 但是透過Airbnb的messenger都能找到他並獲得適當的協助

很推薦的巴黎公寓
column5:
Jeremy's apartment is in the Saint-Louis Island,the island is a style unique century-old building
In this the price of living in Paris really the city's center,really make people surprised
Although located in tourist attractions,but quiet,more is rare

Walk 10 minutes within a distance of 4-5 Subway,where to go is very convenient,walking range you can reach Notre Dame, and Place de La Bastille, and Place des Vosges Square and other attractions

The room was large,included sofa,dining table,and hold up just like at home

Although not see the owner, Jeremy, but through the Airbnb messenger can find him and get appropriate assistance

Very recommended apartment Paris

column1: Dejlig lejlighed med fantastisk beliggenhed. Værterne søde og hjælpsomme.
column5: Lovely apartment in a great location. The hosts are sweet and helpful.

column1: Utrolig hyggelig lejlighed med god beliggenhed. Vi boede to voksne og to børn i lejligheden, hvilket fungerede. Perfekt til et par.
column5: Incredibly cozy apartment with a good location. We stayed two adults and two children in the apartment, which worked. Perfect for a couple.

column1: E rigtig hyggelig lejlighed midt i Marais i en gade, der både byder på gode restauranter, fantastiske bagerier og specialbutikker. Vi satte stor pris på beliggenheden og på den dejlige terrasse, hvor vi nød efterårssolen. Eneste lille minus er de meget faste/hårde senge. Vi boede her 2 voksne og 2 børn på 10 og 14 år, og det fungerede fint.
column5: E really cosy apartment in the heart of the Marais, in a street, both offering great restaurants, fantastic bakeries, and specialty shops. We appreciated the location and the lovely terrace, where we enjoyed efterårssolen. Only small minus is the very firm/hard beds. We lived here 2 adults and 2 children aged 10 and 14 years, and it worked fine.

column1: En dejlig lejlighed og super kommunikation med Sandrine.
column5: A lovely apartment and super communication with Sandrine.

column1: Jeg har kun ros til overs for Aliah og hendes lejlighed. Med kun én dags varsel overtog vi en ren og skøn lejlighed, der er rigelig rummelig for en familie med to små børn med stort spisebord og masser af skabsplads. Sengen er hyggelig alkoveagtig, og sofaen kan slås ud til en ok seng. Aliah var endda så venlig at skaffe en højstol til vores yngste. Lejligheden var helt igennem i orden, men det er helt klart Aliah som vært, der er det store plus. Mere imødekommenhed og hjælpsomhed skal man lede længe efter!
column5: I have nothing but praise to spare for Aliah and her apartment. With only one day's notice, we acquired a clean and beautiful apartment that is plenty spacious for a family with two small children with large dining table and plenty of cupboard space. The bed is cozy alkoveagtig, and the couch can be turned out to an ok bed. Aliah was even so kind as to provide a highchair for our youngest. The apartment was absolutely in order, but it is quite clear Aliah as the host, that is the big plus. More kindness and helpfulness you have to look long for!

column1: Super lejlighed med perfekt beliggenhed i gåafstand til seværdigheder. Roligt nabolag uden trafikstøj og med flot udsigt til Anne Frank have - imponerende. Flot istandsat, ren, pæn og med velfungerende køkken. Fungerede godt for en familie. Kan anbefales.
column5: Super apartment with the perfect location in walking distance to the sights. Quiet neighborhood without traffic noise and with beautiful views to the Anne Frank garden - impressive. Nice renovated, clean, neat and with well-functioning kitchen. Worked well for a family. Can is recommended.

column1: Holly Cottage er et meget hyggeligt er specielt sted at bo. Vi var fuldt tilfredse med alt og værten sørgede tilmed for at der var vand, juice, sodavand, kaffe osv. klar til os. Så det er en klar anbefaling fra vores side.
column5: Holly Cottage is a very nice special place to stay. We were fully satisfied with everything and the host made sure even that there was water, juice, soft drinks, coffee, etc. ready for us. So it is a clear recommendation from our side.

column1: Emmaniel/Mathieu's bolig er en fantastisk hyggelig og har alt hvad man har brug for. Boligen ser ud præcis som vist på billederne, og den ligger i et hyggeligt nabolag med nem adgang til metroen. Mathieu var meget imødekommende og besvarede alle vores spørgsmål inden han forlod boligen. Alt i alt havde vi et dejligt ophold, og jeg kan på det kraftigste anbefale andre, at leje denne bolig, hvis de skal bruge nogle dage i smukke Paris.
column5: Emmaniel/Mathieu's home is a great cozy and has everything you need. The home looks exactly as shown in the pictures, and it is located in a cozy neighborhood with easy access to the metro. Mathieu was very welcoming and answered all our questions before he left the residence. All in all we had a lovely stay, and I can strongly recommend others to rent this home if they need to spend some days in beautiful Paris.

column1: David laget en veldig oversiktlig veibeskrivelse og svarte kjapt på spørsmål jeg hadde. Nabolaget er utrolig fint, med mange muligheter for forskjellige aktiviteter.
column5: David made a very straightforward directions and responded quickly to any questions I had. The neighborhood is incredibly nice, with many opportunities for different activities.

column1:
숙소 위치가 굉장히 좋고, 주차가 가능해서 차로 여행하시는 분께는 매우 좋습니다.
여섯 명이 묵기에 불편함은 없지만, 거실 쇼파베드가 불편하고 침구류가 지저분했습니다. 긴 시간을 숙소에서 보내기보다는 거의 밖에서 여행하시다가 잠만 주무실 분들께는 적당할 것 같습니다.
마지막에 주차 문제가 조금 있었지만, 호스트가 많이 미안해하고 충분히 이해할 만한 상황이라서 괜찮았습니다.
column5:
The hostel location is very good, Parking is available in car travel with are very good.
Six people were nice, but the living room sofa bed was uncomfortable and bedding was dirty. Long time to stay in rather than go out and travel..... though they fit like.
The last on the Parking problem a little, but the host has a lot to be sorry about and enough for you to understand the situation I was fine.

column1: Right site for workmates
column5: Right site for workmates

column1: Det beste ved denne leiligheten er plasseringen - som er svært sentrumsnær i en meget rolig gate. Imidlertid bor man i en bakgård, og solen når knapt ned til førsteetasje. Det kan være en fordel om sommeren, men i april ble det litt kjølig. Alt er velholdt og rent, og vertsskapet driver ryddig business. Godt supermarked ligger ti minutter unna, mange gode spisesteder finner man i retning St. Germain de Pres - et kvarter unna til fots.
column5: The best thing about this apartment is the location - which is very sentrumsnær in a very quiet street. However, staying in a backyard, and the sun reaches barely down to førsteetasje. It can be an advantage in summer, but in april, it was a little chilly. Everything is well-kept and clean, and the owner driver neat business. Good supermarket is ten minutes away, many excellent dining options are found in the direction of St. Germain de Pres - a quarter of an hour away on foot.

column1:
Det var en dejlig oplevelse at ankomme til Bertrand`s lejlighed. 
Lejligheden levede helt op til vores forventinger og beliggenheden var helt perfekt !!! Den ligger ca 15 min fra Eiffeltårnet hvor der er masser af muligheder for tansport rundt i Paris og få min fra toget. Lige rundt om hjørnet ligger der masser af forretninger så det er nemt at handle.
Vi mødte dog ikke Bertrand men vi snakkede og SMS flere gange og han var meget idemødekommendne og hjælpsom. 
Tager vi til Paris igen er der ingen tvivl om at det bliver hos Bertrand.
column5:
It was a lovely experience to arrive to Bertrand's apartment. 
The apartment lived up to our expectations and the location was absolutely perfect !!! It is located about 15 min from the Eiffel tower, where there are plenty of options for transport network around Paris and get my train. Just around the corner, there is plenty of business so it is easy to trade.
We met, however, not Bertrand, but we talked and SMS several times and he was very idemødekommendne and helpful. 
We go to Paris again, there is no doubt that it will be in Bertrand.

column1:
Virkelig fin lejlighed, hvor der var alt hvad man skulle bruge. Lejligheden ligger centralt, men man skal gå et lille stykke for at komme til metroen. Rundt om hjørnet var flere butikker og det lækreste bageri. 
Benjamin havde sørget godt for os og der var styr på det hele - et sted man har lyst til at komme tilbage til.
column5:
Really nice apartment, where there was everything what we needed. The apartment is centrally located, but you have to go a short distance to get to the metro. Around the corner were several shops, and delicious bakery. 
Benjamin had provided well for us and there was a track of it all - a place you want to come back to.

column1:
Vi var utrolig glade for at bo i Fabios lejlighed. Den var rummelig, lys og hyggelig. Det var perfekt, at den lå på 5. sal med elevator. 
Vi var vilde med kvarteret. Der var en lokal stemning, som ikke var præget af turister, og der var et fantastisk handelsliv i gaderne omkring, særligt i rue Daguerre. 
Sidst men ikke mindst var det utrolig praktisk, at lejligheden lå tæt på metrostationen Denfert-Rochereau, så det var nemt og hurtigt at komme til og fra lufthavnen. Vi kommer gerne igen og bor der og anbefaler gerne lejligheden til andre.
column5:
We were incredibly happy to stay in Fabios apartment. It was spacious, light and cosy. It was perfect that it was on 5. floor with elevator. 
We were wild with the neighborhood. There was a local atmosphere, which was not marked by tourists, and there was a great shopping in the streets around, especially in the rue Daguerre. 
Last but not least, it was incredibly convenient that the apartment was close to the metro station Denfert-Rochereau, so it was easy and fast to get to and from the airport. We would be happy to come again and stay there and recommend the apartment to others.

column1: Min kone og jeg tilbragte nogle rigtig dejlige dage i lejligheden. Super praktisk indrettet og med meget smuk udsigt til pladsen foran Sorbonne universitetet. Sarahs velkomst var hjertelig med en god introduktion til lejligheden. Lejligheden indeholder alt nødvendigt til madlavning, men de mange restauranter frister også. Et rigtig dejligt sted for nogle dage i det centrale Paris.
column5: My wife and I spent some really lovely days in the apartment. Super convenient furnished and with very beautiful views to the square in front of the Sorbonne university. Sarah's welcome was hearty with a good introduction to the apartment. The apartment contains everything necessary for cooking, but the many restaurants is also tempting. A really nice place for a few days in central Paris.

column1: Lejligheden ligger fantastisk i forhold til metro og man hurtigt komme omkring. Dejlige cafeer omkring på gaderne.
column5: The apartment is fantastically located for the metro and you quickly come around. Lovely cafes around on the streets.

column1: 방은 비앤비에 나온 사진 아주 그대로였어요. 복층구조로 위에는 2인용 매트리스, 아래층에는 간이침대로 변형가능한 쇼파가 있었어요. 주방에 오븐은 없었지만 전자레인지가 있었고요. 위치는 찾기 어렵지 않았고, 근처에 베이커리나 가게들이 다양하게 있었어요.
column5: How is the beach shown in the photo very literally. The for 2 mattresses, and downstairs is a great variation for the sofa. The kitchen oven is not a microwave there. The location is hard to find, and did not have near the bakery shop there are different kinds.

column1: Det mest slående var at der var næsten ingen støj trods at lejligheden ligger hypercentralt og at sængen indbød til minimum 8 timers søvn. Alt fungerede som det skulle. Også for den af os som brugte det lille skrivebord som arbejdsplads. Vi fik forbedret konditionen ved at gå op til 6. sal et par gange om dagen. Elevatoren var alternativet men den er lille og langsom. Vi satte også pris på at bo på nær Seinen på grænsen mellem 1. og 4. arrondisement og vi botaniserede i begge.
column5: The most striking was that there was almost no noise, despite that the apartment is located hypercentralt and to sængen invited to a minimum of 8 hours of sleep. Everything worked as it should. Also, for the of us who used it a small desk as a workplace. We got improved your fitness go up to 6. floor a couple of times a day. The elevator was the alternative but it is small and slow. We also set price to stay at near the Seine on the border between the 1. and 4. arrondisement and we botaniserede in both.

column1: Lejligheden har en enormt god placering! Der er masser af restauranter, cafeer og butikker, og så ligger Luxembourg haven rigtig tæt på. Så der er intet at udsætte på lokationen! Det eneste minus er, at lejligheden er ret lille. Især er det lidt træls, at køkkenet er så småt, da det gør det ret besværligt at lave mad. Til gengæld kan man nemt finde et sted at spise ude i stedet :-)
column5: The apartment has a huge good location! There are plenty of restaurants, cafes and shops, and so is Luxembourg garden really close. So there is nothing to expose at the location! The only minus is that the apartment is pretty small. In particular, it is a bit annoying that the kitchen is so small, as it makes it quite tedious to cook. However, you can easily find a place to eat out instead :-)

column1: Rigtig god lejlighed med venlig vært. Godt kvarter - alt fungerede supert!
column5: Really good apartment with a friendly host. Good neighborhood - everything worked reviewed!

column1: Flott sted, veldig sentralt, skikkelig by-følelse i hjertet av latinerkvartalet. Bittelite, men rent og med herlig atmosfære.
column5: Great place, very central, proper city feeling in the heart of the Latin quarter. Tiny, but clean and with a lovely atmosphere.

column1: Dette er det skønneste sted, jeg nogensinde har boet! Man får SÅ meget for pengene, og lejligheden er vildt charmerende, ren og med rigeligt plads. Også kvarteret var lige i vores ånd med hyggelige og gode spisesteder og caféer. Lejligheden er fuldkommen tyst. Selv med åbne vinduer kunne man absolut intet høre bortset fra en solsort ved 6 tiden om morgenen.
column5: This is the loveliest place I have ever lived! You get SO much for the money, and the apartment is wildly charming, clean and with plenty of space. Also the neighborhood was right in our spirit with cosy and good restaurants and cafes. The apartment is completely quiet. Even with the windows open, you could absolutely hear nothing apart from a blackbird at 6 o'clock in the morning.

column1:
Boligen er perfekt for en familie, som fx vores med 2 børn på 10 og 12. Rummelig, lige op af Metroen og i et roligt kvarter i forhold til en storby. Eve havde sørget for masse basis ting vi kunne bruge, og endda en flaske vin da vi kom. 
Kommunikation med Eve var også i top, hvilket jeg finder meget vigtig.
Desuden fint med en p-plads i aflåst kælder.
En god anbefaling herfra, en lejlighed vi godt vil vende tilbage til.
column5:
The home is perfect for a family like ours with 2 children aged 10 and 12. Spacious, right up to the Metro and in a quiet neighbourhood in relation to a big city. Eve had provided the mass basis, things we could use, and even a bottle of wine when we arrived. 
Communication with Eve was also in the top, which I find very important.
Also fine with a parking space in the locked basement.
A good recommendation from here, an apartment we would return to.

column1:
Fuldstændig perfekt!! 
Skøn lille lejlighed med en fantastisk atmosfære. 
Pauls bageri ligger som genbo, perfekt til at hente det lækreste briochebrød til morgenmaden :) 
2 min fra lejligheden ligger der et supermarked, hvis man gerne vil fylde køleskabet lidt op. 
Pascal er meget hurtig til at kommunikere tilbage ved spørgsmål og hjælp :) 
Kan 100% anbefales
column5:
Totally perfect!! 
Lovely little apartment with a great atmosphere. 
Paul's bakery is located as a neighbor, perfect to download the hottest briochebrød for breakfast :) 
2 min from the apartment there is a supermarket, if you would like to fill the fridge up a bit. 
Pascal is very quick to communicate back by the question and help :) 
100% recommended

column1: Så hyggeligt et sted; autentisk taglejlighedsstemning i Paris med udsigt til Sacre Cour. Lige ved Pigalle og nemt til alt. Den bedste bager lige rundt om hjørnet!
column5: So lovely a place; authentic taglejlighedsstemning in Paris with a view to the Sacre Cour. Right by the Pigalle and the easy access to everything. The best bakery just around the corner!

column1: Meget fin, ren og rummelig lejlighed på 6. sal (m. elevator) i charmerende, stille kvarter tæt på lækre butikker og cafeer, og gå afstand til mange seværdigheder. Marie var sød til at give præcis information vedrørende bus til døren fra lufthavnen.
column5: Very nice, clean and spacious apartment on the 6. floor (ft. elevator) in a charming, quiet neighborhood close to delicious shops and cafes, and walking distance to many sights. Marie was sweet to give accurate information regarding the bus to the door from the airport.

column1: dejlig bolig og perfekt beliggenhed. alt fungerede
column5: lovely accommodation and perfect location. everything worked

column1: Kjempefint sted fin beliggenhet. Anbefales
column5: Terrific place, nice location. Recommended

column1:
Antoine var hurtig til at svare på beskeder, og da han ind selv kunne modtage mug, så fik han en anden til at modtage os set på aftenen. Oveni det fik han skaffet os en barneseng.
Kan klart anbefale denne udlejer.
column5:
Antoine was quick to reply to messages, and when he himself could receive the mold, so he got someone else to receive the us seen in the evening. On top of that he got provided us a baby cot.
Can definitely recommend this landlord.

column1: God kontakt. Svarede med det samme. Antoine havde ikke selv mulighed for at  overdrage nøgler osv, men Estelle var utrolig hjælpsom og overholdte tidsaftaler. Nemt og smidigt.
column5: Good contact. Replied with the same. Antoine had not even the ability to assign keys etc, but Estelle was very helpful and complied tidsaftaler. Easily and smoothly.

column1: Audeline的房子楼下有很多中餐厅,离巴黎春天和老佛爷很近｡房间比图片里更加漂亮｡厨房里除了齐备的作餐用具外,Audeline还提供了胶囊咖啡,饮料,水果,冰箱里还有面包｡卫生间和浴室分离让我们觉得很方便｡
column5: Audeline of the house downstairs there are a lot of Chinese restaurant,away from the Printemps and Galeries Lafayette are close as well. Room than the picture more beautiful home. The kitchen in addition to full for meal utensils,Audeline also provides coffee capsules,drinks,fruit,refrigerator as well as bread as well. Toilet and bathroom separated makes us feel very convenient location.

column1: 房东Audelin非常热情,根据我们的行程安排提供了非常具体的到达路线,使我们顺利到达他的房子｡房子所在的位置交通方便,有多条地铁线路能快速到达大部分景点｡房间干净整洁,光线明亮,房东提供了好多早餐,品种很丰富｡感谢Audelin能提供他浪漫温馨的家,让我们在巴黎的蜜月更加完美~
column5: The landlord Audelin very warm,according to our itinerary provides very specific directions,so that we successfully reach his house area. The house the location where the traffic is convenient,there are many subway lines can quickly reach most spots apartment. Room clean and tidy,light and bright,the landlord provided a good Breakfast,variety is very rich area. Thank Audelin can provide his romantic and warm home,let us at the Paris honeymoon more perfect~

column1: Dejlig lejelighed med masser af plads og hyggelig stemning. Et stenkast fra metroen og en kort gåtur til Sacre Coeur. Midt i det multi-etniske Paris, en rigtig god base for at nyde storbyen.
column5: Nice restaurant is consistently excellent with plenty of space and cosy atmosphere. A stone's throw from the metro and a short walk to the Sacre Coeur. In the middle of the multi-ethnic Paris, a really good base to enjoy the city.

column1: Efter nogle timers forsinkelse kom vores vært og lukkede os ind i lejligheden. Vi slog ventetiden ihjel på den nærliggende skønne Place de la Contrescarpe. Udlejer gjorde hvad han kunne for at udbedre sin sene ankomst. Lejligheden er hyggelig og uden støj. Der er hvad der skal være til nogle dejlige feriedage i en meget central del af Paris.
column5: After some hours of delay, came our host and closed us into the apartment. We beat the waiting time to death in the nearby beautiful Place de la Contrescarpe. The landlord did what he could to repair his late arrival. The apartment is cosy and without noise. That is what should be some lovely holidays in a very central part of Paris.

column1: Vi var meget glade for vores venlige og imødekommende vært og for boligen. Det var hyggeligt at kunne åbne vinduerne og se ud over tagene i Paris, mens solen og den friske luft strømmede ind. Beliggenheden kunne ikke være bedre i det livlige kvarter ved Rue Mouffetard, fyldt med restauranter, marked og små butikker. Vi trivedes virkelig. Lejligheden var i sit udgangspunkt moderne med de nødvendige bekvemmeligheder, men den var lige lille nok til 3 mennesker, og sovesofaen i stuen bør udskiftes. Vi ville meget gerne komme igen 2 mennesker - og 3, hvis der kommer ny sovesofa.
column5: We were very pleased with our friendly and welcoming host and the accommodation. It was nice to be able to open the windows and look out over the roofs of Paris while the sun and the fresh air flowed in. The location could not be better in the lively area of Rue Mouffetard, filled with restaurants, market and small shops. We thrived really. The apartment was in its starting point modern with the necessary amenities, but it was just small enough for 3 people and the sofa bed in the living room should be replaced. We would very much like to come again 2 people - and 3, if the new sofa bed.

column1: Fantastisk vært og beliggenhed, vi (2 voksne og 2 teenagere) har elsket autenciteten og at få følelsen af at være i Frankrig, tak for en god og varm (35 grader) uge.
column5: Great host and location, we (2 adults and 2 teenagers) loved the authenticity and to get the feeling of being in France, thanks for a good and hot (35 degrees) week.

column1: Rigtig fin og hyggelig lille lejlighed til prisen. Rent og pænt, og værten var særdeles fleksibel og imødekommende. Kan kun anbefale det.
column5: Really nice and cosy little apartment for the price. Very clean and the host was very flexible and accommodating. Can only recommend it.

column1: Hyggelig lejlighed, der ligger i en lille baggård som gjorde at man lå lidt tilbagetrukken og gjorde at der var stille. Den lå dejlig tæt på en metro station så man hurtigt kunne komme rundt omkring.
column5: Cozy apartment, located in a small backyard that did that was a little withdrawn and did that there was quiet. It was lovely, close to a metro station so as to quickly be able to get around.

column1:
Fin lejlighed, der havde alt hvad vi havde brug for til en forlænget weekend. Nabolaget var så fint - der er gode spisesteder og en hyggelig atmosfære på gaden, der ligger roligt. Joana var sød, meget let at kommunikere med og betænksom.
Alt i alt helt klart anbefalelsesværdigt.
column5:
Fine apartment which had everything we needed for an extended weekend. The neighborhood was so fine - there are good dining options and a cozy atmosphere on the street, which is quiet. Joana was a very sweet, very easy to communicate with and thoughtful.
All in all definitely recommendable.

column1:
Det var en dejlig stille lejlighed uden nogle problemer.. Et rigtig hyggeligt kvarter, især i aftentimerne. 
Dejlig centralt og nemt at komme fra og til. 
Vi oplevede ikke nogle problemer med noget i lejligheden og det var fantastisk at der både var internet og TV. 
Og så er det også dejligt at det ikke var vildt dyrt..
column5:
It was a lovely quiet apartment without any problems.. A really nice neighborhood, especially in the evening hours. 
Nice centrally located and easy to get from and to. 
We experienced no problems with anything in the apartment and it was fantastic that there was both internet and TV. 
And so it is also nice that it was not wildly expensive..

column1:
Super beliggenhed med alt, hvad man skal bruge omkring sig. Centralt for restauranter og tæt på seinen. Da der kun er vinduer ind til gården, er det svært at få gang i vindcirkulation, men der er en blæser i lejligheden, som kompenserer rigtig godt for det. Dejligt højt til loftet, som gør at selvom man bor 4 i lejligheden, føles man ikke klemt. God hurtig og nem kommunikation med udlejer og Sonia. Skulle man være lidt kritisk, kunne de godt udskifte revnet glas og stangen til badeforhænget, som spiller på sidste vers. 
Rigtig dejligt ophold.
column5:
Super location with everything you need around. Central location for restaurants and close to the river seine. Since there are only windows into the courtyard, it's hard to get time in vindcirkulation, but there is a fan in the apartment, which compensates very well for it. Nice high ceiling, which makes that even though you live 4 in the apartment, it feels like you are not pinched. Good quick and easy communication with the landlord and Sonia. You had to be a little critical, they could well replace the cracked glass and the rod to the badeforhænget, which plays on the last verse. 
Really nice stay.

column1: Lækker lejlighed. Vi var virkelig glade for vores ophold. Super vært og meget hjælpsom. Selvom det ligger lidt væk fra city, tæt på Metro og rart kvarter at gå på opdagelse i. Kan kun anbefales.
column5: Delicious apartment. We were really pleased with our stay. Super host and very helpful. Even though it is located a little away from the city, close to the Metro and nice neighbourhood to explore. Can only be recommended.

column1: Charming flat!
column5: Charming flat!

column1: Joakim er meget hjælpsom. Der var frugt, kaffe og sengetøj og viskestykker og sæbe, så vi behøvede ikke, at slæbe oget med. Lejligheden er lille, men hyggelig, og indeholder det, man har brug for til 2 personer. Meget tæt på en central metrolinie (8) og kvarteret er hyggeligt med cafeer og restauranter. Supermarked overfor og bager lige i nærheden. Kort sagt et godt udgangspunkt for en smuttur til Paris. Tag bussen fra lufthavnen til Operaen og videre med Metro til lejligheden Per
column5: Joakim is very helpful. There was fruit, coffee and bed linen and tea towels and soap, so we didn't have to lug everything with. The apartment is small, but cozy, and contains what you need for 2 persons. Very close to a central metro line (8) and the neighborhood is nice with cafés and restaurants. Supermarket opposite and a bakery just nearby. In short, a good base for a getaway to Paris. Take the bus from the airport to the Opera and move on with the Metro to the apartment Per

column1: Meget central placering. Vi gik til/fra Seinen-området. Lejligheden er gammel, men oser af hygge. Handelsmuligheder indenfor 50 meter - og masser af restauranter.
column5: Very central location. We went to/from the Seine area. The apartment is old, but exudes warmth. Trading within 50 metres and plenty of restaurants.

column1: jeg boede i tys lejlighed i 2 dage og havde en meget fin oplevelse. jeg havde mulighed for at aflevere min taske allerede inden checkin og da jeg kom tilbage fremstod legligheden meget ren og pæn. et meget fint og nyt badeværelse med fine håndklæder og sæbe. et hyggeligt soveområde med en god seng og dejlig ugeneret udsigt til en parisisk baggård, gjorde lejligheden lys og lækker. et fint køkken med nepresso maskine, brødrister, og nydeligt og stlfuldt indrettet. sofa området var ligeledes stilfuldt indrettet i retro stil og på bogreolen var en del interessante bøger om alt fra arkitektur til rejseguider omkring Paris. toilettet var lille, men rent og pænt. alt i alt vil jeg meget gerne anbefale Ty lejlighed, da den virkelig ser ud som på billederne. endelig skal det nævnes at man føler det meget fint med sikkerhed og elevatoren mm virkede virkeligt rart. mvh Jako (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I (Website hidden by Airbnb) I...

column1: Vi boede rigtig dejligt i Tommys lejlighed. Virkelig hyggelig gade med masser af liv. Lejligheden var lige som vi forventede. Pænt, rent og hyggeligt indrettet. Kan klart anbefales.
column5: We lived really nice in Tommy's apartment. Really cosy street with a lot of life. The apartment was just as we expected. Nice, clean and cozy decorated. Can be clearly recommended.

column1: Havde en rigtig god forlænget weekend i Mathieu's lejlighed. Alt fungerede perfekt og Mathieu og hans kæreste var gode værter der både kom med lokale tips og gjorde at man følte sig hjemme i deres lejlighed. God kommunikation og fleksibilitet omkring ind- og udcheckning. - og så er det også værd at nævne at lejligheden har en rigtig fin placering i Montmartre - tær på offentlig transport, indkøb og gode restauranter uden at være et alt for turistet område. Helt sikkert et sted jeg vil undersøge om er ledigt hvis jeg skal Paris igen!
column5: Had a really good long weekend in Mathieu's apartment. Everything worked perfectly and Mathieu and his girlfriend were good hosts, both come with local tips and made to feel at home in their apartment. Good communication and flexibility around check - in and check-out. and so, it is also worth to mention that the apartment has a great location in Montmartre - close to public transport, shopping and good restaurants without being too touristy area. Definitely a place I will examine about is available if I'm going to Paris again!

column1: Definetly recommended ! 10/10
column5: Definetly recommended ! 10/10

column1:
Denne lejlighed på 4. sal består af et køkken med stue, mens der er to værelser ovenpå. Man skal der gå gennem det ene værelse for at komme til badeværelset.
Det er en meget stille, hyggelig og charmerende lejlighed med en personlig og kunstnerisk indretning. Beliggenhed tæt på Canal Saint-Martin er fantastisk.
Vi er en familie på 3, som brugte denne lejlighed som et godt udgangspunkt til at udforske Paris. 
Værtsparret svarerede hurtigt på mails inden opholdet og gjorde et fint indtryk ved modtagelsen. Vi kommer gerne tilbage.
column5:
This apartment on the 4. floor consists of a kitchen with living room, while two rooms upstairs. You must go through one room to get to the bathroom.
It is a very quiet, cozy and charming apartment with a personal and artistic décor. Location close to the Canal Saint-Martin is great.
We are a family of 3 who used this apartment as a good starting point to explore Paris. 
The hosts was similar quickly to emails before the stay and made a fine impression at the time of receipt. We would be happy to come back.

column1:
Boede i lejligheden med min søn fra lørdag til mandag, primært som sovested.
Stille og fredeligt område, og samtidig tæt på byen med Metro.
Levede op til forventningerne.
column5:
Lived in the apartment with my son from Saturday to Monday, mainly as a sleeping place.
Quiet and peaceful area, yet close to the city with the Metro.
Lived up to the expectations.

column1:
den første mail var en standart beskæftigelse og derfor med fejl det fik os til at blive usikker på Ange.
tilliden blev dog oprettet igen.
underligt at oplev at der havde været en person inde i lejligheden mens vi ikke var der.

beskrivelse til lejlighed var god.

meget centralt.
rent og pænt.
column5:
the first email was a standard employment and, therefore, with the mistakes it led us to be unsure of the Ange.
the trust was set up again.

description for the apartment was good.
