very centrally located.
clean and neat.

column1: Tres gentil
column5: Very nice

column1:
Lejligheden i Rue St Andre des Arts har den bedste beliggenhed. Der er cafeer, restauranter og take a way i flere udgaver lige udenfor døren. Station med Metro og RER til lufthavn Charles de Gaulle 5 min til fods.
Lejligheden er meget charmerende istandsat og godt udstyret.
I følge beskrivelsen er der to seperate soveværelser, hvilket IKKE er tilfældet. Den store seng står i stuen. Det giver lidt begrænsninger, hvis man fx vil være fire voksne.
Det var nemt at modtage nøgle og vi følte, at der ville være god kontakt undervejs, hvis det havde været aktuelt.
Alt i alt en rigtig god oplevelse.
column5:
The apartment in Rue St Other des Arts has the best location. There are cafes, restaurants and take a way-in several versions right outside the door. Station of Metro and RER to the airport Charles de Gaulle, 5 min by foot.
The apartment is very charming, refurbished and well equipped.
In the following description, there are two seperate bedrooms, which is NOT the case. The large bed is in the living room. It gives some restrictions, e.g. if they will be four adults.
It was easy to receive your key and we felt that there would be good contact along the way, if it had been currently.
All in all a really good experience.

column1: Perfekt lejlighed for to midt i et af de hyggeligste kvarterer i Paris. Tæt på alting, men en fredelig gade og så er der elevator og lille altan (sydvendt). Regine tog selv imod og gav gode råd til området og var i det hele taget meget venlig. Lejligheden er lys og rummelig og mere personlig end mange af de airbnb-lejligheder vi ellers har været i. Kan absolut anbefales.
column5: Perfect apartment for two in the middle of one of the friendliest neighbourhoods in Paris. Close to everything, but a peaceful street and then there is the elevator and a small balcony (south facing). Regine took the and gave good advice to the area and was on the whole very friendly. The apartment is light and spacious and more personal than many of the airbnb apartments we would otherwise have been in. Can definitely recommend.

column1: Dejlig lille lejlighed i rolig gade midt i et spændende kvarter. Régine er god og hjælpende vært.
column5: Nice small apartment in quiet street in the middle of an exciting neighbourhood. Régine is good and helping host.

column1:
Antoinettes lejlighed var lige så hyggelig, ren og i god stand som den ser ud på billederne.  Comforten er rigtig god - der er alt hvad man har brug for. Vi benyttede os dagligt af bageren lige nedenunder - det var svært andet da der ofte duftede af nybagte croissanter. Området er skønt og man føler sig nærmest som en del af det lokale miljø samtidig med, at man er i gåafstand til flere seværdigheder, metro, indkøb, gode restauranter osv. 
Rigtig godt sted og udgangspunkt til at udforske fantastiske Paris!
column5:
Antoinettes apartment was just as cozy, clean and in good condition as it looks in the pictures. Comfort is really good - there is everything you need. We took advantage daily of the bakery just downstairs - it was difficult in the second as there often smelled of freshly baked croissants. The area is beautiful and you feel almost like a part of the local environment at the same time, you are in walking distance to several attractions, metro, shopping, good restaurants, etc. 
Really good place and base to explore the amazing Paris!

column1:
房東有極佳的設計品味,加上空間舒適,我們可以獲得充分的休息｡
附近有超市,好吃的麵包電,交通也非常方便｡
如果喜歡夜生活的話,附近也有很多bar.
離劇院,博物館與購物商圈近,可以盡情享受巴黎的各種藝文活動｡

通訊溝通都非常清楚｡
非常滿意這次的選擇｡
column5:
Landlord has excellent design taste,plus the space is comfortable,we can get adequate Seating area.
Nearby there are supermarkets,delicious bread,electricity, traffic is also very convenient as well.
If you like the nightlife,nearby there are also many bar.
Away from the Theatre,Museum and shopping district near,can enjoy the Paris of the various arts activities available.

Communication communication is very clear as well.
Very satisfied with this choice as well.

column1:
Vi havde en vidunderlig weekend i Elisabeths lejlighed. Vi var 3 voksne og 3 børn. Rart og roligt kvarter med gode indkøbsmuligheder og gode restauranter. Super tæt på metro. Rigtig rigtig rart sted at bo som børnefamilie. Lejlighedens indeklima var lidt fugtigt men den var hyggelig og det varm dejligt med den fine terrasse hvor man kunne sidde og spise og slappe af i fred og ro.
Anbefaler varmt!
column5:
We had a wonderful weekend in Elisabeth's apartment. We were 3 adults and 3 children. Nice and quiet neighbourhood with good shopping and good restaurants. Super close to the metro. Really really nice place to live as a family. The apartment's indoor climate was a bit humid but it was cosy and warm great with the lovely terrace where you could sit and eat and relax in peace and quiet.
Recommend warm!

column1:
fin lille værelse hvis man udelukkende skal bruge den til overnatning. 
Der er bad, toilet og lille tekøkken. 

Centralt i paris, 20 meter fra Oberkampf station der fører en hen overalt i paris.
column5:
nice little room if you need to use the accommodation. 
There is a shower, toilet and small kitchenette. 

In central paris, 20 metres from Oberkampf station, which leads one to go anywhere in paris.

column1: 非常不错的房东和房子,物有所值｡虽然入住前Celine的回复有点慢,但可能这就是法国人的风格吧,你可能需要一点点耐心｡
column5: Very nice landlord and the house,value for money and great views. Although check-in before Celine's reply a little slow,but may be this is the French style it,you may need a little patience as well.

column1: Lejligheden sæderledes godt placeret ved canal St. Martin. Området er fyldt med mange cafeer, restauranter og  supermarkeder. Gåaftsand til Gare de l'Est og Republique pladsen med metro.  Lejligheden er rummelig, dog kan der være en del gadestøj om aftenen.
column5: The apartment sæderledes well located at the canal St. Martin. The area is filled with many cafes, restaurants and supermarkets. Gåaftsand to the Gare de l'est and the Republique square with the metro. The apartment is spacious, however, there can be a part of street noise in the evening.

column1: 这套studio很不错,经常住airbnb就知道图文经常不符｡这家的样子看起来会比图片上小,暗｡但是说实话,这个studio的性价比在巴黎已经算很不错的了｡首先位置很安静,安全,十六区是传统的富人区｡位置离地铁不算太近,走路十分钟,在接受范围内｡房间很干净,房东住楼上,入住之前会请人来彻底打扫,装修布置也挺有品位｡房间的热水非常大,暖气很足,暖气可以自己调温度｡厨房就是个小corner,但是东西很全,冰箱微波炉胶囊咖啡机,锅碗瓢盆,油盐都有｡房东也很热情,一直发信息问需要什么,我们要喝热水,还把自己的热水壶给我们了｡很推荐｡
column5: This studio is very good,often live I know text often does not match well. This home looks than the picture on the small,dark room. But to be honest,this studio price in Paris has been very good the room. First of all the location is very quiet,safe,sixteenth district is a traditional rich areas. Position away from the subway not too near,walk ten minutes,in the accepted range of areas. The room was very clean,the landlord lives upstairs,check-in before you will ask someone to thoroughly clean,decoration layout is also very tasteful apartment. The room the hot water is very large,the heating is sufficient,heating can be their own tune temperature as well. The kitchen is a small corner,but something very full,refrigerator,microwave, capsule coffee machine, pots and pans,oil, salt there's. The landlord is also very enthusiastic,has been sent messages asking what is needed,we want to drink hot water,also take your own kettle to us a home. Very recommended apartment.

column1: Nice little spot for Paris visitor.
column5: Nice little spot for Paris visitor.

column1: Anbefales på det varmeste! Kjempefin leilighet to minutter unna metroen, og Sandrine var lett tilgjengelig hele tiden. Vi kommer gjerne igjen!
column5: Highly recommended! Nice apartment two minutes away from the metro, and Sandrine was readily available all the time. We come gladly again!

column1: Veldig sentral leilighet. Smidig levering av nøkler og hadde alt jeg trengte. Kan absolutt anbefales! Kommer gjerne tilbake.
column5: Very central apartment. Agile delivery of the keys and had everything I needed. Can absolutely be recommended! Will be back.

column1: 숙소의 위치는 매우 훌륭했습니다. 공항에서 리무진버스를 타고 오가기에도 좋았고, 관광을 하기에도 좋았습니다. 호스트의 안내도 좋았고, 매우 친절했습니다.
column5: Location of the hostel is very good. From the airport limousine bus ride for good, the sky was good. The host of the guide was also great, very friendly.

column1:
Dejlig stor og lys lejlighed med god stemning. God placering midt i Montmartre med 20 minutters gang til Sacré Coeur og tæt på flere Metrostationer. Vi var 5 voksne som nød 3 dage i Paris med lejligheden som et hyggeligt udgangspunkt. Pænt kvarter med flere caféer og småhandlende i nærheden.
Vi var i bil og havde reserveret plads i et P-hus i nabogaden. Det fungerede helt uden problemer.
Den dejlige lejlighed har alt hvad man har brug for og man føler sig hurtigt godt hjemme. Godt velfungerende internet.
Et sted vi ikke ville betænke os på at komme tilbage til.
column5:
Nice big and bright apartment with a good atmosphere. Good location in the middle of Montmartre with a 20-minute walk to the Sacré Coeur and close to several metro Stations. We were 5 adults and enjoyed the 3 days in Paris with this apartment as a cozy base. Nice neighborhood with several cafes and small shops nearby.
We were in the car and had reserved space in a P-house in the same neighbourhood as. It worked without any problems.
The lovely apartment has everything you need and you feel quickly at home. Good functioning of the internet.
A place we would not hesitate to come back to.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed med en rigtig god beliggenhed.
column5: Lovely apartment with a great location.

column1: Størrelsen på lejligheden, roen og så den fantastiske placering lige ved rue Daguerre. Det kan næppe blive bedre.
column5: The size of the apartment, the tranquility and the amazing location just by the rue Daguerre. It can hardly be better.

column1:
Flora Busse har hele vejen igennem været en meget venlig og hjælpsom vært, både mht transport muligheder til og fra lejligheden, som med gode anbefalinger af indkøbs muligheder, gode lokale bagere, cafeer og restauranter i lokal området.  Området var hyggeligt, multikulturelt og meget spændende at udforske og opleve. Det var helt klart en meget anderledes og spændende måde at bo på end i de vanlige turist områder. Vi fik et indblik i hvordan det rent faktisk er at bo i Paris. Lejligheden var godt indrettet og det fungerede fint med 2 voksne og 2 børn. 
Flora havde endda udstyret med køleskabet med brød, juice, smør marmelade og kaffe så morgenmaden var reddet en tidlig lørdag morgen hvor cafeerne endnu ikke var åbnet. Lejligheden var meget ren og pæn, der var alt hvad vi behøvede for en dejlig weekend i smukke Paris. Kan varmt anbefale andre at bo hos Flora.
column5:
Flora Busse has been a very friendly and helpful host, both mht transportation options to and from the apartment, which with good recommendations of shopping opportunities, good local bakeries, cafes and restaurants in the local area. The area was cozy, multicultural and very exciting to explore and experience. It was clearly a very different and exciting way to stay on than in the usual tourist areas. We got an insight in how it actually is to live in Paris. The apartment was well decorated and it worked fine with 2 adults and 2 children. 
Flora had even equipped the fridge with bread, juice, butter jam and coffee, so breakfast was rescued early Saturday morning when the cafes had not yet opened. The apartment was very clean and tidy, there was everything we needed for a lovely weekend in beautiful Paris. Can highly recommend others to stay with Flora.

column1:
Maria er meget nem at kommunikere med og meget imødekommende. 
Lejligheden mangler en ordentlig rengøring, væggene smuldrer og badeværelse ligner ikke billederne. Det er malet gult og malingen falder af i store flager og er ekstremt slidt og ucharmerende. Perfekt beliggenhed.
column5:
Maria is very easy to communicate with and very accommodating. 
The apartment lacks a proper cleaning, the walls crumbling and the bathroom does not look like the pictures. It is painted yellow and the paint comes off in large flakes and is extremely worn and ucharmerende. Perfect location.

column1:
Carolyn er en fantastisk vært, med meget højt serviceniveau, alt fungerede god modtagelse og guide i brug af lejligheden.
Fantastisk god beskrivelse af beliggenhed, selve lejligheden og den lille private have som hører til lejligheden. Beskrivelse levede 100% op til det som stod i annoncen. 
Ligger lige i hjertet af Paris, du kan gå til alt, og der ligger hyggelige restauranter lige om hjørnet og gode shoppemuligheder. Meget stille og roligt om natten selvom den ligger midt i Paris. Til den en side har du udsigt til en lille brostensbelagt gade og til den anden side, udgang til dejlig have, hvor vi kunne sidde og nyde dagens indtryk. God luksus og rigtig vel fungerende lejlighed. Dejlig med 2 wc. Lækkert at du har udgang fra begge soveværelser til den private haven. Nice.
Vi var meget glade vores ophold med 6 overnatninger og vil 200% anbefale denne lejlighed til andre. Det var verdensklasse.
column5:
Carolyn is a great host, with a very high level of service, everything worked good reception and guide in the use of the apartment.
Great description of the location, the apartment itself and the small private garden which belongs to the apartment. Description lived 100% up to it which stood in the ad. 
Located right in the heart of Paris, you can walk to everything, and there are cosy restaurants just around the corner and great shopping areas. Very quiet and peaceful during the night even though it is located in the heart of Paris. To the one side you have a view of a small cobbled street and to the other side, exit to the nice garden where we could sit and enjoy the day's impressions. Good luxury and very well-functioning apartment. Nice with 2 wc. Nice that you have the output from both bedrooms to the private garden. Nice.
We were very happy with our stay of 6 nights and will 200% recommend this apartment to others. It was world-class.

column1: Lejligheden var fin - omend en smule brugt. Beliggenheden var super og skøn udsigt.
column5: The apartment was fine - albeit a bit used. The location was super and great views.

column1: Meget småt, men brugbart til overnatning for 2. Fint område i paris
column5: Very small, but usable for accommodation for 2. Excellent area in paris

column1:
Lejligheden var super fin. Balkonen rundt om med den fantastiske udsigt var dejlig, og lejligheden var fyldt med sjove og skøre ting. Fint børneværelse og soveværelse, fint køkken, sjovt badeværelse i maritimt tema med lækkert badekar. Rigtig godt sted at bo med et lille barn.  Beliggenheden var fin, der var flere metrostationer i nærheden, supermarkeder samt et stort marked tirsdag og fredag. 
Alt i alt anbefalelsesværdigt.
column5:
The apartment was super nice. The balcony around the with the amazing view was lovely, and the apartment was filled with fun and crazy things. Fine children's room and bedroom, fine kitchen, fun bathroom in nautical theme with a nice bath. Really good place to stay with a small child. The location was fine, there were several metro stations nearby, supermarkets and a large market on Tuesday and Friday. 
All in all recommendable.

column1:
Tomas' lejlighed er helt fantastisk! Udsigten fra terrassen var formidable - At sidde derude med en kop kaffe og udsigt til Notre Dame, Eiffel tårnet og Sacré-Cæur. 
Lejligheden har rigtig meget charme og nabolaget er rigtig fint. Det er super nemt at komme til en metrostation og indtil de store attraktioner, men det nabolag hvor lejligheden ligger er også rigtig hyggeligt. 

Jeg kan kun varmt anbefale at bo hos Tomas. Det var alle pengene værd.
column5:
Tomas' apartment is absolutely amazing! The view from the terrace was amazing To sit out there with a cup of coffee and a view of Notre Dame, the Eiffel tower and the Sacré-Cæur. 
The apartment has so much charm and the neighborhood is really nice. It is super easy to get to a metro station and until the big attractions, but the neighborhood where the apartment is located is also really nice. 

I can only highly recommend to stay with Tomas. It was all worth it.

column1: Denne lille og charmerende  lejlighed var en perfekt ramme om vores ferie i Paris. Beliggenheden kan ikke være bedre. Stille gade, men tæt på alt. Vi vil med glæde anbefale til andre. Vi havde SMS kontakt med udlejer om ankomst og det fungerede perfekt. Yvon tog sig af alle vores spørgsmål og anbefalede gode restauranter i området. Så vi følte os godt modtaget.
column5: This small and charming apartment was a perfect setting for our vacation in Paris. The location could not be better. Quiet street, but close to everything. We will be happy to recommend to others. We had SMS contact with the landlord on arrival and it worked perfectly. Yvon took care of all our questions and recommended good restaurants in the area. So we felt well received.

column1: Kommunikationen med Céline forløb uden problemer både før og under opholdet - hun var altid hurtig til at svare, så der nåede aldrig at opstå noget usikkerhed, og vi følte os i gode hænder. Lejligheden og området var som beskrevet og var begge med til at give os en perfekt oplevelse af Paris. Lejligheden er lille, men der var alt, hvad vi havde brug for. Området var helt perfekt med gode restauranter, caféer og butikker i nærheden og Canal Saint Martin lige om hjørnet. Resten af byen kunne vi uden problemer komme til på gåben (men metroen er også lige om hjørnet, hvis man vil længere væk). Næste gang vi skal til Paris vil vi helt sikkert overveje Célines lejlighed igen!
column5: The communication with Céline went smoothly both before and during the stay she was always quick to respond, so there never arise any uncertainty, and we felt us in good hands. The apartment and the area was as described and was both to give us a perfect experience of Paris. The apartment is small, but there was everything we needed. The area was perfect with good restaurants, cafes and shops nearby and the Canal Saint-Martin is just around the corner. The rest of the city, we could without problems get to on foot (but the subway is also just around the corner, if you want longer away). Next time we go to Paris we will certainly consider Call the apartment again!

column1:
Vi kom akkurat hjem fra kjærstehelg Paris. Studio ligger midt i smørøyet med gangavstand (10 min) til flere severdigheter (notre dame, Seinen, Louvre, jardin de Luxemburg). Man tar enkelt toget fra Charles du gaulle til (Website hidden by Airbnb) dame. (100kr PR.billett) Så finner du adressa på tlf og går 500m. Der blir du møtt av Olivier som er gjestfri, ryddig og hjelpsom med alt du måtte lire på. Gatene rundt studio yrer av liv og røre, men akkurat der studio ligger er det helt stille. 
Restauranter som varmt kan anbefales: Cosi, Freddy’s (litt annerledes tapas enn den tradisjonelle spanske), ønsker du høy kvalitets skinker og ost, prøv Bellota, Atlas (nydelig beef bourgnion). Favorittfrokostplass; Smiths bakery, nydelig Quiche. Alt som står nevnt er utenfor døra og byr på matopplevelser mens du titter på hyggelig gateliv og pop-up gla’jazz konserter på gatehjørnene. 
God tur!
column5:
We just got home from kjærstehelg Paris. The Studio is located in the middle of the action with easy walking distance (10 min) to several sights (notre dame, Seine, Louvre, jardin de Luxembourg). We take the easy train from the Charles du gaulle airport to (Website hidden by Airbnb) lady. (100kr PR.ticket) So you can find it on the phone and go 500m. There you will be greeted by Olivier who is friendly, tidy and helpful with anything you may read on. The streets around the studio is teeming hustle and bustle, but just where the studio is, it is completely silent. 
Restaurants such as hot can be recommended: Cosi, Freddy's (a little different tapas than the traditional Spanish), you want high-quality hams and cheeses, try the Bellota, Atlas (lovely beef bourgnion). Favorittfrokostplass; Smith's bakery, lovely Quiche. All that is mentioned is outside the front door, and offers dining experiences while you are looking at pleasant street stalls and pop-up gla’jazz concerts on the street corners. 
Good trip!

column1: 숙소 설명은 정확했지만 프랑스를 가는 것이 처음이라 시간이 조금 걸렸다. 하지만 지하철이랑 가깝고 가장 좋은 것은 사이요 궁, 에펠탑, 개선문과 거리가 가깝다는 것이엇다. 호스트는 반갑게 인사를 해주었다. 생각보다 방이 작았지만 쓰는데 불편함은 없었다. 대체적으로 깨끗하고 좋았다.
column5: Listing description was accurate, but France will be the first time a little took. But subway, bus and the most good thing Chaillot, Eiffel Tower, triumphal arch and close will do. The host greeted me. The room was small but the writing is. Generally clean and good.

column1: Vi har hatt fire strålende dager i Paris og i leiligheten til Guillaume sentralt i Le Marais med alt du trenger i gangavstand. Leiligheten var ryddig, luftig og ren som forventet og plasseringen på Place des Vosges var helt perfekt for oss med to smågutter og besteforeldre i entouragen. Det går veldig bra å være 6 stykker i leiligheten og 98 trappetrinn er ingenting! Bryllupspicnick med sjampanje og makroner for 25 gjester på Place des Vosges gikk også veldig bra, men nakenbading i fontenene er forbudt selv for 2-åringer. Vi anbefaler leiligheten på det varmeste og kommer gjerne tilbake.
column5: We have had four glorious days in Paris and in the apartment of Guillaume centrally located in Le Marais with everything you need in walking distance. The apartment was neat, airy and clean as expected and the location on Place des Vosges was perfect for us with two smågutter and grandparents in entouragen. It goes very well to be 6 pieces in the apartment, and 98 of stairs is nothing! Bryllupspicnick with champagne and makroner for 25 guests at the Place des Vosges was also very good, but nakenbading in the fountains is prohibited even for 2-year-olds. We recommend the apartment highly recommended and will be back.

column1: Skøn lejlighed med god beliggenhed. Der er styr på det, og Pierre er en fantastisk vært. Havde et rigtigt dejligt ophold.
column5: Great apartment with good location. There is a track on it, and Pierre is a great host. Had a really nice stay.

column1:
Fin leilighet. Kort vei til Metro, butikker, restauranter. 
Rolig gata.  Svalt og behagelig temperatur når det var veldig varmt ute. 
Super plass for familier med barn.
column5:
Nice apartment. Short distance to Metro, shops, restaurants. 
Quiet street. For a cool and comfortable temperature when it was very hot outside. 
Super place for families with children.

column1:
Moira er en sød værtinde som er let at kommunikere med. Lejligheden var ren og pæn ved ankomst og lever til fulde op til de viste billeder. Lejligheden ligger i et livligt område og vi kunne som eneste minus have tænkt os at vide at det er en del støj fra trafik (også om natten)... 
Moira - har desuden lavet et lille nyttigt opslagsværk om Metro, nærmeste bager osv. Virkelig godt tænkt!
column5:
Moira is a sweet hostess that is easy to communicate with. The apartment was clean and neat upon arrival and live to the fullest up to the pictures shown. The apartment is located in a lively area and we could as the only minus have thought us to know that it is a part of the noise from the traffic (also during the night)... 
Moira - has also made an useful reference book on the Metro, nearest bakery, etc. Really well thought!

column1: 不錯的地點,接近地鐵轉接站Bastille,距巴黎核心觀光區域如聖母院､羅浮宮､巴黎鐵塔等都很近｡到巴黎各個觀光景點也都方便｡Linda很熱心開朗,雖然因為平日要工作不能多聊,但是住宿細節頗為照顧,讓我在短短三天停留的時間裡,自由放鬆｡
column5: Good location,close to the Metro transfer station Bastille,from Paris, the core area of the domain such as Notre Dame, and the Louvre, and Eiffel Tower are very close to the apartment. To Paris, various tourist attractions are also easily available. Linda is very enthusiastic and cheerful,though because on weekdays to work not much chat,but the accommodation details quite care,let me in just three day residence time,free to relax and great views.

column1: Olivier, Rochester NY
column5: Olivier, Rochester NY

column1: 房东Romy非常热情和周到,对住户的问题有问必答,住房也非常靠近中心地带,离卢浮宫很近,最近的地铁站是pyramids三五分钟即可｡唯一的遗憾是房间的楼梯确实非常狭小,由于我带着24寸行李箱,所以非常失策,搬行李花了很多时间和体力,当然,其他方面都很好,尤其适合单独的旅行者｡
column5: The landlord Romy was very welcoming and attentive,the tenants of the questions answer all the questions,housing is also very close to the heart,the center of Paris very close by,the nearest metro station is the pyramids a few minutes to the apartment. The only regret is the room of the stairs are indeed very small,since I took a 24 inch suitcase,so very misstep,Luggage spends a lot of time and stamina,of course,other aspects are very good,especially suitable for individual travellers as well.

column1: Lejligheden levede op til forventningerne, beliggenhed var fin og faciliteterne var gode. Kommunikationen med Carolyn var rigtig fin. Bemærk dog den 'sene ankomst' fee, der er lidt dyr (50 euro).
column5: The apartment lived up to expectations, the location was fine and the facilities were good. Communication with Carolyn was very nice. Note, however, the 'late arrival' fee, which is a little pricey (50 euros).

column1:
Lejligheden er præcis, hvad den giver sig ud for at være. Mega hyggelig, funktionel, fantastisk beliggenhed, og så er altanerne hele turen op til 6. sal værd! Vi havde rigtig dårligt vejr, og så er det skønt at have et rigtig hjem at komme tilbage til efter mange timer i regnen.

Nelly er en forbilledlig vært. Sød og hjælpsom. Svarer hurtigt på mails, mødte os 23.30 med godt humør ved ankomsten, gav os fantastiske anbefalinger af restauranter lige om hjørnet. Mere end bare et rigtig godt måltid mad - ingen andre udlændinge, imødekommende betjening og meget lokal atmosfære.

Jeg vender helt sikkert tilbage og jeg vil anbefale alle, der skal til Paris at bo i Nellys lejlighed.
column5:
The apartment is exactly what it makes itself out to be. Mega cozy, functional, great location, and so are the balconies the whole trip up to 6. floor worth! We had really bad weather, and so it is great to have a real home to come back to after many hours in the rain.

Nelly is an exemplary host. Sweet and helpful. Respond quickly to emails, met us 23.30 with a good mood on arrival, gave us great recommendations of restaurants just around the corner. More than just a really good meal - no other foreigners, friendly service and very local atmosphere.

I will certainly return and I would recommend anyone who needs to Paris to stay in Nellys apartment.

column1: Denne lejlighed har hvad vi havde brug for, hverken mere eller mindre. Den ligger dejlig centralt. Man skal lige være opmærksom på at den ligger på 6 sal, men der er dejlig roligt der.
column5: This apartment has what we need, neither more nor less. It is a lovely central location. You need to be aware that it is located on the 6 floor but there's nice and quiet there.

column1: Nelly er en yderst god vært. Hun svarede hurtigt, og var god til at give tips til ens ferie i Paris. Lejligheden var rigtig hyggelig, og indrettet i fransk stil, hvilket fuldender ens oplevelse af Paris. Lejligheden ligger nogle kilometer fra de store seværdigheder, men ikke værre end man kan gå dertil, eller tage metroen tæt på. Der er gode spisesteder tæt på, hvor der serveres fransk-inspireret mad. Kan klart anbefale denne lejlighed
column5: Nelly is an extremely good host. She responded quickly, and was good to give tips to one's holiday in Paris. The apartment was really cosy, and decorated in the French style, which completes one's experience of Paris. The apartment is located a few kilometres from the major attractions, but not worse than you can walk there, or take the metro close by. There are good restaurants close by, which serves French-inspired food. Can clearly recommend this apartment

column1: Fullt utstyrt 2 rom leilighet. Ingen problemer med inn og utsjekking. Ikke behov for å kontakte vertinne under oppholdet - alt var i orden. Svært hensiktsmessig beliggenhet for deltakere i arrangementer i Expo, Porte de Versailles
column5: Fully equipped 2 room apartment. No problems with in and out. No need to contact your host during your stay - everything was in order. Very appropriate location for the participants in the events in the Expo, Porte de Versailles

column1:
Vi hadde fire fine dager i leiligheten.   Vi fikk en veldig fin mottagelse.Christine var en veldig koselig dame.
Leiligheten var veldig fin,alt vi trengte var på plass.
Veldig fin beliggenhet i et koselig strøk m, mange småbutikker og resturanter og barer.
Det var stille og rolig i leiligheten.Satt også pris på at det var en dagligvarebutikk v,hovedinngangen.



 og
column5:
We had four nice days in the apartment. We got a very nice reception.Christine was a very nice lady.
The apartment was very nice,everything we needed was in place.
Very nice location in a cosy coat m, many small shops and restaurants, and bars.
It was quiet and peaceful in the apartment.Set also the price that it was a grocery store v,the main entrance.

column1: Lejligheden var ren og pæn da vi kom. Somaya har desuden været en fantastisk vært, der hentede os, da vi ikke kunne finde lejligheden og svarede på vores spørgsmål. Den ligger tæt på en metrostation så det er super nemt at komme ind til byen og der er masser ting til rådighed når man ankommer. Alt i alt en super hyggelig lejlighed med en skøn vært
column5: The apartment was clean and neat when we arrived. Somaya has also been a great host, who picked us up, since we could not find the apartment and answered our questions. It is located close to a metro station so it is super easy to get into town and there are lots of things available when you arrive. All in all, a super cozy apartment with a wonderful host

column1:
Vi kan varmt anbefale denne lejlighed. Super beliggenhed i roligt familievenligt område med kort afstand til supermarked og metro, rigtigt godt udgangspunkt for at komme rundt i Paris.
Selve lejligheden var perfekt for vores familie på syv personer. Kommunikationen med udlejer var præcis, og der kom hurtigt svar på vores spørgsmål.
Lejligheden levede til fulde op til vores forventninger og Mr Song var en god vært :-)
column5:
We can highly recommend this apartment. Super location in quiet family friendly area with short distance to supermarket and metro, really good base for getting around Paris.
The apartment itself was perfect for our family of seven persons. Communication with the landlord was accurate and came quickly answers to our questions.
The apartment lived fully up to our expectations and the Mr Song was a good host :-)

column1: Lejligheden er stor og ligger i et meget multietnisk kvarter, tæt på banegårde og metro, og med gode muligheder for at spise ude. Andrés er en meget hjælpsom vært og nem at komme i kontakt med. Det hele fungerede rigtig godt
column5: The apartment is big and located in a very multi-ethnic neighbourhood, close to the railway stations and the metro, and with good options to eat out. Andrés is a very helpful host and easy to get in touch with. It all worked really well

column1: Dejligt hus med god beliggenhed. Vi var glade for at bo der.
column5: Nice house with good location. We were happy to stay there.

column1:
Meget hyggelig, ren og dejlig lys lejlighed som havde alt hvad vi havde brug for. Lejligheden lå lige ved siden af metroen og i gå afstand til et stort supermarked, indkøbsgader og Sacre Coeur.
Vi var i løbende kontakt med Julien som sørgede for at alt var ok. for os. Vores fly var kl. 22.00 om aftenen og vi fik lov til at blive i lejligheden hele dagen hvilket var virkelig en stor hjælp. Vi vil meget gerne komme tilbage.
column5:
Very cosy, clean and lovely light apartment which had everything we needed. The apartment was right next to the metro and within walking distance to a large supermarket, shopping and the Sacre Coeur.
We were in constant contact with Julien who made sure that everything was ok. for us. Our flight was at. 22.00 in the evening and we were allowed to stay in the apartment all day which was really a great help. We would very much like to come back.

column1:
Efter en rigtig god ferie i Paris er vi nu tilbage med en masse gode oplevelser i bagagen. Julien var en rigtig god vært og fortalte os om kvarteret hvor lejligheden er beliggende, lejligheden var god og i orden, meget rolig og som beskrevet i annoncen.
Vi siger tak til Julien og vil gerne bruge hans lejlighed når vi kommer til Paris igen.
Vi anbefaler på det varmeste denne lejlighed til andre som ville ønske at holde ferie i denne del af Paris.
Med venlig hilsen Brian og Lise.
column5:
After a really good holiday in Paris, we are now back with a lot of good experiences in the luggage. Julien was a great host and told us about the neighborhood where the apartment is situated, the apartment was good and in working order, very quiet and as described in the ad.
We say thank you to Julien and would like to use his apartment when we come to Paris again.
We strongly recommend this apartment to others who wish to holiday in this part of Paris.
Sincerely, Brian and Lise.

column1: Ludovic tog rigtig godt imod os, fik vist os rundt samt givet os de fornødne instrukser. Vigtigst af alt fik han os til at føle os velkomne.
column5: Ludovic did really well against us, had shown us around and given us the necessary instructions. Most importantly he got us to feel welcome.

column1:
Vi var 6 dage i Paris og boede hos Ludovic i hans super lejlighed. Vi blev taget godt imod og blev vist rundt så vi vidste hvor tingene var. 

Lejligheden er super lækker i et fantastisk område af Montmartre med kort afstand til mange lækre restauranter og barer. Lejligheden var næsten nyistandsat og var toplækker med alle nødvendige faciliteter. Det var en super base for vores tur til Paris. 

Området er helt fantastisk med metro indenfor 5 min og masser er gode restauranter lige ved siden af. Og med minimale støjscener.

Det kan klart anbefales at bo i Ludovic's lejlighed og vi vil med glæde leje den igen.
column5:
We were 6 days in Paris and stayed with Ludovic in his super apartment. We were welcomed and were shown around so we knew where things were. 

The apartment is super nice in a great area of Montmartre, with a short distance to many delicious restaurants and bars. The apartment was almost fully refurbished and was toplækker with all necessary facilities. It was a super base for our trip to Paris. 

The area is absolutely fantastic with the metro within 5 mins and lot's of good restaurants right next to it. And with minimal støjscener.

It can clearly be recommended to stay in Ludovic's apartment and we will be happy to rent it again.

column1:
Perfekt lejlighed og vicevært Carlos tog godt imod os.
Kan varmt anbefales
Pænt og rent. Sengetøj og håndklæder. Alt i den fineste orden.
column5:
Perfect apartment and caretaker Carlos took good against us.
Highly recommended
Nice and clean. Bed linen and towels. All in the finest order.

column1:
Spændende bolig, der svarer helt til værtens beskrivelse.  Ligger meget tæt på Metro station i et kvarter med mange spisesteder og butikker, god atmosfære.
Værten var imødekommende og hurtig til at svare. Vi og vores to teenagere nød opholdet til fulde.
column5:
Exciting accommodation which is fully equivalent to the host's description. Located very close to the Metro station in a neighborhood with many restaurants and shops, good atmosphere.
The host was welcoming and quick to respond. We and our two teenagers enjoyed the stay to the full.

column1:
Vi boede 4 personer i lejligheden. Det var en rigtig hyggelig og stemningsfuld lejlighed. Pascal var en god vært, som var hjælpsom og anviste gode steder at spise.
Området er dejligt roligt, med adskellige barer og restauranter i gå-afstand.
Vi anbefaler lejligheden.
column5:
We lived 4 persons in the apartment. It was a really nice and cosy apartment. Pascal was a great host, who was helpful and showed us good places to eat.
The area is nice and quiet, with several bars and restaurants in walking distance.
We recommend the apartment.

column5: Nice little room with very good location

column5: The necessary supplies, there in the at home as if you were staying well spent. Paris city tours can be in a good position in a fun and well spent.

column1: Une hôte très gentille et agréable. A recommander.
column5: A host very nice and pleasant. Has recommend.

column1:
Lejligheden er hyggelig, lidt overfyldt, men rummer fint fire personer, der er klar til at flytte lidt rundt på madrasser og dyner.
Den ligger fantastisk i Marais-kvarteret.
Vi så ikke Christine, men hun er hurtig til at svare og kommunikerer godt på engelsk.
column5:
The apartment is cozy, a little crowded, but fine four persons, who are ready to move around a bit on the mattresses and duvets.
It is superbly located in the Marais district.
We so not Christine, but she is quick to respond and communicates well in English.

column1: Alles bestens, gute Kommunikation.
column5: All the best, good communication.

column1: Dejligt, dejligt lille studio, morgensol på balkonen, meget venlige og hjælpsomme værter, super kvarter, masser af liv i de nærliggende gader, tæt på kanalerne - dejlig ferie!
column5: Nice, nice, small studio, the morning sun on the balcony, very friendly and helpful hosts, super neighborhood, plenty of life in the nearby streets, close to the canals - wonderful holiday!

column1: Super beliggenhed. Hyggelig, stille gade med mange restauranter og cafeer i nærheden. Lejligheden er hyggeligt indrettet og passer fint til 2 voksne og 3 mindre børn. Eneste minus var at vi skulle vente i mere end en time på værten foran lejligheden selvom vi havde ringet fra lufthavnen og sagt at vi var på vej.
column5: Super location. Cosy, quiet street with many restaurants and cafes nearby. The apartment is warmly decorated and suitable for 2 adults and 3 small children. Only minus was that we had to wait for more than an hour on the host in front of the apartment even though we had called from the airport and said that we were on the way.

column1: Perfekt leilighet i det beste området i Paris. Leiligheten er ren og nydelig og har alt man trenger, og alt du vil ha når du er i Paris finnes i umiddelbar nærhet: gode restauranter, koselige kafeer, kule barer, vakre bygninger, imponerende gallerier/museer, nydelige plasser og parker ... Et fantastisk sted å tilbringe noen dager!
column5: Perfect apartment in the best area in Paris. The apartment is clean and lovely and has everything you need and everything you want when you are in Paris are in the immediate vicinity: good restaurants, cosy cafes, cool bars, beautiful buildings, impressive galleries/museums, gorgeous squares and parks ... An amazing place to spend a few days!

column1:
距离几个景点都很近｡卢浮宫和奥赛博物馆大概1公里左右,蓬皮杜不到一公里,走路差不多十分钟就到了｡巴黎圣母院2公里不到,走路20分钟｡

南边大约400米有一个很大的shopping mall: Forum des Halles, 是一个很大的购物中心,里面有一个特别大的书店和电影院｡如果巴黎下雨或者比较冷,我就去看书或者看电影｡

附近有很多餐馆和小商店,比如Rue Montorgueil街上｡我每天早上都去那里吃早饭｡很晚回来也可以在附近吃点东西｡

因为这附近是一个非常热闹的商业区,所以很安全｡晚上到11点还有不少人在餐馆吃饭聊天｡

主人很热情友好｡房屋也干净整洁,就像照片一样｡有冰箱和灶台,可以做饭｡我都是在外面吃饭,所以没有使用过｡住在这里我想能体验巴黎本地人的生活｡

如果说有小小的缺憾的话,就是虽然本身所处的街道比较安静,但是离餐馆比较多的Rue Montorgueil大概只有几十米,所以晚上还是稍许能听到些餐馆的人声｡不过因为差不多是步行街,所以这里几乎没有汽车经过｡不像挨着马路的酒店,会有汽车经过的噪音｡
column5:
Distance to several attractions as well. The Louvre and the Orsay Museum is about 1 km or so,the Pompidou less than a km away,walk about ten minutes to the House. Notre Dame Cathedral 2 km,walking 20 minutes home.

To the South about 400 meters there is a very large shopping mall: Forum des Halles, a big shopping Mall,which has a particularly large bookstore and a cinema room. If Paris it's raining or cold,I'll go read a book or watch a movie house.

Nearby there are many restaurants and small shops,such as Rue Montorgueil Street area. I every morning have to go there to eat Breakfast as well. Very late back can also be in the vicinity for something to eat as well.

Because this neighborhood is a very lively business district,so very safety area. Night to 11 point, there are many people eat in restaurants on the chat room.

The owner is very friendly as well. The house is also clean and tidy,just like the photo as well. There is a refrigerator and stove,can cook well. I always eat out,so no Used Available. Live here I want to be able to experience Paris local life apartment.

If there is a little imperfection,then, is that, while the street is quite quiet,but away from the restaurants more Rue Montorgueil probably only a few tens of meters,so the night still slightly able to hear some of the restaurants in the vocal area. However, because the almost is a pedestrian street,so there is almost no cars passing as well. Not like next to the street of the hotel,there will be cars passing by the noise areas.

column1: meget stilfuld lejlighed, der var rigtig rar at være i.
column5: very stylish apartment, which was very nice to be in.

column1: Det er er dejlig lejlighed, vi nød vores ophold. Julien er en god vært som svarede omgående på vores spørgsmål. Den dag da vi skulle afsted fik vi lov til at blive der til om eftermiddagen da vores fly først gik sent om aftenen.
column5: It is a lovely apartment, we enjoyed our stay. Julien is a good host who responded promptly to our questions. The day when we were leaving we were allowed to stay there for the afternoon since our flight first went late in the evening.

column1: Alt var super bra. Rent og koselig. perfekt beliggenhet. Alexander var hyggelig og hjelpsom. Anbefales
column5: Everything was super good. Clean and cozy. perfect location. Alexander was friendly and helpful. Recommended

column1: A rexommander
column5: A rexommander

column1: Lille fin lejlighed i et roligt kvarter med vandudsigt, tæt ved metrostation
column5: Small fine apartment in a quiet neighborhood with water view, close to metro station

column1: Rigtig hyggelig lejlighed, meget parisisk stil - stille og privat i forhold til beliggenhed midt i turistområde. God plads til en hel familie! Dejlig central placering.
column5: Really nice apartment, very parisian style - quiet and private in relation to the location in the heart of the tourist area. Good space for a whole family! Nice central location.

column1:
Prisen var god, for det man fik. En dejlig, lille lejlighed med en helt perket beliggenhed. Lige når man træder ud på gaden, er der en dejlig atmosfære om dagen og et hyggeligt natteliv og placering tæt på en af de større togstationer. 
Kan bestemt anbefales
column5:
The price was good, for what you got. A nice, little apartment with a completely perket location. Right when you step out on the street, there's a lovely atmosphere on the day and a cosy nightlife and the location close to one of the larger train stations. 
Can certainly be recommended

column1:
Meget fin pariser-lejlighed. Lejligheden lå helt centralt i Paris, med gåafstand til det meste. Da vi ankom havde vi fået angivet dørkoder, som bare fungerede uden besvær. Lejligheden var ren og indeholdte alt hvad vi skulle bruge. Vores vært var kun forbi en enkelt gang, for lige at tjekke op på, at vi var ankommet og give os et tip til en restaurant. 
Ren, hyggelig og hel central. Vi havde en rigtig god ferie i lejligheden.
column5:
Very nice parisian apartment. The apartment was quite centrally located in Paris, with walking distance to most things. When we arrived we had been set door codes, which just worked without any hassle. The apartment was clean and contained everything we needed. Our host was only past a single time, just to check up on, that we had arrived and to give us a tip for a restaurant. 
Clean, cozy and quite central. We had a really good holiday in the apartment.

column1: Fantastisk indretning af et-værelses. Området kunne ikke være bedre... og vi elskede indretningsstilen Vi boede fem mand her i fire nætter og der var plads til os..men det er kun et studio - dog meget velindrettet.
column5: Stunning décor of a-room. The area could not be better... and we loved the interior style was We lived for five men here for four nights and there was room for us..but it is only a studio - but very well appointed.

column1: Meget fin kommunikation med Emilie op til opholdet, og fin modtagelse og information ved ankomst. Lejligheden ligger perfekt og har rolige omgivelser. Kan varmt anbefales.
column5: Very good communication with Emilie up to the stay, and the staff, reception and information upon arrival. The apartment is perfectly located and has quiet surroundings. Can be highly recommended.

column1:
Vi er en dansk familie på 2 voksne og 2 børn på hhv. 11 og 14 år. Vi har lige haft 5 fantastiske dage i skønne Paris. Richard's lejligheden ligger tilbagetrukket i et roligt område og lige overfor Pigalle station. 
Lejligheden er til 4 personer som godt kan bo i et åbent miljø. Dobbeltseng på en stor hems og en rigtig god sovesofa i stuen. Lejligheden er godt indrettet, spændende i form af de 3 plan og i en trendy stil, som gør at man føler sig hjemme.
Vi fandt dog ud af at der manglede lidt bestik og porcelæn til 4 personer, men det kunne gå, da vi kun lavede morgenmad i lejligheden.
Vi kan 100 % anbefale lejligheden.
Hilsen Lone og Torsten
column5:
We are a Danish family of 2 adults and 2 children, respectively. 11 and 14 years. We have just had 5 amazing days in beautiful Paris. Richard's apartment is located back in a quiet area and just across from the Pigalle station. 
The apartment is for 4 persons as well as may well live in an open environment. Double bed on a large loft and a very good sofa bed in the living room. The apartment is well decorated, exciting in the form of the 3-level and in a trendy style, which makes you feel at home.
However, we found out that there was a little cutlery and crockery for 4 persons, but it could go, as we only made breakfast in the apartment.
We can 100 % recommend the apartment.
Greetings Lone and Torsten

column1:
Meget spændende bolig - med super atmosfære i gården.
Vær ude i bedre tid med at aftale indtjekning - end jeg var ( jeg gjorde det dagen før) Jeg havde ikke set Richards besked - da min mobil ikke virkede i udlandet .
Venlig og hjælpsom mht bagagen - vi kunne lade den stå indtil flyafrejse.
Kommer gerne igen
column5:
Very interesting interior - with a great atmosphere in the courtyard.
Be out in the better time to arrange check-in than I was ( I did it the day before) I had not seen Richards message since my mobile did not work abroad .
Friendly and helpful in attending to the luggage - we could leave it until your flight.
Would be happy to come again

column1:
Rolig og dejlig lille lejlighed inde i en gård. Ligger tæt på metroer.
Vi har kunnet gå rundt til de fleste kirker og museer.
Lejligheden indeholder alt, hvad man kan ønske sig, f.eks hårtørrer.
Værten havde stillet juice, æg og yoghurt på køl og der var the og kaffe - noget som vi slet ikke havde forventet, en dejlig overraskelse.
column5:
Quiet and lovely small apartment inside a farm. Located close to metros.
We have been able to go around to most churches and museums.
The apartment contains everything one could wish, f.ex a hairdryer.
The host had made juices, eggs and yogurt on the keel and there was tea and coffee - something which we hadn't expected, a nice surprise.

column1: Strålende beliggenhed, lyset i lejligheden er dårligt og vandet løber ud af brusebadet i bunden, koden til døren fik vi for sent
column5: Brilliant location, the light in the apartment is bad and the water runs out of the shower in the bottom of the code to the door, we were too late

column1: 일딴 위찌는 에펠탑에서 매우 가깝고 트로카데로 역에 접근성이 좋아 이런면에서 추천할만 합니다. 또 바로 아래 마트가 있어 간단한 식료품을 사먹기에 좋고, 그 옆 빵집에서 아침에 갓나온 빵과 커피를 드실 수 있습니다. 끄러나 또로 변에 있어 빰에 차량 쏘음이 있는 편으로 얘민하씬 분들이라면 짬들기 여려율수 있습니다. 끄리고 냔뱡이 뺭뺭하지는 않아서 쮸위를 마니 타시는 분은 뚜꺼운 잠옷을 준비하세요. 호스트는 친절하며 게스트의 요구 사항에 즉각적으로 반응해주며 주변 시설을 설명해줍니다. 거울이 화장실에만 있으므로 따로 손거울을 챙겨가는 것이 좋으며, 슬리퍼는 제공하지 않습니다. 침구류와 소파, 식탁, 화장실은 청결합니다.

column1: Super beliggenhed – både i forhold til Metro, lokalmiljø og den private, brolagte gade. Lejligheden er fin og funktionel. Axel var en særdeles hjælpsom og venlig vært, og kommunikationen har været fin.  Alt sammen til en rimelig pris. Anbefales.
column5: Super location – both in relation to the Metro, local community, and the private, paved street. The apartment is fine and functional. Axel was a very helpful and friendly host, and the communication has been excellent. All at a reasonable price. Recommended.

column1: Værten var yderst proaktiv og kommunikativ. Beskrivelsen af boligen var præcis. Vi følte os meget velkommen.
column5: The host was extremely proactive and communicative. The description of home was accurate. We felt us very welcome.

column1: Superb value for money!
column5: Superb value for money!

column1: Jeanne's lejlighed er fantastisk hyggelig med flot kunst og gode senge! Den ligger super godt placeret i Paris. Flere metro stationer tæt på. Og selve kvarteret den ligger i er mega hyggeligt, gode cafeer, god bager, masser af shopping muligheder. Alt i alt en rigtig god oplevelse.  Tak Jeanne :)
column5: Jeanne's apartment is great, cosy with nice art and good beds! It is super well located in Paris. Several metro stations close by. And the neighborhood it is in is mega cozy, good cafes, great bakery, lots of shopping opportunities. All in all a really good experience. Thank You Jeanne :)

column1: Rigtig god mand. Nem til Alesia metro. Supermarked ligger lige ved siden af. Skal bo igen, når vi kommer til Paris.
column5: Really good man. Convenient to the Alesia metro. Supermarket is right next to it. Will be staying again when we come to Paris.

column1: Dejlig lejligheden, centralt i Paris. Kan varmt anbefales til andre
column5: Lovely apartment, centrally located in Paris. Highly recommended to others

column1: Skøn lejlighed med atmosfære og sjæl, perfekt beliggenhed mlm Latinerkvarteret og Marais. Marked 200 m væk med antikviteter og byens bedste croissanter. Fantastisk gæstfrihed fra udlejer, hurtige og fyldestgørende svar med fif og anbefalinger. Boligen er stor nok til 5, 1 db seng og 3 seperate senge. Masser af bøger i boligen, gode senge, og i det hele taget fint renoveret med sans for den gamle fine ejendom.
column5: Great apartment with atmosphere and soul, perfect location mlm the Latin quarter and the Marais. Market 200 metres away with the antiques and the city's best croissants. Fantastic hospitality from the landlord, the fast and complete answers with hints and recommendations. The home is big enough for 5, 1 db bed and 3 separate beds. Lots of books in the house, good beds, and on the whole, finely renovated with care and attention to the old fine estate.

column1: Vi har været rigtig tilfredse med opholdet i Paris. Lejligheden ligger super godt. Vi havde børn med og de trivedes godt. Selma var sød og rar
column5: We have been really satisfied with the stay in Paris. The apartment is super good. We had children and they thrived well. Selma was a very sweet and nice

column1: Marine var en dejlig vært, som har været meget behjælpelig og venlig, både før og efter bookning. Lejligheden levede helt op til vores forventninger, og hver dag vi var der satte vi pris på vores valg, over et hotelværelse. Der havde alt hvad vi behøvede for at føle os hjemme, og lejligheden er smuk og meget parisisk, hvilket gjorde vores ophold i byen endnu bedre.
column5: Marine was a wonderful host, who has been very helpful and friendly, both before and after booker. The apartment lived up to our expectations, and every day we were there, we put the price on our choice of a hotel room. It had everything we needed to feel at home, and the apartment is beautiful and very parisian, which made our stay in the city even better.

column1: Nicoles lille studio i Paris ligger i et meget lækkert område, med masser af restauranter (thai-mad, sushi, græsk, amerikansk - og fransk selvfølgelig!), små cafeer og det smukke torv med st sulpice kirke lige ved siden af. Der er metroforbindelser tæt på, Luxembourghaven og masser af autentisk Pariserstemning. Lejligheden er fin til to, men bedst når man er på farten og ikke planlægger at bruge den som arbejdssted. Vi var rigtig glade for at bo hos Nicole!
column5: Nicole's small studio in Paris is located in a very nice area, with lots of restaurants (thai food, sushi, Greek, american and French of course!) small cafes and the beautiful square of st sulpice church right next to it. There are direct links close to the Luxembourg gardens and lots of authentic parisian atmosphere. The apartment is fine for two, but is best when you are on the move and not planning to use it as a workplace. We were really happy to stay with Nicole!

column1: Unforgettable !!!
column5: Unforgettable !!!

column1:
Lejligheden kunne ikke ligge mere centralt - få meter fra metroen og i gåafstand af mange seværdigheder.
Lejligheden er hyggelig, med gode møbler. Praktisk indrettet med ekstra bekvemmeligheder som hårtørrer, støvsuger og brødrister. 
Og fuldstændig stilhed! Lige midt i Paris' hjerte. 
Jeanne var meget hjælpsom og meget venlig. Hun skrev i god tid, hvordan vi kunne komme fra RERen. Mødte os ved gadedøren og viste os lejligheden. 
Det eneste minus var, at køkkenet var meget koldt. Det må blive virkelig koldt til vinter.
Alt i alt en dejlig lejlighed som vi sagtens kan anbefale til andre.
column5:
The apartment could not be more centrally located - a few meters from the metro and in walking distance of many attractions.
The apartment is cozy, with good furniture. Practically furnished and are equipped with extra amenities such as hairdryer, vacuum cleaner and toaster. 
And complete silence. Right in the centre of Paris' heart. 
Jeanne was very helpful and very friendly. She wrote in good time, how we could come from RERen. Met us at our front door and showed us the apartment. 
The only drawback was that the kitchen was very cold. It must be really cold for the winter.
All in all a lovely apartment which we can recommend to others.

column1: Kind person. I felt like at home. Recommended
column5: Kind person. I felt like at home. Recommended

column1: Great View! Very helpful front desk manager.
column5: Great View! Very helpful front desk manager.

column1: Vi havde en rigtig dejligt ophold. Beskrivelsen passede meget fint, spændende indretning. Kvarteret var også helt perfekt og meget charmerende. Alle vinduer er tæt på den smalle gade og derfor følger der selvfølgelig mange gadelyde med ind når man har åbne vinduer.
column5: We had a really nice stay. The description matched the very fine, exciting interior design. The neighborhood was also perfect and very charming. All the windows are close to the narrow street and therefore it follows that, of course, many gadelyde with check when you have the windows open.

column1:
En perfekt lejlighed, hvis man vil ud at opleve Paris. Med udsigt til Eiffeltårnet fra terrassen. 
Ligger i det hyggeligste kvarter. Kan helt klart anbefales.
column5:
A perfect apartment if you want to experience Paris. With views of the Eiffel tower from the terrace. 
Located in the friendliest neighborhood. Can definitely be recommended.

column1: Fin beliggenhet, veldig nært moulin Rouge der vi var på show! Hyggelig og punktlig vert! Rent og pent
column5: Nice location, very close to the moulin Rouge where we were on the show! Pleasant and punctual host! Clean and nicely

column1: Ghislains lejlighed er super. Lever til fulde op til forventningerne.
column5: Ghislains apartment is super. Living fully up to expectations.

column1: Rigtig autentisk og super hyggelig centralt beliggende pariserlejlighed hos Quentin, som er en sød og sjov maler. Perfekt vært - som at bo hos en god ven.
column5: Really authentic and super cozy, centrally located parisian apartment of Quentin, which is a sweet and fun painter. Perfect hosts - like staying with a good friend.

column1: Its is place for younger, more avante garde people for short stay 1-2 days.
column5: Its is place for younger, more avante garde people for short stay 1-2 days.

column1: Fin og hyggelig lejlighed, som svarede præcis til beskrivelsen. Hyggeligt kvarter med flere små caféer og restauranter samt tæt på metroen. Patrick og Nam var meget venlige og hjælpsomme.
column5: Nice and cosy apartment, which answered exactly to the description. Pleasant neighbourhood with several small cafés and restaurants, and close to the metro. Patrick and Nam were very friendly and helpful.

column1:
Vi er vilde med Penelopes lejligheder. Det er så charmende, der er styr på tingene, vi nød at købe ind hos den lokale købmand og bager. Spise morgenmad hjemme, lave madpakker af de lækreste baguettes og spise aftensmad på hyggelige restauranter i området. Det er skønt med tre metrostationer så tæt på. 
Penelope er super servicemindet, hjælpsom og er hurtig til at svare.
column5:
We are wild with the Penelope apartments. It is so charm, there is a grip on things, we need to buy from the local grocery store and a baker. Eat breakfast at home, make a packed lunch of the most delicious baguettes and eat dinner at nice restaurants in the area. It's great with three stations so close. 
Penelope is super professional, helpful and quick to respond.

column1:
Hyggelig lejlighed på 5. sal (mange trapper) tæt på Chemin Vert metro station - kun 2 mins gang. Der ligger en bager på hjørnet af gaden pg kun 2 min fra lejligheden.
Der er massere af restauranter i området.

Der er lidt støj fra den store vej som ligger parallelt med lejligheden. Men vi sov uden problemer, da vi var totalt udmattede efter sightseeing hele dagen :)
column5:
Cozy apartment on the 5. floor (many stairs), close to Chemin Vert subway station - only 2 mins walk. There is a bakery on the corner of the street and only 2 min from the apartment.
There are a lot of restaurants in the area.

There is a little noise from the main road which is parallel with the apartment. But we slept without problems, as we were totally exhausted after sightseeing all day :)

column1:
Vi havde et dejligt ophold i François' lejlighed. Lejligheden var hyggelig og ren og havde en fantastisk lokation.
François var meget fleksibel med både ind- og udtjekningstidspunkter, og vi kunne bestemt godt finde på at komme tilbage.
column5:
We had a lovely stay in François' apartment. The apartment was cosy and clean and had a great location.
François was very flexible with both check - in and check-out times, and we could definitely find to come back.

column1: Hyggelig lille lejlighed. Ligger tæt på metro linie 13 og det hyggelige Montmartre kvarter.
column5: Cosy little apartment. Located close to metro line 13 and the quaint Montmartre district.

column1: Excellent!! Could not ask for more!! : )
column5: Excellent!! Could not ask for more!! : )

column1:
Dejlig, New Yorker agtig , smagfuld lejlighed, beliggende i en super velholdt, rolig ejendom / område.
Meget hurtig response på vores forespørgsler. Tak Patricia !
column5:
Lovely, New Yorker style , tasteful apartment located in a super well-kept, quiet property / area.
Very quick response to our requests. Thank You Patricia !

column1: Super god lejlighed - halvandet minut til metrostation - og 2 metrostop fra Triumfbuen. Rolig gade - lejligheden beliggende ved siden af et slags privathospital - så der mere eller mindre var vagt på hele natten. Kun få minutters gang til restauranter, bager, supermarked og butikker. Et par minutters gang  til en fin park - med gode legepladser og løbestier. Lejligheden var pæn og ren og det var dejligt, at man ikke selv skulle medbringe håndklæder og sengetøj.  Køkkenet er udstyret med det mest nødvendige - så man selv kan lave mad, hvis man ønsker det. Også opvaskemaskine. Badet er også rigtig fint. Lejligheden er rigtig godt indrettet  og man kan uden problemer bo 4 personer i den. Vær obs  på, at det er 2 dobbeltdyner. Der er wifi - og det fungerer super godt. Ariane var så sød at tage imod os - det var rigtig fint at møde værten.  Vi har allerede anbefalet lejligheden og værten til mange af vores venner - og hvis vi selv skal til Paris igen - så kontakter vi med garanti Ariane igen.  Tak for et super ophold - det var en fornøjelse :-). Der var også en meget fin korrespondence inden opholdet - og det var en fin rejsebeskrivelse fra lufthavnen til lejligheden, som vi fik af Ariane. Super lejlighed til prisen :-)
column5: Super good apartment - one and a half minutes to the metro station and 2 metro stops from the arc de Triomphe. Quiet street - apartment is located by the side of a sort of private hospital - so that more or less was the guard on throughout the night. Only a few minutes walk to restaurants, bakery, supermarket and shops. A few minutes walk to a nice park with great playgrounds and jogging trails. The apartment was neat and clean and it was nice not even having to bring your own towels and bed linen. The kitchen is equipped with the most necessary - so you can cook yourself, if you want it. Also the dishwasher. The bath is also really nice. The apartment is really well decorated and you can without problems stay 4 people in it. Please note that it is 2 dobbeltdyner. There is wifi and it works super well. Ariane was so sweet to greet us - it was really nice to meet the host. We have already recommended the apartment and the host to many of our friends and if we even need to Paris again - so we contact with warranty Ariane again. Thank you for a super stay - it was a pleasure :-). There was also a very good correspondence before their stay and it was a fine travelogue from the airport to the apartment, which we got of Ariane. Super apartment for the price :-)

column1:
Min familie og jeg har ikke en finger at sætter på Ariane og hendes hyggelige lejlighed. Kommunikationen med Ariane inden ankomst har været helt i top - hurtige tilbagemeldinger, gode og dybdegående svar på spørgsmål til både lejlighed og byen og generelt bare rigtig sød og imødekommende. 
Da vi ankom til lejligheden stod Ariane klar til at modtaget os og overrække nøglerne og ligeledes fortæller om diverse informationer omkring lejligheden. 
Selve lejligheden indeholder lige hvad man har brug for - hyggelige stue og soveværelse i ét, dejligt rummeligt badeværelse og fint lille køkkenet med plads til at lave mad hjemme, hvis man har lyst til dette. 
Det absolut bedste ved det hele, var absolut lejlighedens beliggenhed. Dejligt chamerende, roligt og trygt område med dørvagt i """"entreen"""". Meget tæt på metro og mange hyggelige gågader til at gåture i, i området. Ligeledes gode handlemuligheder og bageri. 
Næste gang vi skal til Paris vil jeg klart booke Arianes lejlighed igen og til hver en tid anbefale hende til andre!
column5:
My family and I don't have a finger to put on the Ariane and her cozy apartment. Communication with Ariane before the date of arrival has been right at the top - fast feedback, good and in-depth answers to questions for both the apartment and the city and generally just really sweet and accommodating. 
When we arrived to the apartment stood the Ariane ready to received us and hand over the keys and also tells about various information about the apartment. 
The apartment itself contains just what you need - cozy living room and bedroom in one, lovely spacious bathroom and a nice little kitchen with space to cook at home, if you feel like this. 
The absolute best thing about it all was definitely the location of the apartment. Nice sporty, quiet and safe area with the door guard in the """"the hall"""". Very close to the metro and the many charming pedestrian streets to walks in the area. Also good options and a bakery. 
Next time we go to Paris I would definitely book Arianes apartment again and to recommend her to others!

column1: Super lejlighed, perfekt beliggenhed, sød og hjælpsom vært, man følte sig omgående velkommen. Livligt område, masser af spændende spisesteder
column5: Super apartment, perfect location, sweet and helpful host, we felt immediately welcome. Lively area, lots of interesting eateries

column1:
Trods flyforsinkelse blev vi modtaget meget hjertevarmt. Lejligheden er charmerende og velindrettet og indeholder alt man har brug for. Terrassen er en skøn oase. 
Kan helt klart anbefale Erling som vært, der bliver svaret meget hurtigt.
column5:
Despite the flight delay, we were received very hjertevarmt. The apartment is charming and well-appointed and contains everything you need. The terrace is a beautiful oasis. 
Can definitely recommend Nico as a host, which will answer very quickly.

column1: Et godt sted at være, nemt til alting, bus og Metro næsten lige ved døren. En lejlighed der er super, hvor der er det der skal være.
column5: A good place to be, easy to everything, bus and Metro almost at the door. The apartment is super, where it should be.

column1: Dejligt ophold i en autentisk, hyggelig og centraltliggende fransk lejlighed.
column5: Delightful stay in an authentic, cozy, and centraltliggende French apartment.

column1: Fantastisk beliggenhed, tæt på barer, restauranter, metro, bager og supermarked. Derudover god kommunikation med værterne og alt forløb planmæssigt.
column5: Great location, close to bars, restaurants, metro, bakery and supermarket. In addition, good communication with the hosts and everything went well.

column1:
Lejligheden var rigtig hyggelig og dejlig at være i. Der var Nespresso-kaffe, hvilket var skønt! Lejligheden ligger midt i centrum med minutters gang til både tog, metro, Nortre Dame og en overkommelig gangdistance til resten af Paris' store oplevelser. 
Marine var nem at kommunikere med, svarede hurtigt på alle beskeder og var sød med gode svar på alle henvendelser.
column5:
The apartment was really nice and lovely to be in. There was Nespresso coffee, which was great! The apartment is located right in the centre with minutes walk to both trains, metro, Nortre Dame and an affordable gangdistance to the rest of Paris' great experiences. 
Marine was easy to communicate with, responded quickly to all messages and was sweet with good replies to all inquiries.

column1: Fuldstændig fantastisk lejlighed i gå afstand til Notre Damm og div. seværdigheder
column5: Absolutely fantastic apartment in walking distance to Notre Damm and the div. attractions

column1: Super dejlig og hyggelig  lejlighed. God plads, komfortable møbler og praktisk køkken. Beliggenheden  er fin   tæt til metro og hyggeligt kvarter med caféer og butikker lige i nærheden.  Meget søde værter.
column5: Super nice and cosy apartment. Good space, comfortable furnishings and convenient kitchen. The location is fine-close to metro and nice neighbourhood with cafes and shops just nearby. Very sweet hosts.

column1:
Super lejlighed placeret i farverigt og levende kvarter i byen. 
Det kan dårligt fåes bedre
 Værten er meget venlig og imødekommende.
column5:
Super apartment located in the colorful and vibrant neighborhood in the city. 
It could hardly come better
The host is very friendly and welcoming.

column1: Leiligheten ligger rolig til i et urbant strøk. Det er 2 minutters gange til nærmeste undergrunnstasjon og derfra 10-15 minutter til alle hovedattraksjoner. Leiligheten har alt av fasiliteter og passer bra for familier og par. Ingen støy. Bruker ca 50 min fra Orly flyplass til leilighet ved buss/tog og undergrunn.
column5: The apartment is in a quiet location in an urban area. It is a 2 minute walk to the nearest undergrunnstasjon and from there, 10-15 minutes to all the main attractions. The apartment has all of the amenities and suitable for families and couples. No noise. Uses about 50 min from Orly airport to the apartment by bus/train and underground.

column1:
Min søn og jeg har tilbragt 6 dejlige og varme juli-dage i Christophe og Chehrazads lille og meget charmerende lejlighed, hvor der er alt, man har brug for. Vi handlede dagligt i supermarkedet lige overfor. Lejligheden er meget stille og rolig, men sover man med åbne vinduer, skal man indstille sig på larm fra gaden om natten, bl.a. når varer leveres til supermarkedet tidligt om morgenen. Men også det har sin egen pariser-charme!
Vi nød meget at bo- og opleve Paris mere """"lokalt"""" - og at kunne tage lidt væk fra det mere centrale Paris med alle seværdighederne og alle de andre turister. (Og alligevel er der ikke langt til centrum og seværdigheder.)
Christophe og Chehrazad er super søde og hjælpsomme værter. De har besvaret alle vores mails og smser lynhurtigt, hvilket har været vigtigt for os. Det var ikke noget problem, at vi ankom sent om aftenen, og Christophe og Chehrazad havde endda stillet noget mad og drikkevarer til min søn og mig i køleskabet! Vi fik også lov til at lade vores bagage stå i lejligheden den sidste dag, hvor vi først skulle forlade Paris om aftenen.
Vi takker mange gange for stor gæstfrihed og for et dejligt ophold - vi kan varmt anbefale Christophe og Chehrazads lejlighed!

Hilsen Mette fra Danmark
column5:
My son and I spent 6 lovely and warm July days in Christophe and Chehrazads small and very charming apartment where there is everything you need. We traded daily in the supermarket just opposite. The apartment is very quiet and calm, but sleep with the windows open, must be set on the noise from the street at night, fol.a. when the goods are delivered to the supermarket early in the morning. But also it has its own parisian charm!
We enjoyed very much to stay and experience Paris more """"local"""" and that could take a little away from the more central Paris with all the sights and all the other tourists. (And yet there is not far to the centre and the sights.)
Christophe and Chehrazad is super sweet and helpful hosts. They have answered all our mails and smses quickly, which has been important for us. It was no problem that we arrived late in the evening, and Christophe and Chehrazad had even provided some food and drinks for my son and me in the fridge! We were also allowed to leave our bags in the apartment on the last day when we had to leave Paris in the evening.
We thank you many times for the great hospitality and for a wonderful stay - we can highly recommend Christophe and Chehrazads apartment!

Regards Mette from Denmark

column1: 정말 아름답습니다. 그리고 굉장히 넓었어요. 파리를 몇차례 왔지만 이렇게 넓은 공간을 지낸건 처음이었습니다. 18세기로 온 기분이었어요. 집주인이신 두 분도 너무 친절하셨고, 고양이의 사랑스러움으로 시간이 가는게 아쉬울 정도였습니다. 욕실도 깔끔했고, 온수도 정말 잘나왔고, 식기도 엔틱풍으로 완전했고 드럼세탁기도 좋았어요. 오래된 곳이고 먼지 알러지나 벌레를 조금 걱정했는데 전혀 없었습니다 굳이 단점을 고르라고 한다면 제가 지낸 방은 밤에 조금 어두웠습니다.스탠드가 4개 있지만 메인샹들리에가 장식이어서.. 하지만 괜찮았어요. 제가 해가 짧은 겨울에 지내서 그렇게 느꼈을 수있습니다. 노을이 길게 함께 해서 운치있어 일부러 일찍 귀가해 집에서 쉬었던 적도 있어요. 라디에이터가 큰 것이 있어 춥지 않았고, 패딩이불까지 따로 챙겨주셨습니다. 권해드리고 싶은 장소였고, 다음 번 파리행도 이곳에서 묶고 싶다는 생각을 했습니다.
