column1: Svært vennlig og hjelpsom vert. Veldig hyggelig og flott leilighet i et sjarmerende, trygt nabolag med gode restauranter etc og kort vei til Metroen.
column5: Very friendly and helpful host. Very nice and beautiful apartment in a charming, safe neighborhood with good restaurants etc and a short distance to the Metro.

column1: Venlig og imødekommende perfekt værtinde
column5: Friendly and welcoming perfect hostess

column1: Helle, angenehme Wohnung an toller Lage. Entgegenkommende Gastfreundschaft.
column5: Bright, pleasant apartment in a great location. Responsive Hospitality.

column1: En skøn rummelig og spændende lejlighed i dejligt kvarter.
column5: A lovely spacious and interesting apartment in nice neighborhood.

column1: Vi havde en god kommunikation med Danielle inden vores ankomst. Vi blev godt modtaget af hendes datter og lejligheden levede helt op til vores forventninger. Alt var gjort klar og vi manglede intet under vores ophold. Lejligheden er meget hyggelig og ligger centralt i en dejlig del af Paris.
column5: We had a good communication with Danielle before our arrival. We were well received by her daughter and the apartment lived up to our expectations. Everything was made ready and we lacked nothing during our stay. The apartment is very cozy and is centrally located in a lovely part of Paris.

column1:
메트로 역에서 7분 거리에 위치해 찾아가기 쉽다.
역에서 집 가는 길에 많은 레스토랑과 큰 마트, 
베이커리들이 있어서 편리하다.
동네가 조용한 편이라 위험하진 않다.
집에서 세탁기를 사용할 수 없다는 것 빼고는
있을만한 물건 다 있고, 깨끗해서 좋은 것 같다.
column5:
Metro station in 7 minutes find easy.
At the station house on the way, many restaurant and big Mart, 
Bakery they have.
The neighborhood is quiet dangerous.
At home the washing machine that you can't use the sword
But stuff, clean seems to be good.

column1:
Rafik房子坐落在非常繁华的街区,交通便利,商店､餐馆遍地都是,但同时也很安静,完全不影响休息｡房间很小,不过我们三个女孩住足够了,设施都很齐全,床很舒服,被子很暖和｡
Rafik特别热情,回复也很快,我们之间的沟通很顺畅,交谈很愉快｡
column5:
Rafik House is located in a very lively neighbourhood,with convenient transportation,shops, and restaurants are everywhere,but at the same time also very quiet,completely does not affect the Seating area. The rooms are small,but we Three Girls lived enough,the facilities are very well equipped,the bed was very comfortable,the quilt is nice and warm apartment.
Rafik particular zeal,reply is also very fast,between US communication is very smooth,while very pleasant area.

column1: Boligen var præcis som beskrevet, super fed og hyggelig. Fedt område. Jeg kan kun anbefale Arnauds lejlighed!
column5: The home was exactly as described, nice and cozy. Fat area. I can only recommend Arnauds apartment!

column1: Sarah var meget venlig og imødekommende, hun kom og hentede os da vi var faret lidt vild på vejen til lejligheden. En dejlig lille lejlighed i et skønt kvarter. Vi giver vores varmeste anbefalinger. Vh Sarah
column5: Sarah was very friendly and welcoming, she came and fetched us when we got slightly lost on the way to the apartment. A lovely little apartment in a wonderful neighborhood. We give our warmest recommendations. Vh Sarah

column1: 지하철역에서 3분만 걸으면 나오는 곳입니다. 파리 동역과 북역 근처여서 스위스나 독일 쪽으로 출발하기도, 파리 공항에서 오기도 아주 편합니다. 치안은 근처에 군인들이 많아서 안전합니다. 집은 깨끗하고 아주 아늑했습니다. 다만 엘리베이터가 없어서 무거운 짐을 옮기기는 불편합니다. Demian은 아주 친절하게 파리와 주변 명소들을 소개해 주었습니다.
column5: Underground station in 3 minutes. Paris East station and North station, close to the Swiss or German side with departure to Paris, from the airport also very easy. Policing in the neighborhood and soldiers in the safe. The house is clean and very cozy. Just check-in from a heavy load to move that is uncomfortable. Demian is very friendly to Paris and the surrounding attractions to to introduce.

column1: sfeervolle kamer, vlotte eigenaar.
column5: beautiful room, smooth owner.

column1: Lejligheden var virkelig ren og ordentlig og ligger i et ret hyggeligt kvarter med uformelle bistroer, park og ikke mindst metro i tæt nærhed. Ikke fancy men rigtigt fin og velfungerende til vores familie på fire. Muriel er en god, stabil og imødekommende vært - ingen slinger i valsen. :-)
column5: The apartment was really clean and tidy and is situated in a rather pleasant neighbourhood, with informal bistros, park and, not least, the metro in close proximity. Not fancy but really nice and functional for our family of four. Muriel is a good, stable and friendly host - no beating around the bush. :-)

column1: God og venlig vært. Adriano var punktligt til stede ved både ankomst og afrejse.
column5: Good and friendly host. Adriano was punctually present at both arrival and departure.

column1: Davids lille lejlighed i centrum af Montmatre er den perfekte baggrund for to personers tur i Paris. Der er alt hvad man har brug for også på en regnvejrsdag. Hyggelig stemning i baggården, tæt på både supermarkedet, delikatesseforretninger og restauranter. Davids kommunikation før/under og efter opholdet var også helt i top.
column5: David's small apartment in the centre of Montmatre is the perfect background for the two person trip in Paris. There is everything you need on a rainy day. Cozy atmosphere in the backyard, close to both the supermarket, delis and restaurants. David's communication before/during and after the stay was also top notch.

column1: Cyrille var en perfekt vært og svarede altid hurtigt tilbage på email og SMS. Lejligheden ligger dejligt centralt i Paris. Kan anbefales.
column5: Cyrille was an excellent host and answered always quickly back on the e-mail and SMS. The apartment is a nice location in Paris. Can is recommended.

column1: Rigtig fin loftslejlighed på fjerde sal med elevator. Vi var familie på 2 voksne og 2 børn. Ingen larm fra trafik. God central beligenhed med Metro indenfor 200 m og tæt på restauranter og indkøb
column5: Very nice attic apartment on the fourth floor with elevator. We were family of 2 adults and 2 children. No noise from the traffic. Good central location with Metro within 200 metres and close to restaurants and shopping

column1:
Verten var veldig imøtekommende og rask til å svare på henvendelser. Hun ga gode tips og detaljert informasjon på forespørsler. Overlevering av nøkler/leilighet var smidig og som planlagt.
Utleiestedet var godt beskrevet med representative bilder og størrelse som forventet. Leiligheten lå inn mot gårdsrommet, som var stille og fredelig, og leiligheten føltes trygg siden bygget var skjermet med adgangskontroll. Kort vei til Metro, bra dagligvareforretning og liten restaurant. God størrelse på sengene og adskilt bad og toalett var et pluss. Anbefales!
column5:
The host was very accommodating and quick to respond to inquiries. She gave great tips and detailed information on requests. The handover of the keys/apartment was smooth and as planned.
Utleiestedet was well described by the representative photographs and size as expected. The apartment was located towards the courtyard, which was quiet and peaceful, and the apartment felt safe since the building was shielded with access control. Short way to Metro, good grocery shop and small restaurant. Good size of the beds and separated bathroom and toilet was a plus. Recommended!

column1: Lejligheden ligger perfekt i forhold til masser af gode spisesteder og indkøb.
column5: The apartment is located perfectly in relation to lots of good restaurants and shopping.

column1:
Vi havde et fantastisk ophold i Bruno's lejlighed. Lejligheden passede perfekt til os, to voksne og 3 børn. Beliggenheden skøn i fredelig gade og alligevel central og tæt på Metrostationer.
Bruno tog imod os som aftalt, og alt fungerede efter hensigten inklusive wifi, og lejligheden var hyggelig, ren og pæn og velfungerende. Kan absolut anbefales!
column5:
We had a great stay in Bruno's apartment. The apartment was perfect for us, two adults and 3 children. The location estimates in a peaceful street yet central and close to metro Stations.
Bruno welcomed us as agreed, and everything worked properly including the wifi, and the apartment was cozy, clean and neat and well-functioning. Can definitely recommend!

column1: Vi have 5 gode overnatninger i lejligheden, som lå dejligt stille i nærheden af Place Pigalle. Lejligheden var som beskrevet og Manon var hjælpende og imødekommende - helt klart en lejlighed vi ville leje en anden gang.
column5: We have 5 good nights in the apartment, which was lovely, quiet in the vicinity of the Place Pigalle. The apartment was as described and Manon was helpful and accommodating - definitely an apartment we would rent a second time.

column1: God beliggenhed, i et roligt område. Dog larmede køleskabet (ville have været rart hvis det stod beskrevet) og overbo (ikke Manon’s skyld). Så husk ørepropper, så sover du godt! Sofasengen var udemærket men for kort til en på 189 cm. Derudover havde vi et godt ophold, god kontakt til Manon, i et dejligt kvarter. Prisen var efter min mening lift for høj ift. Stoppet afløb i bruseren (som vi fjernede) larmende køleskab samt ingen wc (højst sandsynlig ved fejl). Men alt i alt udemærket oplevelse.
column5: Good location, in a quiet area. However, I found the fridge (would have been nice if it was described) and the house is an creative (not Manon's fault). So remember earplugs, so sleep you well! Sofasengen was okay but too short for a at 189 cm. In addition, we had a good stay, good contact to Manon, in a nice neighborhood. The price was in my opinion the lift for high ift. Stopped the drain in the shower (which we removed), noisy refrigerator and no wc (probably by mistake). But all in all, good experience.

column1:
Det var en meget fin lejlighed, rigtig god placering i Paris - nær Luxemborg Haven - Adressen var helt nøjagtig.
Vi blev budt velkommen af Rosa - stand in fra Jean Luc - hun hjalp os med falde til i lejlighed. Meget behagelig.
Vi var 4 voksne og vi havde fint med plads. Vi lavede både mad i lejligheden og spiste ude, en perfekt blanding.
Lejligheden ligger rigtig godt for ture ud i Paris, Metro, RER tæt på, og mange ting i gå afstand.
column5:
It was a very nice apartment, really good location in Paris near the Luxembourg Garden - the Address was absolutely accurate.
We were greeted by Rosa - able in from the Jean Luc - she helped us settle into the apartment. Very comfortable.
We were 4 adults and we were fine with the space. We made both meals in the apartment and ate out, a perfect blend.
The apartment is situated very well for trips out of Paris, Metro and RER close by, and many things in walking distance.

column1: Charmerende lejlighed placeret helt centralt i Paris. Vi var to voksne og to børn (6 og 8). Der er et separat soveværelse, stue med stor hems, bad og køkken. Det er helt oppe under taget med udsigt til Sacre Coeur, Pantheon og Paris’ hustage. Området er perfekt til at opleve pariserstemning omkring St Germain og Latinerkvarteret, og Luxembourghaven er to skridt væk.
column5: Charming apartment located quite centrally in Paris. We were two adults and two children (6 and 8). There is a separate bedroom, a living room with a large loft, bath and kitchen. It is all the way up under the roof with views to the Sacre Coeur basilica, the Pantheon and the rooftops of Paris. The area is perfect for experiencing the parisian atmosphere around St Germain and the Latin quarter and the Luxembourg gardens are steps away.

column1:
Jean Francois tog godt imod os og var meget hjælpsom.
Lejligheden er hyggelig og som vist på billederne. Selvom den ligger midt på Montmartre var der stille og roligt.
Kan sagtens anbefales til andre.
column5:
Jean Francois was good against us and was very helpful.
The apartment is cosy and as shown in the pictures. Even though it is located in the middle of the room was quiet and calm.
Can easily recommended to others.

column1:
Lejligheden er præcis, som billederne beskriver, hyggelig og med en dejlig altan.
Beliggenheden er rigtig god, kvarteret er hyggeligt og der er cafeer, restauranter, indkøbsmuligheder og flere metrostationer meget tæt på.
Antoine, som vi ikke mødte, da han var bortrejst, er en god og omsorgsfuld vært.
Desværre er der et problem med indeklimaet i lejligheden, som min voksne søn, der har astma, led meget under, -min datter og jeg kunne fint opholde os der uden problemer, og havde ikke bemærket noget, hvis vi havde været alene. Dette kun for at kommende gæster kan undgå denne lejlighed, hvis de lider af astma.
column5:
The apartment is exactly as the pictures describe, cosy and with a nice balcony.
The location is really good, the neighbourhood is nice and there are cafes, restaurants, shopping, and several metro stations very close.
Antoine, as we do not met when he was out of town, is a good and caring host.
Unfortunately, there is a problem with the indoor climate in the apartment, as my adult son, who has asthma, suffered greatly under-my daughter and I could fine stay there without problems, and had not noticed anything, if we had been alone. This is only for that future guests can avoid this apartment if they suffer from asthma.

column1: Nette, saubere Unterkunft
column5: Nice, clean accommodation

column1: God og presis informasjon om leiligheten og området rundt i forkant av oppholdet. Sentral beliggenhet. Liten, praktisk og grei loftsleilighet. Virket til å være lite turister i området. Folkeliv i gatene, særlig på kveldstid. Lett å komme seg rundt i Paris fra leiligheten, enten til fots eller metro. Greit å være bevisst på at mange av de bedre restaurantene i Paris holder stengt mellom jul og nyttår (24 des-2 jan).
column5: Good and precise information about the apartment and the surrounding area in advance of your stay. Central location. Small, practical and straightforward loft. Seemed to be little tourists in the area. Street life in the streets, especially in the evenings. Easy to get around Paris from the apartment, either on foot or metro. Good to be aware of the fact that many of the better restaurants in Paris is closed between christmas and new year (24 dec-2 jan).

column1: Rigtigt godt sted i et super hyggeligt kvarter. Masser af lækre steder af spise og drikke kaffe, samt en masse butikker. Et rigtigt pariser kvarter. Metroen er super tæt på, og fungerer rigtigt godt til at komme rundt med. Man kan gå til Notra Dame på 20 minutter.
column5: Great location in a super nice neighborhood. Lots of delicious places to eat and drink coffee, as well as a lot of shops. A true parisian neighborhood. The metro is super close, and works really well to get around with. You can walk to Notra Dame cathedral in 20 minutes.

column1:
Vi havde en lækker forlænget weekend i Marais med udgangspunkt i Nathalies lejlighed. Den lå lige i hjertet af Marais, nabo til Picasso museet og til alle de små hyggelige gader. Det er Paris, når det er bedst. Nathalie bød os velkommen med god rødvin og chokolade samt anbefalinger af restauranter og shopping kvarterer i nærheden. Værten snakker både fransk og flydende engelsk. 

Lejligheden har alt hvad man har brug for med en charmerende stue ud til gaden i åben forbindelse med et lille velfungerende køkken. Et fint soveværelse mod gården, som der er direkte udgang til (den er meget lille, men man kan sidde og spise derude). Toilet og bad fungerede upåklageligt. Vi kan kun anbefale Nathalies lejlighed!
column5:
We had a delicious long weekend in the Marais, starting in Nathalies apartment. It was located right in the heart of the Marais, adjacent to the Picasso museum and all of the small cosy streets. It is Paris at its best. Nathalie welcomed us with good red wine and chocolate, as well as recommendations of restaurants and shopping districts nearby. The host speaks both French and English fluently. 

The apartment has everything you need with a charming living room out to the street in open connection with a small functioning kitchen. A fine bedroom facing the courtyard, as there is direct access to (it's very small, but you can sit and eat out there). Toilet and shower worked perfectly. We can only recommend Nathalies apartment!

column1: Karl est formidable
column5: Karl est formidable

column1:
Ikke prangende 

Meget rodet og slet ikke som på billederne
Meget støj i løbet af natten pga. værtens kat der løb ind på værelset
column5:
Not flashy 

Very messy and not at all like on the pictures
Very noise during the night due. the host's cat who ran into the room

column1:
Min kæreste og jeg havde en fantastisk tur til Paris og vores ophold i Wilson og Marielles lejlighed bidrog især til dette. 
Lejligheden var præcis lige så skøn som beskrevet og den lå det mest pragtfulde sted. Få minutter fra lejligheden lå sacre coeur, hvorfra der var en vidunderlig udsigt over Paris. 
Wilson og Marielle var virkelig hjælpsomme. Allerede før vi tog afsted, modtog vi en besked med en præcis beskrivelse af, hvordan vi kom fra lufthavnen og hen til lejligheden. Og da vi ankom modtog vi en besked med tips om gode restauranter, cafeér og andre seværdigheder. 
Vi skulle først flyve hjem sent om aftnen, så Wilson og Marielle rykkede vores check ud tid til klokken 18.00, hvilket var en stor hjælp! 
De var virkelig gode værter og man kunne virkelig mærke, at de gjorde alt for, at man havde et godt ophold. 
Alt var udover alle forventninger og jeg vil bestemt anbefale Wilson og Marielles lejlighed til alle der skal til Paris!
column5:
My girlfriend and I had a fantastic trip to Paris and our stay in the Wilson and Marielles apartment contributed especially to this. 
The apartment was just as beautiful as described and it was the most magnificent place. A few minutes from the apartment was the sacre coeur, from where there was a wonderful view over Paris. 
Wilson and Marielle were really helpful. Already before we took off, we received a message with an accurate description of how we came from the airport and to the apartment. And when we arrived we received a message with tips on good restaurants, cafés and other attractions. 
We had to first fly home late in the evening, as Wilson and Marielle moved our check out time at 18: 00, which was a great help! 
They were really good hosts and you could really feel that they did everything that you had a good stay. 
Everything was beyond all expectations and I would definitely recommend Wilson and Marielles opportunity to all to Paris!

column1: Meeting us late after delayed flight
column5: Meeting us late after delayed flight

column1: Dejligt sted, hvis man bare er to! Min kæreste og jeg havde en fantastisk tur til Paris! Wilsons og Marielles lejlighed var rigtig fint. Vi mødte kun Wilson, som er en imødekommende mand, der gav os gode tips om vore ophold. Rigtig venlige værter, da i måtte tjekke senere ud, så vi kunne nå vore fly om aftenen. Anbefaler dette sted!
column5: Nice place if you just are two! My girlfriend and I had a fantastic trip to Paris! Wilson's and Marielles apartment was really fine. We met Wilson, who is a friendly man who gave us good tips on our stay. Really friendly hosts, as in had to check out later, so we could reach our flight in the evening. Highly recommend this place!

column1:
Hyggelig og fin lille lejlighed, som har alt, hvad du har brug for. Ligger super fint lige ved siden af Sacre Coeur, hvor der dog er lidt mange turister, men hvis man går mod stationerne Abbesses og Pigalle, er der virkelig hyggeligt. Vi mødte kun Wilson, som var rigtig sød og imødekommende og gav os nogle tips til området og metrostationer. Da vi ville tjekke ud senere end kl. 10, var det heller ikke et problem. Alt i alt et rigtig fint ophold. 
Et lille tip: Der ligger en vanvittig god morgenmadsrestaurant lige ved siden af lejligheden, som hedder Hardware Society, den er klart værd at besøge.
column5:
Cozy and nice little apartment which has everything you need. Is super fine right next to the Sacre Coeur, where there are a little many tourists, but if you go against the stations Abbesses and Pigalle, is really cozy. We met Wilson, who was very sweet and accommodating and gave us some tips for the area and metro stations. When we would check out later than noon. 10, it was also not a problem. All in all a really nice stay. 
A little tip: There is a crazy good breakfast restaurant right next to the apartment, which is called the Hardware of the Society, it is clearly worth a visit.

column1:
Herve har været en exceptionelt imødekommende vært. Han var fleksibel med vort ankomst og afrejsetidspunkt og gav os flere gode tips om gode restauranter i nabolaget.
Han var meget betænksom og havde forberedt vor ankomst ved at købe god ost, frugt, kølig vin, vand og yogurt til os. Der var endvidere pyntet med en stor buket afskårne blomster.

Lejligheden er helt som beskrevet med hele tre etager og to grønne terrasser med fantastisk udsigt over Paris - et dejligt sted at slappe af på ferien. Vi var to voksne og to teenagere og fordelte os på etagerne med det store køkken alrum på etagen i midten hygge. Lejligheden er rustikt istandsat og meget perosnligt indrettet med mange fine detaljer og genstande og et væld af interessante bøger.

Lejligheden ligger på Rue Montorgueil gågaden i et af de bedste kvarterer, hvor der er masser af restauranter, cafeer og fødevare specialforretninger - der er super indkøbsmuligheder for foodies. Samtidig er der gode forbindelser til alle dele af Paris og parkeringsmuligheder, hvis man er i bil, fx under Pompidou Centret.

Samlet vil vi varmt anbefale Herve, lejligheden og kvarteret - vi kommer selv meget gerne igen.
column5:
Herve has been an exceptionally welcoming host. He was flexible with our arrival and departure and gave us several good tips on good restaurants in the neighborhood.
He was very thoughtful and had prepared our arrival by buying good cheese, fruit, chilled wine, water and yogurt for us. There was also adorned with a large bouquet of cut flowers.

The apartment is absolutely as described, with three floors and two green terraces with stunning views of Paris - a wonderful place to relax on holiday. We were two adults and two teenagers and allocated us on the floors with the large kitchen and dining room, on the floor in the middle of the toilet. The apartment is rustically renovated and very perosnligt decorated with many fine details and objects and a host of interesting books.

The apartment is located on Rue Montorgueil pedestrian street in one of the best neighborhoods, where there are plenty of restaurants, cafes and food specialty stores - there are super shopping for foodies. At the same time there are good connections to all parts of Paris and parking facilities, if you are in a car, for example under the Pompidou Centre.

Overall, we would highly recommend Herve, the apartment and the neighborhood - we get even again.

column1: Vi havde nogle dejlige dage i Emma's lejlighed. Vi blev taget godt imod og vist til rette. Lejligheden var ren og pæn. Hvis vejret havde været til det, havde vi brugt altanen til at spise morgenmad på.
column5: We had some lovely days in Emma's apartment. We were welcomed and shown to the right. The apartment was clean and neat. If the weather had been for it, had we used the balcony to eat breakfast on.

column1: Enlightening, friendly, beautiful
column5: Enlightening, friendly, beautiful

column1: Godt modtagelse, hyggelig, praktisk lejlighed i en meget stille kvarter. Vil  stærk embefale  hvis du skal holde ferie i Paris som en person eller par.
column5: Good reception, cosy, convenient apartment in a very quiet neighbourhood. Will strong embefale if you need to vacation in Paris, as a person or a couple.

column1:
Dejlig hyggelig lejlighed centralt og roligt beliggende i det smukke Latinerkvarter tæt på Seinen. 
Gangafstand til Metro. 
Husk at tage en sejltur på Seinen (hop af - hop på)
column5:
Lovely cosy apartment-centrally and quiet located in the beautiful Latin quarter near the Seine. 
Walking distance to the Metro. 
Remember to take a boat trip on the Seine (hop - hop)

column1: Vi følte os velkomne og godt modtaget. Da vi ankom til lejligheden, var der en ven af huset til at modtage os og instruere i de forskellige småting med vand, netværk, nøgler osv. Det var en stor fordel for os, at han talte svensk, så vi kunne kommunikere helt ubesværet. Ellers var vi glade for den udførlige manual om at bo i lejligheden. Lejligheden svarede til billederne og alt var rent og i orden. Beskrivelsen af lejligheden og kvarteret svarede til vores oplevelse. Nabolaget var fredeligt og pænt. Det var ganske let at komme til og fra lufthavnen med offentlige transportmidler, og det var nemt at komme rundt i Paris til seværdigheder, enten til fods eller med metro.
column5: We felt welcome and well received. When we arrived to the apartment, there was a friend of the house to receive us, and to instruct in the various small items with water, network, keys, etc. It was a big advantage for us, that he spoke Swedish, so we could communicate quite effortlessly. Otherwise we were pleased with the detailed manual on to stay in the apartment. The apartment corresponded to the pictures and everything was clean and in order. The description of the apartment and the neighbourhood corresponded to our experience. The neighborhood was peaceful and nice. It was quite easy to get to and from the airport with public transport, and it was easy to get around Paris to the sights, either on foot or by metro.

column1: Charlotte은 매우 친절합니다. 영어도 유창합니다. 룸메이트 또한 잘생겼고 친근합니다. 싼가격에 파리에 오래 머물기에 적절했습니다. 핞국읺/룸멣갏남잟 평솛엟웃통벗곯있닳 괂심있읋싢붆강춣 빯랧넗숧없닳 빯랧셇젫돓직접삻얋핞닳 줋삻섫창틇핧곯묺핧곯엲겷햃섫썼닳 방엟쥟갏있늖것같닳음식삻섫듫엃왔덣닗찍찍댆닿 방엟젆등잃없닳슳탢듫핧낧롫벓텷얋핞닳긇걿밤샗켰닳곯짏랋핧덣랋 헳엃듫랋잃긿돓없닳 숧걶돓없닳 청솛긿돓없닳 압축팩못쓶닳 룸멣는흡엲잟냄샗갏방엟닳듫엃옪닳 침댏갏잃밇붏셣졇있닳

column1:
Skøn lys lejlighed, centralt beliggende i rolig gade. Værten var meget fleksibel i forhold til check in og ud tidspunkter og opmærksom under opholdet.
Jeg var vild med den lille balkon, jeg følte mig hjemme i lejligheden, og vil booke den igen. Nem adgang fra metro/bus.
column5:
Estimates bright apartment, centrally located in quiet street. The host was very flexible for check in and out times, and attentive during the stay.
I was thrilled with the little balcony, I felt at home in the apartment and will book it again. Easy access from the metro/bus.

column1: Dejlig lille bolig for to. Billeder viser præcis hvad man får. Vi boede 5 overnatninger og det var rigtig fint. Det er virkelig tæt på alt og det nød vi meget. Chantal er en utrolig god og flink vært som er meget hjælpsom og indstillet på at sørge for man som gæst føler sig velkommen. Hun overholdt aftaler til punkt og prikke. Vi følte vi havde vores eget lille hjem i de fem dage vi var i Paris. Husk ørepropper da der er lidt trafikstøj ved åbne vinduer og der kan også godt være fest i gaden. Samlet en rigtig god bolig til prisen.
column5: Nice little home for two. Pictures show exactly what you get. We stayed 5 nights and it was really fine. It is really close to everything and we enjoyed very much. Chantal is an incredibly good and nice host who is very helpful and willing to make sure guests feel welcome. She complied with the agreements to the letter. We felt like we had our own little home in the five days we were in Paris. Remember the ear plugs as there is little traffic noise at the open windows, and there can also be celebration in the street. Overall a very good accommodation for the price.

column1:
En meget fin og hyggelig lejlighed. Værtsparret kunne ikke selv være der til at tage imod os, men havde fået en meget venlig nabo til at gøre det. Det fungerede fint. Lejligheden ligger i et roligt kvarter og der er meget stille i lejligheden. Vi var i Paris for at se byen og opholdt os kun i lejligheden et par aftener og om natten. Så gør det ikke noget at det er en baggårdslejlighed uden udsigt eller kontakt med byen. Lejligheden er ren og pæn og der er alle fornødenheder. Den levede fuldt op til vores forventninger og er helt som man ser på billederne. 
Værtsparret virker venlige og responderer hurtigt på div. spørgsmål.
column5:
A very fine and cozy apartment. The hosts couldn't even be there to greet us, but had been a very friendly neighbor to do it. It worked just fine. The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood and is very quiet in the apartment. We were in Paris to see the city and were only in the apartment a couple of evenings and at night. It doesn't matter that it is a baggårdslejlighed with no view or contact with the city. The apartment is clean and neat and there are all necessities. It fully lived up to our expectations and is exactly as you see in the pictures. 
The hosts seem friendly and respond quickly to div. questions.

column1:
Efter afrejse - gjorde værten krav på €650 for et møbel hvor der var rande fra kondens fra er glas. Da vi var i lejligheden var randen dækket af et glasfad til drikkepenge/nøgler...
Vil anbefale alle at tage billeder af hele lejligheden ved indtjekning og fjerne pynteting og synliggøre hvordan tingene ser ud ... så man er forberedt på krav fra værten... meget dårlig oplevelse :-( ....
column5:
After departure - did the host requirements of €650 for a piece of furniture where there were circles of condensation from the glass. When we were in the apartment was the verge, covered by a glass to the tips/keys...
Would recommend everyone to take pictures of the whole apartment at check-in and remove pynteting and visualize how things look like ... so you are prepared for the requirements from the host... very bad experience : - ( ....

column1: Aida var informativ og god til at kommunikere. Det var nemt at komme til lejligheden, selv om vi ankom sent.
column5: Aida was informative and good to communicate. It was easy to get to the apartment even though we arrived late.

column1: Dejligt og hyggeligt sted. Det var meget nemt med check in og check ud. Lejligheden er lille, men stadig fin og der er hvad man har brug for.
column5: Nice and cozy place. It was very easy with check in and check out. The apartment is small, but still fine and that is what you need.

column1:
Martin tog imod os og viste os rundt i lejligheden. Vi følte os hjemme med det samme. Der var god plads og ro til at slappe af. 

Der var 2 min til metroen, 10 min til Eiffel Tårnet. Der var 2-timers parkering, vi valgte at parkere i et parkeringshus ca. 300 meter derfra. 

Kan kun anbefale at leje denne lejlighed:-)
column5:
Martin welcomed us and showed us around the apartment. We felt at home with the same. There was plenty of space and quiet to relax. 

There was 2 min to metro, 10 min to the Eiffel Tower. There was 2-hour parking, we chose to park in a parking garage approx. 300 metres away. 

Can only recommend to rent this apartment:-)

column1: 소음방지가 안 되어서 잠자기가 불편합니다.
column5: Noise Prevention has not been at sleep is uncomfortable.

column1:
Det var en fornøjelse at bo i Emily og joels hus. Det er hyggeligt og rummeligt og der er dejlige barer og bistroer lige i nærheden. 
Vi kommer meget gerne tilbage.
column5:
It was a pleasure to stay in Emily and joel's house. It is cosy and spacious and there are lovely bars and bistros nearby. 
We will very much like back.

column1:
Fantastisk modtagelse af en super sød værtinde, der var indkøbt lidt af diverse fornødenheder til lige at starte op på...meget gæstfri, super dejligt område i gå afstand af det meste..

Super dejlig lejlighed...med en hyggelig terrasse.

En stor tak til (Website hidden by Airbnb) kommer helt klart tilbage en dag..

Heidi, Charlotte, Kim, Henrik og Mads (Danmark)
column5:
Great reception by a super sweet hostess, there was procured a bit of miscellaneous necessities for the right to start up on...very hospitable, super nice area within walking distance of most..

Super nice apartment...with a cosy terrace.

A big thank you to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) will definitely return one day..

Heidi, Charlotte, Kim, Henrik, and Mads (Denmark)

column1:
Det har været en sand fornøjelse at leje lejligheden.
Helt fra start har Jean været meget behjælpelig når vi har haft spørgsmål inden vores rejse, og det har under opholdet været muligt at sms eller ringe ved eventuelle spørgsmål.
Lejligheden ligger som beskrevet et rigtigt fint område. Det er nemt at komme rundt, enten på gåben eller med metro. Lige rundt om hjørnet, og op at trapperne ligger Monmatre , som bestemt er et af de steder man skal se når man er i Paris. 
Vi vil på det varmeste anbefale Jean og hans fine lille lejlighed, og kommer vi til Paris igen vil vi bestemt undersøge om det vil være muligt at leje denne igen.
Alt muligt held og lykke til de der ønsker at bo et dejligt, meget fint og utroligt stille sted midt i hjertet af Paris hos en meget fin, opmærksom og ærlig udejer
column5:
It has been a true pleasure to rent the apartment.
Right from the start, Jean has been very helpful when we had questions before our trip, and it has during the stay has been possible to sms or call for any questions.
The apartment is as described a very nice area. It is easy to get around, either on foot or by metro. Just around the corner, and up the stairs is a Monmatre , which is certainly one of the places you must see when you are in Paris. 
We will warmly recommend Jean and his fine little apartment, and we come to Paris again we will certainly explore whether it will be possible to rent this again.
All possible good luck and happiness to those who wish to stay in a lovely, very fine, and incredibly quiet place right in the heart of Paris with a very good, attentive and honest udejer

column1: Utrolig hyggelig og charmerende lejlighed med en storslået udsigt over det nordlige Paris. Ligger i et meget charmerede og smukt kvarter uden turistpræg. Tæt på supermarked og mange spisesteder i nærheden. I lejligheden findes alt hvad der skal bruges, også i forbindelse med madlavning. Meget ren lejlighed. Tæt på metro. God kommunikation med værten, som i forbindelse med min booking påpegede forhold som kunne være væsentlige for mig i.f.t. lejligheden og de rejsende. Altid hurtigt svar i forbindelse med spørgsmål.
column5: Incredibly cozy and charming apartment with a magnificent view over the north of Paris. Located in a very charmed and beautiful neighborhood without turistpræg. Close to supermarket and many eateries nearby. In the apartment you find everything what needs to be used, also in connection with cooking. Very clean apartment. Close to the metro. Good communication with the host, as in the case with my booking pointed out facts that could be essential for me.f.t. the apartment and the travelers. Always fast response to questions.

column1: Lejligheden var meget charmerende og passede fint med beskrivelsen. Den var meget godt udnyttet. Der var dejlige senge,  lækre håndklæder og sæber. Dejligt at der var te, kaffe og marmelade, som vi kunne bruge. Der var fint rent overalt, da vi kom. Vi blev godt modtaget af Agnes og fint introduceret til lejligheden. Området er meget hyggeligt med gode forretningsgader i nærheden, som Christophe vejledning hjalp os med at finde. Gode legepladser i nærheden til børnene.
column5: The apartment was very charming and seemed to fit with the description. It was very well utilized. There were comfy beds, plush towels and soaps. Nice that there was tea, coffee and jam, which we could use. It was very clean everywhere, when we came. We were well received by Agnes and the staff and introduced to the apartment. The area is very cosy with good commercial areas nearby, as Christophe the guide helped us find. Good playgrounds nearby for the kids.

column1: Netter & angenehmer Kontakt!
column5: Nice & pleasant contact!

column1: Dejligt sted. Det ligner billederne og Laurence er gæstfri og kan sagtens tale engelsk. Vil klart anbefale stedet.
column5: Nice place. It looks like the pictures and Laurence are hospitable and can easily speak in English. Will clearly recommend the site.

column1:
Det er en virkelig fin og super hyggelig lejlighed og den ligger perfekt. Det er et sjovt og folkeligt område, men det  ligger stadig meget tæt på centrum. Vi kan kun give den vores varmeste anbefaling.
Tina Damholt
column5:
It is a really nice and super cozy apartment and it is perfect. It is a fun and popular area, but it is still very close to the centre. We can only give it our warmest recommendation.
Tina Damholt

column1: Super hyggeligt sted - præcist ligesom billederne. Perfekt lille lejlighed til to.
column5: Super nice place - exactly like the pictures. Perfect little apartment for two.

column1:
Meget lille lejlighed. Sengen var meget lille og svær at sove 2 mennesker i. Der var intet lys på toilettet og lejligheden fremstår lidt tilfældigt indrettet og virker nusset. Den såkaldte """"have"""" er komplet uden værdi da der ikke findes opholdmøbler og samtidig går """"haven"""" ind foran de andre lejligheders værelser med indkigsgener til følge.
På trods af den lave pris ville jeg have foretrukket at betale lidt mere og i stedet bo på hotel.
column5:
Very small apartment. The bed was very small and difficult to sleep 2 people in. There was no light in the toilet and the apartment appears a little randomly decorated and seems dingy. The so-called """"have"""" is complete without value since there is no opholdmøbler and at the same time """"garden"""" in front of the other catering apartments rooms with indkigsgener to follow.
In spite of the low price I would have preferred to pay a little more and instead stay at the hotel.

column1:
Vi blev inviteret med ud den første aften. Og fik set dele af Montmartre vi ellers ikke ville have set.

Tilbuddet om en guidet rundvisning i Montmartre næste dag, afslog vi dog, da vi selv ønskede at se byen.

Men alt i alt en rigtig godt værtskab. Venlig, imødekommende og charmerende sted. Perfekt lokation.
column5:
We were invited out the first night. And got to see parts of Montmartre, we would not have otherwise seen.

The offer of a guided tour of Montmartre the next day, refused, however, we because we wanted to see the city.

But all in all a really good hosting. Friendly, welcoming and charming place. Perfect location.

column1:
Gaspard har skabt en fantastisk oase, midt i een af Paris´ mest eftertragtede områder.Stedet oser af sans for kvalitet, mennesker og god stil. Gaspard og hans sted tryllebandt os fra første færd og gjorde vores ophold til een af de bedste vi har haft i denne vidunderlige (Website hidden by Airbnb) hjertet tak, Gaspard
Kh Mette og Riko
column5:
Gaspard has created an amazing oasis in the middle of one of Paris most coveted areas.The place oozes a sense of quality, people, and good style. Gaspard and his place mesmerise us from the outset and made our stay one of the best we have had in this wonderful (Website hidden by Airbnb) heart, thank you, Gaspard
Kh Mette and Riko

column1: Virkelig god værdi for pengene. Hyggelig lejlighed med altan. Området er hyggeligt og ikke turistet så hvis du ikke har behov for at bo i gå afstand fra turistattraktioner er det anbefalelsesværdigt. Metroen er tæt på og har gode muligheder for forbindelser til alle områder af Paris.
column5: Really good value for money. Cosy apartment with a balcony. The area is cozy and not touristy so if you don't need to stay in walking distance from the tourist attractions, it is recommendable. The metro is close and has good options for connections to all areas of Paris.

column1: Lækker bolig, som lever op til billederne. Patrice var som vært meget venlig og utrolig hjælpsom.
column5: Delicious abode, to live up to the pictures. Patrice was the host very friendly and incredibly helpful.

column1: Praktisk leilighet i et spennende område i Paris, god beliggenhet. Godt samsvar mellom beskrivelsen i annonsen og virkeligheten. Utleieren framstår som seriøs. Anbefales.
column5: Convenient apartment in an exciting area of Paris, good location. A good match between the description in the ad and the reality. He appears as serious. Recommended.

column1:
Grundet flyforsinkelse var vi først fremme klokken  24 istedet for klokken 17. Trods dette ingen problem med nøgleoverdragelse fra nabo. Charmerende lejlighed godt placeret på Montmartre.  Hvis man ikke fik motion nok ved at gå til 5. sal, var der ikke længere rundt til de forskellige områder i Paris, end man kunne nå ved at gå og samtidig så opleve. Mødte kun venlige franskmænd der straks tilbød deres hjælp hvis vi stod og kigge på et bykort Ellers var metro og bus også nær ved.
At Alice formodentlig havde bestilt fint forårsvejr til os, og at vi fik det gjorde kun vores parisertur endnu bedre
column5:
Due to a delayed flight we were first promoting at 24 o'clock instead of at 17. Despite this, no issue with key handover from the neighbor. Charming apartment well located in Montmartre. If you didn't get exercise enough, go to 5. floor, was no longer around to the different areas in Paris, than you could reach by walking and at the same time, so, experience. Met with friendly frenchmen who immediately offered their help if we were to look at a map of the city Otherwise metro and bus also near by.
Alice probably had ordered the fine spring weather to us, and we got it only made our parisertur even better

column1: Hyggelig lille lejlighed i hjertet af Paris
column5: Cosy little apartment in the heart of Paris

column1: God lille lejlighed til 2 personer
column5: Good small apartment for 2 persons

column1: Perfekt lejlighed til par. Super beliggenhed lige midt i Paris. Vi kommer helt sikkert tilbage :-) Dog et meget livligt kvarter.
column5: Perfect apartment for couple. Super location right in the heart of Paris. We will definately be back :-) However, a very lively neighbourhood.

column1: Johanna tog fint imod os som aftalt. Lejligheden var som beskrevet omend den var lidt mindre end vi havde troet, især hemsen hvor vi skulle sove. Lejligheden var ren og pæn og tæt på både metro, supermarked og resturanter.
column5: Johanna took the fine against us, as agreed. The apartment was as described although it was a little smaller than we had thought, especially the loft where we would sleep. The apartment was clean and neat and close to both the metro, supermarket and restaurants.

column1: En vidunderlig charmerende typisk parisisk lille lejlighed. Fredfyldt, fin udsigt til himmel og træer. En meget dejlig atmosfære. Et meget dejligt parisisk ældre kvater lige ved Buttes Chaumont, en dejlig park. Alt praktisk fungerer. Og en utrolig behagelig og fleksibel vært, Clara,  til at byde en velkommen og få en til øjeblikkeligt at føle sig hjemme.  Her vil jeg gerne komme igen!
column5: A wonderful charming typical parisian small studio apartment. Peaceful, great views to sky and trees. A very nice atmosphere. A very nice parisian older kvater right by the Buttes Chaumont, a lovely park. All practical works. And an incredibly pleasant and flexible host, Clara, to offer a welcome and get to instantly feel at home. Here I would like to come again!

column1:
Carmens lejlighed er perfekt beliggende tæt på den hyggelige Luxembourghave, nær metro og indkøb og i et meget hyggeligt og fredeligt fransk kvarter. 
Lejligheden er i flot stand, smagfuldt indrettet og perfekt til 4 personer. 
Carmen er meget hjælpsom og meget nem at komme i kontakt med. 
Vi kan varmt anbefale andre at leje Carmens lejlighed.
column5:
Carmen's apartment is perfectly located close to the pleasant luxembourg gardens, near metro and shopping and in a very cozy and peaceful French quarter. 
The apartment is in excellent condition, tastefully decorated, and perfect for 4 persons. 
Carmen is very helpful and very easy to get in touch with. 
We can highly recommend others to rent Carmen's apartment.

column1: Vi havde en god kommunikation med Tatiana, hun var hurtig til at svare på beskeder, og det var nemt at lave en aftale om afhentning af nøgler. Lejligheden levede helt op til vores forventninger.
column5: We had a great communication with Tatiana, she was quick to reply to messages, and it was easy to make an appointment for collection of keys. The apartment lived up to our expectations.

column1:
Bernadette er en venlig og betænksom vært. Vi ankom sent på adressen, men Bernadette stod selv til rådighed og udleverede nøglen. Bernadette havde sørget for en ekstra opredning til vores datter, og tilbød tilmed at hun kunne sove i hendes lejlighed hvis vi syntes at det blev for trangt at være i studielejligheden alle tre. 
Bernadette bød på Fransk morgenmad  første morgen i sin egen lejlighed, det var meget hyggeligt og vi fik en rigtig god snak om dette og hint.
Under vores ophold tog Bernadette dagligt kontakt til os for at høre om vi havde det godt og havde hvad vi behøvede. Det lille studie er hyggeligt indrettet med eget bad og køkken, helt i Parisisk stil - småt men hyggeligt med direkte adgang til Bernadettes egen gårdhave. 
Bernadette bor i et kvarter omringet af Universitet og parker, hvilket gør at der er meget roligt - i lejligheden hører man ingen støj fra gaden og der er stille hele aftenen og natten.
Lejligheden ligger meget centralt i et hyggeligt kvarter ikke langt fra St. Michel og Notre-Dame.

Vi følte os meget velkomne lige fra første stund og har været rigtig glade for at møde Bernadette og bo hos hende i denne uge. Vi håber at vi får muligheden for at komme tilbage.

TAK for en rigtig hyggelig uge i autentiske omgivelser.
column5:
Bernadette is a friendly and thoughtful host. We arrived late in the address, but Bernadette was even available and provided the key. Bernadette had arranged for an extra bed for our daughter, and offered even that she could sleep in her apartment if we thought that it was too narrow to be in studielejligheden all three. 
Bernadette hosted a French breakfast for the first morning in his own apartment, it was very cosy and we had a really good talk about this and that.
During our stay took Bernadette daily, contact us to hear whether we had it good and had what we needed. The small studio is warmly decorated with a private bath and kitchen, completely in the Parisian style - small but cosy with direct access to the Bernadettes private patio. 
Bernadette live in a neighborhood surrounded by the University parks, which makes it very quiet - in the apartment you hear no noise from the street and is quiet throughout the evening and night.
The apartment is very centrally located in a pleasant neighbourhood, not far from St. Michel and Notre-Dame.

We felt us very welcome from the first moment and have been really excited to meet Bernadette and stay with her this week. We hope that we will get the chance to come back.

THANKS for a really nice week in an authentic setting.

column1:
Lejligheden er super. Alt er som lovet.
Området er meget multi-etnisk, der er meget liv i gaden, men i lejligheden er der dejligt stille og roligt.
column5:
The apartment is super. Everything is as promised.
The area is very multi-ethnic, there is much life in the street, but the apartment is lovely, quiet and calm.

column1:
Rigtig dejlig lejlighed og super beliggenhed. Bedre end fotos og omtale. God og nem kommunikation med Yael. 
Vi kommer igen. 
Familie på 5.
column5:
Really nice apartment and super location. Better than the photos and the publicity. Good and easy communication with Yael. 
We will come again. 
Family of 5.

column1: Super fint lille og hyggelig studio. Præcist som beskrevet. Super nem ind- og ud-checkning. Adressen er centralt placeret i Marais kvarteret og restauranter og butikker findes et stenkast fra lejligheden. Metro lige om hjørnet.
column5: Super nice small and cozy studio. Exactly as described. Super easy check - in-and-out shareholder. The address is centrally located in the Marais district and the restaurants and shops are a stone's throw from the apartment. Metro just around the corner.

column1: En skøn og mindeværdig oplevelse :-) Lejligheden ligger i et meget charmerende kvarter med hyggelige restauranter, caféer, bagerier og grøntsagshandlere, perfekt til at nyde og til at slappe af.  I gåafstand fra Sacré Coeur og metrostation. Lige fra første kontakt med værten Chantal oplevede jeg en hjælpsomhed og service udover det normale. I tillæg til en effektiv og professionel kommunikation per mail vedrørende det praktiske omkring lejligheden, tog hun selv initiativ til at sende os information vedrørende transporten dertil. Da vi ankom lejligheden stod der også en flaske friskt vand til os i køleskabet, tak Chantal! Alle spørgsmål vi havde undervejs blev hurtigt og effektivt besvaret per mail., men vi havde også mulighed for at kontakte Chantal per telefon. Lejligheden havde trådløst internet,  var ren og pæn med en stor og blød dobbeltseng, lækkert nyistandsat badeværelse med bruseniche og et lille men funktionelt køkken med to kogeplader. Vi lavede ikke mad under vores ophold, men der havde været rig mulighed for det. Det eneste vi savnede i lejligheden var et ekstra sengebord (der var kun ét), ellers svarede den fuldt ud til vores forventninger. Jeg kan på det varmeste anbefale denne lejlighed!
column5: A wonderful and memorable experience :-) the Apartment is located in a very charming neighbourhood with cosy restaurants, cafés, bakeries and grøntsagshandlere, perfect to enjoy and to relax. In walking distance from the Sacré Coeur and the metro station. Right from the first contact with the host Chantal I experienced the helpfulness and service in addition to the normal. In addition to a effective and professional communication by e-mail concerning the practical around the apartment, she took the initiative to send us information relating to the carriage thereof. When we arrived the apartment was also a bottle of fresh water for us in the fridge, thank you Chantal! All questions we had along the way were quickly and efficiently answered per mail., but we also had the opportunity to contact Chantal by phone. The apartment had wifi, was clean and neat with a large and soft double bed, clean and newly renovated bathroom with shower and a small but functional kitchen with two hotplates. We did not food during our stay, but there had been ample opportunity for it. The only thing we missed in the apartment was an extra bedside table (there was only one), otherwise it corresponded fully to our expectations. I can warmly recommend this apartment!

column1: Det var en super fin lejlighed, og den ligger rigtig centralt i Paris. Nabolaget var rigtig hyggeligt, og der var både gode caféer og barer tæt på. Meryam var meget god til at guide os, og hun stillede sig til rådighed med både spørgsmål til lejl. og til andre gode råd om både transport og byen.
column5: It was a super nice apartment, and the hotel is situated very centrally in Paris. The neighborhood was really nice, and there were great cafés and bars close by. Meryam was very good to guide us, and she stood available with both the questions to the occ. and to the other good advice on both the transport and the city.

column1:
En skøn lejlighed beliggende i det charmerende
 Montmartre. Lejligheden ligger højt med skønt lysindfald og er yderst velindrettet. Lejligheden ligger i et roligt område, men man skal kun gå lidt før man er i centrum af skønne franske cafeer, restauranter med sprudlende kulinariske oplevelser, delikatesse butikker og lækre butikker. Lejligheden ligger også tæt på metro med direkte forbindelse til hjertet af Paris. Mine varmeste anbefalinger af lejlighed, vært og beliggenhed.
column5:
A wonderful apartment located in the charming
Montmartre. The apartment is situated high with wonderful light and is extremely well-appointed. The apartment is located in a quiet area, but you should only go a little before you are in the centre of the lovely French cafes, restaurants with bountiful culinary experiences, delicacy shops and fab shops. The apartment is also close to the metro with direct connection to the heart of Paris. My warmest recommendations of apartment, host and location.

column1:
저녁 식사에 초대받아 프랑스 가정식을 제대로 맛보았다. Appetizer, entree, dessert로 이어지는 정식요리였다.
1층이라 조금 어두웠지만 밖의 철제문을 열면 큰 문제는 없었다. 별도의 출입문도 좋음. 호스트의 친절함과 배려가 돋보였다. 활달하고 명랑한 안주인과 조용히 배려하는 호스트가 멋진 하모니.
column5:
Dinner invited to a French home food properly tasted. Appetizer, entree, dessert to the full..
The 1st floor is a bit dark but the outside of the Iron Doors open up to a large problem. A separate entrance is also good. The host's kindness and caring stand out. The active and cheerful hostess and quietly to the host that is wonderful harmony.

column1: Stedet ligger sentralt bare 15 min til Eiffeltårnet. Marked 2 min unna med ferske grønnsaker ,fisk , ost og kjøtt. veldig koselig. Mye ellers ligger 30-45 min avstand. Last ned Lime app og lei el sparkesykkel. De står overalt. Gode senger og en veldig god frokost ,noe for alle. Barna fikk en liten overraskelse på sin tallerken og varm hjemmelagd varm sjokolade. veldig hyggelige verter. svarer raskt på meldinger . Ingen problem ved inn/ut sjekking. Hjalp oss med å kjøpe billetter til metro. Veldig god service. Følte at vi bodde hos  venner :) >Toppers . kommer til å overnatte der igjen neste gang vi er i Paris. Takk for oss Sylvian og Dalila
column5: The place is centrally located only 15 min to the Eiffel tower. Market 2 min away with fresh vegetables ,fish , cheese and meat. very cozy. Much otherwise is 30-45 min distance. Download Lime app and tired el sparkesykkel. They are everywhere. Good beds and a very good breakfast ,something for everyone. The kids got a little surprise on his plate and warm homemade hot chocolate. very pleasant hosts. responds quickly to messages . No problem with the in/out checking. Helped us to buy tickets for the metro. Very good service. We felt that we stayed with friends :) >Toppers . going to stay there again next time we are in Paris. Thank you for us Sylvian and Delilah

column1:
빈센트의 숙소는 더할나위없는 편안함과 편리함 그 자체로 너무나 완벽했어요
위치또한 너무 좋구요! 제가 사정상 7박 일정을 쪼개서 예약하게되어서 지금은 다른 숙소에 있지만 빈센트의 집이 그리워 눈물이 날 지경이랍니다~ 진짜!!
빈센트는 또 얼마나 자상하고 배려심이 넘치는지 몰라요.. 냉장고에 물이며 쥬스며 가득 채워주셔서 첫날 더위먹고 도착한 우리에겐 오아시스가 따로 없었지요
용품 하나하나 깔끔고급지고 ㅎㅎ
뭐하나 부족함이 없는 그야말로
PERFECT!!
column5:
Vincent's place will have comfort and convenience by itself, so it was perfect.
The location also is too good! I have a 7 night schedule to split the book in now in other quarters, but Vincent's House and brought tears to my eyes....~ for real!!
Vincent is also how caring and considerate like that, but I don't know.. in the fridge for water and juice, and filled in the first day of the heat I arrived we Oasis is.
Supplies in one neat and advanced and ㅎㅎ
I have it
PERFECT!!

column1:
Julia var den perfekte vært, sød og imødekommende. 
hendes lejlighed fremstod ren og pæn og er præcis lige så hyggelig som på billederne.
Metro (linie 4), supermarket og bager ligger indenfor 3 minutter af lejligheden.
Vi kan på det varmeste anbefale Julia og hendes lejlighed.
column5:
Julia was the perfect host, sweet, and accommodating. 
her apartment appeared clean and neat and is exactly as cosy as in the pictures.
Metro (line 4), supermarket and bakery are within 3 minutes of the apartment.
We can warmly recommend Julia and her apartment.

column1:
Marilou er utrolig sød og imødekommende, og selv om jeg kun taler meget lidt fransk og hun meget lidt engelsk, fungerede kommunikationen fint. 
Området er fredeligt og hyggeligt med masser af Pariserstemning.
column5:
Marilou is incredibly sweet and accommodating, and although I only speak very little French and she very little English, did the communication just fine. 
The area is peaceful and cozy with lots of parisian atmosphere.

column1: Dejlig bolig med fantastisk beliggenhed
column5: Nice accommodation with great location

column1:
Fantastisk studio, nøjagtigt som beskrevet i tekst og billeder. Bedste beliggenhed, ren og fin,  vel udstyret, alt fungerede perfekt.
Varm og venlig modtagelse af værten, som havde sat vin og juice frem til os.
Kan bestemt anbefales, vi vender gerne tilbage.
column5:
Great studio, exactly as described in text and pictures. Best location, clean and nice, well equipped, everything worked perfectly.
Warm and friendly reception by the host, who had put wine and juice back to us.
Can certainly be recommended, we would love to return.

column1:
Her var pænt og rent. Alt hvad man har brug for i et køkken. Behagelige senge. Dejlig fred og ro. Stor hjælpsomhed og fleksibilitet fra Eve, som var til stede ved indtjekning og gav os både praktiske og nyttige informationer i forhold til området.
Vi har kun de bedste anbefalinger for denne lejlighed. Ideel til to eller 3 personer. Berit Mogensen Lopez
column5:
Here was neat and clean. Everything you need in a kitchen. Comfortable beds. Lovely peace and quiet. Great helpfulness and flexibility from Eve, who was present at the check-in and gave us both the practical and useful information in relation to the area.
We have only the best recommendations for this apartment. Ideal for two or 3 persons. Berit Mogensen Lopez

column1: Great staying
column5: Great staying

column1: Bon séjour. À recommander.
column5: Good stay. To recommend.

column1: Internet didn’t work for us
column5: Internet didn’t work for us

column1: Romantisk meget lille etværelses med thekøkken og bad. Den ligger i en pittoresk baggård med vedbend. Den er beliggende i udkanten af latinerkvarteret på en lidt kedelig strækning af gaden. Men hvis man bevæger sig op ad gaden mod Hemmingways tidligere hjem i nr 74 bliver det utroligt hyggeligt og fint med en hyggelig lille plads. Beliggenheden er relativt central men ikke midt i den hyggeligste del af kvarteret. Martine er opmærksom og lejligheden er tæt på metro.
column5: Romantic very small bedroom with a small kitchen and bath. It is situated in a picturesque backyard with ivy. It is situated in the outskirts of the Latin quarter on a somewhat drab stretch of street. But if one moves up the street from Hemmingways former home in no. 74 it becomes incredibly cozy and fine with a nice little space. The location is relatively central but not in the middle of the coziest part of the neighborhood. Martine is aware and the apartment is close to the metro.

column1:
Skøn lejlighed i et dejligt kvarter med supermarked, bager og mange spisesteder. Lejligheden var præcis som på billederne og der var masser af skabsplads.
Trods lidt forvirring omkring vores ankomst tidspunkt, var dialogen med Phillippe uproblematisk.
Vi anbefaler lejlighed og udlejer til andre gæster - og vender helt sikkert tilbage, hvis vi skal til Paris igen
column5:
Great apartment in a nice neighborhood with a supermarket, a bakery and many restaurants. The apartment was exactly as on the pictures and there was plenty of closet space.
Despite a little confusion about our arrival time, was the dialogue with Phillippe unproblematic.
We recommend the apartment and the landlord to the other guests and will certainly return if we go to Paris again

column1: En helt grei leilighet med alt du trenger. Praktisk beliggende rett ved Metroen og nært matbutikk og hyggelige restauranter i Rue Belleville. Veldig hyggelig og hjelpsom vert, han møtte oss ved metroen da vi kom.
column5: A very nice apartment with everything you need. Conveniently located right by the Metro and close to grocery store and nice restaurants in the Rue Belleville. Very nice and helpful host, he met us at the metro when we arrived.

column1:
2017년 5월 5일까지 5박을 묵고 온 생생한 후기입니다. 여느 후기처럼 여자 혼자 묵기에는 베스트 숙소입니다. 지하철 Passy역에서 3분이면 도착하고, 3분거리에 있는 버스정류장에서 72번 버스를 타면 에펠탑, 트로카데로, 루브르박물관 등 어디든 갈 수 있습니다. 게다가 그 정류장에서 조금만 올라오면 매일 아침저녁으로 에펠탑을 볼 수 있을 만큼 위치가 완벽합니다.
때문에 안전하게 귀가할 수 있고 짐이 있어도 이동이 수월해 정말 좋습니다.
그리고 사진과 같이 아기자기한 소품과 안내책자, 각종 브로셔 등 매우 잘 꾸며 놓아 정말 내집처럼 아늑하고 예쁜 공간입니다.
다만 아쉬운 점이 있다면 침대 크기와 샤워부스가 매우 작아 남자분이 지내기엔 힘드실 것 같습니다.
그리고 샴푸와 수건이 제공되지만 챙겨가는 것을 추천합니다. 샴푸는 매우 작고, 수건은 기본 2개가 제공되어 2개를 추가해 사용했지만 위생상태는 개인에 따라 좋지 않음을 느낄 수 있습니다.
에어비앤비 특성 상 호텔만큼의 위생상태를 바랄 수 없으나 침구, 바닥 등 먼지가 매우 많고 주방시설은 사용하기 어려울 정도로 위생이 좋지 않았습니다.
이 점은 개선이 되면 좋겠습니다.
Sandrine이 현재 몸상태가 좋지 않다고 들어 이 부분은 이해하고 지냈습니다.
위치와 숙박비 등을 고려하면 매우 우수한 숙소임에는 틀림없습니다. 예민하지 않은 분이시라면, 완벽할 것입니다.
제가 다시 파리에 간다고 하면 또 묵을 의향이 있습니다.
몇몇 사항만 참고하시라고 자세히 남깁니다.
column5:
2017 Year 5 July 5 days 5 nights stay and more. Here ever after just like a woman alone to stay in the best accommodation. Subway The station in 3 minutes, and 3 minutes on the bus on the 72 bus to the Eiffel Tower, Trocadero, the Louvre Museum can go anywhere. Besides it stop from coming to daily morning and evening as the Eiffel Tower you can see as long as the location is perfect.

Location and accommodation, and very superior accommodation junkies. For people that are not, to be perfect.
