column1:
Vi var så heldige, at denne skønne studio var ledig. 
Værten er så sød og havde købt lidt forskelligt ind, så vi havde en god start i Paris. 
Fantastisk beliggenhed og skøn lejlighed. 5 stjerner herfra
column5:
We were so lucky that this wonderful studio was vacant. 
The host is so sweet and had bought a little differently, so we had a good start in Paris. 
Great location and great apartment. 5 stars from here

column1:
Vi mødte ikke Francoise, men Didier var der til at tage imod os og give os nøglen. Lejligheden var nem at finde, rigtig tæt på er metrostop og så ud præcis som på billederne.
Vi havde et rigtig godt ophold der og kan helt klart anbefale det!
column5:
We did not meet Francoise, but Didier was there to greet us and give us the key. The apartment was easy to find, really close to the metro stop and looked exactly as on the pictures.
We had a really nice stay there and can definitely recommend it!

column1: Vi havde en dejlig uge i Paris. Dejlig lille lejlighed med alt det man har brug for. Ligger perfekt placeret i Montmartre kvarteret, det tager nogen få minutter at gå op til Place du Tertre og metroen Lamarck Caulaincourt. Kan varmt anbefales.
column5: We had a lovely week in Paris. Lovely little apartment with everything you need. Is perfectly located in the Montmartre district, it takes a few minutes to go up to the Place du Tertre and the metro Lamarck Caulaincourt. Can be highly recommended.

column1: Virkelig perfekt oplevelse fra start til slut. Mai Thi var hurtigt til at svare, vi kunne komme til lejligheden præcis når vi ville og kunne forlade den igen, præcis som det passede os. Samt lejligheden var helt fantastisk. Mai Thi havde desuden sørget for en god manual til lejligheden, som også guidede en til de bedste madoplevelser.
column5: Really perfect experience from start to finish. Mai Thi was fast to respond, we could get to the apartment exactly when we wanted and be able to leave again, exactly as it suited us. And the apartment was absolutely fantastic. Mai Thi had also provided a good manual for the apartment, which also guided to the best dining experiences.

column1: Det var et helt igennem vellykket ophold i Valeries dejlige lejlighed! Den var helt som beskrevet: charmerende og velbeliggende, fin til en lille ferie for fire gamle veninder. Værtinden havde gjort alt for at vi skulle føle os velkomne og havde i forvejen givet os gode tips om området. Kort sagt, helt i top!
column5: It was a completely successful stay in Valeries lovely apartment! It was exactly as described: charming and well-located, nice for a small vacation for four old girlfriends. The hostess had done everything that we should feel welcome and already had given us good tips about the area. In short, the very top!

column1:
Skøn lejlighed og dejligt kvarter. Gode transport og indkøbsmuligheder. Alt fungerede optimalt også i forhold til modtagelse.
Vi giver vores varmeste anbefalinger :-)
column5:
Great apartment and nice neighborhood. Good transport and shopping facilities. Everything worked optimally also in relation to the receipt.
We give our warmest recommendations :-)

column1: Vi blev meget venligt modtaget af Vincent. Lejligheden lå meget fint placeret i kvarteret. Supermarked og andre dagligvarebutikker lige i nærheden. Beskrivelse af lejligheden passede rigtig godt. Vi fandt os hurtigt til rette, - Beskrivelsen af hvordan vi fandt fra lufthavnen og til adressen var perfekt. Vincent var meget hjælpsom.
column5: We were very kindly received by Vincent. The apartment was very well located in the neighborhood. Supermarket and other grocery stores nearby. Description of the apartment was a very good. We found ourselves quickly to the right, - the Description of how we took from the airport and to the address was perfect. Vincent was very helpful.

column1: Vincent havde sørget for at have en anden til at møde os, fordi han ikke selv kunne være der. Han var god til at give råd og vejledning, hvis vi havde spørgsmål, både inden vi kom til Paris, og mens vi var der. Lejligheden ligger meget centralt i Paris, og man kan faktisk gå til mange attraktioner, hvis man ikke tager Metroen, hvilket også var nem at komme til .
column5: Vincent had made sure to have a second to meet us, because he could not even be there. He was very good to give advice and guidance if we had questions, both before we came to Paris, and while we were there. The apartment is located very centrally in Paris, and you can actually walk to many attractions if you do not take the Subway, which was also easy to get to .

column1: Nette Unterkunft, eigenes Flair.
column5: Nice accommodation, own Flair.

column1: Mehmet Bey eve erken girisimize izin verdi ve konuksever davrandi. Ev de resimlerde oldugu gibi guzel, rahat ve kullanisli. Tek problem internete baglanamamiz oldu.
column5: Our early entry allowed into the House of Mehmet Bey acted and welcoming. The house in the pictures as it is beautiful, comfortable and convenient. The only problem was inability to connect to the internet.

column1: Super lejlighed i med en fin beliggenhed. Angie var rigtigt god til at tage imod os og hentede os ved den nærmeste cafe, så vi ikke selv skulle lede efter lejligheden. Stor lejlighed med masser af plads til vores familie.
column5: Super apartment in a great location. Angie was very good to greet us and picked us up at the nearest cafe, so we would not look after the apartment. Large apartment with plenty of space for our family.

column1:
Jivan lejlighed ligger helt perfekt i hjertet af Marais. Der er en flot udsigt over Paris tage og lejligheden størrelse er fin til et par eller som os et par med et lille barn.
Jivan gav god beskrivelse så det var nemt at finde og han var hurtig til at svare på mails.
Lejligheden kunne godt være i lidt bedre stand og især sengen trængte til udskiftning.
column5:
Jivan apartment is located perfectly in the heart of the Marais. There is a nice view over Paris roofs and the apartment size is fine for a couple or like us a couple with a small child.
Jivan gave a good description so it was easy to find and he was quick to respond to emails.
The apartment could well be in slightly better condition and especially the bed needed replacement.

column1: Super dejlig lejlighed, meget centralt, dejligt kvarter og lige ved metro. Alt, hvad man har brug for i lejlighed, rent og pænt. Perfekt til en stor familie. Sød og betænksom udlejer.
column5: Super nice apartment, very central, nice neighbourhood and right by the metro. Everything you need in the apartment, clean and neat. Perfect for a large family. Sweet and considerate landlord.

column1: Feeling like at home
column5: Feeling like at home

column1: Lækker lille sjov lejlighed. Meget ungdommelig, så perfekt for mine to døtre på 10 og 13 år. Der er plads til 3 sovende. Rent og pænt og god velkomst af Béatrices ven Renaud. Lejligheden ligger 5 minutters gang fra Metro og lige ved bus 81 der går direkte til Louvre på 15 minutter. 15 minutters gang fra Montmartre. Vi var meget tilfredse.
column5: Delicious small fun apartment. Very youthful, so perfect for my two daughters aged 10 and 13 years. There is space for 3 sleeping. Clean and good welcome by the Béatrices friend Renaud. The apartment is located a 5-minute walk from the Metro and right by the bus 81 which goes directly to the Louvre museum in 15 minutes. A 15-minute walk from Montmartre. We were very satisfied.

column1:
Tak for et dejligt ophold i en lille, men velholdt og ren lejlighed på 4. sal. Alt fungerede fint, lejligheden er virkelig godt udnyttet, og den ligger dejligt centralt i forhold til Metro og sightseeing.
Vi blev fint modtaget af Leonoras søn, hvilket fungerede godt.
column5:
Thank you for a wonderful stay in a small, but well maintained and clean apartment on the 4th. floor. Everything worked fine, the apartment is really well utilized, and it is a nice location for the Metro and sightseeing.
We were well received by leonora's son, which worked well.

column1: Caro og Anthony er gode og søde værter, der gjorde det nemt at bruge AirBnb i Paris. Lejligheden havde en udemærket beliggenhed og størrelse til en mini ferie. Kan varmt anbefales.
column5: Caro and Anthony are great and sweet hosts that made it easy to use AirBnb in Paris. The apartment had a good location and size to a mini vacation. Can be highly recommended.

column1:
Fantastisk leilighet, lyst og fint, stor og med alle fasiliteter. 
Superbra beliggenhet med mange restauranter, kafeer og butikker rett rundt hjørnet. Kort vei med bane til alle store severdigheter. 
Verten Carole tar meget godt vare på gjestene, veldig hyggelig, følger opp, bor i samme hus og er tilgjengelig.
column5:
Fantastic apartment, bright and nice, large and with all facilities. 
Chain location with many restaurants, cafes and shops right around the corner. Short path with the path to all the major sites. 
The host Carole takes very good care of the guests, very nice, follow up, staying in the same house and is available.

column1:
Vi hadde en perfekt langhelg i Paris med sol, vin og severdigheter, og et superhyggelig bosted i Stéphanies fine leilighet. Stéphanie er en veldig vennlig og imøtekommende vert som tar godt vare på sine besøkende. All kommunikasjon gikk lett fra begynnelse til slutt og ved ankomst møtte hun meg på Gare du Nord og viste vei til leiligheten. Hun hadde lagt frem kart og guidebøker og ga oss gode tips om byen og nabolaget. Vi benyttet oss av flere, blant annet en fin gåtur og middag ved kanalen i nærheten. 
Leiligheten er stor og ren og har en behagelig atmosfære. Her har du alt du trenger til å lage mat og slappe av, og ro til nattesøvn. Rett utenfor døren er det yrende liv, med kort vei til gode croissanter, supermarked, offentlig transport og hyggelige cafeer og restauranter.
Anbefales!
column5:
We had a perfect long weekend in Paris with sun, wine and sights, and a superhyggelig residence in Stéphanies nice apartment. Stéphanie is a very friendly and welcoming host who takes good care of its visitors. All communication went easy from beginning to end, and upon arrival she met me at Gare du Nord and showed the way to the apartment. She had put up maps and guidebooks, and gave us great tips about the city and the neighborhood. We availed ourselves of several, including a nice walk and dinner by the canal in the vicinity. 
The apartment is large and clean and has a comfortable atmosphere. Here you have everything you need to cook and relax, and quiet night's sleep. Right outside the door, it is teeming with life, with short way to the good croissants, supermarket, public transportation and cozy cafes and restaurants.
Recommended!

column1:
Super lejlighed i et rigtig fedt område ! Den ligger i gåafstand til massere af barer, restauranter og unikke butikker

Et rigtig godt værtspar der var meget fleksible, da vi kom lidt halvsent. Vi blev lukket ind og introduceret til lejligheden samt fik tips til restauranter mv. De har desuden lavet en rigtig brugbar guide til nærområdet. 

Lejligheden er meget større end hvad man umiddelbart skulle tro !
column5:
Super apartment in a great area ! It is located in walking distance to lots of bars, restaurants and unique shops

A really good staff that was very flexible, when we got a little halvsent. We were let in and introduced to the apartment and got tips for restaurants, etc. They have also created a really useful guide to the surrounding area. 

The apartment is much larger than what you might think !

column1: Vi nød at bo i Laurences dejlige lejlighed. Lejligheden har en perfekt beliggenhed og er hyggeligt indrettet med god plads til to voksne og et barn eller to. Vi blev budt velkommen af Laurences søde mand David og der stod rødvin til os på bordet. Lejligheden ligger i gåafstand til alt hvad hjertet kan begære og med ½ minuts gang til metroen. Vi vil helt sikkert komme tilbage igen en anden gang.
column5: We enjoyed to stay in Laurences lovely apartment. The apartment has a perfect location and is comfortably furnished with good space for two adults and a child or two. We were welcomed by the Laurences sweet husband, David, and there was red wine for us on the table. The apartment is located in walking distance to everything the heart could wish, and with half a minute's walk to the metro. We will certainly come back again another time.

column1: Stemningsfuld og meget hyggelig lejlighed i et hip`t kvarter med få turister. Området er fyldt med gode spisesteder til rimlige priser. Værten var meget fleksibel i forhold til ankomst og afrejse.
column5: Cosy and very nice apartment in a hip`t neighborhood with few tourists. The area is filled with excellent dining options for reasoable prices. The host was very flexible in relation to arrival and departure.

column1: Quentin var en ok vært. Lejligheden ligger i et godt område. MEN MEN med en byggeplads lige over for lejligheden, hvor der blev boret i undergrunden fra 8-17 hver dag. En ulidelig larm. Jeg foreslår, at kommende gæster sikrer sig, at der ikke er byggelarm fra pladsen.
column5: Quentin was an ok host. The apartment is located in a good area. BUT with a construction site opposite the apartment, which was drilled in the tube from 8-17 every day. An excruciating noise. I suggest to future guests to ensure that there is byggelarm from the square.

column1: Philippe og Lise ventede på os i lejligheden ved vores ankomst og vi følte os velkomne med det samme. Lejligheden var nøjagtigt som beskrevet og værterne havde sørget for baquette, vin og børnechampagne. De havde endda en gave til vores sønner. Lejligheden var meget funktionel og fungerede perfekt for fire personer. At bo privat i en ægte fransk lejlighed gav en ekstra dimension - for os fungerede dette meget bedre en at bo på et hotel. Metrostationen Convention ligger ca. 10 minutters gang fra lejligheden og på vej til stationen kunne vi opleve markedet tirsdag, torsdag og søndag. Omgivelserne er rolige og trygge og parken i nærheden var skøn at spadsere i. Derudover lå lejligheden perfekt i forhold til konferencecentret. Alt i alt en god oplevelse!
column5: Philippe and Catherine were waiting for us in the apartment upon our arrival and we felt welcome immediately. The apartment was exactly as described and the hosts had arranged for baquette, wine and børnechampagne. They even had a gift for our sons. The apartment was very functional and worked perfectly for four people. To stay private in a real French apartment gave an extra dimension - for us worked this much better one to stay in a hotel. Convention metro station is located approx. A 10-minute walk from the apartment and on the way to the station, we could experience the market on Tuesday, Thursday and Sunday. The surroundings are quiet and comfortable and the park nearby was great to walk in. Furthermore was the apartment perfect in relation to the conference center. All in all a good experience!

column1: Patricia var utroligt hurtig og professionel i feedback og billederne fra """"Brand New Design Apartment"""" viser stedet som det er. MEGET lækkert og moderne hele vejen igennem. Adresse i Paris er meget centralt og i gå eller cykel afstand fra alle vigtige steder. Patricia var meget hjælpsom med adresser på de bedste restauranter i området. Jeg anbefaler stedet og kunne selv tænke mig at bor der igen.
column5: Patricia was incredibly quick and professional in the feedback and pictures from the """"Brand New Design Apartment"""" shows the site as it is. VERY nice and modern all the way through. Address in Paris is very central and within walking or bicycle distance from all the important places. Patricia was very helpful with the addresses of the best restaurants in the area. I recommend the place and would even like to live there again.

column1:
En meget hyggelig og original lille lejlighed med god beliggenhed. Skønt med caféer, bagerier og indkøbsmuligheder tæt på. Spændende at opleve hvordan en familie kan indrette sig på få kvadratmeter i en af verdens skønneste byer.
En stor tak til Adeline for hendes gæstfrihed og ukomplicerede måde at være på. Det hele forløb godt og vi oplevede en skøn fleksibilitet fra Adeline.
Kan klart anbefales.
column5:
A very nice and original small apartment with good location. Although with cafes, bakeries and shopping facilities close by. Interesting to experience how a family can adapt to a few square meters in one of the world's loveliest cities.
A big thank you to Adeline for her hospitality and uncomplicated way to be. It all went well and we experienced a great flexibility from Adeline.
Can be clearly recommended.

column1: Martine er gæstfri, venlig og hjælpsom som vært. Lejligheden er som beskrevet på hjemmesiden. Placeringen af lejligheden er central i forhold til metro og dagligvare indkøb.
column5: Martine is hospitable, friendly, and helpful as a host. The apartment is as described on the website. The location of the apartment is central for the metro and grocery shopping.

column1:
Jonas var nem at kommunikere med op til vores ankomst og det gik gnidningsfrit både at overtage og overdrage lejligheden ved ankomst og afgang, hvor Jonas i begge tilfælde udviste stor fleksibilitet - til vores store fordel. 
Lejligheden ligger i et dejligt kvarter med mange fine kaffe- og spisesteder i området. Det er nemt at komme til og der var stille og roligt i lejligheden. Vi havde alle de faciliteter vi havde brug for, der er pænt og rent. Soveværelset var måske en kende sporadisk indrettet, men til gengæld er der rigeligt med siddepladser og fantastisk udsigt fra stuens store vindue.
Særligt taget prisen i betragtning, så har jeg intet at udsætte på hverken Jonas eller hans lille hyggelige taglejlighed.
column5:
Jonas was easy to communicate with, up to our arrival and it went smoothly both to take over and transfer the apartment upon arrival and departure, in which Jonas, in both cases, showed great flexibility - to our great advantage. 
The apartment is located in a nice neighborhood with many fine coffee and eateries in the area. It is easy to get to and there was quiet in the apartment. We had all the facilities we needed, that is nice and clean. The bedroom was perhaps a little sporadically furnished, but there is plenty of seating and a great view from its big window.
Especially taken the price into consideration, so I have no complaints on either the Jonas or his cosy little attic apartment.

column1:
Denne lille perle er for os indbegrebet af Paris. 100% ægte og fuld af charme. Balkon man kan sidde og nyde byens puls på, er så fint. Alt var rent i alle kroge af lejligheden, og kvarteret var trygt og godt at bo i,  med gå-afstand til hele Montmartre, og  nem bus og Metro til resten af Paris.
Det hele overtrumfes af Turkans service. Der manglede intet, tværtimod. Tips til bus, seværdigheder og små lokale restauranter kom i god tid inden vores ankomst. Ind- og udtjekning efter vores ønske. Hvis alle i Airbnb var som hende, så forsvandt hotelverdenen helt. 
2 tips: Hvis du planlægger at lave fransk gastronomi hele tiden, så er køkkenet lille, men meget veludstyret. Desuden, hvis du er XXL+ som person, så vil toilettet virke trangt.
Billederne fra lejligheden er fuldstændig retvisende.
Hermed vores TOPANBEFALING
Susanne & Poul, Aalborg - Denmark
column5:
This little gem is for us the epitome of Paris. 100% authentic and full of charm. Balcony you can sit and enjoy the pulse of the city, is so fine. Everything was clean in all the nooks and crannies of the apartment, and the neighborhood was safe and good to live in, with the walking distance to Montmartre, and easy bus and Metro to the rest of Paris.
It all overtrumfes of Turkans service. There lacked nothing, on the contrary. Tips to the bus, the sights and small local restaurants came in good time before our arrival. Check - in and check-out according to our desire. If everyone on Airbnb were like her, then disappeared hotelverdenen completely. 
2 tips: If you plan to make French gastronomy all the time, so is the kitchen small but very well equipped. In addition, if you are a XXL+ as a person, so will the toilet seem cramped.
The pictures from the apartment are completely accurate.
Thus our TOPANBEFALING
Susanne & Paul, Aalborg - Denmark

column1:
Lækker lejlighed, beskrevet som den var. På 5. sal, så mange trapper, men dejligt langt væk fra gadelarm mv. Victoria var meget hjælpsom og mødte os på gaden og viste os op og gennemgik lejligheden. Ligger godt mht. Yderligere så ligger lejligheden godt placeret i forhold til Eiffeltårnet, indkøb, restauranter og metro.
Vi var en familie på to voksne og to børn.
column5:
Delicious apartment, described as it was. 5. floor, so many stairs, but very far away from not far from the river, etc. Victoria was very helpful and met us on the street and showed us up and went through the apartment. Is mht. Further so is the apartment well located for the Eiffel tower, shopping, restaurants and the metro.
We were a family of two adults and two children.

column1:
Roxanne er den bedste vært: omsorgsfuld, serviceminded, pålidelig og sød. Vi kan varmt anbefale dette charmerende værelse i et meget hyggeligt, lokalt og skønt kvarter i Paris. Vi kommer helt sikkert tilbage.

Signe - Danmark
column5:
Roxanne is the best host: caring, friendly, reliable and sweet. We can highly recommend this charming room in a very cozy, local, and although the neighbourhood of Paris. We will definitely go back.

Signe - Denmark

column1:
Perfekt beliggenhed både mht udsigt, offentlig transport og nær område.
Charmerende pariser lejlighed.
Meget hjælpsom og opmærksom vært.
column5:
Perfect location both mht view, public transport and near the area.
Charming parisian apartment.
Very helpful and attentive host.

column1: Elodies lille taglejlighed er helt fantastisk! Lejligheden emmer af Parisisk hygge og udsigten direkte til Sacre Cæur helt enestående. Elodie er en opmærksom og meget imødekommende vært, som havde sørget for fin morgenmad til alle dage. Lejligheden er fyldt med arvestykker, bøger og sjove nips ting og der er pænt og rent. Den er centralt placeret og det er meget nemt at komme rundt i Paris med bussen nede om hjørnet, Metroen 100 meter henne og en taxi holdeplads udenfor døren. Hvis vi skal til Paris igen, så vil vi helt sikkert """"låne"""" Elodies lejlighed igen. Gæstfri, hyggelig og enestående udsigt.
column5: Elodies little penthouse apartment is absolutely amazing! The apartment is full of Parisian coziness, and the view directly to the Sacre Cæur quite unique. Elodie is an attentive and very accommodating host, had arranged for breakfast for all days. The apartment is filled with heirlooms, books and other fun trinkets things and that is neat and clean. It is centrally located and it is very easy to get around in Paris by bus down on the corner, the Metro 100 meters along and a taxi rank outside the door. If we are going to Paris again, we will certainly """"borrow"""" Elodies apartment again. Hospitable, cosy and unique view.

column1: Denne lejlighed kan varmt anbefales. Den ligger helt fantastisk. Vidunderlig udsigt både fra altanen og fra køkkenvinduet - husk at åbne det og se ud - det bliver ikke bedre. Desuden en metrostation lige ude foran opgangen, god sikkerhed i opgangen OG det mest hyggelige lille kvarter på Montmartre fyldt med små fine butikker, restauranter, bagerier og meget andet.
column5: This apartment is highly recommended. It is absolutely amazing. Wonderful views both from the balcony and from the kitchen window - remember to open it and look out - it gets no better. In addition, a metro stop right out front of the entryway, the security is good in the entryway AND the most cozy little neighborhood of Montmartre is filled with small fine shops, restaurants, bakeries and much more.

column1: Fantastisk beliggenhed og en rigtig dejlig båd
column5: Great location and a really nice boat

column1: Min veninde og jeg havde fornøjelsen af at bo i Alexandres studio centralt placeret i Paris i 3 dage. Alexandre og hans kone bor i en lejlighed lige ved siden af studioet (i samme bygning), og de bød os derfor hjerteligt velkommen, da vi ankom til Paris. Det lille studio levede op til forventningerne, da de matchede billederne og beskrivelsen på Airbnb. Al kommunikation med Alexandre var rigtig god - fleksibilitet og hurtige svar - rigtig rare mennesker! Alt i alt en rigtig god oplevelse af Alexandre og hans kone og studioet beliggende i hjertet af Paris.
column5: My friend and I had the pleasure to stay in Alexandres studio centrally located in Paris in 3 days. Alexandre and his wife live in an apartment right by the side of the studio operation (in the same building), and they bade us a hearty welcome when we arrived to Paris. The small studio lived up to the expectations as they matched the pictures and description on Airbnb. All the communication with Alexandre was very good - flexibility and quick answers - really nice people! All in all a very good experience of Alexandre and his wife and studio operation located in the heart of Paris.

column1: Vi var meget godt fornøyd med beliggenheten og nærheten til Eiffeltårnet på kvelden var magisk!
column5: We were very happy with the location and the proximity to the Eiffel tower at night was magical!

column1: Lejlighedens beliggenhed i Marais er virkelig god. Man bor centralt lige ved et lille hyggeligt torv med en fantastisk bager, flere restauranter/caféer, Starbucks og et supermarked. Det er vidunderligt bare at sidde i stuen og betragte byens liv gennem de store døre. Lejligheden er hyggelig og meget personlig. Nogle af møblerne er ved at være lidt slidte, men alt er fuldt brugbart. Der var sat ventilatorer op i soveværelserne og i stuen var der en stor, meget effektiv loftsventilator. Det var nødvendigt, fordi der var 30-35 gr. C i Paris under vores besøg. Soveværelserne var dog varme alligevel. Køkkenet var veludstyret og alt fungerede fint.
column5: Location of the apartment in the Marais is really good. You live centrally located just off a small square with a great bakery, several restaurants/cafés, Starbucks and a supermarket. It is wonderful just to sit in the living room and watch the city life through the large doors. The apartment is cozy and very personal. Some of the furniture is a little worn, but everything is fully usable. That was put fans up in the bedrooms and in the living room there was a large, very efficient ceiling fan. It was necessary because there were 30-35 gr. C in Paris during our visit. The bedrooms, however, was warm anyway. The kitchen was well equipped and everything worked fine.

column1:
Vi kan varmt anbefale Christophe`s lejlighed. Beliggeneheden er centalt med indkøbsmuligheder og tæt på transport. Boligen er meget smagsfuldt indrettet med rigtig gode faciliteter til 6 personer og en meget blækker gårdhave. Informations- og serviceniveau var højt, så absolut en meget postiv oplevelse. Den bedste vi hidtil har haft med Airbnb. Fem stjerne ud af 5 mulige.
Finn Laursen
column5:
We can highly recommend Christophe's apartment. Beliggeneheden is central, with shopping facilities and close to transport. The home is very smagsfuldt decorated with very good facilities for 6 persons and a very blækker patio. Information and the service level was high, so definitely a very positive experience. The best we had with Airbnb. Five star out of a possible 5.
Finn Laursen

column1:
Jeg vil på det varmeste anbefale denne fine lejlighed til andre, og jeg har kun positive ting at sige om stedet :-) Anne-Emmanuelle er en nem og venlig udlejer, og hendes lejlighed var ren, smuk og med den helt rette beliggenhed. 
Der er helt stille om aftenen, selvom lejligheden ligger i hjertet af Paris. Smuk indretning og den fineste lille tagterasse. Bad og toilet er rent, og med et godt indeklima. Lejligheden er udstyret med gode senge og varme dyner og gode puder, som man sover skønt i. 
Anne-Emmanuelle var så venlig at have lidt mad og drikke til os i køleskabet, og ellers var der både god kvalitetskaffe og te. 
Kontakt med udlejer fungerede perfekt :-)
column5:
I would warmly recommend this lovely apartment to others, and I have only positive things to say about the place :-) Anne-Emmanuelle is an easy and friendly landlord, and her apartment was clean, beautiful and with just the right location. 
It is completely quiet in the evening, though the apartment is located in the heart of Paris. Beautiful design and the finest small roof. Bath and toilet is clean and with a good indoor climate. The apartment is equipped with good beds and warm duvets and good pillows, as you sleep though. 
Anne-Emmanuelle was kind enough to have some food and drink for us in the fridge, and otherwise there was both good quality coffee and tea. 
Contact with the landlord worked perfectly :-)

column1:
Anne-Emmanuelles mini-loft er meget charmerende. Meget lille, men praktisk og smukt indrettet. Kvarteret er skønt, tæt på alt, men alligevel med lokal stemning. 

Anne-Emmanuelle var en hjælpsom og fleksibel vært, og kommunikationen med hende var nem og hurtig.
column5:
Anne-Emmanuelles mini-loft is very charming. Very small, but convenient and beautifully decorated. The neighborhood is lovely, close to everything, yet with a very local atmosphere. 

Anne-Emmanuelle was a helpful and flexible host and the communication with her was easy and quick.

column1: เจ้าของที่พักคอยตอบอีเมล์และส่งข้อมูลของที่พักให้อย่างครบถ้วน แจ้งข้อมูลห้องและสิ่งอำนวยความสะดวกไว้อย่างชัดเจน ทำเลที่ตั้งดีเยี่ยม เดินเพียง 400 เมตรจะถึง metro ที่สามารถเชื่อมต่อกับ RER C ได้ การต่อ internet ง่ายและมีความเร็วสูง

column1: Alt levede op til mine høje forventninger! Charmerende og smagfuldt studio med den smukkeste beliggenhed, og rigtig fin service og hjælp fra Sophie og hendes bnbsitter. Det vil være mit førstevalg ved kommende besøg i Paris.
column5: Everything lived up to my high expectations! Charming and tastefully studio with the most beautiful location, and very nice service and help from Sophie and her bnbsitter. It will be my first choice for future visits in Paris.

column1:

Charming small studio with good location and fantastic view.

column1: God kommunikation inden ankomst. Mødte personligt op med nøgle trods meget sen ankomst. Havde sørget for små rare ting som frisk juice, kaffe m.m. Jeg er meget tilfreds og vil helt bestemt benytte mig af denne lejlighed igen.
column5: Good communication prior to arrival. Met up in person with key in spite of very late arrival. Had arranged for the small nice things like fresh juice, coffee.m. I am very satisfied and will certainly use this apartment again.

column1: Fantastisk charmerende lille lejlighed i et skønt kvarter ned til kanalen og tæt på Republique. En del larm. Værterne er imødekommende og meget fleksible med både ind- og udtjekningstider. Kan kun anbefales!

column1: Det var en fornøjelse at tjekke ind i lejligheden. Dejlig velkomst med vin, frugt og div. indkøb til morgenmad og en dejlig buket blomster. Vi følte os meget velkommen og blev bare så glade. Det er en rigtig dejlig lejlighed, den passer perfekt til vores familie. Og super nem at komme til og Metro lige til døren. Du har været meget hjælpsom med vores lidt skæve ind- og udtjeknings  tider. Håber vi kan komme igen til næste år. Kan varmt anbefales.

You have been very helpful with our odd check - in and check-out times. Hope we can come again next year. Can be highly recommended.

column1: Lejligheden har to balkoner med den flotteste udsigt over Paris - har aldrig oplevet noget lignede. Vil gerne bo i lejligheden pga udsigt og den venlige vært samt den rene lejlighed. Køkkenet var fint og forholdsvis nyt. Møblementet i resten af lejligheden var særdeles slidt og gammelt - men funktionelt, intet var i stykker. Kan anbefale lejligheden - hvis man er til den stil. Også igen udsigten opvejer alt!!!
column5: The apartment has two balconies with the best views of Paris - have never experienced something similar. Would like to live in the apartment due to the view and the friendly host and clean apartment. The kitchen was fine and relatively new. The furnishings in the rest of the apartment was very worn and old - but functional, nothing was broken. Can recommend the apartment - if you are into the style. Also, once again the prospect outweigh everything!!!

column1:

Et prakfuldt kvarter. Vi følte os hjemme i hendes lejlighed med hems.

column1:
Hvis du leder efter en lejlighed er dette sted nok ikke det rigtige. Værelset er på 5 m2 og indeholder lille køkken, brusekabine og seng så hvis man er to personer skal man kende hinanden godt. Toilettet ligger på gangen og deles med naboen. 
Men området er fantastisk med masser af gode spisesteder og kaffebarer og kun 10 minutters gang til sacre coeur. Paulo tog godt imod os og var behjælpelig med anbefalinger af steder.
column5:
If you're looking for an apartment this place is probably not the right thing. The room is 5 m2 and contains a small kitchen, shower and bed so if two people should know each other well. The toilet is located in hallway and is shared with the neighbor. 
But the area is great with plenty of good restaurants and coffee shops and only a 10-minute walk to the sacre coeur. Paulo took good against us and was helpful with recommendations of places.

column1: Virkelig en hyggelig lejlighed midt i hjertet af Montmartre og meget tæt på en metrostation. Lejligheden vender ud mod gaden, så en anelse larm kan forekomme hvis vinduerne er åbne. Flot moderne badeværelse og køkken med alle nødvendige ting. Sabe var nem at kommunikere med og svarede hurtigt på evt. spørgsmål.  Vi kan klart anbefale lejligheden og Sabe som vært.
column5: Really a cosy apartment right in the heart of Montmartre and very close to a metro station. The apartment faces the street, so a little noise can occur if the windows are open. Nice modern bathroom and kitchen with all necessary things. Sabe was easy to communicate with and responded quickly to any. questions. We can clearly recommend the apartment and the Sabe as the host.

column1: Vi var meget glade for at bo i Patricias lejlighed. Den var ren og pæn og virkelig indbydende. Patricia var nem at få kontakt til og svarede hurtigt på vores spørgsmål. Vi har intet at udsætte på lejligheden og vil til hver en tid anbefale Patricias lejlighed til andre rejsende. Muligheden for WiFi var også super.
column5: We were very happy to stay in Patricias apartment. It was clean and neat and really inviting. Patricia was easy to get in touch with and responded quickly to our questions. We have no complaints on the apartment and will recommend Patricias apartment to other travellers. The possibility of WiFi was also super.

column1: Lejligheden er nok ok i efteråret men uden aircon og de nødvendige lagner er den sølle. Det er billigere at booke direkte hos Adagio.
column5: The apartment is probably ok in the autumn but without the aircon and the necessary sheets are the measly. It is cheaper to book directly with the Adagio.

column5: Value for money.

column1:
Vores ophold i Sophies hyggelige lejlighed var over vores forventninger, og vi følte os meget velkomne.
Lejligheden passede perfekt som base for vores påskeferie i Paris for to voksne og tre børn på 12.
Lejligheden lå i et meget roligt område med nem adgang til metro, og der var pænt og rent i lejligheden, og alt fungerede.
Vi kunne bestemt godt finde på at komme tilbage.
column5:
Our stay in Sophie's apartment was above our expectations and we felt very welcome.
The apartment was perfect as a base for our holidays in Paris for two adults and three children 12.
The apartment was in a very quiet area with easy access to the metro, and it was clean and comfortable in the apartment, and everything worked.
We could definitely find to come back.

column1: Via e-mailkorrespondencen blev vi informeret om alt vedrørende vores ankomst og blev taget godt imod. Stedet levede op til beskrivelsen og var faktisk mere rummelig, end vi havde forventet. Vores forventninger blev således indfriet til fulde. En dejlig beliggenhed i rolige omgivelser med fine indkøbsmuligheder og med ca. 500 m til nærmeste metro-station.
column5: Via e-mailkorrespondencen we were informed on our arrival and were welcomed. The place lived up to the description and was actually more spacious than we had expected. Our expectations were thus fulfilled. A lovely location in the quiet surroundings, with fine shopping facilities and approx. 500 m to the nearest metro station.

column1:
Vi har haft en fantastisk rejse til Paris. 
Lejligheden var ren, hyggelig og moderne, og når vi åbnede vinduerne flød der fransk stemning ind til os.
Hyggelige spisesteder og kiosk lige uden for døren. Ikke mindst Sacre Cour i baghaven.
Var så heldige at opleve vinfestivalen 7.-11. Oktober 2015. Total fransk hygge
column5:
We have had a fantastic trip to Paris. 
The apartment was clean, cosy and modern, and when we opened the windows flowed the French atmosphere in to us.
Cosy eateries and a kiosk just outside the door. Not least, the Sacre Cour in the backyard.
Was fortunate enough to experience vinfestivalen 7.-11. October 2015. Total French enjoy

column1: Det er den skønneste lille perle i Paris! Lejligheden er nok lille, men så velindrettet, at det ikke var et problem at holde middagsselskab for 6 personer. Hyggelig, funktionel og ren. Natalie har været sød til at svare hurtigt på spørgsmål og tilbudt sin hjælp.  Beliggenheden er perfekt! Trappen op til Sacre Cæur er et levende teater, og pladsen foran bygningen har 5 små travle lokale spisesteder. Et perfekt oase i Paris. Vi kommer helt sikkert tilbage. En vært og en lejlighed der ikke kan anbefales nok.
column5: It is the most beautiful little gem in Paris! The apartment is probably small, but so well-appointed that it was not a problem to keep the dinner party for 6 people. Cozy, functional and clean. Natalie has been sweet to respond quickly to questions and offered his help. The location is perfect! The stairs up to Sacre Cæur is a living theatre, and the square in front of the building has 5 small bustling local eateries. A perfect oasis in Paris. We will definitely go back. A host and an apartment that can't be recommended enough.

column1: Meget hyggelig lejlighed med en perfekt beliggenhed for foden af Sacre Ceur. Sød vært, der svarede lynhurtigt på mails, når vi kontaktede hende både før og under opholdet. Lidt støj fra de omkringliggende cafeer.
column5: Very cosy apartment with a perfect location at the foot of the Sacre Ceur. Sweet host, who responded quickly to emails when we contacted her both before and during the stay. A little noise from the surrounding cafes.

column1: Super skøn lejlighed på 8.sal, med udsigt fra terrassen (som på billedet).
column5: Super great apartment at 8.floor, with views from the terrace (as in the picture).

column1: Lejligheden er rigtig fin og beliggenheden er super. Vi kunne særligt godt lide stilen og det, at der var masser af plads. Gode senge med dyner og et veludstyret køkken.
column5: The apartment is really nice and the location is super. We could very well like the style and the fact that there was plenty of room. Good beds with duvets and a well-equipped kitchen.

column1: 파리에서 머무는 4박5일 동안 너무 좋았어요^^! 집도 사진 그대로 이고 쇼파 두개를 펴면 침대로 이용가능해요. 방도 따듯하게 이옹가능하고 뜨거운 물도 잘 나옵니다. 헤어드라이기도 있어요. 와이파이가 잘 안터진다는 후기가 있어서 erik한테 다시 물어보고 로그인하니 잘 터지네요! 에펠탑이랑 루브르 박물관 중간에 위치하고 센강이랑도 가깝고 위치도 너무 좋아요^^!

Wi-Fi I from with after in erik for the water again and log in the good! Eiffel Tower, Paris France Louvre Museum is located in the middle Center is also close and the location is too good^^!

column1:
Béatrice fikk oss til å føle oss hjertelig velkommen. Vi satte stor pris på korrespondensen i forkant, der hun sendte både mail og sms med forslag og tips om hvordan vi enklest tok oss til leiligheten fra flyplassen. Béatrice møtte oss i leiligheten og leverte nøkler og viste oss facilitetene. Alt fungerte som beskrevet.
Leiligheten ligger i et veldig hyggelig nabolag og var ren og ryddig ved ankomst.
Vi er meget fornøyd med både leilighet og vertens service, det var utrolig hyggelig og en ren fornøyelse å leie av Béatrice.
column5:
Béatrice got us to feel welcome. We appreciated korrespondensen in the forefront, where she sent both e-mail and sms with suggestions and tips on how we easily took us to the apartment from the airport. Béatrice met us at the apartment and delivered keys and showed us the conveniences. Everything worked as described.
The apartment is located in a very nice neighborhood and was clean and tidy upon arrival.
We are very pleased with both the apartment and the host service, it was incredibly enjoyable and a real pleasure to rent by Béatrice.

Good communication with Gilles from the beginning – he was very helpful and accommodating the whole way through. Although the apartment is small, there was everything we needed on our extended weekend in Paris. Warm recommendation from here!

column1: Vi var veldig fornøyd med leiligheten, perfekt for fire venner på tur til Paris. Det var enkelt å finne frem etter god beskrivelse fra Sara og Justin, og vi hadde god kontakt på forhånd og underveis. Leiligheten ligger fint til i et veldig hyggelig nabolag med restauranter og cafeer overalt, og jeg anbefaler alle å ta en tur!
column5: We were very pleased with the apartment, perfect for four friends on a trip to Paris. It was easy to find for good description from Sara and Justin, and we had a good contact in advance and along the way. The apartment is nicely located in a very nice neighborhood with restaurants and cafes everywhere, and I recommend everyone to take a trip!

column1: De fik os til at føle os velkommen og forklarede alt til os. Det var også dejligt, at værterne boede i nærheden og vi kunne nemt komme i kontakt med dem. Alt fungerede i lejligheden og det var perfekt til 4 personer.
column5: They made us feel welcome and explained everything to us. It was also nice that the hosts lived nearby and we could easily get in touch with them. Everything worked in the apartment and it was perfect for 4 persons.

column1: Fantastisk god beliggenhed. I hjertet af Montmartre og alligevel roligt og lidt tilbagetrukket. Tæt på metro, bagerier og indkøb. Flotte gader med træer. Sacre Ceur og restauranter i kort gå afstand. Lejligheden er lille og meget hyggelig, så man føler sig hjemme. Dejligt med havebord og stole i gårdhaven, hvor morgenmaden kunne spises. Paco er en sød, sulten og kærlig kat. Dejligt at have en pariser kat på ferien. Børnene elskede ham. Børn (12 og 13 år) og voksne giver vores varmeste anbefalinger til et ophold i Aminatas lejlighed.
column5: Great location. In the heart of the Montmartre district, yet quiet and a little withdrawn. Close to metro, bakeries and shopping. Beautiful streets lined with trees. Clean and restaurants within a short walking distance. The apartment is small and very cosy, so you feel at home. Nice with patio table and chairs in the courtyard, where breakfast could be eaten. Paco is a sweet, hungry and loving cat. Great to have a parisian cat on holiday. The children loved him. Children (12 and 13 years) and adults give our warmest recommendations for a stay in Aminatas apartment.

column1: Dejlig og hyggelig lejlighed, meget centralt. Vi havde alt rundt om hjørnet som vi skulle bruge. Der var god kontakt med Sylvie. Vil bestemt anbefale Sylvie. Og vil klart komme igen i Sylvie's lejlighed.
column5: Nice and cozy apartment, very centrally located. We had everything around the corner which we should use. There was good contact with Sylvie. Would definitely recommend Sylvie. And will clearly come again in Sylvie's apartment.

column5: Nice and clean apartment on a side street to a vibrant city life. Super good host, who responded quickly to questions.

column1: Meget venlig modtagelse, meget veludstyret lejlighed, rigtig god beliggenhed  tæt ved indkøb, restauranter og Metro.
column5: Very friendly reception, very well equipped apartment, very good location, close to shopping, restaurants and the Metro.

column1:
Fremragende beliggenhed i hjertet af Montmartre. Få minutters gang fra metroen. Pris og kvalitet hænger godt sammen.  
Emmanuel & Sarita tog venligt og gæstfrit imod os, og Emmanuel viste os hurtigt rundt i nærområdet, som bugner af caféer, små bagerier, brasserier og restauranter. Lejligheden er lille, men hyggelig, hvor alle faciliteter som godt lille køkken, lille, men funktionelt bad, sattelit-TV og high speed internet. Alt er i nyere stand, og der er meget roligt i ejendommen.  Emmanuel taler godt engelsk - en fordel, hvis ens franske er lidt rustent. Og han er meget hjælpsom - også med gode råd om lokalområdet, og hvis der er spørgsmål om lejligheden.
column5:
Excellent location in the heart of Montmartre. A few minutes walk from the metro. Price and quality go well together. 
Emmanuel & Sarita took the friendly and hospitable towards us, and Emmanuel showed us quickly around the immediate area, which is full of cafes, small bakeries, brasseries and restaurants. The apartment is small, but cozy, where all the facilities like good little kitchen, small but functional bathroom, satellite TV and high speed internet. Everything is in newer condition, and it is very quiet in the property. Emmanuel speaks good English - an advantage, if one's French is a little rusty. And he is very helpful - also with good advice about the local area, and if there are any questions about the apartment.

column1: Okej boende centralt i Montmartre. Sovrum mot tyst innergård.
column5: Okay accommodation in the very heart of Montmartre. Bedroom towards the quiet courtyard.

column1: Super god beskrivelse af boligen - alt levede op til forventningerne. Lejligheden er nem at finde, ligger centralt i byen 5 minutter fra Eiffel tårnet og tæt på 2 metrostationer. Vores prioritering var hygge og beliggenhed og ikke så meget komfort. Den har alt, hvad to personer skal bruge for 5-6 dage i Paris, hvor man helst bare vil nyde byen... dog stadigvæk med mulighed for hygge i lejligheden. Der er anlæg man kan tilslutte via Wifi med sin telefon over fx spotify, så vi havde flere aftenener med rødvin og musik i lejligheden.
column5: Super good description of the dwelling - everything lived up to expectations. The apartment is easy to find, centrally located in the city, 5 minutes from Eiffel tower and close to 2 metro stations. Our priority was the comfort and location and not so much comfort. It has everything two people need to spend for 5-6 days in Paris, where you just want to enjoy the city... though still with the option of coziness in the apartment. There are installations you can connect via Wifi with his phone than e.g. spotify, so we had more aftenener with red wine and music in the apartment.

column1: Super beliggenhed. Godt værelse. God vært. Anbefalelsesværdigt.
column5: Super location. The room was very comfortable. Good host. Recommended.

column1: Beskrivelsen var præcis, der var det, som Lea havde skrevet, der var. Desværre virkede internette ikke, hvilket Lea ikke kunne gøre for - men det var lidt ærgeligt, da vi booket lejligheden netop på grund af dette (blandt andet).
column5: The description was accurate, which it was, as Leah had written that was. Unfortunately worked the internet not, which Lea could not do - but it was a bit unfortunate as we booked the apartment just because of this (among other things).

column1:
숙박하기 전부터 연락이 매우 잘되었고 지리를 잘 설명해 주었습니다. 찾아 가자마자 환영해 주었으며 숙소 곳곳을 상세하게 설명해 주었습니다. 사진으로 보는 것보다 숙소가 더 넓었고 깨끗하게 관리되어 있었으며 거실, 침실, 부엌 모두 사용하기 편리했습니다.

숙소 위치는 파리의 중심인 오페라 극장에서 걸어서 5분 거리로 매우 가까웠고 주변 건물, 분위기 모두 최상이었습니다. 주변에 에스프레소가 아주 맛있는 카페도 많았고 마트도 가까운 곳에 있어 편리했습니다.
column5:
To stay from before the contact is very well designed and well explained. Find with welcome and stay throughout the detailed description. With than stay, more spacious, was clean and management was in the living room, bedroom, kitchen all easy to use.

Accommodation location the heart of Paris, the Opera Theatre is within a 5 Minute very close and surrounding the building, the atmosphere all top. Around espresso is very tasty cafe and Mart in close vicinity.

column1: Marielou var en fantastisk vert! Hun var tilgjengelig og kommuniserende både i forkant av reisen og under oppholdet. Leiligheten var svært komfortabel og tilrettelagt og lå midt i smørøyet av livlige Oberkamf og i gåavstand fra hippe Marais. Likevel var det fullstendig rolig og stille i selve bygget. Marielou var grei og ga oss en rekke anbefalinger av restauranter og cafeer, alt i en radius på under 5 minutters gåavstand fra leiligheten - og det er mange! Vi likte oss virkelig godt og ville definitivt dratt tilbake. Vi takker Marielou for en autentisk og komfortabel opplevelse av Paris og anbefaler hennes leilighet på det varmeste.
column5: Marielou was a fantastic host! She was accessible and communicative both before the trip and during your stay. The apartment was very comfortable and organized and was right in the thick of the lively Oberkamf and in walking distance from the hip Marais. Nevertheless, it was completely calm and quiet in the building itself. Marielou was straightforward and gave us a lot of recommendations of restaurants and cafes, all in a radius of less than 5 minutes walking distance from the apartment and there are many! We liked us really well and would definitely gone back. We would like to thank the Marielou for an authentic and comfortable experience of Paris, and recommend her apartment warmly.

The apartment can, in principle, accommodate 6, but the turn-out-the couch was worn/loose, then the boards fell out of the night. 
It worked fine just as a sofa, but you slept miserable in it. 

Is it just 4, this is a fine place.

Vi boede 4 dage hos Nathalie. Værelset er fint, og der er ingen støj fra gaden om natten. Ligger lige ved siden af metroen, hvilket er perfekt. Få minutter fra Eiffeltårnet. Vi blev godt modtaget af Nathalies søn, da hun ikke var hjemme på vores ankomsttidspunkt. Dette fungerede upåklageligt.

column5:

Can only highly recommend to rent Nathalies room.

column1: Vi tilbragte tre dage i Camilles fine lejlighed. Lokationen er fantastisk tæt ved hyggelige Rue de Commerce med gode restauranter og hyggelige butikker, samt nem forbindelse til resten af byen. Stedet er rummeligt med alt, hvad man har brug for - vær dog opmærksom på, at sengen er en fold-ud sofa, som ikke var det mest komfortable i længere tid. Alt i alt er det dog en god pris for et rigtig fint ophold!
column5: We spent three days in Camilles fine apartment. The location is fantastic close by the cosy Rue de Commerce with great restaurants and quaint shops, as well as easy connection to the rest of the city. The place is spacious with everything you need - however, please note that the bed is a fold-out sofa, which was not the most comfortable for a longer time. All in all, however, it is a good price for a really nice stay!

column5: All in all a perfect stay. Nelly was friendly. It was nice to stay somewhere where you felt at home. Nice clean! The Fed location. can clearly recommend it.

column1:
Der er hvad man skal bruge i lejligheden, der er beliggende i et hyggeligt kvarter med masser gode restauranter.
Alexis var en god vært, der under vores ophold var til at komme i kontakt med, hvis vi havde spørgsmål.
Det eneste minus var, at lejligheden var meget svær at varme op. Dog var det også ekstremt koldt den weekend vi besøgt Paris.
column5:
That is what you need in the apartment, which is situated in a cosy neighbourhood with lots of good restaurants.
Alexis was a good host during our stay was to come in contact with if we had questions.
The only minus was that the apartment was very hard to warm up. However, it was also extremely cold the weekend we visited Paris.

column1: Jeg kan virkelig anbefale lejligheden. Skønt kvarter i gåafstand fra både metro og Gare du Nord, hippe butikker og gode spisesteder. Dejlig rolig lejlighed i grønne omgivelser.
column5: I can really recommend the apartment. Although the district, in walking distance from both the metro and the Gare du Nord, hip boutiques and great dining. Nice quiet apartment in the green surroundings.

column1: Jeg boede en måned i Marie og Jean-Claudes lejlighed. I den tid følte jeg mig utrolig godt hjemme og meget tryg. Både i lejligheden og i kvarteret. Marie og Jean-Claude tog imod mig, da jeg ankom. Tilfældet viste sig, at vi kunne spise sammen på en af de mange små, gode restauranter lige om hjørnet. Det var en hyggelig oplevelse - Marie og Jean-Claude er varme og vidende mennesker. Senere kom parret forbi for at fikse tv'et, som var lidt indviklet. Jeg valgte i høj grad lejligheden pga. klaveret. Det er et charmerende og følsomt instrument. Lejligheden er præcis så funktionel og lækker, som den fremstår på billederne og kvarteret er i gåafstand til det meste - ellers er der gode metrolinjer. Nedenfor ligger parken, hvor der leves et broget liv af børn, unge, voksne og gamle. Det er som en ekstra dagligstue.
column5: I lived a month in Marie and Jean-Claude's apartment. At the time I felt incredibly well at home and very comfortable. Both in the apartment and in the neighborhood. Marie and Jean-Claude took me in when I arrived. The case proved that we could eat together at one of the many small, good restaurants are just around the corner. It was a nice experience - Marie and Jean-Claude are warm and knowledgeable people. Later, the pair stopped by to fix the tv, which was a little tricky. I selected in high degree the opportunity pga. the piano. It is a charming and sensitive instrument. The apartment is exactly as functional and delicious, as it appears in the pictures and the neighborhood is in walking distance for the most part - otherwise there is a good metro lines. Below is the park, where there lived a variegated life of children, young people, adults and old. It is like an extra living room.

column1: Flott leilighet! Ryddig og rent, store og fine rom. Punktlig vertinne, raske og presise svar. Kort vei til Metro og jernbanestasjon.
column5: Great apartment! Neat and clean, large and nice rooms. Punctual hostess, quick and precise answers. Short way to Metro and train station.

Perfekt beliggenhed, fin og ren.  
Rigtig fin lejlighed til to voksne og to børn.
column5:

Really nice apartment for two adults and two children.

column1: Alexandre var en god vært; al kommunikationen var nem og ind- og udtjekning var meget fleksibel. Lejlighedens beliggenhed var perfekt, og selve lejligheden var rigtig dejlig; lys og hyggelig. Badeværelset var lille, men det var ok. Opgangen til lejligheden var dog meget slidt.
column5: Alexandre was a good host; all the communication was easy and check - in and check-out was very flexible. The apartment location was perfect and the apartment itself was really lovely; bright and cosy. The bathroom was small, but it was ok. The entryway to the apartment however was very worn.

column1: Good value for money.
column5: Good value for money.

column1: Freds studio ligger i det skønneste område af Paris med masser af caféer, restauranter, barer og andre oplevelser tæt på. Lejligheden er meget lille, men super hyggelig indrettet.
column5: Peace studio is located in the beautiful area of Paris with plenty of cafes, restaurants, bars and other experiences close to. The apartment is very small, but very cosy decorated.

column1: Lejligheden var meget fin og hyggelig. Der lå kort over Paris til os, samt beskrivelse af de nærmeste bagere og supermarkeder. Vi følte os straks godt tilpas, og havde nogle fantastiske dage med Camilles lejlighed som base. Kvarteret var hyggeligt og centralt, vi kunne gå skønne ture, og det var nemt at tage med metro. Det var perfekt for os.
column5: The apartment was very nice and cozy. There were maps of Paris for us, as well as a description of the nearest bakeries and supermarkets. We felt immediately comfortable and had some great days with Camilles apartment as a base. The neighborhood was nice and centrally located, we could go for lovely walks, and it was easy to take the metro. It was perfect for us.

column1: Mig og min familie havde en fantastisk ferie i Nathalies lejlighed. Alt fungerede perfekt. Nathalie svarede hurtigt på alle spørgsmål og nødvendig information, blev sendt i god tid inden ferien. Lejligheden ligger i et livligt område, med en del natteliv i weekenden. Men lejligheden ligger højt og er på ingen måde generet af den nattelige aktivitet i gaden. Der er kort til flere metrostationer og der er gode restauranter som Nathalie anbefaler lige i nærheden samt gode muligheder for at handle både i supermarked men også på de to lokale markeder. Min familie og jeg kan kun give Nathalie og hendes lejlighed de varmeste anbefalinger
column5: Me and my family had a great vacation in Nathalies apartment. Everything worked perfectly. Nathalie responded quickly to all questions and necessary information was sent in good time before the holidays. The apartment is located in a lively area, with a part of nightlife at the weekend. But the apartment is loud and is in no way bothered by the nattelige activity in the street. There is a card for several metro stations and there are great restaurants like Nathalie recommend just nearby as well as good opportunities to trade both in the supermarket but also at the two local markets. My family and I can only give Nathalie and her apartment the warmest recommendations

column1: Det var en perfekt lejlighed til 4 personer, lys, pæn, ren, ingen støj og der er alt hvad man skal bruge. Lejligheden ligger super centralt i forhold til hvor vi skulle være i Paris. Nem at komme til fra lufthavnen og ligger tæt på station og Metro. Vi havde en meget dejlig uge der.
column5: It was a perfect apartment for 4 people, bright, neat, clean, no noise and there is everything you need. The apartment is super centrally located in relation to where we should be in Paris. Easy to get to from the airport and is close to station and Metro. We had a very nice week there.

column1:
Lejligheden var lidt mindre end forventet, og døren til badeværelset overlod ikke meget til fantasien. På trods af det, så kan jeg varmt anbefale den. 
Lejligheden ligger i et kvarter fyldt med liv og lækre restauranter. Der er få turister, hvilket er fedt, for så kan man rigtigt få lov til, at mænge sig med de lokale og være ægte pariser. 
Værten var desuden ekstremt hjælpsom med, at finde en restaurant og pege én mod nogle gode oplevelser. 
Alt i alt: 5/5
column5:
The apartment was a little smaller than expected, and the door to the bathroom left not much to the imagination. In spite of it, then I can highly recommend it. 
The apartment is located in a neighborhood filled with life and delicious restaurants. There are few tourists, which is great, because then you can really be allowed to hobnob with the locals and be a real parisian. 
The host was also extremely helpful with finding a restaurant and point one towards some good experiences. 
All in all: 5/5
