column5: Dommage un peu en (Website hidden by Airbnb) 01/04...:)

column1:
Dette er en dejlig lille hyggelig lejlighed som passede perfekt til vores familie på 4 (4 """"voksne""""). Lejligheden er meget veludstyret og der er også lagt badekåber frem når man kommer. 
Beliggenheden er tæt på """"alt"""", og der er mange gode dagligvare butikker og spisesteder lige rund om hjørnet. 
Mathieu har været meget hjælpsom med at svare på vores spørgsmål undervejs og af de anbefalede spisesteder nåede vi at prøve 2, som begge var rigtig gode. 
Lejeprisen er lige i den høje ende.
column5:
This is a nice small cozy apartment which was perfect for our family of 4 (4 """"adults""""). The apartment is very well equipped and there is also put the bathrobes back when you come. 
The location is close to """"all""""and there are many good grocery shops and restaurants just round the corner. 
Mathieu has been very helpful with answering our questions along the way and of the recommended restaurants, we try 2, as both were really good. 
The rental price is just at the high end.

column1:
Vi havde et rigtig godt ophold (5 dage) i lejligheden på Rue d'Enghien. 
Vi var heldige at kunne få et tidligt check-ind (kl. 10), og værtinden skrev til os på forhånd, og hjalp os med, hvordan vi kom til lejligheden med tog og metro. Selve indcheckningen gik hurtigt, og vi havde ingen problemer under vort ophold. Lejligheden er nyistandsat, og er fuldstændig identisk med billederne. Beliggenheden er også god, ikke langt til metro (linie 4 og 8), dog er nabolaget lidt trist og nedslidt.
column5:
We had a really nice stay (5 days) in the apartment on the Rue d'enghien. 
We were lucky to be able to get an early check-in (at. 10), and the hostess wrote to us in advance and helped us with how we got to the apartment by train and metro. The check-in desk went quickly, and we had no problems during our stay. The apartment is newly renovated, and is completely identical with the pictures. The location is also good, not far to the metro (line 4 and 8), however, is the neighborhood a little sad and worn.

column1:
Vi følte os meget velkomne hos Catherine. 
Værelset er præcis som det ser ud. Ordentligt, rent og charmerende. Lejligheden ligger rigtig godt i et dejligt kvarter, centralt, stille og tæt på metroen.
column5:
We felt us very welcome by Catherine. 
The room is exactly as it seems. Properly, clean and charming. The apartment is located really well in a nice neighborhood, centrally located, quiet and close to the metro.

column1: Der var rent og fint da vi ankom til den hyggelige lejlighed på 3 sal. Catherine havde endda købt ind til morgenmad og lidt hygge til os, og det nød vi meget. Efter lange aktive dage i Paris var det skønt at komme hjem om aftenen og slappe af i de skønne omgivelser. En virkelig dejlig og autentisk fransk lejlighed;-)
column5: It was clean and fine when we arrived to the cozy apartment on the 3 floor. Catherine had even shopped for breakfast and a little for us, and we enjoyed very much. After long active days in Paris it was wonderful to come home in the evening and relax in the lovely surroundings. A truly wonderful and authentic French apartment;-)

column1: Rigtig fin lille lejlighed med god beliggenhed i gåafstand til mange af de væsentligste seværdigheder og midt i et levende lokalt miljø. Værten er meget gæstfri og imødekommende. Til trods for beliggenheden tæt på en af de store og trafikkerede boulevarder er der forbavsende roligt og stille. Dobbeltsengen er lidt af en prøvelse da den kun er 120 cm bred - især når man er vant til 160 cm! Man skal være opmærksom på at køkkenet er meget lille og stort set uden bordplads/arbejdsplads og at det derfor kun vanskeligt kan bruges til at kokkerere og kreere større måltider i.
column5: Really nice little apartment with good location in walking distance to many of the main sights and in the middle of a vibrant local environment. The host is very hospitable and accommodating. Despite the location near one of the large and traffic boulevards are surprisingly calm and quiet. The double bed is a bit of an ordeal as it is only 120 cm wide - especially when you're used to 160 cm! You should be aware that the kitchen is very small with virtually no counter space/work space and that it is therefore only with great difficulty can be used to cook and to create larger meals.

column1:
Vores vært fik os til at føle os meget velkommen. Lejligheden var klar til tiden, og alt gik godt. Florence er et meget behageligt menneske, der var meget nem at kontakte på telefonen.
Det var som at træde direkte ind i et pariserhjem, og særligt altanen var pragtfuld til morgenmad eller en god kop te om aftenen.
Lejligheden ligger dejlig tæt på metroen i et fantastisk hyggeligt kvarter med masser af restauranter overalt.
Vi følte os meget heldige over lejlighedens placering.
Vi var to voksne og to børn, og der var masser af plads til os fire.
Florence er desuden en iødekommende og meget behagelig vært, som får vores bedste anbefalinger. Absolut en god oplevelse..
column5:
Our host made us feel very welcome. The apartment was ready on time, and everything went well. Florence is a very pleasant man who was very easy to contact on the phone.
It was like stepping directly into a pariserhjem, and particularly the balcony was wonderful for breakfast or a good cup of tea in the evenings.
The apartment is lovely and close to the subway and in a fantastic neighbourhood with plenty of restaurants everywhere.
We felt very lucky over the apartment's location.
We were two adults and two children and there was plenty of room for us four.
Florence is also a iødekommende and very pleasant host, which gets our best recommendations. Definitely a good experience..

column1: Sentralt sted og hyggelig vert- Informativ og tilgjengelig:)
column5: Central location and nice host - Informative and available:)

column1:
Lejlighedens er meget, meget funktionel og fin til to personer. Der er alt, man har brug for, og det er virkelig godt organiseret på den meget lille plads. Dog skal man igennem det ene """"rum"""" ( kun er adskilt fra køkken/stue med et gardin) for at komme ind på badeværelset, dvs. man vækker let den anden ved natlige toiletbesøg.

Det største aktiv ved lejligheden er måske den meget charmerende bygning med svalegange hele vejen rundt om en hyggelig og livlig gård,  men ingen støj.

Beliggenheden er måske lige lidt længere ude, end det optimale, men kvarteret er skønt, og stort set uden andre tourister. Man behøver ikke tage et andet sted hen om aftenen for at spise eller bare gå ud. Her er rigtig gode restauranter - både etniske og klasiske franske bistroer,  mange cafeer og barer og lige på den anden side af gaden er både en rigtig god bager og et lille supermarked - tæt på også store supermarkeder.

Eneste kritikpunkt er, at vi ankom omkring midnat og fandt et fuldstændig tomt køleskab. Jeg har boet airbnb ganske mange gange og har altid fundet vand/mælk/juice/vin og frugt ved ankomst.
column5:
The apartment is very, very functional and fine for two persons. There is everything you need, and it is really well organized on the very small space. However, through one of the """"space"""" ( is only separated from the kitchen/living room with a curtain) to get into the bathroom, ie. one awakens the other by night-time toileting.

The greatest asset of the apartment is perhaps the very charming building with galleries all the way around on a cozy and lively farm, but no noise.

The location is perhaps just a little further out than the optimum, but the neighborhood is lovely, and virtually no other tourister. You don't need to go somewhere else in the evening to eat or just go out. Here is the really good restaurants - both the ethnic and the last one French bistros, many cafes and bars and just on the other side of the street is both a really good bakery and a small supermarket close to the also large supermarkets.

Only criticism is that we arrived around midnight and found a completely empty refrigerator. I have lived airbnb quite a few times and have always found the water/milk/juice/wine and fruit upon arrival.

column1: Vi havde en god uge i Paris og nød vores ophold i den fine lejlighed, hvor billederne på hjemmesiden giver et fint indtryk. Marie-Claude svarede hurtigt på vores henvendelser og tog venligt imod os ved ankomst. Lejligheden er beliggende i et roligt beboelsesområde hvor der ikke er langt til indkøbsmugligheder og restauranter. Vi kan anbefale at bo i Marie-Cludes lejlighed og vender gerne tilbage en anden gang.
column5: We had a good week in Paris and enjoyed our stay in the fine apartment, where the pictures on the website give a good impression. Marie-Claude responded quickly to our requests and took the friendly against the us upon arrival. The apartment is located in a quiet residential area where there's not far to indkøbsmugligheder and restaurants. We can recommend to stay in Marie-Cludes apartment and would love to return another time.

column1: Koselig leilighet i rolige omgivelser. Nært på spennende restauranter, cafeer og butikker. Leiligheten var optimal for oss fem på studietur, og vi kunne enkelt lage middag flere kvelder.
column5: Cosy apartment in quiet surroundings. Close to exciting restaurants, cafes and shops. The apartment was optimal for us five on the school trip, and we could easily cook dinner multiple evenings.

column1:
Vi blev ca. 1 time forsinket på vores rejse til Paris, men vi var i fin SMS kontakt med udlejeren  Catherine, så det blev intet problem. Vi blev hjerteligt modtaget af Catherine i den meget charmerende lejlighed som fremstod nøjagtig som beskrivelsen og billederne viste på AIRBNB’s hjemmeside. Tre dejlige soveværelser, de 2 med dobbeltseng og det ene med enkeltseng. Vær opmærksom på at dobbeltsengene er udstyret med dobbeltdyne! Lejligheden er en rigtig “pariserlejlighed” med bøger, tegneserier og nips fra gulv til loft. Bad og toilet er delt på 2 rum,- badet er dejligt, toilettet er meget lille, men begge rum fungerer fint, ligesom køkkenet der også indeholder alt hvad man har brug for. Wi-FI fungerer også fint I lejligheden. Catherine havde skitseret en plan over hvilke butikker og restauranter hun anbefaler i området , den var meget nyttig. Lejligheden ligger I behagelig afstand til centrum, så vi gik hver morgen til Seinen, omkring Notre Dame, hvorfra vi kunne nå en masse seværdigheder på gåben (Louvre, Tuileri haverne, Concorde pladsen, Eiffeltårnet, Champs Elysees m.m.)
Vi kan kraftigt anbefale Catherines lejlighed til andre som har lyst til Paris.
column5:
We were approx. 1 hour delayed on our trip to Paris, but we were all in fine SMS contact with the landlord Catherine, so it was no problem. We were cordially received by Catherine in the very charming apartment appeared exactly as the description and the pictures displayed on AIRBNB's website. Three lovely bedrooms, 2 with double bed and one with single bed. Please be aware that the double beds are equipped with duvet! The apartment is a real “parisian apartment” with books, comics, and bric-a-brac from floor to ceiling. Bath and toilet is divided on 2 rooms,- bath is nice, the toilet is very small, but both rooms work fine, just like the kitchen also has everything you need. Wi-FI works fine In the apartment. Catherine had outlined a plan of what stores and restaurants she recommends in the area , was very useful. The apartment is situated In comfortable distance to the city centre, so we went every morning to the Seine, around Notre Dame, from which we could reach a lot of sights on foot (Louvre, Tuileries gardens, Concorde square, the Eiffel tower, the Champs Elysees m.m.)
We can strongly recommend catherine's apartment to others who would like to Paris.

column1:
Det hele forløb ganske glimrende. Jeg bestilte værelset en uge i forvejen, og da Théo var på ferie, var det hans sambo Maxime, som tog i mod mig. Han satte mig fint ind i, hvordan alting i lejligheden fungerede og jeg fik et lyst og rent værelse at sove i. Senere drak vi en øl i selskab med Maximes veninde og vi havde en lang interessant samtale om højt og lavt. Der var god stemning hele vejen og jeg fik tilmed lov at låne Maximes cykel, så jeg kunne køre en midnatstur ned og hente smøger på Nation. 
Ganske fint nabolag, med metrostation udført i art nouveau lige ved siden af. Og så selvføgelig Pére Lachaise lige ved siden af, hvilket jeg meget gerne ville have besøgt, hvis jeg havde haft tid til det.
column5:
It all flows quite brilliantly. I booked the room a week in advance, and when Théo was on vacation, it was his sambo Maxime, who took against me. He put me nicely into how everything in the apartment worked and I got a bright and clean room to sleep in. Later we drank a beer in the company of Maxime friend and we had a long interesting conversation about high and low. There was a good atmosphere all the way and I even got allowed to borrow Maxime bike, so I could run a midnatstur down and download cigarettes in the Nation. 
Quite a fine neighborhood, with the metro station done in art nouveau. And so the knights of Pére Lachaise, which I very much would like to have visited, if I had the time for it.

column1: Denne lejlighed var virkelig cosy. Vi nød vores ophold i lejligheden i Paris og beskrivelsen holdt hvad den lovede. Værten var yderst hjælpsom og svartiden var hurtig og præcis. Beliggenheden er suveræn, tæt på alle de attraktive seværdigheder. Vi vil booke denne lejlighed næste gang vi kommer til Paris.
column5: This apartment was really cosy. We enjoyed our stay in the apartment in Paris and the description kept what it promised. The host was extremely helpful and the response time was quick and accurate. The location is superb, close to all the attractive sights. We will book this apartment next time we come to Paris.

column1: Lille lejlighed, men fin til 3 personer. Fuldt moderne og velfungerende. Ingen gadestøj. Ligger fantastisk, centralt, meget tæt på metro og med masser af restauranter i nærheden. Minus: lidt mørk, ligger langt nede i huset og når man kommer ud kan man blive overrasket over at der faktisk er solskin!
column5: Small apartment but fine for 3 people. Fully modern and well-functioning. No street noise. Fantastic hotel, centrally located, very close to the metro and with lots of restaurants nearby. Minus: a little dark, far down in the house and when one comes out can you be surprised that there is actually sunshine!

column1:
Spændende, smuk bolig, som er perfekt, hvis man rejser flere par sammen, da boligen har fire etager og to badeværelser.
Kvarteret er multietnisk og livligt, og der er metro og butikker lige om hjørnet.
Et ekstra plus er den overdækkede terrasse og smukke gård
column5:
Exciting, beautiful residence, which is perfect if you travel several pairs together, as the residence has four floors and two bathrooms.
The neighborhood is multi-ethnic and lively, and there are metro and shops just around the corner.
An extra plus is the covered terrace and the beautiful courtyard

column1: Très bon quartier. Delphine très attentionnée. A recommander.
column5: Very good neighborhood. Delphine very considerate. Has recommend.

column1:
Værten fik mig til at føle mig meget velkommen. Der var god kommunikation, både før, under og efter rejsen. Vi blev taget rigtig godt imod af værtens imødekommende bror, som gav os god information om alt. Lejligheden var smuk, hyggelig, funktionel og der var rent overalt.
Vi anbefaler varmt Claudines lille lejlighed, og håber at vende tilbage.
column5:
The host made me feel very welcome. There was good communication, both before, during and after the journey. We were taken really good care of the host's gracious brother who gave us good information about everything. The apartment was beautiful, cosy, functional and was very clean.
We recommend warm Claudines small apartment, and hope to return.

column1:
Fin lejlighed med mange værelser. Kækken, bad og toilet. 
Fin beliggenhed med parkering.
column5:
Fine apartment with many rooms. Kækken, bath and toilet. 
Good location with parking.

column1:
Ferien til Paris ble perfekt, mye på grunn av denne leiligheten. Da vi kom sto det blomster på bordet, og Jeanne hadde laget en mappe med forskjellige anbefalinger og ting å gjøre. Leiligheten var ryddig og ren.

Nabolaget var veldig fint, masse liv! Mange hyggelige restauranter og cafeer. Metroen lå veldig nærme. 

Alt var veldig bra!
column5:
Your vacation to Paris was perfect, much because of this apartment. When we arrived, there were flowers on the table, and Jeanne had made a folder with different recommendations and things to do. The apartment was neat and clean.

The neighborhood was very nice, lots of life! Many nice restaurants and cafes. The metro was very close. 

Everything was very good!

column1:
Lejligheden er lille, men fin. Og der er det, man skal bruge - men det bedste er, at den ligger super centralt. Meget tæt på stationen ved Notre Dame, og let at komme til fra Orly.
Og bageren længere nede ad gaden laver fantastiske croissanter!
column5:
The apartment is small, but fine. And that is it, you have to use - but the best part is that it is located super centrally. Very close to the train station at Notre Dame, and easy to get to from Orly.
And the bakery down the street makes amazing croissants!

column1: Vi var godt fornøyd med oppholdet i Annes leilighet.  Litt rufsete nabolag, men en kjempe fin leilighet for en familie på fire.
column5: We were very happy with our stay in anne's apartment. Slightly scruffy neighbourhood, but a very nice apartment for a family of four.

column1: Good location, living like a true Parisian.
column5: Good location, living like a true Parisian.

column1:
Virkelig fin lejlighed i et dejligt område af Paris. Lejligheden ligger i nr. 2 gård, væk fra gaden, så der er stille om natten, og der ligger masser af lækre restauranter og barer i området. Der ligger to metro stationer lige rundt om hjørnet, men hvis man ikke noget imod en god gåtur, kan man let droppe den og gå til de store seværdigheder.
Lejligheden er skinnende ren, med en stor seng, stort vindue, wifi, masser af håndklæder og køkken med te og kaffe. Det var lidt som at bo på hotel, bare billigere og med en højere standard.
Christine er gæstfri og svarer MEGET hurtigt på beskeder :-)
column5:
Really nice apartment in a nice area of Paris. The apartment is located in the no. 2 farm, away from the street, so is quiet at night, and there are plenty of delicious restaurants and bars in the area. There are two metro stations just around the corner, but if you don't mind a good walk, you can easily drop it and go to the major sights.
The apartment is spotlessly clean, with a big bed, big window, wifi, lots of towels and a kitchen with tea and coffee-making facilities. It was a bit like staying in a hotel, just cheaper and with a higher standard.
Christine is welcoming and responds VERY quickly to messages :-)

column1: Super lækkert sted, søde værter der sørgede for at alt var godt og hjalp med anbefalinger til cafeer. Det ligger super godt og selve lejligheden er vildt speciel og cool. Ville klart komme igen. Eneste lille minus var at man ikke kunne bruge gården hvilket vi havde troet.
column5: Super nice place, nice hosts who made sure that everything was nice and helped with recommendations for cafes. It is very nice and the apartment itself is game special and cool. Would definitely come again. Only small minus was that you could not use the courtyard as we had thought.

column1: super ruhig & beste lage um überall hinzukommen
column5: super quiet & best location get around

column1: Fin lejlighed der til fulde levede op til beskrivelsen. God beliggenhed og meget hyggelig.
column5: Nice apartment fully lived up to the description. Good location and very cosy.

column1:
Fin lille lejlighed. Ikke i centrum men nemt at komme dertil med metroen der går lige ude for lejligheden. 
Området er ikke det mest spændende. Men der er fuldstændig ro når man er inde i lejligheden. Alt for hård seng - måtte sove på sofaen. Udendørslampe stod og blinkede det meste af natten.
column5:
Nice little apartment. Not in the centre but easy to get there with the metro that goes straight out of the apartment. 
The area is not the most exciting. But there is complete peace when you are inside the apartment. Too hard bed - had to sleep on the couch. Udendørslampe stood and flashed most of the night.

column1: Vi havde en god tid i Christines lejlighed, alt var som forventet, så kan godt anbefale et ophold centralt i Paris.
column5: We had a great time in christine's apartment, everything was as expected, so can definitely recommend a stay in central Paris.

column1: 정말 깨끗한 방과 친절한 주인 아주머니 덕분에 즐거운 시간이었습니다. 정성껏 차려주신 아침식사는 너무 맛있었고 terne 지하철 역과 버스 정류장이 가까워 관광하기에 편했고 개선문과 샹젤리제 거리도 도보로 갈 수있는 위치에 있어 좋았습니다 다시 파리를 간다면 꼭 다시 이 집에 머물것입니다!^^
column5: Really clean room and friendly landlady, thanks to the city. Carefully tea to your Breakfast too was delicious and terne subway station and a bus stop close to the sightseeing and had arc and the Champs Elysees on foot can go in a location that was good back to Paris to come back to this house and stay in it!^^

column1: Det var en rigtig god oplevelse at bo hos Fabienne. God kontakt både før, under og efter vores ophold. Billederne lever fuldt op til hvad vi fik i lejligheden, hvor vi boede to voksne og to børn, godt med plads. Området som lejligheden ligger i, er dejlig autentisk og ligger både tæt ved Metro, bus og indkøb. Vi er meget tilfredse med vores ophold.
column5: It was a really good experience to stay with Fabienne. Good contact both before, during and after our stay. The pictures live up to what we got in the apartment, where we stayed two adults and two children, good with space. The area the apartment is in is nice, authentic and close by Metro, bus and shopping. We are very happy with our stay.

column1: Adriens lejlighed passede perfekt til en weekend i Paris. Lejligheden ligger i et hyggeligt nabolag med masser af gode spisesteder og barer. Adrien og hans kæreste var imødekommende og udover det sædvanlige venlige i deres kommunikation og hjælpsomhed.
column5: Adrien's apartment was perfect for a weekend in Paris. The apartment is situated in a cosy neighborhood with lots of good restaurants and bars. Adrien and his girlfriend were welcoming and in addition to the usual friendly in their communication and helpfulness.

column1: Det var en fornøjelse at bo hos Nicolas. Stor imødekommenhed, perfekt placering og lækkert område. Vi kunne ikke have bedt om mere. Nicolas var en kanon vært. Vi kommer gerne tilbage igen.
column5: It was a pleasure to stay with Nicolas. Great hospitality, perfect location and nice area. We could not have asked for more. Nicolas was a great host. We'd love to come back again.

column1: Rigtig god modtagelse. Super beliggenhed med gåafstand til stort set alt. Velfungerende indretning
column5: Really good reception. Super location with walking distance to pretty much everything. Functioning décor

column1: Vi har aldrig før brugt Airbnb. Så da familien på to voksne og to teenagere stod i Paris foran Philipes blå dør, var vi ret spændte. Men vupti, ud af det blå, og max. ½ min. efter vi ankom stod hans kæreste klar med koder og nøgle. Vi fik god introduktion til lejligheden og den var helt som beskrevet på nettet. Beliggenheden er i top - udsigt til Eiffeltårnet og Pantheon fra altandørerne er skøn! Trapperne vidste vi jo om!! men det var fint. Køkkenet var veludstyret og sengene gode. Alt i fin stand. Bager og lille supermarked i nærheden og metro Luxemburg få hundrede meter derfra. Vi brugte bussen en del, da der er busstop lige foran indgangsdøren. Alt i alt en rigtig god oplevelse, som vi gerne anbefaler til andre.
column5: Never before have we used Airbnb. So when the family of two adults and two teenagers standing in Paris in front of the Philipes blue door, we were quite excited. But hey presto, out of the blue, and max. ½ Min. after we arrived stood his gf ready with the codes and the key. We got a good introduction to the apartment and it was absolutely as described on the web. The location is in the top - view of the Eiffel tower and the Pantheon from altandørerne is great! The stairs we knew about!! but it was fine. The kitchen was well equipped and the beds good. All in fine condition. Bakery and small supermarket nearby and the metro Luxembourg, a few hundred metres away. We used the bus a lot, because there is a busstop right in front of the entrance door. All in all a really good experience, we'd like to recommend to others.

column1: 여행일정의 마지막이었던 파리가 정말 좋은기억으로 남게 되었어요. 짧은 일정의 아쉬움도 있었지만, 숙소에서의 편안함, 짧게나눈 담소가 더 큰 아쉬움을 남겼네요. 다음에는 일정을 좀 길게잡아서 하루쯤은 그냥 Amelie와 집앞에 있는 브런치 집에서 밥한끼, 저녁에는 맥주한잔의 여유를 즐길 수 있는 일정을 꼭 잡고갈꺼에요. 너무 아쉬워요. 다음에 또 갈께요. 또 뵈요 ^^ 건강하세요.
column5: The itinerary of the last was Paris really a good memory as it was left. A short calendar of the well, but stay in the comfort of the short, or sight of our bigger baby was. Next, schedule a little way to catch one is just Cosy and the house in front of a brunch at home, Bob Moss, in the evening beer, glass of wine in the world to enjoy a certain to hold on tight and get thick. What will you do?. In the following or go. See you again? ^ ^ health.

column1: great value for money!
column5: great value for money!

column1: sentiar역 bonne nevelle 역 중간쯤에 위치하여 어디를 가든 문제 없습니다. 매우 깨끗한 방, 부엌, 욕실이 제공되며, 4일간 묶으면서 전혀 불편할것이 없었습니다. 창문이 커서 통풍도 잘되고 sentiar역 근처 슈퍼마켓, 레스토랑 등 편의시설이 있어 매우 편리했습니다.
column5: sentiar station bonne nevelle station mid-way to wherever you go no problem. Very clean room, kitchen, bathroom, and 4 days tied to no discomfort when it was not there. The window in gout are sentiar station near supermarket, restaurant and other facilities very convenient.

column1: Very large apartment for Paris. Also, very tidy.
column5: Very large apartment for Paris. Also, very tidy.

column1: Aulde var simpelthen så flink og meget sød og informativ omkring lejlighedens indretning :) Vi vil helt klart anbefale folk at bo i lejligheden, den er lille, men ligger helt perfekt i Marais og der var ingen støj overhovedet.
column5: Aulde was just so nice and very sweet and informative about the apartment's decor :) We will definitely recommend people to stay in the apartment, it is small, but is located perfectly in the Marais and there was no noise at all.

column1: Pengene værd
column5: Worth the money

column1: Hyggelig lejlighed og Perfekt lokation! Vi vil helt sikkert gerne komme igen:-)
column5: Cosy apartment and Perfect location! We would definitely like to come again:-)

column1:
Perfekt lejlighed, masser af plads, og super beliggenhed i bagerste del af ejendomen væk fra Rue de Rivoli og helt stille ud mod Roi de Sicile. 
Alt fungerede perfekt, fin plads til 5. 

Theo var utrolig sympatisk, hjælpsom og fleksibel. Vi kan på det varmeste anbefale lejligheden, håber at komme tilbage!!
column5:
Perfect apartment, plenty of space and super location in the rear part of the bathroom away from the Rue de Rivoli and very quiet out against the Roi de Sicile. 
Everything worked perfectly, room for 5. 

Theo was incredibly sympathetic, helpful and flexible. We can warmly recommend the apartment, hope to come back!!

column1: Bra, tyst lägenhet i mysiga kvarter.
column5: Great, quiet apartment in the cozy neighborhood.

column1: Vi følte os meget velkommen i familiens hjem. Thierry var særdeles hjælpsom. Selve lejligheden var perfekt til den store familie og terrassen med grill gjorde aftenerne ekstra hyggelige. Der var stille også om natten. Lejligheden ligger i et charmerende kvarter, med forrygende slagtere, oste- og grønthandlere.
column5: We felt us very welcome in the family home. Thierry was very helpful. The apartment itself was perfect for a large family and terrace with barbecue made the evenings extra cosy. There was quiet also at night. The apartment is located in a charming neighborhood, with awesome butchers, cheese and greengrocers.

column1: Lækker lille lejlighed. God placering
column5: Delicious little apartment. Good location

column1:
Lejligheden var klargjort til mindste detalje og var meget indbydende.
Før vores ankomst blev vi kontaktet flere gange for at alt kunne være på plads. Værten var yderst fleksibel og hjælpsom for at opfylde vore ønsker. 
Lejligheden leverede fuldt ud op til dens beskrivelse.
Nabolaget var roligt og behageligt.
Lejligheden skabte en fuldendt ramme for vores ophold på en uge i Paris.
column5:
The apartment was prepared to the smallest detail and was very welcoming.
Before our arrival we were contacted several times in order that everything might be in place. The host was extremely flexible and helpful to meet our requests. 
The apartment is delivered fully up to its description.
The neighborhood was quiet and pleasant.
The occasion created a perfect frame for our stay of one week in Paris.

column1:
Nathalies lejlighed er en virkelig god løsning, hvis man skal på ferie i PARIS og gerne vil bo lidt uden for centrum.
Lejligheden ligger i det indiske kvarter, som er et livligt men uproblematisk sted at bo - og i gå afstand til canal Saint Martin og spændende indkøbsgader i 18. arond. 
Metrostationen La Chapelle ligger 2 min fra gadedøren.
Nathalie giver i forvejen ( på engelsk) en meget tydelig beskrivelse af vejen dertil - og adgang til lejligheden - og selvom vi ikke mødte Nathalie under opholdet, var vi i tæt kontakt over email, både inden - og under vores ophold.
Lejligheden er hyggelig og ren , men lidt slidt visse steder, men det betød ikke noget efter det 1.døgn (-:
Dobbeltsengen er virkelig god!
Med denne rummelige lejlighed, får man virkelig “value for money”. Vi anbefaler meget gerne dette sted!
Bente og Flemming
Danmark
column5:
Nathalies apartment is a really good solution if you are on vacation in PARIS and would like to stay a little outside of the centre.
The apartment is located in the indian neighbourhood, which is a lively but uncomplicated place to stay and within walking distance to the canal Saint Martin, and exciting shopping streets in the 18. arond. 
La Chapelle metro station is 2 min from our front door.
Nathalie gives in advance ( in English) a very clear description of the way there - and access to the apartment - and even though we did not meet Nathalie during the stay, we were in close contact over email, both before and during our stay.
The apartment is cozy and clean but a little worn in some places, but it didn't mean anything after the 1.day (-:
The double bed is really good!
With this spacious apartment, you really get “value for money”. We recommend very like this place!
Bente and Flemming
Denmark

column1: Lejligheden ligger meget centralt i charmerende kvarter, fyldt med caféer, restauranter og mange specialforretninger. Gode forbindelser med offentlig trafik til og fra lufthavnen. I køkkenet var der alt hvad vi havde brug for, ligesom der var ny vaskemaskine og tørremulighed. Elevator og aflåst opgang. God kommunikation og vi anbefaler lejligheden og kommer gerne igen.
column5: The apartment is very centrally located in a charming neighborhood, filled with cafes, restaurants and many specialty shops. Good connections with public traffic to and from the airport. In the kitchen there was everything we needed, like there was a new washing machine and drying facilities. Elevator and locked out of the tower. Good communication and we recommend the apartment and would be happy to come again.

column1: Nathalie var hurtig til at svare, og indtjekning/ udtjekning var nemt. Lille men hyggelig, og med en lille altan.
column5: Nathalie was quick to respond, and check-in/ check-out was easy. Small but cosy, and with a small balcony.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed centralt i Paris. Vi havde nogle dejlige dage og når vi trak os tilbage fra de Parisiske gader var roen i lejligheden behagelig. Alt fungerede lejligheden fremstod ren og pæn.
column5: Lovely apartment in central Paris. We had some lovely days and when we withdrew from the Parisian streets were calm in the apartment comfortable. Everything worked, the apartment appeared clean and neat.

column1:
Julie havde givet os en nem og overskueligt vejbeskrivelse til lejligheden. Lejligheden var super hyggelig med en skøn udsigt. Vi blev mødt af en super sød værtinde, som havde sørget for andet var lidt morgenmad.
Lejligheden ligger i et lækkert kvarter med hyggelige små gader, gode muligheder for indkøb og i gå afstand til Sacré Coeur.

Vi nød vores ferie i Paris. Og kan klart anbefale Julies lejlighed og Julie som værtinde.
column5:
Julie had given us an easy and clear directions to the apartment. The apartment was super cozy with a beautiful view. We were greeted by a super sweet hostess, had arranged for was some breakfast.
The apartment is located in a nice neighborhood with quaint streets, good opportunities for shopping and within walking distance to the Sacré Coeur.

We enjoyed our vacation in Paris. And can definitely recommend Julie's apartment and Julie as the hostess.

column1: Melanie var en super sød og imødekommende vært, og nem at få fat i. Boligen var som beskrevet, og skøn til en familie på fem, den levede op til vores forventninger. Masser af hyggelige caféer og butikker i nærheden. Tæt på offenlig transport, så man kan komme nemt og hurtigt rundt i Paris. Vi kommer gerne igen.
column5: Melanie was super sweet and welcoming host, and easy to get hold of. The accommodation was as described, and estimates for a family of five, it lived up to our expectations. Plenty of cosy cafes and shops nearby. Close to offenlig transport, so you can move easily and quickly around Paris. We will gladly come again.

column1:
체크인 하루 전, 에어비앤비 숙소에 문제가 생겨 같은 건물에 있는 호텔방에 묵게 되었습니다.
호텔방은 매우 작았지만 매일 청소하기 때문에 깨끗했고, 아침식사도 함께 제공해 주었습니다.
호텔 직원들은 매우 친절했습니다.
column5:
Check-in the day before, and Airbnb listings in the same building in the hotel room in silence.
Hotel room was very small but cleaned daily because it was clean, and The Breakfast also comes with.
The hotel staff were all very friendly.

column1:
Beskrivelsen af boligen er helt i orden; dog er kattens tilstedeværelse meget markant, helst vil katten være i det rum som er til lejeren.
Claire er venlig, men havde dog taget fejl af vores ankomsttidspunkt; det gav 1-2 timers frustration kl. 21,30 -23,30 inden vi fik telefonisk kontakt.
column5:
The description of the dwelling is completely in order; however, the cat's presence very significantly, any time the cat will be in the space which is to the tenant.
Claire is friendly, but had made a mistake in our arrival time; it gave 1-2 hours of frustration at. 21.30 the -23,30 before we got the telephone contact.

column1: Amazing helpful owner.
column5: Amazing helpful owner.

column1:
Mange tak for et dejligt ophold i en fin lejlighed og i et superskønt område med masser af hyggeligt miljø.
Både før vi ankom og da vi var kommet, var Elsa og Adrien meget hjælpsomme med forslag til transport, restauranter mm - samtidig var de meget flexible mht ankomst/afrejse tider mm.
Hvis vi kommer til Paris igen, vil vi helt sikkert gerne bo i samme område og samme lejlighed :-)
column5:
Many thanks for a nice stay in a nice apartment and in a superskønt area with lots of cozy environment.
Both before we arrived and when we were come, was Elsa and Adrien are very helpful with suggestions for transportation, restaurants mm - at the same time, they were very flexible in attending to the arrival/departure times etc.
If we come to Paris again, we will definitely like to stay in the same area and the same apartment :-)

column1: tres bon voyage
column5: very good trip

column1:
Min datter og jeg havde en fantastisk oplevelse ved at leje Floriane`s lejlighed.
Lejligheden ligger helt perfekt. Hyggeligt kvarter og tæt på Metro.
Lejligheden var super fin og ren ligesom beskrivelsen. Floriane var den helt perfekte vært - sød, imødekommende og meget hjælpsom.
Hun havde tænkt på alt. Når vi skal til Paris igen - bliver det 100 procent hos Floriane igen -hvis der er ledigt.
PERFEKT :-)
Malene / København
column5:
My daughter and I had a great experience by hiring Floriane's apartment.
The apartment is absolutely perfect. Pleasant neighbourhood and close to Metro.
The apartment was super nice and clean like the description. Floriane was the perfect host - sweet, friendly and very helpful.
She had thought of everything. When we go to Paris again - it gets 100 percent of Floriane again-if there is a vacancy.
PERFECT :-)
Malene / Copenhagen

column1: Vi havde et perfekt ophold i Floriane's lejlighed og kan varmt anbefale den til andre. Lejligheden er helt som beskrevet, lys, velindrettet, ren og beliggende i et af vores favorit steder i Paris. Floriane havde tænkt på alt for at byde os velkommen og alt var helt i top.
column5: We had a perfect stay at Floriane's apartment and can highly recommend it to others. The apartment is absolutely as described, light, well-appointed, clean and located in one of our favorite places in Paris. Floriane had thought of everything to welcome us and everything was absolutely top notch.

column1: Vi havde en god oplevelse af at leje denne lejlighed som er lille men meget enkel og smagfuldt indrettet. Svarer til beskrivelsen. Vi var 3 i lejligheden, det kan lade sig gøre, men mest optimalt med 2 personer. Udsigten til eifeltårnet perfekt. Rent og pænt. Værten svarede hurtigt på henvendelser og var rigtig hjælpsom og fleksibel med at få nøgle og aflevere lejlighed, beskrivelse af hvordan man kommer fra lufthavn til lejlighed,meget nemt. Overraskede med hjemmelavet suppe i køleskabet
column5: We had a good experience of renting this apartment which is small but very simple and tastefully decorated. Corresponds to the description. We were 3 in the apartment, it can be done, but best with 2 people. The prospect of eifeltårnet perfect. Clean and neat. The host responded quickly to inquiries and was very helpful and flexible with getting the key and returning the apartment, the description of how to get from the airport to the apartment,very easy. Surprised with homemade soup in the fridge

column1: En skøn lejlighed med en helt fantastisk beliggenhed. Rue Daguerre er en dejlig markedsgade fyldt med lækre butikker. Vi kommer meget gerne tilbage til Rue Daguerre og Catherines lejlighed.
column5: A great apartment with a fantastic location. Rue Daguerre is a lovely markedsgade filled with delicious shops. We will very much like to return to the Rue Daguerre and catherine's apartment.

column1: Som vi løbende har tilkendegivet overfor Francois, så har vi på alle måder nydt vores ophold i hans skønne lejlighed. Alt har fungeret og selv med en aldersspredning fra 19  - 86år, så alle ubetinget enige om, at den gode setting med vue til Sacre Cours i den grad har understøttet vores 5 skønne dage i Paris :-)
column5: As we have continuously stated opposite Francois, we have all ways enjoyed our stay in his lovely apartment. Everything has worked out and even with a spread of ages from 19 - 86år, so all unconditionally agree, to the good setting with vue to the Sacre Cours in the extent have supported our 5 wonderful days in Paris :-)

column1: Tak til Pauline og Alex for lån af deres dejlige lejlighed. Vi fik fin hjælp over mail og ved Alex da vi fik nøglerne til både at finde vej og finde parkering. Lejligheden var perfekt for at opleve Montmartre, og vi NØD at kigge ud over Paris fra det store stue-vindue og at vi kunne se Sacre Coeur fra toilet-vinduet!
column5: Thank you to Pauline and Alex for the loan of their lovely apartment. We were fine using the over email and by Alex when we got the keys to both to find and to find parking. The apartment was perfect for discovering Montmartre, and we ENJOYED looking out over Paris from the large living room window and we could see the Sacre Coeur from the toilet window!

column1: Louis var en god vært, fleksibel med vores forsinkede ankomsttid og meget hjælpsom generelt, også i forhold til at anbefale gode steder at gå ud i området osv. Lejligheden var lille men hyggelig og der var alt vi havde brug for. Altanen var super lækker med sol og fin udsigt over den hyggelige gade. Beliggenheden var perfekt, tæt på butikker, caféer og metro. Det eneste minus for os var, at der ikke var helt rent, da vi kom, men ellers alt i alt en god oplevelse.
column5: Louis was a good host, flexible with our late arrival time and very helpful in general, in relation also to recommend good places to go out in the field, etc. The apartment was small but cosy and there was everything we needed. The balcony was super delicious with the sun and fine views over the quaint street. The location was perfect, close to shops, cafes and the metro. The only minus for us was that there was not quite clean when we arrived, but otherwise all in all a good experience.

column1:
Leticia var rigtig sød og gjorde det let for os at checke ind. 
Vi nød vores ophold i hendes lejlighed der er lille men har hvad man har brug for. Tæt på hyggelige restauranter og seværdigheder.
column5:
Leticia was very sweet and made it easy for us to check in. 
We enjoyed our stay in her apartment which is small but has what you need. Close to cosy restaurants and attractions.

column1: Alles bestens, unkomplizierte Kommunikation, ruhige Wohnung, super gegend!
column5: Everything was perfect, easy communication, quiet apartment, great area!

column1: Delightful
column5: Delightful

column1:
Vi havde 4 gode dage i lejligheden, der er rummelig og flot og har alle fornødenheder. Vi var 2 voksne og 2 børn.
Den ligger i et hyggeligt område, tæt på kanal St. Martin, og der er masser af indkøbsmuligheder og restauranter af alle slags.
Der er kort (7-800 m) til både Gare d L'est og Republique, hvorfra der går mange Metro linier.
Tak til Nathalie, der svarer hurtigt på alt og er meget hjælpsom.
Mvh Søren og familie
column5:
We had 4 good days in the apartment, which is spacious and beautiful and has all the necessities. We were 2 adults and 2 children.
It is located in a pleasant area, close to canal St. Martin, and there are plenty of shopping facilities and restaurants of all kinds.
There is a short (7-800 m) to both the Gare d L'est and the Republique, where you can take many Metro lines.
Thank you to Nathalie, who respond quickly to everything and is very helpful.
Mvh Søren and family

column1: Super sted, med masser spisesteder i nærheden.
column5: Super place, with lots of eateries nearby.

column1: Rigtig fin lejlighed i et hyggeligt kvarter. Tydeligvis en udlejningslejlighed og ikke et privat hjem. Dejlig altan med god udsigt. Alt nyt og i meget fin stand. Hvis man ankommer til Paris med bil er det fantastisk med en privat parkeringskælder. Eneste minus er at der er ca. 10 minutters gang til metro (togstationen 500 meter der fra er besværlig og har langsomme forbindelser).
column5: Really nice apartment in a pleasant neighbourhood. Obviously a rental apartment and not a private home. Lovely balcony with good views. Everything new and in very fine condition. If you are arriving to Paris by car, it is fantastic with a private underground parking garage. Only minus is that there are approx. A 10-minute walk to the metro (train station 500 metres from the is cumbersome and has slow connections).

column1: Hyggeligt lille studio i hjertet af Paris. Vi kunne gå til alle seværdigheder og brugte ikke metroen en eneste gang. Perfekt base, når man vil nyde byen mest muligt.
column5: Cosy little studio in the heart of Paris. We could walk to all the sights and used the metro a single time. Perfect base when you want to enjoy the city as much as possible.

column1: Fred var meget venlig og imødekommende, og vi havde en god kommunikation før og under opholdet. Lejligheden er utroligt central og godt beliggende. Den er lille og hyggelig og med en god udsigt over Paris. Jeg kan kun anbefale folk at bo der.
column5: Fred was very friendly and welcoming, and we had a good communication before and during the stay. The apartment is incredibly central and well located. It is small and cosy and with a good view of Paris. I can only recommend people to stay there.

column1: Alex sin leilighet er et funn, hvis man er i Paris og ikke MÅ bo på hotell. Den befinner seg nord i byen, 10 min fra livlige Montmartre, Sacre Coeur og Pigalle. Metroen (holdeplass Guy Mochet) stopper rett utenfor, og det er to overfranske frokostkafeer 10 m fra inngangen, hvor morgenens petit dejeuner kan inntas. Selv om gata nedenfor er sterkt trafikkert, hører man lite gjennom de lydisolerte vinduene i fjerde etasje. Vakker liten stue med tregulv, rent og ryddig, en deilig dobbeltseng og et innbydende bad - hva mer trenger du? Dette er som å få en suite på hotellet, men slippe unna med prisen for et enkeltrom. Her kommer vi tilbake, hvis vi reiser til Paris igjen!
column5: Alex's apartment is a discovery, if one is in Paris and not HAVE to stay in a hotel. It is located north of the city, 10 min from the lively Montmartre district, the Sacre Coeur and Pigalle. The metro (stop Guy Mochet) stops right outside and there are two overfranske frokostkafeer 10 m from the entrance, where the morning's petit dejeuner can be taken. Even though the street below is heavily trafficked, you can hear it a little through the soundproof windows of the fourth floor. Beautiful small living room with parquet floor, clean and neat, a nice double bed and an inviting bathroom - what more do you need? This is like getting a suite at the hotel, but get away with the price for a single room. Here we come back, if we travel to Paris again!

column1: 公寓在18区,离爱墙和圣心大教堂都很近,最近正是世界杯,所以周边的餐馆都热闹极了｡离地铁站也很近,五､六分钟的距离｡就是楼层还蛮高的,在五楼,其实相当于中国的六楼,没有电梯,所以如果带着大行李箱的要考虑一下,我们两个人一个大箱子感觉还好,可以一起抬｡总体来说性价比真的不错了｡ps: Denis家的客厅阳台可以俯瞰巴黎美景哦,还可以看到埃菲尔铁塔,风景十分不错｡
column5: Apartment in the 18th arrondissement,away from the love wall and the Sacre Coeur are very close,recently it is the World Cup,so restaurants are lively and fantastic location. From the metro station is also very close,five -, and six-minute distance from the apartment. Is the floor is also pretty high,on the fifth floor,in fact the Chinese equivalent of the sixth floor,no Elevator,so if carrying a large suitcase to consider it,the two of us a big box feeling all right,can work together to lift the House. Overall for the price really good as well. ps: Denis is home to the living room balcony overlooking Paris Beauty Oh,you can also see the Eiffel Tower,the scenery is very nice as well.

column1:
Vi følte os meget velkomne :-)
Lejligheden var helt perfekt og vi elskede kvarteret.
Klare anbefalinger herfra.
column5:
We felt us very welcome :-)
The apartment was absolutely perfect and we loved the neighborhood.
Clear recommendations from here.

column1: Perfekt til en weekend i Paris
column5: Perfect for a weekend in Paris

column1: Dejlig lille bolig med rigtig god beliggenhed.
column5: Nice little home with great location.

column1: Central placering. Gode indkøbsmuligheder. Roligt og lyst værelse. Rent. Dog lidt trangt: Svært at få plads til sig selv med kufferter og tasker. Nemt at få kontakt med udlejer.
column5: Central location. Good shopping opportunities. Quiet and bright room. Clean. However, a little cramped: it's Hard to get space for itself with suitcases and bags. Easy to get in touch with the landlord.

column1:
Min kone og jeg havde en super dejlig 1. Oplevelse med Marie-pascale, hun var sød og rar, god til at komme med gode råd, og spørge ind til om vi havde brug for hjælp...
Hvis i vil bo centralt i Paris, er dette helt sikkert stedet..
column5:
My wife and I had a super nice 1. Experience with the Marie-pascale, she was sweet and kind, good to get advice, and ask if we needed help...
If you want to stay centrally in Paris, this is definitely the site..

column1: Rigtig god beliggenhed
column5: Rigtig god beliggenhed

column1: 숙소까지는 지하철을 이용하고 걸어갔다. 주변은 아파트들이 있지만 대부분 오피스여서 밤에는 매우 조용하다. 집까지 엘리베이터가 없어서 불편했다. 집 분위기가 좋았다. 세탁기도있고 주방도 있어서 간단한 음식은 할 수 있다. 깔끔하고 와이파이도 잘 되었는데, 난방은 잘 되지 않아서 추웠고 따뜻한 물이 잘 나오는 편은 아니다. Arnaud가 친절해서 좋았다.
column5: Stay until the use of the subway and walked. Around the apartment there are but for the most part the office at night, very quiet. Home until there is no Elevator in uncomfortable. The house atmosphere was great. Washing machine and kitchen in a simple food can be. Clean and Wi-Fi was fine, but the heating is well not the cold and warm water, well that comes easy. Arnaud with were very nice.

column1: Jeg og mine 2 piger overnattede i Anetas lejlighed og det vil vi rigtig gerne gøre igen hvis vi igen skal til Paris. Vi havde en rigtig fin kommunikation og hun hjalp, hvor hun kunne. Den ligger meget tæt på en Metrostation - 1 minut, hvilket var rigtig dejligt og den ligger også tæt på Eiffeltårnet - ca. 20 minutters gang. Det er et stille og roligt kvarter. Jeg kan varmt anbefale Anetas lejlighed.
column5: I and my 2 girls slept in Anetas apartment and we would really like to do again if we back to Paris. We had a really nice communication and she helped where she could. It is very close to a Metro station - 1 minute, which was really nice and the hotel is also close to the Eiffel tower - approx. A 20-minute walk. It is a quiet and calm district. I can highly recommend Anetas apartment.

column1: Det var super fedt at bo i en lejlighed, der var et rigtigt hjem! Vi var 2 voksne og 2 børn på 10 og 13, og vi nød det alle. Det var ikke klinisk som på et hotel, men lejligheden havde masser af personlighed, hyggelig og hjemlig indretning + en internetforbindelse, der var helt i top (hvilket børnene især satte meget pris på) - alt i alt skøn lejlighed!! Kvarteret er helt perfekt - selve gade er rimeligt stille, men lige om hjørnet er masser af caféer med liv og unge mennesker, der nyder sommeraftenerne (+ tips fra Sabine til hvor man kunne gå hen). Meget parisisk og ikke mange turister. Og metroen er tæt ved, så der er ingen problemer med at komme rundt. Alt i alt et fantastisk ophold, som jeg kun kan anbefale!!!
column5: It was super cool to stay in an apartment was a real home! We were 2 adults and 2 children aged 10 and 13, and we enjoyed it all. It was not clinical as in a hotel, but the apartment had plenty of character, cosy and homely decor + an internet connection, which was right at the top (which the children especially valued a lot) - all in all great apartment!! The neighborhood is absolutely perfect - the street is reasonably quiet, but just around the corner are plenty of cafes with life and young people who enjoy summer evenings (+ tips from the Sabine to which one could go). Very parisian and not many tourists. And the metro is close by, so there are no problems with getting around. All in all a great stay, which I can only recommend!!!

column1:
En dejlig og ærlig lille toværelses lejlighed med det der skal til for at få en ferie til at fungere. Alle fornødenheder er til stede, og lejligheden fremtræder ren og pæn. Godt beliggende i forhold til Metro, restauranter og supermarkeder.
Luis er en fantastisk vært, der er behjælpelig med alt. Svarer lynhurtigt på mails, giver værdifuld information om steder og muligheder, links til seværdigheder, forhåndskøb af entrébilletter osv. Han fandt derudover rigtig god information om spacialøl i Paris.
Og så hentede han os endog i lufthavnen, og vi fik dermed en endnu bedre viden om Paris i vores snak under transporten.
Vi ville gerne vælge såvel Luis som hans lejlighed en anden gang.
column5:
A nice and honest small one bedroom apartment with it to get a holiday work. All the necessities are present, and the apartment appears clean and neat. Well located to the Metro, restaurants and supermarkets.
Luis is a great host who is helpful with everything. Responds quickly to emails, gives valuable information about the places and opportunities, links to attractions, advance purchase of entrance tickets, etc. He found moreover very good information about spacialøl in Paris.
And so he fetched us even in the airport, and we got an even better knowledge of Paris in our talk during the transport.
We would like to choose as well Luis as his apartment a second time.

column1:
Vi var 5 personer i lejligheden i alderen 65-72 og vi havde et dejligt ophold. 3 soveværelser, 1 køkken/opholdsstue samt et lille badeværelse.
Hverken mere eller mindre end lovet. Vi kunne nok have ønsket os et lidt større badeværelse (eller 2), men det er ikke muligt indenfor rammerne af huset.
Værtsparret boede lige op af det annex vi havde booket og var enormt venlige og imødekommende. Dagligt kontaktede Alejandra os og spurgte om vi manglede noget, eller om hun i øvrigt kunne gøre noget for os.
column5:
We were 5 persons in the apartment aged 65-72 and we had a lovely stay. 3 bedrooms, 1 kitchen/living room and a small bathroom.
Neither more nor less than promised. We could probably have wished for a slightly larger bathroom (or 2), but it is not possible within the framework of the house.
The hosts lived right up by the lodge we had booked and were enormously friendly and accommodating. Daily contacted Alejandra us and asked if we were missing anything, or whether she could do something for us.

column1: Perfekte Unterkunft!
column5: Perfect Accommodation!

column1:
Vi blev modtaget af en meget venlig vært og introduceret for boligen og kvarteret.
Skøn bolig helt nyrenoveret og tilbagetrukket i en gård, så absolut ingen støj overhovedet før man kom ud på gaden, hvor der var et fantastisk levende miljø, barer, restauranter, musik og masser af unge mennesker.
Beliggenheden ved Place de la Bastille er perfekt for bl.a. metroen.
Kan kun sige, at næste gang vi kommer til Paris så bliver dette vores bolig.
Tak til Jimmy
Eivind og elinborg
column5:
We were greeted by a very friendly host and introduced to the dwelling and the neighbourhood.
The discretion of the accommodation is completely renovated and set back in a courtyard, so absolutely no noise whatsoever before it came out on the street, where there was a fantastic living environment, bars, restaurants, music and lots of young people.
The location at the Place de la Bastille is perfect for the bl.a. metro.
Can only say that the next time we come to Paris so this becomes our dwelling.
Thanks to Jimmy
Eivind and elinborg

column1: Super fedt område, vi kunne gå til alting. Lejligheden var lækker, ren og pæn. Lidt mindre end forventet. Vi var glade og tilfredse!
column5: Super cool area, we could walk to everything. The apartment was great, clean and neat. A little less than expected. We were happy and satisfied!

column1: Daniel var meget fleksibel ved ankomst og afgang. Vi fik en meget detaljeret beskrivelse af hvordan vi nemmest kom ind i lejligheden - og praktiske detaljer vedrørende indretning af lejligheden. Der var adgang til køleskab med øl, æg, yoghurt m.v. samt kaffe og the. Lejligheden ligger meget centralt i forhold til at opleve Paris.
column5: Daniel was very flexible on arrival and departure. We got a very detailed description of how we easily got into the apartment - and the practical details relating to the furnishing of the apartment. There was access to a fridge with beer, eggs, yoghurt m.v. as well as coffee and tea. The apartment is located very centrally in relation to experience Paris.

column1:
크리스의 집은 모든 것이 완벽했습니다. 개성있는 소품과 가구로 꾸며진 집이 멋스러웠고 지하철역, 버스 정류장과 가까워서 시내로 이동하기도 좋았습니다.루브르박물관까지 20분, 에펠탑까지도 35분이면 충분히 갈 수 있었습니다. 아파트 건물의 보안도 철저하고 주변 치안도 좋았습니다. 

호스트인 크리스를 직접 만나지는 못했지만 그의 친구가 친절하게 숙소에 대한 설명을 해주었고, 크리스도 메시지와 이메일을 통해 불편한 것이 없는지 수시로 체크해주었습니다.  다시 파리에 와도 꼭 이용하고 싶은 집과 좋은 호스트였습니다.
column5:
Chris ' house everything was perfect. Personal props and furniture decorated the house with was and the subway station, bus station and close to the city to go to.The Louvre Museum, 20 minutes to the Eiffel Tower, even 35 minutes is enough, you can go. Apartment building security is also thoroughly and around policing. 

Host Chris directly, but did not but his friends kindly stay, for the explanation, Chris a message via email with discomfort that is not often checked. Back to Paris and you want to the house and a good host.

column1:
Vores vaert var ikke selv hjemme til at modtage os, men havde faaet en  veninde til at vise os til rette. Alting fungerede som beskrevet, og alle faciliteter var som de skulle vaere.
Det lille hus er beliggende i en rolig baggaard. Lige udenfor er der et helt fantastisk marked med frisk frugt og groent, som har aabent tirsdag til soendag. I de omkringliggende gader er der masser af smaa lokale cafeer, restauranter, bistroer og smaa hyggelige gader. Der er masser af muligheder for baade indkoeb og shopping i naeromraadet.
Huset er beliggende lokalt i Bastille kvarteret, og man kan sagtens gaa til f.eks. Marais og Notre Dame. Der er ogsaa en Metro station under 5 minutter vaek.
Huset er velegnet til f.eks. en familie med lidt stoerre boern.
column5:
Our vaert was not even at home to receive us, but had gotten a friend to show us to the right. Everything worked as described, and all facilities were as they should be.
The small house is situated in a quiet baggaard. Just outside there is a fantastic market with fresh fruit and green, which open Tuesday to Sunday. In the surrounding streets there are plenty of small local cafes, restaurants, bistros and small cosy streets. There are plenty of options for both the purchase and shopping in the naeromraadet.
The house is located locally in the Bastille neighbourhood, and you can easily go to f.ex. The Marais and Notre Dame. There is also a Metro station less than 5 minutes away.
The house is suitable to f.ex. a family with a little larger children.

column1: Sarah havde sørget for drikkevarer og lidt mad i køleskabet så vi kunne nyde ferien med det samme. Lejligheden var nem at finde ud fra Sarahs anvisninger og levede mere end op til forventningerne. Dejligt og stille nabolag, charmerende lejlighed med personligt aftryk. Kan varmt anbefales.
column5: Sarah had arranged for drinks and a little food in the fridge so we could enjoy the holidays with the same. The apartment was easy to find out from sarah's instructions and lived more than up to expectations. Nice and quiet neighborhood, charming apartment with a personal stamp. Can be highly recommended.

column1:
Præcis og god kommunikation. Nemt at finde.
Lejligheden var ren og svarede fint til billederne. Mange små detaljer, som telefon oplader og Nespresso kapsler gør at man umiddelbart føler sig hjemme.

Kvarteret er stille lige omkring lejligheden men livligt et stykke væk. Mange små supermarkeder og restauranter tæt på.
column5:
Exactly and good communication. Easy to find.
The apartment was clean and corresponded perfectly to the images. Many small details, such as the phone charger and Nespresso capsules make you immediately feel at home.

The neighborhood is quiet and just around the apartment but lively a piece away. Many small supermarkets and restaurants close by.

column1:
Guillemette var utrolig hjælpsom ift. at imødekomme mine og mine venners ønske om at få lov at bo fire mennesker i lejligheden, selvom den er annonceret til to mennesker. Hun var ærlig omkring, at der måske ikke var den bedste plads til fire mennesker - men at det kunne lade sig gøre. Hun sørgede for at der var nok dyner, puder, håndklæder osv., og hvis hun ikke selv havde nok, sørgede hun for at give os besked om dette, så vi selv kunne tage det med. 

Derudover var Guillemette sød til at give en grundig beskrivelse af, hvordan vi skulle komme til og ind i lejligheden, så det oplevede vi ingen problemer med! 

Lejligheden var lille men fin, og ligger i et rigtig hyggeligt område med en smuk udsigt. Det er nemt at komme til og fra lejligheden, da der ligger en metro meget tæt på. 

Mine venner og jeg havde en rigtig dejlig tur til Paris, og vi kan anbefale Guillemette som vært :-)
column5:
Guillemette was very helpful and always willing. to meet my and my friends ' desire to be allowed to stay four people in the apartment, even though it is advertised for two people. She was honest about that, that maybe was not the best room for four people - but that it could be done. She made sure there were enough blankets, pillows, towels, etc., and if she did not even had enough, she made sure to notify us of this so we could take it with. 

In addition, there was Guillemette sweet to give a thorough description of how we should come to and check in the apartment, so we experienced no problems with! 

The apartment was small but fine, and is in a really nice area with a beautiful view. It is easy to get to and from the apartment, as there is a metro very close. 

My friends and I had a really nice trip to Paris and we can recommend Guillemette as the host :-)

column1: Lejligheden er beliggende i et dejligt kvarter med både butikker, forretninger, cafe’er, skønne boulevarder og nærhed til metroen. Den er hyggelig, veludstyret, ren og meget parisisk. Egner sig fint til 3 personer. 4.sal kræver på en relativ smal trappe, at man er mobil, ligesom man må udvise smidighed for at benytte det diminutive toilet, men det kan være en charme mere og trækker ikke ned på helhedsindtrykket af en ualmindelig dejlig og funktionel lejlighed med en meget fin beliggenhed.
column5: The apartment is located in a nice neighborhood with shops, stores, cafe's, beautiful boulevards and the proximity to the subway. It is cozy, well equipped, clean and very parisian. Lends itself nicely to 3 persons. 4.floor requires on a relatively narrow set of stairs, that is mobile, just like you must have the flexibility to use the diminutive toilet, but it can be a charm more and do not draw down on the general appearance of an extraordinarily beautiful and functional apartment with a very good location.

column1:
Mine døtre og jeg havde en fantastisk tur til Paris , hvor vi boede i Roberts lejlighed. Tusind tak til Laure som stod for al det praktiske omkring lejligheden, højt serviceniveau, både før og efter ankomst, en rigtig god oplevelse. Beliggenheden er perfekt. 
Kan varm anbefales.
column5:
My daughters and I had a fantastic trip to Paris , where we stayed in Roberts apartment. Many thanks to Laure who stood for all the practical around the apartment, high level of service, both before and after the arrival, a really good experience. The location is perfect. 
Can warm is recommended.

column1:
På ankomstdagen var vi først fremme ved lejligheden kl 22.30, men det var intet problem; værten ventede på os ved lejligheden, da vi kom frem, og lod os vide, at vi endeligt måtte kontakte ham, hvis vi havde spørgsmål. Kommunikationen har hele vejen igennem fungeret perfekt; har vi haft spørgsmål til noget, har vi fået svar i løbet af kort tid. 
Lejligheden ligger i et hyggeligt område lige ved siden af den smukke Luxembourg have og tæt på latinerkvarteret og fantastiske Marais.  Der er gåafstand til flere af de store seværdigheder i Paris. Man skal igennem to døre, for at komme ind i baggården, hvor lejligheden ligger, hvilket giver en følelse af tryghed. Beliggenheden i baggården gør også, at der er fred og ro.
Lejligheden ligger lige ved Luxembourg station, hvor RER B toget fra Orly lufthavn kører direkte til.  
Overordnet har lejligheden været et godt bud på et hjem i de 4 dage, vi var i Paris!
column5:
On the day of arrival we were first promoting at the apartment at 22.30, but it was no problem; the host was waiting for us at the apartment when we arrived, and let us know that we finally had to contact him if we had questions. The communication has worked perfectly; we've had a question for something, we've got the answer in the course of a short time. 
The apartment is situated in a cosy area right next to the beautiful Luxembourg gardens and is close to the Latin quarter and the amazing Marais. Walking distance to several of the major sights in Paris. You need to go through two doors to get into the backyard, where the apartment is located, which provides a sense of security. The location in the backyard also makes that there is peace and tranquility.
The apartment is located right by the Luxembourg station, where the RER B train from Orly airport go directly to the. 
Overall, the apartment has been a good bid on a home in the 4 days we were in Paris!

column1: Meget imødekommende og hjælpsom vært, super beliggenhed i dejlig stille gård. Desværre virkede ventilationen i kælder-værelset ikke mens vi var der, så der lugtede noget muggent.
column5: Very friendly and helpful host, super location in the lovely quiet courtyard. Unfortunately worked the ventilation in the basement room while we were there, so it smelled something fishy.

column1:
Centralt beliggende studio Lejlighed meget tæt på Les Halles. Husk ørepropper til om natten da lejligheden ligger midt i minefeltet. 
Super gode restauranter ca 400 meterfra området
column5:
Centrally located studio Apartment very close to Les Halles. Remember earplugs for the night because the apartment is located in the middle of the minefield. 
Super good restaurants about 400 meterfra area

column1:
Lejligheden ligger i et dejligt centralt område i gå-afstand til både Montmartre og Notre Dame. Der er mange gode café'er og indkøbsmuligheder i området.
Lejligheden er som beskrevet. Toilettet er MEGET lille. Lejligheden kan rumme 4 personer, men er mest optimal til 2 personer.
Terrassen er absolut fantastisk - Desværre slog vejret om til koldere vejr lige før vi kom, så det var begrænset hvor meget vi kunne bruge terrassen, men med ophold i midt oktober måned, havde vi nu ikke forventet at bruge den så meget. En sommeraften på terrassen efter en lang dag i Paris, kan jeg forestille mig, må være fantastisk.
Elise havde desværre travlt mens vi var i Paris, så vi mødte hende ikke. Ved ankomst blev vi mødt af en af Elise's venner, som viste os til rette.
column5:
The apartment is in a great central area within walking distance to both Montmartre and Notre Dame. There are many good cafe's and shopping facilities in the area.
The apartment is as described. The toilet is VERY small. The apartment can accommodate 4 persons, but is most optimal for 2 persons.
The terrace is absolutely stunning - Unfortunately beat the weather changed to colder weather just before we came, so it was limited how much we could use the terrace, but with stay in the middle the month of October, we had now not expected to use it so much. A summer evening on the terrace after a long day in Paris, I can only imagine, must be great.
Elise had unfortunately busy while we were in Paris, so we met her not. Upon arrival we were greeted by one of Elise's friends, who showed us to the right.

column1: Een fijn verblijf, goed ingerichte kamer, functioneel en schoon, fijne gastheer .
column5: A fine stay, well furnished room, functional and clean, fine host .

column1: 파리여행은. 처음이었는데 아주 친절하게 해주셔서 좋았습니다 . 다만. 아쉬운점은. 위치였습니다. 몽마르뜨 언덕은. 아주 근처에 있었지만. belleville 역 주변은. 차이나타운 같은 느낌이라. 밤에 나가기가. 좀. 불편합니다. 왠지 동양인들이 돌아다니면. 중국인같이 보기때문에 위치는 그닥 비추천입니다. 가격대비 나머지 부분은 훌륭했습니다.
column5: Paris. The first time was very friendly and very helpful . Just. Perhaps. Location. Montmartre hill. Very near there was a but. belleville around the station. Chinatown feels like. At night I have. A little. Uncomfortable. Vaguely Oriental look. The Chinese look like because of the location and dislike. Price the rest was great.

column1: Vi skrev sammen med vært så vi følte os velkommen og de oplyste os om div.praktiske ting. Boligen passede til beskrivelsen. Nabolaget var super godt roligt, indkøb, spisesteder og tæt på seværdigheder samt haver og parker og floden.
column5: We wrote together with the host so we felt us welcome and informed us about the div.practical things. The accommodation matched the description. The neighborhood was super quiet, shopping, dining and close to attractions such as gardens and parks and the river.

column1: Thanks for having us! :-)
column5: Thanks for having us! :-)

column1: 메트로와 에펠탑과 가까워 편했고 근처에 k-market가 있어 자주 갔다. 샤워실 문이 쫌 고장나 불편했지만 이용하는데 어려움은 없었다.
column5: Metro and the Eiffel Tower, and hotel near k-market have frequently went. Shower door popped and discomfort, but this is new.

column1:
Hyggelig hjemlig lejlighed i hyggeligt,roligt kvarter, med gode indkøbsmuligheder, og metro lige ved siden af= super-nemt at komme omkring.
Sød og omsorgsfuld vært, som gør hvad hun kan for at hjælpe med spørgsmål. Svarer dejlig hurtigt på alle henvendelser!
column5:
Nice homely apartment in nice,quiet neighborhood, with good shopping, and the metro right next to the= super-easy to get around.
Sweet and caring host, who does what she can to help with questions. Corresponds nice quickly to all inquiries!

column1: 좋은 위치, 친절한 호스트. 혼자쓰기 좋은 숙소다.
column5: Good location, friendly host. Alone writing a good stay.

column1: Rigti god beliggenhed tæt på alt. Virkelig rolige omgivelser og dejlig lejlighed. Vi nød virkelig vores dage i Paris med en dejlig base.
column5: Rigti good location, close to everything. Really quiet surroundings and nice apartment. We really enjoyed our days in Paris with a nice base.

column1: 숙소 정말 좋았습니다. 넓고 자리도 좋았어요
column5: The hostel was really good. Spacious and good.

column1: Tak for nogle dejlige dage. Skøn og charmerende lejlighed med rigtig god beliggenhed.
column5: Thank you for some lovely days. Estimates and charming apartment with very good location.

column1: Praktisk og smukt huset. Tæt på """"Gare de l'est"""" & metro & canal St Martin. Stephane & hans kone er meget øde og hjælpsomme. Dejligt ophold.
column5: Practical and beautiful house. Close to """"Gare de l'est"""" & the metro & the canal St Martin. Stephane & his wife is very desolate and helpful. Nice stay.

column1: Perfekt beliggenhed og Hugo var meget hjælpsom og venlig. Vi vender gerne tilbage en anden gang.
column5: Perfect location and Hugo was very helpful and friendly. We would love to return another time.

column1: Lille studio-lejlighed. Godt indrettet. Skønt placeret i baggård midt i Paris. Rent og pænt. Lille misforståelse om mødested omkring nøgleoverdragelse ved ankomst pga. sprog - hun talte kun fransk og det gør jeg ikke! Kunne sagtens finde på at benytte Sharons studio igen!
column5: Small studio-apartment. Well decorated. Although located in the backyard in the middle of Paris. Clean and neat. Little misunderstanding about the venue about the key handover upon arrival at the pga. languages - she spoke only French and I do not! Could easily find to use Sharon's studio again!

column1:
Både Adrienne og Willy svarede hurtigt på vores beskeder. Nøgleudvekslingen gik fint, og Willy ventede på os, selv om vi var lidt forsinkede pga. Metroen. Willy tilbød os at opbevare vores bagage den sidste dag efter udcheckning. Det blev ikke relevant. 
Spændende nabolag. Det blev kaldt """"Lille Afrika"""". I første omgang en smule utrygt, men det viste sig at være trygt og en stor kulturel oplevelse. Metro, bager og supermarked tæt på. Montmartre og Sacre Coeur 5-10 minutters gang derfra. Vi ville bo der igen.
column5:
Both Adrienne and Willy replied quickly on our messages. Nøgleudvekslingen went fine, and Willy were waiting for us, although we were a little delayed due to. Metro. Willy offered us to store our luggage the last day after check-out. It was not relevant. 
Exciting neighborhood. It was called """"Little Africa"""". In the first place a bit utrygt, but it proved to be safe and a great cultural experience. Metro, bakery and supermarket close by. Montmartre and the Sacre Coeur are a 5-10 minute walk away. We would stay there again.

column1:
Super dejlig og charmerende lejlighed, fint beliggende på Montmartre, 100 m fra metro Abbesses. Et stille og roligt sted med dørtelefon og elevator. Anne havde sørget for kaffe og te og hun mødte os med gode ideer til aktuelle udstillinger m.v. 
Vi vil gerne anbefale Annes sted og vil gerne selv vende tilbage.
column5:
Super nice and charming apartment, nicely located in Montmartre, 100 m from the metro Abbesses. A quiet and tranquil place, with entryphone and lift. Anne had arranged for coffee and tea, and she met us with great ideas for current exhibitions m.v. 
We would like to recommend Anne's place and would like to even return.

column1: En trivelig leilighet med god beliggenhet for vårt første lengre opphold i Paris. Tilstrekkelig utstyrt. Nærhet til Metro og gangavstand til gode restauranter. Hyggelig og tilgjengelig vertinne. Passe størrelse for familie på fire. Noe støy da leiligheten ligger i normalt trafikkert område. Kan absolutt anbefales.
column5: A pleasant apartment with good location for our first extended stay in Paris. Sufficiently equipped. The proximity to the Metro and walking distance to good restaurants. Nice and available host. The right size for a family of four. Some noise as the apartment is located in the normally busy area. Can be certainly recommended.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed men ikke for fem personer. Wifi virkede ikke eller rettere vi fik ikke den rigtige kode. Udtjeck skulle være flexibel det var den ikke.
column5: Nice apartment but not for five people. Wifi did not work, or rather we were not given the right code. Udtjeck should be flexible it was not.

column1:
Ami는 모든 질문에 빠르고 자세하게 답변을 보내주고, 체크인도 친절하게 안내해줬습니다. 주방이 잘 구비되어 매일 식사를 안에서 해결할수 있어서 좋았구요. 방 안에 미술관련 잡지나 책들도 많아서 방안에서 볼것도 많을 것 같습니다. 와이파이도 잘터집니다.
5층이라 전망이 좋은데, 엘리베이터가 없어서 그것만 조금 불편했어요.
수건이나 세면도구는 직접 챙기시는것이 좋고, 동역/북역은 치안상태가 매우좋은 편은 아니니 적당히 조심하시면 즐거운 여행 되실수 있으실거에요 :)
column5:
