column1:
Huset var charmerende, spændende og fantastisk! 
Velfungerende! 
Velbeliggende - centralt i forhold til alt! 
Men: køkkenet og alt køkkengrej var så ulækkert og fedtet, så vi desværre slet ikke kunne lave mad selv, uden først at skulle lave hovedrengøring!
Anbefaler det, men med en opmærksomhed på det snavsede og fedtede grej i køkkenet!
column5:
The house was charming, exciting and amazing! 
Well-functioning! 
Great location - central to everything! 
But: the kitchen and all the kitchenware was so disgusting and greasy, so unfortunately, we could not cook even, without first having to do housecleaning!
Recommend it, but with an attention to the dirty and greasy gear in the kitchen!

column1: We found Bring
column5: We found Bring

column1: Den lille lejlighed levede fuldt op til beskrivelsen - velholdt, stille, nydeligt indrettet og utrolig centralt placeret, tæt ved Hotel de Ville metro, i gåafstand fra St. Germain og utrolig tæt på de mange gode butikker i Marais. Christine har været virkelig hjælpsom - bedre værtskab kan man ikke bede om. Den varmeste anbefaling herfra.
column5: The small apartment fully lived up to the description - well maintained, quiet, nicely decorated, and very centrally located, close to Hotel de Ville metro, in walking distance from the St. Germain and incredibly close to the many great shops in the Marais. Christine has been really helpful - better hosting can not ask for. The warmest recommendation from here.

column1: Personne très arrangeante, linge de lit et toilette propre. A recommander.
column5: Person very arrangeante, bed linen and towels clean. Has recommend.

column1: Lejligheden er super og perfekt til 5 personer. Ligger centralt og tæt på metro station i et hyggeligt område. Kommunikationen med Charles var nem og behagelig. Kan varmt anbefale andre gæster at booke dette sted!
column5: The apartment is super and perfect for 5 persons. Centrally located and close to the metro station in a nice area. Communication with Charles was easy and pleasant. Highly recommend other guests to book this place!

column1:
Charles er en fantastisk person og var hele vejen igennem meget hjælpsom med diverse info. Lejligheden var som beskrevet lys og venlig og beliggende i et pulserende område med masser af liv - men når porten til gaden blev lukket, var der en vidunderlig stilhed. I gåafstand til Seinen og diverse turistattraktioner og dejlig tæt på flere Metrostationer. Området bød desuden på flere muligheder for kulinariske oplevelser - både cafeer, restauranter og indkøbsmuligheder (prøv bla. Monoprix)
Vi føler dog, at husreglerne burde fremgå på engelsk samt være tydeligere defineret - ro efter 22.30, ikke for højttalende mv. - dette kan være svært helt at efterleve, når man er en familie på fem, der alle går op i at vinde et spil. :-)
Alt i alt dog en helt fantastisk oplevelse at være i Paris - og en dejlig lejlighed. Kan på trods af foranstående varmt anbefales.
column5:
Charles is a great person and was all the way through very helpful with miscellaneous info. The apartment was as described bright and friendly and located in a vibrant area with lots of life - but when the gate to the street was closed, there was a wonderful silence. In walking distance to the Seine river and various tourist attractions and conveniently close to several metro Stations. The area featured several opportunities for culinary experiences - both cafes, restaurants and shopping opportunities (try the bla. Monoprix)
We feel, however, that the house rules should be stated in English as well as be more clearly defined - quiet after 22.30, not for højttalende etc. - this can be difficult to completely comply with, when you are a family of five, all goes up in winning a game. :-)
All in all though, an absolutely amazing experience to be in Paris - and a lovely apartment. Despite the foregoing, highly recommended.

column1:
En meget skøn lejlighed , som bar præg af en personlig god smag.
Vi vil meget gerne komme der igen, og kan kun anbefale den til andre.
En fantastisk god beliggenhed med udsigt til Sacre Coeur og Eiffeltårnet. 
Alt var i orden.
column5:
A very great apartment , which bore the stamp of a personal good taste.
We would very much like to come there again and can only recommend it to others.
A fantastic location with views to the Sacre Coeur and the Eiffel tower. 
Everything was in order.

column1: Well located. Good value for money.
column5: Well located. Good value for money.

column1: Lejligheden kunne ikke ligge bedre! Rue des Martyrs er lige i hjertet af Montmartre, og man mærker den skønne lokale stemning. Lejligheden er lille, fin og hyggelig, og vi havde nogle dejlige dage i den :)
column5: The apartment could not be better! Rue des Martyrs is right in the heart of Montmartre, and you can feel the wonderful local atmosphere. The apartment is small, nice and cozy, and we had some lovely days in it :)

column1:
Meget hyggeligt kvarter og en fin lejlighed med lille altan med udsigt til Sacre Ceur. (det foto som Clement har taget på profilbilledet). Vi var to voksne og 2 unge som sov på sovesofa i stuen. Rigtig god seng med fast madras, fint udstyr i lejligheden og rolige omgivelser på vejen. Nem at rengøre.
Vi har ikke mødt Clement og familien da de anvender BNB Sitter, men det fungerede fint ved ankomst og afgang. En lejlighed vi vil anbefale til familie og venner som skal til Paris. 
juli 2016 /Lotte og Christian og Co
column5:
Very pleasant neighbourhood and a nice apartment with a small balcony with view to Sacre Ceur. (the photo which Clement has taken on the profile picture). We were two adults and 2 young people who slept on the sofa bed in the living room. Really good bed with firm mattress, fine equipment in the apartment and quiet surroundings on the road. Easy to clean.
We have not met Clement and family as they occupy the BNB Sitter, but it worked fine on arrival and departure. An apartment we would recommend to family and friends going to Paris. 
July 2016 /Lotte and Christian and Co

column1:
ﾎｽﾄの連絡がとても早く､到着まで不安を感じることはありませんでした｡連絡はAirbnbのﾒｯｾｰｼﾞで行いました｡
場所は駅も近く非常に便利で､観光に最適です｡歓楽街らしい雰囲気がありますが治安は良く､夜に外を歩いても不安を感じることはありません｡土曜日の深夜のみ外が騒がしかったですが､寝るには困りませんでした｡
家は場所柄非常に古く､内装に清潔感はありますが､ﾄﾞｱの立て付け､ﾀｲﾙのひびなど､ところどころ完璧でない部分があります｡
部屋は2Kです｡ﾎｽﾄの部屋が隣にありましたが7泊のうち2回しか会いませんでした｡夜もあまり部屋にはいないようでした｡私たちの部屋はﾃｰﾌﾞﾙｾｯﾄ､たんす､ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞがあり､荷物を広げるのには十分な広さでした｡古い建物で､部屋のﾄﾞｱがきちんと閉まりませんでしたが､ﾌﾟﾗｲﾊﾞｼｰは保たれるように感じました｡
ｷｯﾁﾝ､ﾄｲﾚ､ﾊﾞｽは日本の基準からすると狭いですが､お湯はすぐに出ました｡時々熱過ぎることもありますが､ｼｬﾜｰは快適でした｡共用のｷｯﾁﾝでは電気ﾎﾟｯﾄと電子ﾚﾝｼﾞ､食器があったため､毎日借りて食事の準備をしていました｡
値段が非常にﾘｰｽﾞﾅﾌﾞﾙなので､細かいことが気にならなければ快適に過ごせるはずです｡

column1:
Rigtigt fin lille lejlighed, som havde alle de mest nødvendige ting, vi skulle bruge. Området er utroligt hyggeligt og meget nede på jorden med små gader og butikker, der giver et meget lokalt indblik i Paris, væk fra alt turismen.
Køkkenet er ok i forhold til udstyr, og man kan lave mindre måltider. Badeværelset er meget dejligt. Sovesofaen er lidt ubehagelig, når den er trukket ud.
Vores største bekymring var, at rummet ligger i stueetagen, ud til en passage hvor mange mennesker passerede, og gardinet er gennemsigtigt. Så for at have noget privatliv, var vi nødt til at køre metal skodderne helt ned meget af tiden, når man for eksempel skulle skifte tøj, sove eller bare gik rundt i mindre tøj. Og med skodderne nede blev lejligheden komplet mørklagt. Men det kan jo også skyldes vores egen blufærdighed.
Kan godt anbefales.
column5:
Really nice little apartment, which had all the most necessary things, we should use. The area is incredibly nice and very down to earth with the small streets and shops which provide a very local insight in Paris, away from all tourism.
The kitchen is ok in relation to the device, and you can do smaller meals. The bathroom is very nice. The sofa bed is a little uncomfortable when it is pulled out.
Our biggest concern was that the room located on the ground floor, next to a passage where many people passed, and the curtain is transparent. So, to have no privacy, we had to run the metal shutters all the way down much of the time, when, for example, had to change clothes, sleep, or just walked around in less clothing. And with the shutters down, the apartment was full dark. But it can also be due to our own shame.
Can be well recommended.

column1: 这个民宿房子超级棒｡首先位置很好,购物很方便,地铁站就在附近,去景点也方便,周围很安静｡其次,emma把房子打扫的超级超级干净,和照片上一摸一样,真的太干净了,一尘不染,室内有淡淡的檀香味,很舒服的味道｡还要说一下早饭,很美味!总体真的很不错,值得推荐给大家｡但有一点,出行需要保持安静哦,尽量别打扰楼道内的其他居民｡
column5: This bed and Breakfast House is super awesome as well. First of all the location is very good,shopping very convenient,the metro station is nearby,go to the attractions is also convenient,the surrounding is very quiet and great views. Secondly,emma put the house clean super super clean,and the photos on the exactly the same,really too clean,spotless,room with a hint of sandalwood taste,very comfortable taste area. Also to say about Breakfast,it was delicious! Overall really good,worth recommending to everyone's. But there is one thing,to travel need to keep quiet Oh,try not to disturb within the corridor the other inhabitants of the House.

column1:
Havde skønne dage i Paris i den dejlige lejlighed.
Lejligheden ligger godt i forhold til at tage på sightseeing. I gåafstand til mange metrostationer og til Marais.
Lejligheden er lækker og meget ren. 
Tager gerne tilbage til Paris og Alexandres lejlighed
column5:
Had lovely days in Paris in this lovely apartment.
The apartment is well located to go sightseeing. In walking distance to many metro stations and to the Marais.
The apartment is nice and very clean. 
Take like back to Paris and Alexandres apartment

column1: Det var en meget klar information omkring opholdet og en god forklaring på hvordan vi kom dertil fra lufthavnen . Det var rart. Alt om nøgle og information om butikker i området var også fint. Så vi følte os godt modtaget. Boligen ligger centralt og i gå afstand til centrum, hvilket vi også var glade for.
column5: It was a very clear information about the stay and a good explanation of how we got there from the airport . It was nice. All about the key and information about the shops in the area were also fine. So we felt well received. The home is centrally located and within walking distance to the city centre, which we also were happy.

column1: Dette kunne have været et godt sted at bo - hvis jeg havde været yngre og kunne acceptere, at jeg skulle dele lejligheden med Timothee og hans veninde. De synes det er naturligt, at der hænger vasketøj  i rummet og at man kommer til en fyldt skraldespand og opvask i vasken.
column5: This could have been a good place to stay - if I had been younger and could accept that I had to share the apartment with Timothee and his friend. They think it's natural to hang laundry in the room and that we come to a full trash can and dirty dishes in the sink.

column1: Flott leilighet - super beliggenhet og alt ellers ihht avtale og beskrivelse på nettside. Anbefales!
column5: Great apartment - super location and everything else under the agreement and the description on the website. Recommended!

column1: Denne lejlighed er præcis som beskrevet. Jeg var på en tre-dages tur til Paris med min teenagerdreng. Virkelig fin lejlighed med alt, hvad vi behøver til et ophold i Paris. Modtagelsen var rigtig fin. Vi var desværre lidt forsinkede i forhold til aftalen og alligevel blev vi modtaget personligt. Der var god kommunikation med mange gode tips til nærområdet. Lejligheden er fint indrettet med mulighed for selv at lave mad. Sengen er god at sove i og alt i lejligheden var i god stand. Lejligheden er meget hyggeligt indrettet og indbyder til, at man også opholder sig i lejligheden efter en lang dag i Paris. Samtidig er der meget stille, da den vender væk fra vejen. Lejligheden ligger på 6. etage, men der er verdens mindste elevator (en seværdighed i sig selv), så det er ikke noget problem. Placeringen er perfekt i forhold til Eiffeltårnet og der er en Metro næsten udenfor døren, så det er utroligt nemt at komme rundt. Der er også restauranter og cafeer i området, så man både kan få en god morgenmad eller aftensmad tæt på.
column5: This apartment is exactly as described. I was on a three-day trip to Paris with my teenagerdreng. Really nice apartment with everything we need for a stay in Paris. The reception was really nice. We were unfortunately slightly delayed in relation to the agreement and yet we were received personally. There was good communication with the many great tips for the surrounding area. The apartment is finely decorated, with the opportunity to cook. The bed is good to sleep in and everything in the apartment was in good condition. The apartment is very cosy decorated and invites you to also staying in the apartment after a long day in Paris. At the same time is very quiet as it faces away from the road. The apartment is on the 6. floor, but there is the world's smallest elevator (a sight in itself), so it is no problem. The location is perfect in relation to the Eiffel tower and there is a Metro almost outside the door, so it is incredibly easy to get around. There are also restaurants and cafes in the area so you can get a good breakfast or dinner close by.

column1: Kun gode ting at rapporterer. God beliggenhed, tæt på parisisk charme og metro, men samtidig en rolig gade. Perfekt til par.
column5: The only good things to report. Good location, close to the parisian charm and the metro, but at the same time a quiet street. Perfect for couples.

column1: Super dejlig lejlighed og en flot service med nøgle udlevering og intro til lejlighed. Perfekt beliggenhed, måske Paris` bedste? Alt var i orden og lejligheden levede op til vore forventninger og mere til. Hyggelig og god kommunikation med Claire. Vi glæder os til at vende tilbage til Paris og forhåbentligt Claires lejlighed.
column5: Super nice apartment and a nice service with the key extradition and the intro to the apartment. Perfect location, perhaps Paris` best? Everything was in order and the apartment lived up to our expectations and more. Cosy and good communication with Claire. We look forward to returning to Paris and hopefully Claire's apartment.

column1: Raisas lille, hyggelige et-værelses lejlighed var præcis som forventet og som ses på billedet. Lille, men rigtig hyggelig og pladsen var godt udnyttet. Man kunne sagtens bruge køkkenet, sidde i sofaen/slå-ud-sengen om aftenen og slappe af. Der var meget stille og man mærkede intet til naboer. Wi-Fi var god og hurtig, sengen var behagelig og bruseren rigtig god. Og der var meget meget pænt og rent.
column5: Raisas small, cosy one-room apartment was exactly as expected and as seen in the image. Small, but really cozy and the space was well utilized. One could easily use the kitchen, sit in the couch/fold out bed in the evening and relax. It was very quiet and you felt nothing for the neighbors. Wi-Fi was good and fast, the bed was comfortable and the shower really good. And there was very very nice and clean.

column1:
Skøn lejlighed, god stil og fantastisk udsigt!
Velkomstbrev og guides til diverse i Paris, god kommunikation og følelsen af at være velkommen.
column5:
Great apartment, good style and stunning views!
Welcome letter and guides to various in Paris, good communication and the feeling of being welcome.

column1: Hyggelig lejlighed med alt, hvad man behøver til en overnatning. God og afslappende atmosfære. Rare omgivelser og tæt på meget charmerende kvarter.
column5: Cosy apartment with everything you need for an overnight stay. Good and relaxing atmosphere. Nice surroundings and close to the very charming neighborhood.

column1: God beliggenhed. Venlig, fleksibel og imødekommende vært.
column5: Good location. Friendly, flexible and accommodating host.

column1: Hyggelig lille lejlighed i det 10. arr. Lejligheden var ren og velholdt, nøjagtig som I kan se på billederne. Vi nød opholdet og kommunikationen med værten var let og flydende.
column5: Cosy little apartment in the 10. arr. The apartment was clean and well maintained, exactly as you can see in the pictures. We enjoyed the stay and the communication with the host was easy and fluid.

column1: Good place for youngster.
column5: Good place for youngster.

column1:
Dejlig lejlighed, dog lidt mørk, da der ikke kommer meget lys ind. 
God beliggenhed. Der er stille i lejligheden, men den ligger i et dejligt kvarter med meget liv og mange caféer.
column5:
Nice apartment, though a bit dark, since there is not coming much light. 
Good location. There is quiet in the apartment, but the location is in a nice neighborhood with a lot of life and many cafes.

column1: Nathalies lejlighed er beliggende i et godt kvarter mht cafeer og indkøbsmuligheder. Metroen er også tæt på lejligheden. Og kanalen for enden af gaden er perfekt til afslapning. Sengene er gode, lejligheden er velindrettet.Alt hvad vi behøvede, to bedstemødre på tur med to børnebørn på 14 år. Vi fik mange informationer om seværdigheder og gode spisesteder. Det var lidt hårdt at skulle på 4. sal uden elevator, efter at have gået Paris tynd 4 dage i træk, men det gik. Jeg kan bestemt anbefale stedet.
column5: Nathalies apartment is located in a good neighborhood mht cafes and shopping facilities. The metro is also close to the apartment. And the channel for the end of the street is perfect for relaxation. The beds are good, the apartment is well-appointed.Everything we needed, two grandmothers on a trip with two grandchildren at the age of 14. We got many information about the sights and good eateries. It was a bit hard to have on the 4. floor without elevator, having gone to Paris thin 4 days in a row, but it went. I can definitely recommend the place.

column1:
거실의 창문과 침실의 창문에 바로 완벽한 에펠탑의 모습이 보입니다. 전망에는 부족함이 없기에, 전망을 가장 우선순위에 두신 분에게 강력 추천드리고 싶습니다. 그러나 개인적으로 느낀 단점이 몇가지 있습니다. 우선 집이 가장 꼭대기, 6층에 위치하는데 엘리베이터가 없습니다. 아무런 짐을 지고 올라가지 않아도 꽤 힘들더라구요. 보통 웬만한 높은 층수의 숙소에도 큰 내색없이 참는 편이고 크게 불평하지
않는데, 다시 한번 이용할 의사에 대해선 아마도 높은 층수때문에 고민할 것 같습니다. 또 다른 단점은 생각보다 집이 깨끗하진 않았습니다. 이는 매우 주관적이라는 생각이 들지만, 욕실이 그리 깨끗하진 않았고, 부엌의 식기도 깨끗하지 않아 처음 사용할 때에 모두 세척 후에 사용했네요. 그 외의 것들은 만족스러웠습니다. 무엇보다 호스트의 배려가 깊습니다. 저희의 체크인 전날과 체크아웃 전후로 예약이 빈 상태라 체크인 체크아웃 모두 저희가 원하는 시간에 맞춰 주었습니다. 또 함께 여행한 친구가 장식품 하나를 깼는데 있을수 있는 일이라며, 오히려 걱정말고 파리에서의 여행을 즐기라고 호의를 베풀어 주었습니다. 
여러 장단점이 있지만, 본인이 가장 우선시하는 부분을 참고하여 좋은 여행에 보탬이 되었으면 합니다. ;)

column1: Rigtig dejlig beliggenhed, vi nød at spise morgenmad med udsigt over byens tage!
column5: Really nice location, we enjoyed to have breakfast with a view over the roofs of the city!

column1:
Lejligheden lever fuldt op til beskrivelsen, der er alt hvad man har brug for.
Vi havde nogle gode Påskedage i Paris, vi gik til Eiffeltårnet og de andre severdigheder. Enma havde lavet et fint kort med oplysninger om området nær lejligheden ;-)
column5:
The apartment lives up to the description, there is everything you need.
We had some good easter day in Paris, we went to the Eiffel tower and the other severdigheder. Enma had made a fine map with information about the area near the apartment ;-)

column1: Awesome spot for a wandering traveller
column5: Awesome spot for a wandering traveller

column1: Veldig praktisk og fin leilighet, meget sentralt i et attraktivt nabolag.
column5: Very convenient and nice apartment, very centrally located in an attractive neighborhood.

column1: Trevlig lägenhet! Bra läge, stilren
column5: Nice apartment! Good location, clean

column1: En hyggelig lejlighed der svarer til det, man kan se på billederne. Det er ægte fransk romantik og kultur.  Beliggenheden kan ikke være meget bedre, tæt på metro, caféer, shopping og hyggelige spisesteder. Vi kan varmt anbefale et ophold her.
column5: A cozy apartment that matches what you can see on the pictures. It is true French romance and culture. The location can not be much better, close to metro, cafes, shopping and cosy restaurants. We can highly recommend a stay here.

column1: Good place for budget travellers!
column5: Good place for budget travellers!

column1: Rigtig fin og lille lejlighed på en perfekt lokation. Rigtig godt valg og pris, hvis man rejser 1 eller 2 personer og gerne vil bruge hele dagen på at udforske Paris.
column5: Very fine and little apartment in a perfect location. Really good choice and price, if you travel 1 or 2 persons and would like to spend the whole day exploring Paris.

column1: couldn't ask for better, defo recommended
column5: couldn't ask for better, defo recommended

column1: Fin lejlighed i roligt kvarter beliggende på tredje sal. Venlig vært.
column5: Nice apartment in quiet neighborhood located on the third floor. Friendly host.

column1: fin lejlighed, der var forberedt lidt morgenmad og snacks til os da vi ankom, uheldigvis kom vi til at smække os ude af lejligheden, værten var flink til at komme og hjælpe med at finde en låsesmed der kunne låse op for os.
column5: nice apartment, there was prepared a little breakfast and snacks for us when we arrived, unfortunately we came to slap us out of the apartment, the host was nice to come and help to find a locksmith that could unlock up to us.

column1:
Virkelig fin lille lejlighed i hjertet af Latinerkvarteret i Paris. Andrea havde lavet en passende beskrivelse af lejligheden og dens faciliteter. Ligeledes var Andrea venlig og hjælpsom i forhold til at gøre vores ophold i Paris til netop det, vi ønskede. Hun var fleksibel i forhold til vores ankomst og overdragelse af nøgler og havde lavet en liste med hendes egne favoritsteder i Paris. Vi nød at besøge mange af stederne.
Beliggenheden kunne ikke være mere perfekt.
column5:
Really nice little apartment in the heart of the Latin quarter in Paris. Andrea had made an appropriate description of the apartment and its facilities. Similarly, Andrea friendly and helpful in making our stay in Paris for exactly what we wanted. She was flexible for our arrival and handover of keys and had made a list of her own favourite places in Paris. We enjoyed visiting many of the sites.
The location could not be more perfect.

column1:
Fint lille studio ned god beliggenhed i charmerende kvarter. Kan anbefales for enlig gæst eller ungt par
.
column5:
Nice little studio down good location in a charming neighborhood. Can be recommended for a single guest or a young couple
.

column1: En hyggelig liten leilighet midt i Marais. Fantastisk utsikt fra tak vinduene. Stille og fredelig.Ryddig og rent. Litt komplisert bad for høye personer, da skrå veggen der er veldig lav.
column5: A pleasant little apartment right in the Marais. Fantastic views from the roof windows. Quiet and peaceful.Neat and clean. A little complicated bathroom for tall people, then oblique wall which is very low.

column1: Veldig praktisk leilighet med god beliggenhet i forhold til både shopping og sentrale turistattraksjoner. Maud er hyggelig og imøtekommende!
column5: Very convenient apartment with good location in relation to both shopping and major tourist attractions. The crew is pleasant and attentive!

column1:
Perfekt base i Paris, hvis du bare søger et sted at overnatte.
Rart kvarter og tæt på Metro
column5:
Perfect base in Paris if you're just looking for a place to stay.
Nice neighbourhood and close to Metro

column1: Super beliggenhed og den venligste vært
column5: Super location and the friendliest host

column1: Det er et vidunderligt sted. Lejligheden har den smukkeste udsigt over Paris som man kan ønske sig. Tæt ved metro, spisesteder og supermarked. Man følte sig velkommen fra minuttet man trådte ind i lejligheden. Smukkeste blinkende Eiffeltårn klokken 22. Vi var solgt på stedet. Det er en trafikeret gade den ligger ud til men det generede nu ikke selvom vi måtte have altandøren åben på grund af varmen. Vi kørte lidt efter parkering af bil men vi fandt et parkeringshus tæt på og der holdt vi godt og billigt.
column5: It is a wonderful place. The apartment has the most beautiful views of Paris as you could wish for. Close to metro, restaurants and supermarket. You felt welcome from the minute we stepped into the apartment. Most beautiful flashing eiffel tower at 22. We were sold on the spot. It is a busy street it is situated next to the but it bothered now if we had to have the balcony door open because of the heat. We drove a bit after parking the car but we found a parking garage close to and that we had good and cheap.

column1: 7 mn walking from La Villette, """"La Cité des Enfants"""", ideal for kids...
column5: 7 mn walking from La Villette, """" The City of Children"""", ideal for kids...

column1: Vi blev rigtig fint modtaget af Sonia ( en bekendt af Ambre), som mødte os ved metrostationen. Hun instruerede os i alt, hvad der er brug for vide. Området er typisk parisisk, multikulturelt og ikke turister. Lejligheden er nem at komme til. Den var pæn og ren og fungerer fint til 4 personer. Vi var 5, hvilket den ikke er udstyret til. Fx manglede, der et håndklæde og en stol. Lejere skal være opmærksomme på, at der ikke wi-fi.
column5: We were very well received by Sonia ( an acquaintance of Ambre), who met us at the metro station. She instructed us in everything, what you need to know. The area is typically parisian, multicultural and not tourists. The apartment is easy to get to. It was neat and clean and works fine for 4 persons. We were 5, which it is not equipped for. The Fx was missing, a towel and a chair. Tenants should be aware that there is not wi-fi.

column1: Good for solo traveller, near Metro station..near Restaurant..
column5: Good for solo traveller, near Metro station..near Restaurant..

column1: Leiligheten ligger veldig sentralt. Hyggelig nabolag. Lys, luftig og ren leilighet. Høy kvalitet med god dusj, gode kjøkkenfasiliteter og gode senger.
column5: The apartment is located very centrally. Nice neighborhood. Light, airy and clean apartment. High quality with good shower, good kitchen facilities and great beds.

column1: Not being honest for a foreign visitor.
column5: Not being honest for a foreign visitor.

column1: Julien var meget sød og imødekommende, og det var meget nemt at få og aflevere boligen. Stedet ligger meget centralt, og man kan få trænet benene på trappen og til 7. etage og nyde udsigten over byen. Kan helt klart anbefales!
column5: Julien was very sweet and accommodating, and it was very easy to get and deliver the dwelling. The place is very centrally located and you can get a great workout the legs on the stairs and to the 7. floor and enjoy the view over the city. Can definitely be recommended!

column1: Fantastisk beliggenhet. Jeg stortrivdes i pacos leilighet. Kommer helt klart tilbake!
column5: Fantastic location. I thoroughly enjoyed himself in pacos apartment. Will absolutely be back!

column1: Det var vores første brug af AirBnb, og vil varmt anbefale Christian og hans fantastisk beliggende lejlighed i Latinerkvarteret i Paris.
column5: It was our first use of AirBnb, and would highly recommend Christian and his wonderfully located apartment in the Latin quarter in Paris.

column1:
Det var den perfekte lokation for at opleve Paris og alle tilbudene i centrum.
Velegnet også til en aften i lejligheden og ikke blot et sovested.
column5:
It was the perfect location to experience Paris and all the services provided in the centre.
Also well suited to an evening in the apartment and not just a sleeping place.

column1: Marais kvarteret er helt fantastisk at være i.
column5: The Marais neighbourhood is quite amazing to be in.

column1: Min datter og jeg boede i Pierricks lejlighed i 5 dage, vi var på buisseness trip, så beliggenheden var super perfekt i toppen af Marais og kun kort afstand til 10 arr. hvor vi også elsker at komme. Hvis man som os er vild med veganske og bio cafe'er og restaurenter er lokal området spækket med skønne steder. Vi kan på det varmeste anbefale denne airbnb, man skal dog være vild med trapper, da man skal bestige 115 skønne skæve trin for at nå til herligheden på 6. sal....men tag det som oplevelse og nyd opstigningen i dette autentiske Paris. Vi vil helt sikkert booke hos Pierrick igen ;)
column5: My daughter and I lived in Pierricks apartment in 5 days, we were on a buisseness trip, so the location was super perfect at the top of the Marais and only a short distance to the 10 arr. where we also love to come. If you like us love with the vegan and bio cafe's and restaurants is the local area is packed with beautiful places. We can warmly recommend this airbnb, however, one should be in love with the stairs since you must climb 115 beautiful odd steps to reach the glory on the 6. floor....but take it as experience and enjoy the ascent in this authentic Paris. We will certainly book with Pierrick again ;)

column1: Vi havde 3 overnatninger i denne charmerende parisiske bolig. Beliggenheden perfekt i gå afstand til Notre Dame, Louvre, Latinerkvarteret o.m.a. Blev vel modtaget, fik fine instrukser. Nød aftenhyggen i baggården. Alt i alt en virkelig hyggelig bolig som vi gerne vender tilbage til, hvis tilfældet skulle være.
column5: We had 3 nights in this charming parisian accommodation. The location is in walking distance to Notre Dame, the Louvre, the Latin quarter o.m.a. Was well received, got the fine instructions. Enjoyed aftenhyggen in the backyard. All in all a really nice home that we would return to, if the case should be.

column1: Ganske ubeskrivelig skøn lejlighed i det cooleste kvarter. 100 m til Metro der forbinder med alle seværdigheder langs Seinen. Rolige omgivelser - en følelse af ro der sænker sig når man kommer 'hjem' efter en travl dag. Masser af spisemuligheder eller take-away og et hav af små skønne delikatessebutikker lige om hjørnet.
column5: Quite indescribable great apartment in the coolest neighbourhood. 100 m to the Metro which connects with all the sights along the Seine. Quiet surroundings - a sense of calm that descends when you come 'home' after a busy day. Plenty of dining options or take-away and a sea of small delightful luxury food shops just around the corner.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed i smukke Le Marais. Lejligheden er hyggelig og ligger et fantastisk roligt sted. Super restauranter, shopping mv er lige uden for døren. Super base for en ferie i Paris.
column5: Lovely apartment in the beautiful Le Marais. The apartment is cozy and is a great quiet place. Super restaurants, shopping, etc are just outside the door. Super base for a holiday in Paris.

column1: Jeg har været 3 uger i Christians lejlighed som både er hyggelig og har en enestående udsigt. Fra køkken og bad kigger man ud over Paris og fra soveværelset kigger man lige over på Sacre Cæur. Det er et meget overvældende syn! Gode senge og fint indrettet lejlighed! Man kan sagtens bo der 4 personer hvis man kender hinanden godt! Der en en lille elevator og det er rart når man kommer med en stor kuffert og skal op på 4 sal!
column5: I have been 3 weeks in Christian's apartment that is both cozy and has a unique view. From kitchen and bath looking out over Paris from the bedroom, you look right over at the Sacre Cæur. It is a very overwhelming sight! Good beds and nicely decorated apartment! You can easily stay 4 persons if they know each other very well! There is a small elevator, and it's nice when you come with a big suitcase and be up on the 4th floor!

column1:
Virkelig charmerende 'autentisk' pariserlejlighed perfekt beliggende på en stille gade i Marais. Fint og funktionelt køkken, hvor man nemt kan lave mad. 

Ind- og udtjekning forløb, som det skulle, og Charles (manageren) gav en god og grundig introduktion til lejligheden og området og var i det hele taget fint tilgængelig.

Der ligger en skole overfor, der giver en del larm i dagtimerne. Og lejligheden, især køkkenet, virkede en smule nusset ved ankomst men ikke noget, der betød noget i det store billede. 

Søde naboer og dejligt sikkert sted at bo.
column5:
Really charming 'authentic' parisian apartment is perfectly situated on a quiet street in the Marais. Fine and functional kitchen, where you can easily cook. 

Check - in and check-out process, as it should, and Charles (the manager) gave a good and thorough introduction to the apartment and the area and was on the whole fine available.

There is a school across the street, there is a noise in the daytime. And the apartment, especially the kitchen seemed a bit dirty upon arrival but nothing that meant anything in the big picture. 

Sweet neighbors and a nice safe place to stay.

column1: Vi har haft et fantastisk ophold i Pauls lejlighed. Centralt og i et livligt område, hvilket man dog ikke lægger mærke til i selve lejligheden, det var ret afslappende efter en lang dag i Paris. Bare lige sovesofaen kunne have brug for en lille opfriskning.
column5: We have had a fantastic stay in Paul's apartment. Centrally located and in a lively area, which, however, did not pay attention to in the apartment itself, it was quite relaxing after a long day in Paris. Just the sofa bed could need a little refresh.

column1: Skøn lejlighed i et dejligt kvarter
column5: Great apartment in a nice neighborhood

column1: Det var veldig enkelt å kommunisere med Aud, og en trivelig Pierre møtte oss sent fredag kveld for å gi nøkler. Alt gikk smidig! Leiligheten er trivelig  og området er livlig og sentralt. Sammen med leiligheten kommer katten Bengal. Utover å gi den mat og vann, trenger Bengal litt kos og oppmerksomhet:)
column5: It was very easy to communicate with Aud, and a pleasant Pierre met us late Friday night to give the keys. Everything went smooth! The apartment is nice and the area is lively and central. Together with the apartment comes the cat Bengal. In addition to providing the food and water, need Bengal a little cuddling and attention:)

column1:
Yacine var en meget sød og venlig værtinde. Hun var meget fleksibel med at være hjemme til vi ankom for, at få nøgle og informationer om lejligheden. Faciliteterne var helt som vi havde forventet. Fint soveværelse, bad + toilet, samt internet. Yacine havde stilt morgenmad frem hver morgen, og vi kunne benytte lejligheden, som det passede os. Værtinden var meget rummelig, og vi følte os hurtigt tilpas både i lejligheden, men også i området. 
Området er meget centralt, og det er nemt, at komme rundt i Paris med den offentlige transport, samt på gåben. Stedet var meget lokalt, og der var lækre restauranter i området.
column5:
Yacine was a very sweet and friendly hostess. She was very flexible to be home to the we arrived, to get the key and information about the apartment. The facilities were exactly as we had expected. Fine bedroom, bath + toilet, as well as the internet. Yacine had stilt breakfast every morning, and we could use the apartment as it suited us. The hostess was very spacious, and we felt quickly comfortable both in the apartment, but also in the area. 
The area is very central, and it is easy to get around in Paris by public transport, and on foot. The place was very local, and there were delicious restaurants in the area.

column1: Lejligheden ligger i et skønt og hyggeligt område. Massere af gode spisesteder i nærheden. Vi havde 4 gode dage. Lige i nærheden af République st.
column5: The apartment is located in a lovely and cosy area. Lots of good eateries nearby. We had 4 good days. Right in the vicinity of the République st.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed og stor gæstfrihed :)
column5: Lovely apartment and great hospitality :)

column1:
悪天候のため､飛行機の到着が3時間以上も遅れましたが､ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝもｽﾑｰｽﾞに対応してくださいました｡
ﾎﾞﾝﾏﾙｼｪから徒歩すぐの立地､お部屋は清潔で､ｲﾝﾃﾘｱもとても素敵です｡sound systemもとても良く､快適な滞在でした｡
Mille mercis Antoine!
column5:
Due to bad weather, and the plane arrived 3 hours late, the check list and in the meantime I am using I love this app also I tie escape I have been to.
Applications my its head, spat water Playground and a short walk from the hotel, we room was clean, and I love this app Deposit't play very nice in a can. sound system also very good and have very comfortable stay in Lima.
Mille mercis Antoine!

column1: Excellent, extended my stay.
column5: Excellent, extended my stay.

column1: Lejligheden ligger rigtig godt ift metro, bus og Eiffel tårnet. Olga var rigtig god til at hjælpe med turen fra lufthavnen til lejligheden, alt i alt en helt fantastisk ferie.
column5: The apartment is located very good near the metro, bus and the Eiffel tower. Olga was really good to help with the trip from the airport to the apartment, all in all a fantastic holiday.

column1: Alt fungerede perfekt. Meget hjælpsom og fleksibel med ud tjekning. Tak til Marine
column5: Everything worked perfectly. Very helpful and flexible with out tjekning. Thank you to the Marine

column1: Super hôte  à recommander.
column5: Super host to recommend.

column1:
Vi følte os virkelig velkommen. Ivan tog imod os og var meget behjælpelig med spørgsmål angående nabolag osv. Lejligheden passer fint med beskrivelsen. Lidt larm fra cafeer i gaden. 

Lejligheden ligger virkelig godt og i gåafstand til rigtig mange af Paris attraktioner.
column5:
We felt us really welcome. Ivan welcomed us and was very helpful with questions about the neighborhood, etc. The apartment fits with the description. A little noise from the cafes in the street. 

The apartment is really good and in walking distance to many of Paris attractions.

column1: Fin lille lejlighed med en helt perfekt terrasse, hvor man kan sidde ude om aftenen med et glas vin og en god bog. Gaden er ikke så spændende i sig selv, men ligger super centralt i fht. Luxembourg haven, hvor vi startede hver morgen med en løbetur. Der er natteliv i gaden i weekenden, men lukker du dørene, slipper intet larm ind. Lejligheden er ren, gode dyner og puder og et fint lille badeværelse med bruser i badekarret. Perfekt til to veninder på shoppetur!
column5: Nice little apartment with a perfect terrace where you can sit out in the evening with a glass of wine and a good book. The street is not so exciting in itself, but is located super centrally in the fht. Luxembourg garden, where we started every morning with a run. There is nightlife in the streets at the weekend, but you close the doors, release the nothing noise. The apartment is clean, comfortable duvets and pillows, and a nice little bathroom with shower in the bathtub. Perfect for two girlfriends on shopping sprees!

column1: Netter, aufmerksamer Vermieter
column5: Nice, attentive landlord

column1: Lejlighed var rigtigt godt placeret i Paris. Meget stille område, men alligevel helt centralt. Perfekt for en familie på fem. Stéphane var utrolig venlig i sin modtagelse og vi fik svar på alle spørgsmål. Lækker indretning og rigtig gode senge - et plus i vores familie som har prøvet mange dårlige senge! Vi Kan kun anbefale lejligheden til alle, der skal en tur til Paris med familie.
column5: Apartment was really well located in Paris. Very quiet area, but nevertheless quite central. Perfect for a family of five. Stéphane was very friendly in its reception and we got answers to all the questions. Delicious interior design and very good beds - a plus in our family has tried many bad beds! We Can only recommend the apartment for anyone who needs a trip to Paris with family.

column1:
Gennadiy var en dejlig vært som gjorde opholdet let for os. Han var let at få fat i og god til at informere os. I starten havde vi problemer med toilettet, men mens vi var på arbejde, kom Gennadiy og fiksede det for os, så det var ordnet når vi kom hjem.
Vi blev en smule overraskede over lejlighedens størrelse, da den så en del større ud på billederne.
Alt i alt levede lejligheden op til vores forventninger. Den lå godt og var pæn og ren.
column5:
Gennadiy was a lovely host who made the stay easy for us. He was easy to get in and good to inform us. In the beginning we had problems with the toilet, but while we were at work, came Gennadiy and fixed it for us, so it was sorted when we got home.
We were a bit surprised by the apartment size, since it as a lot bigger in the photos.
All in all, lived in the apartment up to our expectations. It was good and was neat and clean.

column1:
사진에 보이는 이미지 그대로 입니다.
좋아요~
column5:
Photos seen on image as it is.
Like~

column1: En fantastisk lejlighed i et dejligt område. Lejligheden oser af sjæl og har alle faciliteter. Det er til dato den bedste AirBnB lejlighed vi har oplevet. God vært, der gav fin service ved ankomst.
column5: A fantastic apartment in a nice area. The apartment oozes soul and has all the facilities. It is to date the best AirBnB apartment we have experienced. Good host, who gave fine service by arrival.

column1:
Super fin loftlejlighed centralt i Paris. Ift standard med rengøring, håndklæder og sengetøj minder den om et hotel :)
Der var to badeværelser hvilket var perfekt, når man er afsted hele familien. 
Vi var glade for at kunne følge med i bylivet lige nedenfor - men der var selvfølgelig også noget støj fra trafikken (hvilket nærmest må høre med med central beliggenhed i en storby!). 
Chokri var så flink at give anvisning til transporten dertil fra lufthavnen og var en super vært.
column5:
Super nice loft apartment in the centre of Paris. Monitor the standard of cleaning, towels and linen, it resembles a hotel :)
There were two bathrooms which was perfect, when one is off the whole family. 
We were happy to be able to follow the action of the city just below - but there was, of course, also some noise from the traffic (which almost must consult with with a central location in a big city!). 
Chokri was so nice to give instructions for transport to there from the airport and was a super host.

column1: Fine for one night
column5: Fine for one night

column1: Den utrolig centrale beliggenhed (Pl. de la Republique) kombineret med et roligt kvarter (sidegade/baghus) var meget bekvem. Lejligheden var ren og pæn og med et artistisk touch, lækre billeder og spændende indretning. Fantastisk terrasse. Funktionelt køkken. I mangel af sofa tog vi dobbeltsengen i brug til familiehygge(!).
column5: The incredibly central location (Pl. de la Republique), combined with a quiet area (side street/backyard) was very convenient. The apartment was clean and neat and with an artistic touch, nice pictures and interesting decor. Stunning terrace. Functional kitchen. In the absence of the sofa we took the double bed in use for family time(!).

column1:
Jack var fantastisk imødekommende og parat til at gøre stort set alt for at gøre vores ophold helt perfekt. Lejligheden var ren, lys og havde, hvad vi skulle bruge - og en dejlig terrasse. Området er helt fantastisk med et brus af multietnisk. Dejligt bekvemt til indkøb, restauranter, metro m.v.
Tak for indsatsen Jack.
column5:
Jack was very helpful and prepared to do virtually everything to make our stay absolutely perfect. The apartment was clean, bright and had what we were going to use and a lovely terrace. The area is absolutely stunning with a shower of multi-ethnic. Nice convenient to shopping, restaurants, metro m.v.
Thank you for the efforts Jack.

column1:
Velfungerende lejlighed, god placering tæt på Montmartre kvarteret og metro. 
God beskrivelse ved ankomst og let tjek ind/ud. 
Selvom vi ikke mødte Thierry var der hurtig kommunikation på mail.
column5:
Well-functioning apartment, good location close to Montmartre district and the metro. 
Good description on arrival and easy check in/out. 
Although we have not met Thierry, there was quick communication by e-mail.

column1:
Uden sammenligning kan jeg sige, at Nathans lejlighed må være den bedste af alle i Paris. Og jeg har virkelig researchet! Der er sjæl og stemning i de smukke rum - og vi var 3 generationer som bare var ovenud lykkelige fra første syn. Indretningen er aldeles chik og parisisk - og lyden af Paris lige udenfor de smukke vinduer fuldendte det, vi håbede på at finde: nemlig det """"ægte"""" Paris.
Området er også helt eminent, masser af små lækre cafeer, bagerier og shopping-muligheder. 
Det var vemodigt at sige farvel, og jeg lovede mine piger på 9 og 11 år, at vi har skabt en tradition. At Nathans lejlighed bliver vores """"sommerhus i Paris"""".

Generelt kan jeg sige, at det var lækkert, at der var så rent overalt.
Eneste ting man lige skal vide er, at der ikke er det store udstyr i køkkenet, hvis man havde planer om at spise meget hjemme. (Hvilket vi ikke havde)
column5:
Without comparison, I can say that Nathan's apartment may be the best of all in Paris. And I have really researched! There is the soul and mood of the beautiful space and we were 3 generations, which was just delighted from first sight. The decor is absolutely chic and parisian - and the sounds of Paris just outside the beautiful windows completed it, we hoped to find: namely, the """"genuine"""" Paris.
The area is also quite excellent, lots of small delicious cafes, bakeries and shopping opportunities. 
It was sad to say goodbye, and I promised my girls at 9 and 11 years, we have created a tradition. To Nathan's apartment will be our """"cottage in Paris"""".

In general, I can say that it was delicious, that was so clean everywhere.
Only thing I need to know is that there is not the great equipment in the kitchen, if you had plans to eat at home. (Which we had not)

column1:
Lejligheden var præcist som vist på billederne og beliggenheden er i top.
Kommunikationen med Inger var rigtig god fra starten, og hun sendt tydelige instruktioner omkring den nemmeste vej fra lufthavnen til lejligheden og de informationer vi skulle bruge for at komme ind i bygningen og få fat i nøglen.
Hun kontakte mig også undervejs for at sikre at alt var som det skulle være, og var alt i alt en god og kommunikativ host.

Man skal dog være opmærksom på, at der ikke er så meget varmt vand ad gangen så man skal ikke tage lange bade medmindre man godt kan lide at skylde shampoo ud i kold vand.
column5:
The apartment was exactly as shown on the pictures and the location is in the top.
Communication with Inger was really good from the start, and she sent clear instructions about the easiest way from the airport to the apartment and the information we would use to get into the building and grab the key.
She contact me also along the way to ensure that everything was as it should be, and was all in all a good and communicative host.

You must, however, be aware that there is not so much hot water at a time so one should not take long baths unless you like to rinse shampoo out in cold water.

column1: Perfect spot for exploring Paris!
column5: Perfect spot for exploring Paris!

column1: Lejligheden er rigtig dejlig og ligger godt. Caroline er en sød og hjælpen vært.
column5: The apartment is really nice and is good. Caroline is a sweet and help host.

column1: Vi giver vores bedste anbefalinger til Lilly og hendes lejlighed. Placeringen er super fin, meget tæt på en metrostation og et hyggeligt område med restauranter og lokale butikker.
column5: We give our best recommendations to Lilly and her apartment. The location is super fine, very close to a metro station and a nice area with restaurants and local shops.

column1: Kun godt at sige om stedet og værten, som var meget hjælpsom og betænksom!
column5: Only good to say about the place and the host, who was very helpful and thoughtful!

column1: En dejlig og velfungerende lejlighed med meget personlighed. Den ligger i et godt kvarter, når man skal besøge Paris´s turistattraktioner. Vi boede 6 personer i lejligheden, og selvom værelserne var små fungerede det fint. Det ene toilet i lejligheden fungerede ikke. Når man er 6 personer i samme lejlighed ville det have været dejligt med to toiletter. Caroline havde dog gjort os opmærksom på det da vi kom. Caroline var meget imødekommende og let at komme i kontakt med, og hun havde sørget for friske blomster i lejligheden. Kan kun anbefale denne lejlighed.
column5: A lovely and well functioning apartment with a very personality. It is located in a good neighborhood, if you want to visit paris's tourist attractions. We stayed 6 persons in the apartment, and though the rooms were small it worked fine. The one toilet in the apartment did not work. When you are 6 persons in the same apartment, it would have been nice with two toilets. Caroline had, however, made us aware of it when we arrived. Caroline was very accommodating and easy to get in contact with, and she had arranged for fresh flowers in the apartment. Can only recommend this apartment.

column1:
En dejlig bolig velegnet til lille familie på 3. Specielt er parkeringsforhold - parkerings kælder et stort plus+ 
Dejlig lejlighed - rent og oprydeligt. Et ophold jeg varmt kan anbefale.
column5:
A lovely home suitable for small family of 3. In particular is the parking - the parking basement is a big plus+ 
Lovely apartment - clean and oprydeligt. A stay I can highly recommend.

column1:
Der er det , der er brug for. 
Den flotte udsigt og den dejlige altan var det hele værd. 

Behjælpelig vært
column5:
There it is , there is a need for. 
The beautiful views and the lovely balcony was worth it all. 

Helpful host

column1: 일주일 있었습니다. 아파트는 작지만 깨끗하고 필요한 물품이 다 있어 간단한 음식을 해먹기도 좋았습니다. 지하철 및 버스가 근처에 있어 저녁까지 이동하기 편했습니다. 근처에 마트도 여러개 있습니다. 호스트인 Kelsea는 친절했습니다.
column5: A week. The apartment is small but clean and the necessary supplies there's a simple food, the hammock was great. Metro and bus nearby, until the evening to go. Near town but. Host Kelsea is friendly.

column1:
Kelsea의 집은 정말 최고였다. 그녀는 체크인 할 때 친절하고 세심하게 집에 대한 모든것을 알려주었다. 
집은 너무나 예쁘고 아늑했고, 주방에는 요리 할 때 필요한 모든것들이 다 있다!
수건도 넉넉하고, 침대 시트도 깨끗하고 집의 청결 상태는 최고.
집의 테라스는 너무 로맨틱해서 식사를 하고, 저녁에 와인을 먹기에도 좋다.
집 근처에는 아주 맛있는 빵집이 있다. 또, 근처의 정육점의 고기는 정말 질이 좋고 주변에 마트와 약국 등 편의시설도 다양하다.
다만, 내가 묵었던 날짜에는 동네가 공사 중이라 아침 일찍부터 시끄러웠다.
시끄러웠던 점만 빼면 모두 완벽.
다음에도 파리여행을 간다면 난 다시 Kelsea의 집에 호스팅을 할것이다.
column5:
Kelsea's house really was the best. She when you check in, friendly and attentive to the house all about it. 
The house is so pretty and cosy, in the kitchen cooking when all the necessary things.
Towels ample, and the bed sheets are clean and your house clean state is the best.
Of the house the terrace is so romantic to have a meal and wine in the evening to eat is also good.
Near the house on a very delicious bakery. Also, near the butcher's meat is really good quality and around and and pharmacy an.
However, I had a date in the neighborhood-from early in the morning noisy.
Noisy except all is perfect.
The next Paris trip goes when I am back to Kelsea's House hosting to do it.

column1: 这是我住过最好的民宿,Angela是一个超级棒的房东,所以我决定下次再来巴黎必须继续住这｡
column5: This is I live had best of hotel,Angela is a great landlord,so I decided to come back next time in Paris must continue to live in this area.

column1: 离地铁公交站还算方便,很有生活气息的房子,没图片那么大但是也不错,可爱的Loft~Mark很热心,这几天人在美国但是回复很及时,我们走的时候太匆忙有点麻烦到他和他拿钥匙的朋友,真是不好意思｡
column5: From the metro bus stop is also fairly easy,the very life breath of the house,no pictures so big but also nice,cute Loft~Mark is very enthusiastic,these days people in the US but the reply was timely,and we take the time too much of a hurry a bit of a hassle to him and he take the keys friend,really sorry House.

column1: Perfekt planering i Paris. Trevlig personal. Bra städning. Enkel standard i rum utan tv. Enkel, men god frukost.
column5: Perfect planning in Paris. Nice staff. Good housekeeping. Single standard rooms with no tv. Simple, but good breakfast.

column1:
Lejligheden ligger lige midt i Paris og det var rigtig nemt at komme rundet der var mange metroer meget tæt på. Man skal selvfølgelig også være opmærksom på at bor man midt i byen er der larm fredag lørdag aften fra gaden.
Elodie var en rigtig god host. Vi mødte ikke Elodie men kun hendes bror men jeg snakkede med Elodie da vi kom til lufthavnen og hun sørgede for at hendes bror kunne lukke os ind og bar endda vores baggage op på værelset fordi vi kom noget tidligt, fin service :)
column5:
The apartment is located right in the middle of Paris and it was really easy to get rounded there were many metros very close. Of course one must also be aware that if you live in the middle of the city there is noise on Friday, Saturday night from the street.
Elodie was a great host. We did not meet Elodie but only her brother but I talked with Elodie when we got to the airport and she made sure that her brother could let us in and bar, even our luggage up in the room because we got something early, great service :)

column1: I am a returning customer. So it says it all!
column5: I am a returning customer. So it says it all!

column1: Vi boede i den lille lejlighed i 3 overnatninger. Den er lidt slidt. Men placeringen er fantastisk. Køleskabet virker ikke. Kommunikationen kanvære lidt træg, men når først der er hul igennem så lykkedes det...ihverttilfælde for os. Men igen hvis det bare er for overnatning og et bad om morgenen så ligger den helt perfekt lige bag hallerne. Og der ligger gode restauranter lige rundt om. Vi kunne sagtens finde på at bruge den igen.
column5: We lived in the little apartment for 3 nights. It is a little worn. But the location is great. The fridge does not work. Communication kanvære a little sluggish, but once there is a hole through so we managed...ihverttilfælde for us. But again if it's just for the night and a shower in the morning so is it absolutely perfect just behind the halls. And there are nice restaurants just around the. We could easily find to use it again.

column1:
Værten var meget informerende og skrev også til mig under opholdet. Beskrivelsen og billederne af lejligheden passede meget overens med hinanden. Desværre ligger lejligheden lidt langt væk fra centrum og de fede steder, men man kunne gå til toget på 5 minutter, så det var ikke noget stort problem.

Alt i alt en god oplevelse
column5:
The host was very informative and also wrote to me during your stay. The description and the pictures of the apartment suited very consistent with each other. Unfortunately, the apartment is a bit far away from the centre and the cool places, but you could go to the train in 5 minutes, so it was no great problem.

All in all a good experience

column1:
Flot lys studio - perfekt til en romantisk uge i Paris for to. Der var meget rent og pænt, og studioen ligger i et roligt område. 

Kommunikationen med Ana var perfekt, hun kontaktede os i god tid om det praktiske. Hun havde i øvrigt sørget for vand, juice m.m. da vi ankom, hvilket fik os til at føle os utrolig velkomne. Vi kan derfor klart anbefale Anas hyggelige studio!
column5:
Nice bright studio - perfect for a romantic week in Paris for two. It was very clean and neat, and the studio is located in a quiet area. 

The communication with Ana was perfect, she contacted us in good time about the practical. She had, moreover, arranged for water, juice ft.m. when we arrived, which made us feel incredibly welcome. We can therefore definitely recommend ana's cosy studio!

column1: Maurices bolig er beliggende et stenkast fra Sacre Cæur, så du skal op af en helvedes masse trapper eller skråninger men tilgengæld er udsigten fra området helt fantastisk! Lejligheden er ren og overskuelig, den har hvad man skal bruge til en weekend-tur og er helt optimal til det formål. Vi var i hvert fald rigtig glade for at bo der!
column5: Maurices home is located a stone's throw from the Sacre Cæur, so you need to up of a hell of a lot of stairs or slopes, but on the other hand is the view from the area absolutely amazing! The apartment is clean and uncluttered, it has what you need for a weekend trip and is quite optimal for this purpose. We were very happy to stay there!

column1: Bon voyage
column5: Good trip

column1: Dejligt ophold i Florianes lille studio. Perfekt beliggenhed tæt på Cacre Coeur og metro. Både supermarkeder, bager og restauranter helt tæt på. Rent og pænt, fint lille køkken med alt det nødvendige. Floriane var meget hjælpsom ved ankomst og super fleksibel omkring vores udtjekning. Kan varmt anbefale hendes sted, hvis ikke man har brug for så meget plads og komfort.
column5: Lovely stay in Florianes small studio. Perfect location close to the Cacre Coeur and the metro. Both supermarkets, bakery and restaurants very close to you. Clean and neat, nice little kitchen with everything needed. Floriane was very helpful on arrival and super flexible about our check-out. Can highly recommend her place, if you do not have use for so much space and comfort.

column1:
Floriane er en utrolig hjælpsom værtinde. Svarede hurtigt på spørgsmål inden afrejse. Skrev tips til os under opholdet.
Lejligheden er meget TINY APARTMENT men fin og ren. Beliggenheden er helt unik..ikke mange turister,hyggelige lokale cafeer og samtidig tæt på alting! -vi kommer helt sikkert tilbage
column5:
Floriane is an incredibly helpful hostess. Responded quickly to questions before departure. Wrote tips for us during the stay.
The apartment is very TINY APARTMENT but nice and clean. The location is quite unique..not many tourists,quaint local cafes and at the same time close to everything! -we will definitely go back

column1: Dejlig lejlighed med virkelig god beliggenhed.
column5: Nice apartment with really good location.

column1: A good location for visiting Université Paris Sorbonne.
column5: A good location for visiting the University of Paris Sorbonne.

column1: Virkelig dejlig og hyggelig lejlighed! Stan var en skøn og meget hjælpsom vært med alt fra hjælp til transport til tips til kvarteret. Anbefales !
column5: Really nice and cosy apartment! Stan was a wonderful and very helpful host with everything from assistance with transportation to tips to the neighborhood. Recommended !

column1:
Vi fik en meget god modtagelse på kontoret, flinke, engelsk talende og hjælpsomme. 
Beskrivelse og billeder af lejligheden er autentiske og passer med virkeligheden. 
Der er forventelig storbystøj fra gaden, hvilket er charmerende. 
Der er indkøbsmuligheder, i naboejendommene. 
God kontakt fra bureauet op til ankomst.
column5:
We got a very good reception in the office, staff is friendly, English speaking and helpful. 
Description and pictures of the apartment is authentic and fits with reality. 
There is likely storbystøj from the street, which is charming. 
There are shopping opportunities, in naboejendommene. 
Good contact from the agency up to the date of arrival.

column1:
Dette studio ligger i et rigtig hyggeligt område, med et supermarked tæt på, samt bank og restauranter. Desuden tog det kun 10-15 minutter at gå ned til Les Halles og Centre Pompidou (1. arr). Beliggenheden var altså i top. Men desværre levede lejligheden ikke helt op til de lovede standarter. Der var meget beskidt, og udstyret i køkkenet var ikke vasket ordentligt op. Desuden skriver værten, at han vil sørge for at der er gaver, såsom tandbørste, shampoo og 'pastry' ved ankomsten, men det var der altså ikke. Der var godt nok nogle efterladte shampoo-flasker fra folk der havde lejet det tidligere, men der var ikke andet. Og 'pastry' indebærer en halvspist pakke kiks fra supermarkedet. 
Dog er den franske altan rigtig lækker, og der ligger en frokostcafé lige ved siden af (La Parenthese), som serverer nogle vildt lækre grillede sandwiches - derudover er der gratis wifi og en servitrice som er englænder, hvis man har brug for at spørge om noget angående byen. Caféen kan anbefales! 

 Evt medbring egen pude, da der kun lå 1 på sengen da vi ankom...
column5:
This studio is located in a really nice area, with a supermarket close by, as well as the bank and restaurants. In addition, it took only 10-15 minutes to walk down to Les Halles and the Centre Pompidou (1. arr). The location was in the top. But, unfortunately, lived the apartment not quite up to the promised standards. It was very dirty, and the equipment in the kitchen was not washed up properly. Also write the host, that he will make sure that there are gifts such as toothbrush, shampoo and 'pastry' on arrival, but it was not. That was good enough some survivors shampoo bottles from people who had rented it earlier, but there was nothing. And the 'pastry' implies a halvspist packet of biscuits from the supermarket. 
However, is the French balcony really delicious, and there is a frokostcafé right next to the (La Parenthese), which serves some of the game delicious grilled sandwiches - in addition, there is free wifi and a waitress who is an englishman, if you need asking anything regarding the city. The café can be recommended! 

Possibly bring your own pillow as there was only 1 on the bed when we arrived...

column1:
Perfekt belikkenhed
Nedslidt lejlighed
Ulovlig og farligt elarbejder
column5:
Perfect, warm
Worn-down apartment
Illegal and dangerous elarbejder

column1: Lejligheden ligger meget tæt på Triumfbuen og metroen og ikke mindst Champs-Élysées. Fik informationer fra værten i god tid og blev kontaktet af ham som skulle give mig nøglen, inden vi tog fra Danmark. Var hele tiden tryg ved lejeaftalen. Kan varmt anbefale lejligheden.
column5: The apartment is located very close to the arc de Triomphe and the metro, and, not least, the Champs-Élysées. Got the information from the host in good time and was contacted by him which should give me the key before we took from Denmark. The whole time was not comfortable with the rental agreement. Can highly recommend the apartment.

column1: Vi har været på den skønneste 5 dages tur til Paris, og Elodies lille fine lejlighed er perfekt med en lille balkon hvor vi tilbragte en hel del tid med at drikke morgenkaffen, spise brunch som vi lavede i det lille køkken der er i lejligheden. Vi sad der også med et koldt glas lokalt hvidvin, og om aftenen hyggede vi os også der alt imens vi betragtede trafikken og folk på gaden. Lejligheden har den perfekte placering tæt på alt i Paris. Vi håber meget på at komme tilbage til Paris igen og så booker vi meget gerne den samme lejlighed
column5: We have been on the most wonderful 5 day trip to Paris, and Elodies small fine apartment is perfect with a small balcony where we spent quite a bit of time to drink a coffee, eat brunch as we did in the small kitchen in the apartment. We sat there also with a cold glass of local white wine, and in the evening had a good time, we are also there all the while we watched the traffic and people on the street. The apartment has the perfect location close to everything in Paris. We very much hope to come back to Paris again, and so the booker we very much like the same apartment

column1: Super god lejlighed med alt hvad jeg havde brug for . Alex var virkelig god til at guide hen til lejligheden og blev taget rigtig godt imod . Skønt sted hvor fra jeg kunne gå rundt til hele Paris .
column5: Super good apartment with everything I needed . Alex was really good to guide to the apartment and was taken really well against . Although the place from where I could go around to all of Paris .

column1: Alt fungerede perfekt. Lejligheden ligger hyggeligt i baghus på 4. sal med gode cafeer, lokale butikker og museer i gåafstand. Hele byen er indenfor rækkevidde med metro. Skønt ophold.
column5: Everything worked perfectly. The apartment is cozy in the parlor at 4. floor with good cafes, local shops and museums within walking distance. The entire city is within reach with the metro. Although stay.

column1: John er en god og hjælpsom vært. Området er livligt, og man kan ikke undgå at høre og mærke livet i gaden og metroen. Lejligheden er bedst egnet til to overnattende gæster.
column5: John is a good and helpful host. The area is lively and one can't avoid to hear and feel the life in the street and the subway. The apartment is best suited for two guests.

column1: fantastisk sted, god info om transport og alt hvad der skal bruges i området. Boligen kan ikke ligge mere centralt og der er hvad man har brug for i lejligheden. på trods af beliggenheden var der meget roligt og sikkerheden i top.
column5: great place, good info about transport and everything required in the area. The home can not be more central and that is what you need in the apartment. despite the location was very quiet and the security of the top.

column1: Hyggeligt men lille lejlighed med super beliggenhed.
column5: Cozy but small apartment with a super location.

column1:
Denne lejlighed er virkelig god til to venner/veninder, der gerne vil have hvert sit værelse.
Den er simpelt indrettet, og der er alt,hvad der skal være i lejligheden.
Beliggenheden er også god.
column5:
This apartment is really good for two friends/girlfriends, who would like to have each one its room.
It is simply decorated and there is everything that should be in the apartment.
The location is also good.

column1: Lucie var virkelig sød, glad og hjælpsom. Lejligheden var ren og klar til benyttelse. Den levede fuldt ud op til beskrivelsen. Den lå MEGET centralt og vi brugte ikke Metro eller bus en eneste gang og vi så mange seværdigheder. Lucie bor lige inde ved siden af, så man kunne nemt komme i kontakt, også via SMS. Vi er MEGET tilfredse med vores ophold og kommer helt sikkert igen!
column5: Lucie was really sweet, happy and helpful. The apartment was clean and ready for use. It fully lived up to the description. The location is VERY good and we did not use the Metro or bus a single time and we saw many sights. Lucie lives right inside, so you could easily get in touch, also via SMS. We are VERY happy with our stay and will definitely go again!

column1: PERFEKT lille lejlighed, ligger MEGET centralt til rigtig mange ting... Der var rent og pænt, og en meget sød vært. Vi kommer helt sikkert tilbage en anden gang. Vi kan helt sikkert anbefale lejligheden til andre
column5: PERFECT little apartment, is VERY central to many things... It was nice, and a very sweet host. We will definitely go back a second time. We can certainly recommend the apartment to others

column1: Vi boede 2 voksne og 2 børn på 10 og 13 år i Veroniques lejlighed. Lejligheden er super charmerende og området er perfekt, hvis man vil lidt væk fra turismens hovedstrøg og samtidig være i et levende, pænt og """"hipt"""" område. Der er kun 10 min gang til Place de la Republique, men det er en helt anden verden. Der er mange gode og billige restauranter i området og anderledes butikker. Lejligheden havde alt hvad vi havde brug for. Og den er meget """"stille"""", da den ligger inde i baggården. Véronique var en super vært. Altid hurtig respons og gav gode tips til vores ophold. Vi kan på det varmeste anbefale at bo i lejligheden.
column5: We stayed 2 adults and 2 children 10 and 13 years in Veroniques apartment. The apartment is super charming and the area is perfect if you want a little away from the tourism in the world and at the same time be in a vibrant, nicely and """"hip"""" area. There is only a 10 min walk to Place de la Republique, but it's a totally different world. There are many good and cheap restaurants in the area and different shops. The apartment had everything we needed. And it is very """"ask""""since it is located in the backyard. Véronique was a super host. Always quick response and gave good tips for our stay. We can warmly recommend to stay in the apartment.

column1: Virkelig god, hyggelig, enkel og velfungerende lejlighed til 2 personer. Fantastisk beliggenhed med to metro-linjer på nærmeste station. Praktik og kommunikation fungerede upåklageligt. Kan virkelig anbefales.
column5: Really good, cozy, simple and well-functioning apartment for 2 persons. Great location with two subway lines at the nearest station. Training and communication worked flawlessly. Can really recommended.

column1:
Vi boede lige midt i Paris i Marleens lille hyggelige lejlighed. Ingen larm fra byen-og alligevel i gå afstand fra alt -lige fra Notre Dame til shopping.
Kan anbefales til 2 personer :-)
column5:
We lived right in the heart of Paris in Marleens small cosy apartment. No noise from the city-and yet in walking distance from everything-from Notre Dame to the shopping.
Can be recommended for 2 persons :-)

column1:
Alexanders bolig er spændende i sin rå indretning og værkstedskarakter. Tilpas størrelse ogfin beliggenhed tæt ved mange centrale steder i Paris. 
De store jernvinduer giver et fantastisk lys og et lækkert interieur. 
Vi kommer tilbage 
Jeppe & Jørgen
column5:
Alexander's home is exciting in its raw interior and værkstedskarakter. Resize ogfin location near many key places in Paris. 
The big jernvinduer gives a great light and a nice interieur. 
We will come back 
Jeppe & Jørgen

column1: 저스틴과 게일, 귀여운 아기들이 따뜻하게 맞아준 숙소였습니다. 에어비앤비를 많이 이용했지만 현지인들의 생활을 가까이서 볼수있었던 좋은 기억이네요. 유머러스한 저스틴과 다정한 게일, 귀여운 아기들과 고양이까지 모두모두 좋은 추억입니다. 함께 한 저녁식사도 잊지 못할 것 같아요
column5: Justin and Gale, cute babies a warm welcome stay. Airbnb, a lot of this, but the local people's life to see up close were a good memory. Humorous Justin and affectionate Gale, cute baby and cat all up all the good memories. With one dinner you won't forget, I guess

column1:
Fin lejlighed med alt det vi havde brug for. Tæt på offentlig trafik.

Eneste minus var, at det var lidt upraktisk, at der ikke var håndvask i samme rum som toilettet, men at man skulle ind i rummet ved siden af for at vaske hænder. 
Men kan man leve med det, er det en rigtig god lejlighed.

Værten var rigtig flink, fleksibel og god til at svare på de spørgsmål vi havde.
Vi anbefaler gerne Flora' s lejlighed, og ville selv overveje den en anden gang hvis vi skulle til Paris igen.
column5:
Nice apartment with everything we needed. Close to public traffic.

Only minus was that it was a little inconvenient that there was not a sink in the same room as the toilet, but to check in the room next door to wash hands. 
But can you live with it, it is a really good opportunity.

The host was really nice, flexible and good to answer the questions we had.
We recommend Flora's apartment, and would even consider a second time if we were going to Paris again.

column1:
Vi havde en dejlig ferie i Paris, blant andet på grund af lejlighedens placering. Vi brugte ikke stedet til andet en at sove og gå i bad, og til det formål er det rigtig fint. 
Køkkenet så ud til at være udstyret med nok ting til at man kunne lave lidt mad, men vi brugte det dog ikke, da der var mange hyggelige restauranter og caféer lige ude for døren.
Vi er personligt til en hård seng, så vi var meget tilfreds med sengen, på trods af at den lå på gulvet. Hvis man holder af en blød seng vil man nok sove dårligt. 
Det var ærgerlig at internettet ikke virkede.
Poul er god til at svare tilbage, så snart man har et spørgsmål, og det var let at finde stedet og låse sig ind.
column5:
We had a lovely holiday in Paris, including due to the location of the apartment. We did not use the site to another one to sleep and go in the bath, and to this end, it is really fine. 
The kitchen looked to be equipped with enough stuff to make some food, but we used it not, however, as there were many cozy restaurants and cafes just out the door.
Personally we have to a hard bed, so we were very pleased with the bed, despite the fact that it lay on the floor. If you like a soft bed you will probably sleep poorly. 
It was annoying that the internet wasn't working.
Paul is good to respond back as soon as you have a question, and it was easy to find the place and lock in.

column1: Teddy var veldig hjelpsom og svarte veldig raskt på meldingene. Boligen var rent og pent. Rommet ligger i bakgården så det var rolig om kvelden. Det var restauranter, puber og dagligvareforretninger i nærheten.
column5: Teddy was very helpful and responded very quickly to messages. The accommodation was clean and nicely. The room is located in the backyard so it was quiet at night. There were restaurants, pubs and grocery stores nearby.

column1: Værten var meget informativ, og hjælpsom inden vores ankomst. Behagelig og hurtig feed-back på spørgsmål. Stor fleksibilitet.
column5: The host was very informative and helpful prior to our arrival. Comfortable and quick feed-back on issues. Big flexibility.

column1: Ikke kæmpestort, men pænt og rent i et, for Paris, roligt kvarter. En utrolig hjælpsom og imødekommende vært.
column5: Not huge, but clean and in a, for Paris, quiet neighborhood. An incredibly helpful and accommodating host.

column1: Marion er en super vært og hurtig til at svare på eventuelle spørgsmål. Meget fleksibel, sød og rar. Lejligheden ligger helt perfekt på Montmarte og svarer fint til, hvad man ser på billederne. Vi vil helt sikkert anbefale Marion som vært!
column5: Marion is a great host and quick to answer any questions. Very flexible, sweet and nice. The apartment is absolutely perfect on Montmarte and similar fine to what you see in the pictures. We will definitely recommend Marion as a host!

column1: Rositas lejlighed har en helt fantastisk udsigt til både Eiffeltårnet og Sacré Coeur samt det meste af Paris. Lejligheden er ren og rummelig til to personer, der er hvad der skal være. Helt klart et ganske dejlig sted at bo i Paris.
column5: Rositas apartment has an absolutely amazing view of both the Eiffel tower and Sacré Coeur as well as the most of Paris. The apartment is clean and spacious for two people, which is what should be. Clearly a quite nice place to stay in Paris.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed. Meget venlig udlejer. Ligger lige ved saint Michel. Intet støj fra vejen, hvilket var rart da det var meget varmt. Ligger på 5 sal med trapper, så medtag gode ben :-)
column5: Lovely apartment. Very friendly landlord. Located next to saint Michel. No noise from the road, which was nice since it was very hot. Is on the 5 floor by stairs, so include good bones :-)

column5: Very orderly and caring host. The home was very nice and clean and corresponds very well to the pictures. Very well-maintained. We had everything we needed in a small veludnyttet apartment. The location is absolutely top notch, with lots of cafes and shopping close by.

column1:
Rigtig dejlig bolig med perfekt beliggenhed i nærheden af både butikker, metro station og caféer. Lejligheden var rigtig hyggelig og lignede fuldstændig billederne.

Alt i alt en meget anbefalelsværdig bolig.

Really nice accommodation with a perfect location near shops, metro station and cafes. The apartment was really nice and looked like complete pictures. 
Barbara received us and handed over the key was super sweet and very helpful. 

All in all a very anbefalelsværdig housing.

column1: Super fin lejlighed til prisen. Ligger i et godt og roligt kvarter. Rent og hyggeligt.

column1: Superhyggelig lejlighed i midten af Paris. Samtidligt en stille lejlighed, med fin udsigt over Paris baggårdmiljø. Kan klart anbefales til en god weekend i Paris for 2 personer.
column5: Superhyggelig apartment in the middle of Paris. Samtidligt a quiet apartment, with fine views over Paris baggårdmiljø. Can be clearly recommended for a good weekend in Paris for 2 persons.

column1:
Værten er hurtig til at svare og behjælpelig. Det er gennem et større udlejningsfirma kaldet Habitat. 

Lejligheden mangler personlighed, kærlighed og en del udskiftning af fx interiør. Lejligheden er virkelig charmerende i sig selv - men det er tydeligt, at den kun lejes ud, og at der ikke er nogle privat, der bor der. Sengen var gået i stykker, TV og musikanlæg virkede ikke. Generelt lidt havde lejligheden en del mangler i forhold til den høje pris. Dette håber vi, at de fremover vil gøre noget ved, da lejligheden som sagt er rigtig fin i sig selv og ligger i et hyggeligt (dog turistet) område.

Placeringen er genial, hvis du besøger Paris for første gang. Tæt på Notre Dame, seinen, direkte tog til lufthavnen Charles de Gaulle og gåafstand fra mange steder. Dog midt i et meget turistet område.
column5:
The host is quick to respond and helpful. It is through a larger rental company called Habitat. 

The apartment lacks personality, love, and a part replacement of the fx interior. The apartment is really charming in itself - but it is clear that the only rented out, and that there is some private, who live there. The bed was broken, TV and music system did not work. General had little occasion a part is missing compared to the high price. This, we hope that in the future, they will do something by, as the apartment as I said is really nice in itself and is situated in a cosy (but touristy) area.

The location is brilliant if you are visiting Paris for the first time. Close to Notre Dame, the seine, the direct train to Charles de Gaulle airport, and walking distance from many places. However, in the middle of a very touristy area.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed. godt indrettet og der er dejligt stille og roligt. Alt gik perfekt. Ligger lige i hjertet af Marie. Passer godt til 4 personer. Vi havde en god ferie i Paris.

column1: Juliettes lejlighed var dejlig rummelig og hyggelig. Kvarteret ved kanalen er levende og med masser af gode spisesteder og caféer. Perfekt udgangspunkt for ture rundt i byen. Alt fungerede fint, og Juliette vendte hurtigt tilbage på vores forespørgsler inden ankomsten. Hun var meget imødekommende og lod os checke ud sent, fordi vores fly fra Paris først var om aftenen. Ingen problemer og klart en anbefaling herfra.
column5: Juliette offers apartment was nice, spacious and cozy. The channel is live and with plenty of good restaurants and cafes. Perfect starting point for trips around the city. Everything worked fine, and Juliette turned back quickly to our queries prior to arrival. She was very accommodating and let us check out late because our flight from Paris was only about the evening. No problems and is clearly a recommendation from here.

column1:
Pierre var meget venlig og imødekommende. Han tog imod os og viste os lejligheden, og gav et par tips til området. Lejligheden var fantastisk og endnu bedre end vi havde forventet. Dejlig stue/køkken, fint bad og soveværelse med massere af skabsbplads. 
Kvarteret i sig selv er efter min mening det hyggeligste i Paris og vi tilbragte det meste af vores ophold i området omkring lejligheden. Selve lejligheden lå super godt og i gåafstand til de fleste seværdigheder. 
Alt i alt var vi meget glade for at bo her og vil til hver en tid vende tilbage.
column5:
Pierre was very friendly and welcoming. He welcomed us and showed us the apartment, gave a couple of tips for the area. The apartment was fantastic and even better than we had expected. Lovely living room/kitchen, fine bathroom and bedroom with lots of skabsbplads. 
The neighbourhood itself is, in my opinion, the friendliest in Paris and we spent most of our stay in the area around the apartment. The apartment itself was super good and in walking distance to most sights. 
All in all we were very happy to stay here and will return.

column1: Det var en rigtig dejlig oplevelse at bo hos Hugues, der var rent og pænt. Hugues var venlig og hjælpsom, og gav en god vejledning til nær området og til Paris. Vi kan varmt anbefale stedet.
column5: It was a really nice experience to stay at Hugues, who was very kind and helpful. Hugues was friendly and helpful, and gave a good guide to the near field and to Paris. We can highly recommend the place.

column1: Meget centralt beliggende lejlighed med fantastiske muligheder for at se nærmere på det vidunderlige Paris. Der er masser af muligheder for at besøge restauranter, cafeer lige nede på gaden. Nedgangen til en metro station (St. Michel) er indenfor 200 meter. Notre Dame ligger kun 600 meter fra lejligheden.
column5: Very centrally located apartment with fantastic opportunities to look closely at the wonderful Paris. There are plenty of opportunities to visit restaurants, cafes just down the street. The decline to a metro station (St Michel) is within 200 metres. Notre Dame is only 600 metres from the apartment.
