column1:
Værtinden Nina svarede os hurtigt på alle vores henvendelser. Og hun var i galleriet til at tage imod os og vise os til rette. 

Det er et fantastisk galleri, der ligger virkeligt fint i den centrale galleri-gade Rue Quincampoix - og lige op til Pompidoux-centret. Bygningen har elementer helt tilbage fra 1600-tallet - så hvis man er til kunst og historiens vingesus, finder man sig hurtigt til rette :)

Alting i galleriet er af fin standard - der er kaffemaskine, opvaskemaskine etc. Sengene er udtrækssofaer, der også er fine at sove i.

Det eneste minus ved boligen er, at der en del larm fra vandrør mv. Man kan høre, når andre tager bad og går på toilettet. Det suser og løber ret højlydt, da de store rør går igennem galleriets nederste etage. Vi sov med ørepropper!

Tak for et dejligt sted og en dejlig velkomst!
column5:
The hostess Nina responded to us quickly on all our requests. And she was in the gallery to greet us and show us to the right. 

It is a fantastic gallery that is really fine in the central gallery-the Rue Quincampoix - and right up to the Pompidoux centre. The building has elements dating back to the 1600s - so if you are into art and history, takes you quickly to the right :)

Everything in the gallery is of excellent standard - there is a coffee machine, dishwasher etc. The beds are udtrækssofaer, there also are fine to sleep in.

The only bad thing about the tabernacle is that there was a lot of noise from water pipes etc. You can hear when the other takes a bath and goes to the toilet. It hurries and runs quite loudly, as the big pipe goes through the gallery's lower floor. We slept with ear plugs!

Thank you for a lovely place and a lovely welcome!

column1: Leatitia, eller Sweet Inn, fik os til at føle os meget velkommen. De var klar til at tage imod os i lejligheden, som lå perfekt i forhold til nogle af de mest kendte sights i Paris. Lejligheden var ren og dejlig. Under opholdet blev jeg kontaktet flere gange, fordi de ville høre, om alt var, som det skulle være. Kan varmt anbefales, at booke denne lejlighed.
column5: Leatitia, or Sweet Inn, made us feel very welcome. They were ready to welcome us in the apartment, which was perfect compared to some of the most well-known sights in Paris. The apartment was clean and nice. During the stay I was approached several times because they would hear if everything was as it should be. Can highly recommend to book this apartment.

column1:
Vores vært modtog os med varme & bar kufferter op.
Lejligheden, der var smukt og enkelt renoveret, var pinligt ren, og værten havde sørget for kaffe & the samt lækre Madeleine kager. En god flaske vin og to glas stod fremme! Udsigt over Paris's tage - alt som i beskrivelsen. En bog over Paris lå parat ligesom henvisning til gode spisesteder. Meget nyttigt og betænksomt.
WiFi fungerede upåklageligt.
Lokaliteten af lejligheden var perfekt, midt i det smukke & livlige le Marais kvarter. Små caféer og fine butikker overalt i kvarteret. Tæt ved Metro & taxaholdeplads.
Fleksibel udchekning, der gjorde, at vi fik næsten en hel ekstra dag i Paris.
Tak for et perfekt ophold. Elva og Marie Louise
column5:
Our host received us with warmth & bar trunks up.
The apartment, which was beautifully and simply renovated, was painfully clean, and the host had provided for the coffee & the, as well as the delicious Madeleine cakes. A good bottle of wine and two glasses stood promotion! A view over Paris's roofs - all as in the description. A book of the city of Paris was prepared like reference to good eateries. Very useful and thoughtful.
WiFi worked flawlessly.
The location of the apartment was perfect, in the middle of the beautiful & lively le Marais neighbourhood. Small cafes and fine shops everywhere in the neighborhood. Close to Metro & taxi rank.
Flexible opulence, which meant that we got almost a whole extra day in Paris.
Thank you for a perfect stay. Elva and Marie Louise

column1:
Virkelig fed lejlighed! Nøjagtig som på billederne - pladsen er utrolig godt udnyttet, og den indeholde alle de nødvendige basis ting. Rigtig venlige værter som vi kunne kontakte uden problemer gennem hele forløbet. Alt forløb fuldstændig uproblematisk, også selvom vores fly blev forsinket, og vi derfor måtte aftale nye tidspunkter osv. angående nøgleudlevering. 
Dejligt område med både liv og ro på samme tid - derudover ligger den kun få minutters gang fra diverse butikker og metro. 
Alt i alt en rigtig god oplevelse - kan varmt anbefales, hvis du vil have din egen rolige base i en by med masser af liv. Kæmpe thumbs up herfra!
column5:
Really bold apartment! Exactly as in the pictures - the space is incredibly well utilized, and include all the necessary basis things. Really friendly hosts that we be able to contact without problems through the entire course. Went completely smoothly, even though our flight was delayed, and we therefore had to deal the new times, etc. regarding the handover of the keys. 
Nice area with both life and peace at the same time - there are only a few minutes ' walk from various shops and the metro. 
All in all a very good experience - highly recommended if you want to have your own quiet base in a city with lots of life. Big thumbs up from here!

column1: Dejligt sted. Rent, varmt og en betænksom vært. Kan klart anbefales.

column1: Vi var meget tilfredse med opholdet hos Nana. Lejligheden var lille men indeholdte alt hvad man behøver! Den lå i et dejligt område i Paris, og var pæn og ren! Nana var super sød og opmærksom samt behjælpelig ved behov! Check ind, check ud osv gik nemt.
column5: We were very satisfied with the stay at the Nana. The apartment was small but contained everything you need! It was in a nice area in Paris, and was neat and clean! Nana was super sweet and attentive and helpful when needed! Check in, check out etc was easy.

column1: Området omkring lejligheden er super med Belleville og masser af gastronomi til ok priser. Men hvis man er sensitiv overfor køkken/bad, der ikke er rent/ikke er up to date og ikke er funktionelt, så er stedet no go. Resten af lejligheden er typisk boheme chik og der er hvad der skal være.
column5: The area around the apartment is super with Belleville and plenty of gastronomy to ok prices. But if you are sensitive to kitchen/bath not clean/not up to date and not functional, then this is the place no go. The rest of the apartment is typically bohemian chic and that is what should be.

Meget fin beskrivelse, selvom det at skulle bruge 3 koder for at komme ind,  måske ikke var verdens letteste adgang.

column5:
Very fine description, although the having to use 3 codes to enter, perhaps not the world's easiest access.
Marie is an incredibly sweet and helpful person, which spends time on his lodger, when they bump into problems. Well done!!

column5: A fine home for a young couple who want to stay close to Montmartra. But for pensioners a bit of discomfort.

column1: Lejligheden levede helt op til de forventninger vi havde fået ud fra billederne. Virkelig god, central beliggenhed. Rydelig og ren da vi ankom, hvor vi også blev informeret om wifikode, rene håndklæder og sengetøj i et fint velkomstbrev.
column5: The apartment lived up to the expectations we had from the pictures. Really good, central location. Rydelig and clean when we arrived, where we were also informed about the wifikode, clean towels and bed linen in a fine welcome letter.

column1:
Virginies lejlighed var utrolig hyggelig og pænt indrettet. Lejligheden ligger godt placeret kun få hundrede meter fra Sacre Coeur. Metro 4 og 12 går næsten lige til døren. 
Vi havde nogle dejlige dage i Paris og kan varmt anbefale Virginies lejlighed.
column5:
Virginies apartment was incredibly cozy and nicely decorated. The apartment is well located only a few hundred metres from the Sacre Coeur. Metro 4 and 12 goes almost right to the door. 
We had some wonderful days in Paris and can highly recommend Virginies apartment.

column1: Margaux var virkelig sød og hjælpsom. Vi følte os meget velkomne. Det var en charmenrede lille lejlighed, perfekt placeret i et dejligt område af Paris med hyggelige gader, caféer og restauranter. Det kan helt sikkert anbefales.
column5: Margaux was really sweet and helpful. We felt us very welcome. It was a charmenrede small apartment, perfectly located in a lovely area of Paris with its streets, cafés and restaurants. It can certainly be recommended.

column1: Meget lille lejlighed, men med alt hvad vi havde brug for. Ligger i trygt område, og med mange muligheder for lækker mad lige rundt om hjørnet. En del støj fra gaden når skraldemændene kom eller restaurantgæsterne gik hjem, men sådan er det i en storby.
column5: Very small apartment, but with everything we needed. Located in the safe area, and with many options of delicious food just around the corner. A part of noise from the street when the bin men came or restaurant guests can went home, but it is in a big city.

column5: Super ligging

column1:
Lejligheden ligger i et hyggeligt nabolag med mange butikker og i gåafstand til hele den venstre bred.

Billederne beskriver fint lejligheden. For os føltes den dog lidt for privat, idet der stadig var tøj i skabene og mad i køkkenskabene og i fryseren, så vi følte lidt, at vi trængte os på.
column5:
The apartment is located in a cozy neighborhood with many shops and in walking distance to the whole of the left bank.

The pictures describes the fine apartment. For us it felt like the dog a little too private, since there were still clothes in the closets and food in the pantry and in the freezer, so we felt that we needed us.

column1: Meget bra og moderne leilighet med det man trenger av fasiliteter. God beliggendhet i et tilbaketrukket nabolag. Verten er pålitelig, hyggelig og imøtekommende. Anbefales!
column5: Very clean and modern apartment with the need of the facilities. Good beliggendhet in a secluded neighborhood. The host is reliable, pleasant and attentive. Recommended!

column1:
Alt var flott, bortsett fra en del støy fra rehabiliteringsarbeid i bygningen ved siden av.
Ellers et rolig og trygt nabolag med alt av bekvemmeligheter rundt.
column5:
Everything was great, apart from some noise from the rehabiliteringsarbeid in the building next door.
Otherwise a quiet and safe neighbourhood with all amenities around.

column1:
Fin lejlighed. Rigtig god beliggenhed. Ingen trafikstøj når døren er lukket.
Meget hjælpsom og venlig ejer Francois.
De to soveværelser ligger i kælderen. Det ene soveværelse er gennemgangsrum. Lidt svært at se på billederne hvordan lejligheden er indrettet. 
Meget fugtigt og kælderlugt i kælderen - på trods af udluftningssystem.
Selvom der kun var 25 grader varmt i Paris var der meget varmt i lejligheden. 
Lejligheden mangler aircondition. Det vil være godt at få installeret både i stue og kælder. 
Man kan ikke åbne nogen vinduer, kun hoveddøren (som åbner ud til passagen) og et lille vindue over døren. 
Dynerne var meget tunge og varme.
column5:
Fine apartment. The location was great. No traffic noise when the door is closed.
Very helpful and friendly owner, Francois.
The two bedrooms are located in the basement. The one bedroom is gennemgangsrum. A little hard to see in the pictures how the apartment is furnished. 
Very humid and kælderlugt in the basement - in spite of the venting system.
Although there were only 25 degrees in Paris was very hot in the apartment. 
The apartment lacks air conditioning. It will be good to have installed both in the living room and basement. 
You can't open any windows, only the front door (which opens out to the passage) and a small window above the door. 
The duvets were very heavy and warm.

column1: Studio très bien située et très gentille hôte.
column5: Studio very well located and very nice host.

column5: Perfetto studio for visiting Paris!

column5: We were received by one of vincent's friends when he was out of town, the reception was warm and cordial, we felt the ice cream was well-received. column1: På forhånd fekk vi tilsendt ein fleire siders beskrivelse av leilighet, korleis komme dit, internet, nabolag mm Vi vart møtt av ein representant for verten i leiligheita som avtalt. Leiligheita ligg i 5 etasje og der var heis, men heisa var ekstremt trang, berre plass til en person.  Gangavstand til Gare de Nord og flere Metrostasjonar og busser.  Leiligheita ligg i ein eldre bygård, men den er nydelig modernisert og respektfullt pussa opp. 2 gode soverom med dobbeltseng. Ikkje mange gode sitteplassar for avslapping i stova. Greit nabolag med flere ok restauranter. Vi legger gjerne der igjen.
column5: In advance had we sent a several-page description of the apartment, how to get there, the internet, neighborhood mm We were met by a representative for the host in the leiligheita as agreed. Leiligheita is in the 5 floor and there was a lift, but the lift was extremely narrow, only space for one person. Walking distance to Gare de Nord and several Metrostasjonar and buses. Leiligheita is in an older apartment building, but it is beautifully modernized and respectful tipsy up. 2 good bedrooms with double bed. Not many good sitteplassar for relaxation in the sitting-room. Nice neighborhood with several ok restaurants. We lay there again.

Vi blev nød til at vaske ydermuren af fordi de lugtede for meget ind i lejligheden.
column5: Perfect location. The Ile Saint-Louis is quite central, lying between Marais and St. Germain. However, two negative comments. The apartment could have been cleaner and we had odour problems from the road. The apartment is located in the living room with only a window out to, and in the weekend was that pissed heavily in the street. We had to wash the outer wall of because they smelled too much into the apartment.

Ganske fin og ren lejlighed, som tilbyder det allermest nødvendige for et ophold på et par dage i Paris.

column5:
Very nice and clean apartment, which offers it really necessary for a stay of a few days in Paris. 
Benchohra was helpful to send us a schedule, which helped us from the airport and back to the apartment.
Kind and friendly introduction to the apartment of Benchohra's husband, when we arrived.
Big plus that the apartment is located very close to a metro station and city bikes. Also big plus that the slots from the apartment is flexible.

column1:
Vi boede i en uge  i Jean-Claudes lejlighed. Lejligheden lå som beskrevet lige midt i Marais - beliggenheden var helt perfekt.
Lejligheden var rigtig hyggelig. Ren og fin og personligt indrettet.
Vi følte os rigtig godt hjemme.
Jean-Claude var nem at få kontakt til, når vi havde brug for det, og han var rigtig god til at komme med forskellige tip, når vi spurgte.
Alt i alt en rigtig god oplevelse, som vi varmt kan anbefale til andre.
column5:
We stayed for a week in Jean-Claude's apartment. The apartment was as described, right in the middle of the Marais - everything was perfect.
The apartment was really nice. Clean and nice and personally decorated.
We felt really good at home.
Jean-Claude was easy to get in touch with when we needed it, and he was really good to come with different tip when we asked.
All in all a really good experience, which we can highly recommend to others.

column1: 위치는 정말 좋다. 홍대 연트럴파크 바로 앞에 집이 있는 기분이어서 그렇지. 놀긴 좋고 코하긴 쉽지않고. 요리는 포기하자. 근처 빵집도 맛있고, 마트도 가까이 있다. 해먹기엔 대부분이 동묘에서 산 것 같다. 이렇게 살면 엄니한테 등짝천대다. 분위기 자체는 낭만적이고, 위치도 좋아서 만족한다. 좋은 추억을 많이 만들고 왔다.
column5: The location is really good. Hongdae, contact the Park directly in front of the house there is a mood in it. Play good and code to easy without. Cooking abandon. Near the bakery is also delicious, Mart. Hammock end for the most part the same temple in the mountains. So if you live mom, such as sparkling Springs. The atmosphere itself is romantic, the location is also good. Lots of good memories made.

column1: Det var en fornøjelse at låne Brigittes studio over weekenden, og vi havde en fantastisk tur i den smukke by. Lejligheden havde alt, hvad vi behøvede og levede i den grad op til vores forventninger.
column5: It was a pleasure to lend Brigittes studio over the weekend, and we had a fantastic trip in the beautiful city. The apartment had everything we needed and lived up to our expectations.

column1: Vi havde en skøn uge i Sylvains charmerende og meget personlige lejlighed, hvor man træder ind i en """"Aladdins hule"""" af rejseminder og kunst. Vi parkerede bilen i tilhørende, privat P-hus, hvilket var et stort plus for os. Området er farverigt og passede lige til vores familie, lidt bohemestil med masser af cafeer, god shopping, lækker take away mad og kun venlige mennesker. Gå-afstand til de store seværdigheder, hvis man er klar på en dejlig travetur gennem Paris' charmerende gader. Sylvain tog imod os med god tid til at give os tips om byen og området og er i det hele taget en fantastisk og opmærksom vært. Vi kan ikke sige andet end at vi kommer tilbage til Sylvains lejlighed hvis overhovedet muligt på vores næste Paris besøg : vores to børn på 11 og 14 er helt enige.
column5: We had a wonderful week in Sylvains charming and very personal apartment, where one enters into a """"an Aladdin's cave"""" of mementos and art. We parked the car in its private car-park, which was a big plus for us. The area is colorful and was perfect for our family, a little bohemian style with lots of cafes, good shopping, delicious takeaway food and only friendly people. Walking distance to the major sights, if you are ready on a lovely ramble through Paris' charming streets. Sylvain welcomed us with good time to give us tips about the city and the area and is on the whole a fantastic and attentive host. We can not say other than that we come back to the Sylvains apartment if at all possible on our next Paris visit : our two children aged 11 and 14 totally agree.

column1: Det er en meget hyggelig lille Parisisk lejlighed i et skønt kvarter. Meget fransk på den bedste måde og meget tæt på Metro. Tæt på en af de lækreste små handelsgader med masser af små cafeer, restauranter og de lækreste delikatessebutikker.
column5: It is a very nice little Parisian apartment in a wonderful neighborhood. Very French in the best way and very close to the Metro. Close to one of the nicest small shopping streets with lots of small cafes, restaurants and the most delicious luxury food shops.

column1:
Lejligheden er rigtig lækker. Dejligt centralt beliggende, veludstyret og ren. Det var nemt at udforske Paris fra lejligheden. Gaden er relativt rolig i forhold til hvor centralt lejligheden ligger.
Vitalina er sød og hjælpsom, taler ok engelsk og gav et par tips til oplevelser. Jeg kan sagtens anbefale andre at bo her mens de er turister i Paris
column5:
The apartment is really delicious. Nice centrally located, well equipped and clean. It was easy to explore Paris from the apartment. The street is relatively quiet compared to how central the apartment is.
Vitalina is sweet and helpful, speaks ok English and gave a few tips for experiences. I can easily recommend others to stay here while they are tourists in Paris

column1:
Koselig lita leilighet, sentralt i Paris.

Vi hadde et kjempefint opphold hos Bea.

column5:
Cozy little apartment, centrally located in Paris.
Good description on arrival.
We had a terrific stay with Bea.
Can recommend this place.

column5: Maud is a great nice host. the apartment is extremely cozy and fit the description. The apartment is near the metro and transport to and from the airport is also easy.

column5: A real """"bijou"""" in the heart of Paris near a marvellous park. Charming owner. Staying like real """"parisiens"""" do. A delightful apartment! Phil, April 2018

column1: Vi var rigtig glade for at bo i Chokris lille pariser-lejlighed: Perfekt til par. Efter min mening var lejligheden mere rummelig i virkeligheden end på billederne. Der var hyggeligt, rent og Chokri havde sørget for nødvendigheder som håndklæder, sæbe, elkedel o.l. Jeg ved ikke om det er besøgende igennem tiderne, der har efterladt ting, men der var også te, kaffe osv. Chokri var lidt lang tid om at svare på vores beskeder i starten, så vi nåede lige at blive bekymrede for om han havde glemt at vi kom. Dog havde vi en rigtig fin korrespondance da vi først fik fat i ham. Alt i alt et rigtigt fint sted som vi helt klart vil anbefale andre, der gerne vil bo i et fredeligt, men smukt kvarter - dog tæt på metro st. Wagram, så man nemt kan opsøge alle de dejlige seværdigheder i Paris.
column5: We were really happy to stay in the Chokris small parisian apartment: Perfect for couples. In my opinion, was the apartment more spacious in reality than on the pictures. It was cosy, clean and Chokri had provided for the necessities like towels, soap, kettle o.l. I don't know about it's visitors through the ages who have left behind things, but there was also tea, coffee, etc. Chokri was a bit too long time to respond to our messages in the beginning, so we got to be worried about whether he had forgotten that we came. However, we had a really nice correspondence when we first got hold of him. All in all a very nice place which we definitely will recommend others who would like to live in a peaceful, yet beautiful neighbourhood - close to metro st. Wagram, so you can easily seek out all the lovely sights in Paris.

column1:
Vi søgte en bolig til tre personer (bedsteforældre + et barnebarn på 14) i det centrale Paris. Det fik vi.
Lejligheden ligger tæt på metrostationen Republique, der giver forbindelse til stort set alle seværdigheder. I nabolaget er et indkøbsmarked """"City"""" med alt, hvad der er nødvendigt til dagligt hushold. Endvidere ca. 700 meter fra boligen en superb bager med friskt brød og alskens lækkerier. Vil man spise ude, er der div. restauranter i nabolaget. Lejligheden er forsynet med nødvendigt køkkengrej.
Kvarteret er roligt og det er muligt at få en uforstyrret nattesøvn.
column5:
We searched for a home for three people (grandparents + grandson at 14) in central Paris. It we got.
The apartment is close to Republique metro station, which provides connection to virtually all the sights. In the neighbourhood is a procurement market """"City"""" with everything that is needed for daily housekeeping. Furthermore, the ca. 700 metres from the accommodation a superb bakery with fresh bread and all sorts of goodies. Will you eat out, there are div. restaurants in the neighborhood. The apartment is equipped with necessary kitchenware.
The neighborhood is quiet and it is possible to get an undisturbed night's sleep.

column1: Supersentralt, genuin leilighet med nærhet til «alt». Med barn er denne leiligheten en sikker vinner for store og små, sammenlignet med et lite upersonlig hotellrom. God service fra verten, anbefaler å ta med sjåfør:-) Takk for et flott opphold i en annerledes leilighet! Hilsen Ida og Øivind
column5: Supersentralt, genuine apartment with close proximity to "everything". With children, this apartment is a sure winner for large and small, compared with a small impersonal hotel rooms. Good service from the host, recommend to take with chauffeur:-) Thank you for a great stay in a different apartment! Regards, Ida and Øivind

column1: Vi hadde et fantastisk opphold hos Elsa, i en akkurat passe stor og kul leilighet med en eventyrlig utsikt mot Sacré-Coeur. Utsikten er fullstendig verdt de seks etasjene man må opp uten heis. Stedet er stilig innredet og har de fasilitetene som trengs. Nabolaget er livlig og tidvis veldig folksomt, men leiligheten ligger skjermet og rolig til. Gåavstand til flere metrostasjoner og Montmartre/Pigalle etc.
column5: We had a wonderful stay at Elsa, in a just fit great and cool apartment with a fantastic view towards the Sacré-Coeur. The views are completely worth the six floors you need to climb without a lift. The place is stylishly decorated and has the facilities needed. The neighborhood is lively and at times very crowded, but the apartment is secluded and quiet. Within walking distance to several metro stations and Montmartre/Pigalle etc.

column1:
Hadde en fin opplevelse i Paris! Michele var en super vert som ordnet frokost hver morgen og alltid blid og hjelpsom. Kunne definitivt bodd der igjen. Anbefales på det sterkeste, det var også lett å komme seg rundt med offentlig transport. 

Trine
column5:
Had a nice experience in Paris! Michele was a great host who arranged breakfast every morning and always cheerful and helpful. Could have definitely stayed there again. It is strongly recommended, it was also easy to get around with public transport. 

Trine

column1:

column5:
Nice apartment in area close to the Luxembourg garden and the Latin quarter. The hard bed and sofa bed.

column1: Meget skøn bolig centralt i Montmartre. Moderne og ren bolig i roligt kvarter tæt på indkøbsmuligheder, transport og på Sacre Coeur. Fik de oplysninger af Didier jeg havde behov for. Kan anbefales og jeg vender gerne tilbage.
column5: Very discretion of the housing centrally in Montmartre. Modern and clean home in quiet neighborhood close to shopping, transport and the Sacre Coeur. Got the information of Didier I needed. Can be recommended and I would love to return.

column1: Alt var godt og levede mere end op til forventninger og beskrivelser!!!
column5: Everything was good and lived more than up to expectations and descriptions!!!

column1: Vi havde et skønt ophold i Frédériques lejlighed. Alt var som vi havde forventet og endda bedre. Marion som tog imod os da vi ankom og overrakte nøglen var meget hjælpsom og nem at have kontakt med. Lejligheden lå perfekt ud til en lille livlig gade med masser af restauranter og cafeer, men alle vinduer vendte ind mod en lille gård så der var dejlig stille inde i lejligheden. Vi kunne sagtens finde på at vælge denne lejligheden igen!
column5: We had a wonderful stay in Frédériques apartment. Everything was as we had expected and even better. Marion who took us when we arrived and handed over the key was very helpful and easy to have contact with. The apartment was perfect in a lively street with lots of restaurants and cafes, but all of the windows turned towards a small farm so there was nice, quiet inside the apartment. We could easily choose this apartment again!

column1: 캐리어가 고장나는 해프닝이 있었는데 체크아웃 시간도 늘려주시고, 질문 할 때마다 피드백이 좋아 안심하고 프랑스를 즐길 수 있었습니다. 청결도도 매우 좋고, 주방을 쓸 수 있어서 좋았습니다. 마들렌이 맛있었어요. 신경쓰일 정도는 아닌 약간의 방음문제나 다소 느린 와이파이 등의 문제는 있습니다만 편안하고 좋은 숙소입니다.
column5: The carrier and the opening was check-out time is also increasing and the question, whenever the feedback is good and safe to France to enjoy. Cleanliness is also very good, and the kitchen to write. The Madeleine is delicious. Cared enough or not a few of the questions or somewhat slow Wi-Fi issue..... only a comfortable and good place to stay.

column1: Leiligheten var perfekt, det samme var verten vår! Alt gikk flott og vi koste oss veldig i Paris! Leiligheten var ren og lå veldig bra til rett ved Republique plassen!
column5: The apartment was perfect, as was our host! Everything went great and cost us a lot in Paris! The apartment was clean and was located very well right next to the Republique square!

column1:
Vi har bestemt nydt vores ophold hos Chloe. Chloe er en sød og gæstfri vært. Vi havde underetagen for os selv herunder eget badeværelse. Desuden var køkkenet også til fri afbenyttelse, hvilket var enormt fornemt. Eneste kritik var, at man ikke sov så godt i sengen(som er en sovesofa). Dette problem løste vi dog ved at ligge madrassen på gulvet, hvilket fungerede helt fint. Boligens beliggenhed er rigtig god. Gaden er chamerende og rolig. Desuden ligger det tæt på Sacré cæur, tæt på caféer, butikker, bagere, supermarked mv. og ikke mindst tæt på metrostationer.

Vi vil klart anbefale Chloes bolig :)
column5:
We have certainly enjoyed our stay with Chloe. Chloe is a sweet and hospitable host. We had the downstairs to ourselves including a private bathroom. Moreover, the kitchen also free of charge, which was immensely distinguished. Only criticism was that you not slept so good in bed(which is a sofa bed). This problem was solved, however, by lying the mattress on the floor, which worked perfectly fine. The apartment's location is really good. The street is charming and quiet. In addition, it is close to the Sacré cæur, close to cafés, shops, bakers, supermarket, etc. and, not least, close to metro stations.

We recommend that if you fail to succeed home :)

column1: Vi boede 9 piger i lejligheden og det var en god lejlighed. Den var ikke særlig ren da vi ankom selvom rengøringsdamen havde været der, men da vi ringede og fortalte der stadig var beskidt sendte de straks en ny. Så servicen var iorden
column5: We were 9 girls in the apartment and it was a good opportunity. It wasn't particularly clean when we arrived though the cleaning lady had been there, but when we called and told there was still dirty they sent immediately a new one. So the service was okay

column1:
Beliggenheden af denne lejlighed er super god. Central men ikke i et støjende kvarter. Perfekt med den lille altan. Det tager kun 15 min at gå til Seinen herfra. 5 min til Monoprix og tæt på restauranter.
Personalet der håndterer udlejningen er søde og hjælpsomme. 
Fotografierne fra Lejligheden snyder lidt. Lejligheden er noget mere skrammet og brugt end på billederne. Håndtagene sidder ikke ordentligt fast og spisebordet (fremgår ikke på foto) er utroligt vakkelvornt. Og så er deres rengøring ikke fantastisk. Fandt 15 lange sorte hår samt skomærker i en af sengene - tydeligvis fra rengøringen  Og jeg var heller ikke imponeret over kvaliteten af deres sengelinned og håndklæder - meget slidt. 
MEN når det så er sagt, synes jeg det er en rigtig god lejlighed til prisen. Alt fungerede og det søde personale og beliggenheden opvejede resten for mig. Jeg kommer gerne igen.
column5:
The location of this apartment is super good. Central but not in a noisy neighbourhood. Perfect with the little balcony. It only takes 15 min to walk to the Seine from here. 5 minutes to Monoprix and close to restaurants.
The staff who handles the hiring is cute and helpful. 
The photographs from the Apartment cheat a little. The apartment is somewhat more scratched and used than on the pictures. The handles are not properly fixed and the dining table (does not appear on the photo) are incredibly vakkelvornt. And so are their cleaning service is not great. Found 15 long black hair as well as the shoe brands in one of the beds - obviously from the cleaning, And I also was not impressed with the quality of their linens and towels - very worn. 
BUT when it is said and done, I think it is a really good apartment for the price. Everything worked and the sweet staff and the location outweigh the rest for me. I'd love to come again.

column1:
Lejligheden er en charmerende parisisk lejlighed. Smulle gulve og lofter og flot opgang. Vores vært Anna tog imod og viste lejligheden frem. Lejligheden var ryddelig og ren, og der var adgang til kaffe, the og mad. der var endog købt en flaske vin til os.
Alt I alt en perfekt ramme om vores lange week-end I Paris.
Hilsen
Egon
column5:
The apartment is a charming parisian apartment. Smulle floors and ceilings and sweeping staircase. Our host, Anna took up and showed the apartment. The apartment was tidy and clean, and there was access to coffee, tea, and food. there were even purchased a bottle of wine for us.
All In all a perfect setting for our long week-end In Paris.
Greeting
Egon

column1: very nice place for solo traveller
column5: very nice place for solo traveller

column1: Alle var meget venlige.Og der var endda købt mælk, brød mm til vores morgenmad
column5: Everyone was very friendly.And there was even purchased milk, bread etc for our breakfast

column1: Laurent var den bedste vært. Altid til at få fat på ved spørgsmål. Lejligheden var rigtig fin til prisen og lå super centralt.
column5: Laurent was the best host. Always get hold of by questions. The apartment was really nice for the price and was super helpful.

column1: Fin lejlighed med plads til 6 personer, ingen larm. God skriftlig dialog med Laurent - ingen problemer.
column5: Fine apartment with space for 6 people, no noise. Good written dialogue with Laurent - no problems.

column1:
Laurents lejlighed er ideelt placeret, og det er helt klart dens allerstørste fordel. Man er meget tæt på Gare de l'est (og dermed tæt på RER, mange metroforbindelser og i gåafstand til attraktioner som fx les Halles-området og le Centre Pompidou). Tæt på ligger også le Canal Saint-Martin, et meget charmerende kvarter med kanal og grønne områder. Det føles lokalt at være her. Man skal vælge denne lejlighed, hvis man vil bo i kvarteret tæt på le Canal Saint-Martin. Kvarteret er skønt!

Lejligheden er på ingen måde et """"loft"""", så hvis man regner med at komme op og få udsigt, bliver man ret skuffet. Lejligheden ligger i stueplan, og når man kigger ud af vinduet, skal man dreje nakken ret meget for at se, om himlen er blå eller overskyet. Fra køkkenet og det ene værelse er der udsigt til en baggård med skraldespande. I det andet værelse er der et ovenlysvindue, som (sandsynligvis?) også har udsigt til en baggård (men man kan ikke se gennem selve vinduet, så der er ingen udsigt, men dog dagslys). 

Ellers fungerer alt i lejligheden. Vi var der ikke selv så meget. 

Billederne afspejler, hvordan lejligheden er indrettet. Der er, hvad man har brug for til et kort ophold i Paris.

Laurent er en venlig og imødekommende vært, der er let at få fat på, og som giver klare beskeder om nøgler, indtjekning mv. Kommunikationen fungerer.
column5:
Laurent's apartment is ideally located, and it is clearly its greatest advantage. You are very close to the Gare de l'est and close to the RER, many metro links and within walking distance to attractions such as les Halles area and le Centre Pompidou). Close to le Canal Saint-Martin, a very charming neighborhood with canal and green areas. It feels locally to be here. You should choose this apartment, if you want to stay in the neighborhood close to le Canal Saint-Martin. The neighborhood is great!

The apartment is in no way a """"ceiling""""so if you plan to get up and get views, one becomes quite disappointed. The apartment is located in the ground floor, and looking out of the window, you must turn the neck very much in order to see whether the sky is blue or overcast. From the kitchen and one room overlooks a backyard with garbage cans. In the second room there is a skylight, which (probably?) also the view from the backyard (but you can't see through the window itself, so there is no view, but the daylight). 

Otherwise, the functioning of everything in the apartment. We were there not even so much. 

The pictures reflect how the apartment is furnished. That is what you need for a short stay in Paris.

Laurent is a friendly and welcoming host who is easy to get hold of, and which gives clear messages about the keys, check in etc. The communication works.

column1: Ligger i kælderen. Lidt fugtigt i regnvejr. Ligger i en lidt skummel bydel. Ellers super fint. Tæt på notre dame
column5: Located in the basement. A little damp in the rain. Set in a slightly sinister town. Otherwise super fine. Close to notre dame

column1: Dejlig ren og lækker lejlighed, super central beliggenhed, lige over for hallerne. Selve lejligheden ligger inde i en smuk og helt rolig gård, med springvand i midten. Smuk og enkel indretning, gode soveværelser, fuldt udstyret og  helt nyt køkken - alt var delikat og pænt. Skønne restauranter og masser af mulighed for shopping. Husk at besøge haven ved Palais Royal 2 minutters gang fra lejligheden. Gode og opmærksomme værter med styr på tingene. Vi følte os meget velkomne og kommer gerne igen - og vi er ellers temmelig kræsne.
column5: Lovely clean and nice apartment, super central location, just across the halls. The apartment itself is located in a beautiful and very calm courtyard, with a fountain in the middle. Beautiful and simple interior, good bedrooms, a fully equipped and completely new kitchen - everything was delicate and nicely. Wonderful restaurants and plenty of opportunity for shopping. Remember to visit the garden at Palais Royal is a 2-minute walk from the apartment. Good and attentive hosts with a grip on things. We felt very welcome and would be happy to come again - and we are otherwise pretty picky.

column1: En fantastisk lille lejlighed, der ligger perfekt i montmartre.  Lejligheden er virkelig ren og pæn, og har alle nødvendige faciliteter trods sin meget lille størrelse. Der er en fantastisk udsigt til Eiffeltårnet.  Vi ville helt klart bo her igen. Boede to voksne og to børn (der kunne deles om sovesofaen).
column5: A great little apartment which is perfectly located in montmartre. The apartment is really clean and neat, and has all the necessary amenities, despite its very small size. There is a fantastic view of the Eiffel tower. We would definitely stay here again. Lived with two adults and two children (who could share the sofa bed).

column1:
Har været i Paris et par dage. En rigtig god ferie.
I forbindelse med booking af Karines lejlighed skrev vi sammen, hvilket var let og man fik hurtig besked.
Karine har en hyggelig lejlighed og den er præcis som billederne viser. Da vi ankom blev vi vist rundt af hendes mand og det var perfekt. Vi kom til Paris i bil og der er fin aflukket parkeringskælder til rådighed.
Lejligheden ligger tæt på flere metrostationer, så det var nemt at komme omkring.
Lejlighedskomplekset er roligt.
Der er masser af supermarkeder i nærheden og masser af restauranter.
Alt i alt en rigtig god ferie.
Lejligheden kan klart anbefales!
column5:
Have been in Paris a couple of days. A really good holiday.
In connection with the booking of the Karines apartment we wrote together, which was easy and got the quick message.
Karine has a nice apartment and it is exactly as the photos show. When we arrived we were shown around by her husband and it was perfect. We came to Paris by car and there are fine secluded underground parking available.
The apartment is located close to several metro stations so it was easy to get around.
The apartment complex is quiet.
There are plenty of supermarkets nearby and plenty of restaurants.
All in all a really good holiday.
The apartment can be clearly recommended!

column1: Lejligheden fungerede rigtig godt, vi var der sammen med vores barnebarn og det var lejligheden perfekt til. Ligger centralt vi kunne gå til rigtig mange ting. Remy var meget gæstfri og viste os kort rundt da vi ankom så vi vidste hvor vi kan finde et supermarked og en bager.
column5: The apartment worked really well, we were there with our granddaughter and it was the apartment perfect. Centrally located we could walk to many things. Remy was very hospitable and showed us the map around when we arrived so we knew where we can find a supermarket and a bakery.

column1: Fin beliggenhed, skøn tagterrasse.
column5: Fine location, wonderful roof terrace.

column1: Lejligheden har den mest vidunderlige og helt private Balkon. Ingen udsigt men fred, ro og smukke planter!
column5: The apartment has the most wonderful and completely private Balcony. No view but peace, tranquility and beautiful plants!

column1: Det er en meget lille lejlighed, men beliggenheden er rigtig god.
column5: It is a very small apartment, but the location is really good.

column1:
En lejlighed med perfekt beliggenhed. 
Der er roligt i lejligheden, da alle vinduer vender ind mod en lille gårdskakt. 
Vi var der 4 personer, 2 voksne og 2 børn, hvilket der er sovepladser til, men det var lidt tæt. 
Værten var hurtigt til at svare og meget god til at hjælpe.
column5:
An apartment with a perfect location. 
There is quiet in the apartment when all the windows facing a small gårdskakt. 
We were 4 people, 2 adults and 2 children, sleeps up to, but it was a bit close. 
The host was fast to respond and very good to help.

column1:
Fin Lejlighed I et hyggeligt kvarter.
Lejligheden fungerer fint. Dejligt med en lille altan. 
Lidt anstrengende med hele tre låse med kode for at komme til lejligheden, men så er man også sikker på at der er roligt og sikkert. Lejligheden fungere fint, dog er sovesofaen ret lille og hård.
Kanalerne tæt på er meget hyggelige med gode restauranter og barer. Fedt at det ikke er så turistet et område. Metroen ligger meget tæt på, dog er der ret langt til centrum.
column5:
Nice Apartment In a pleasant neighbourhood.
The apartment works fine. Lovely with a small balcony. 
A little exhausting with all the three lock with the code to get to the apartment, but then one is also sure that there are quiet and safe. The apartment work just fine, however the sofa bed is quite small and hard.
The canals close to is very cosy with good restaurants and bars. Fat that it's not as touristy an area. The metro is very close, however, there are quite far to the centre.

column1:
Vi var i Pris i forbindelse med arbejde og selv om at vi var en time forsinket i forhold til aftalte mødetidspunkt, så var det ikke noget problem i forhold til overlevering af nøgle. Lejligheden er lidt lille og der bor en roonmate også, men dette var intet problem.
Lejligheden ligger i et dejlig levende kvarter med en masse restauranter og tæt på metro. Generelt en god oplevelse.
column5:
We were in the Price in connection with the work and although we were an hour delayed compared to the agreed meeting time, so it was no problem in relation to handover of key. The apartment is a little small and there is a roonmate also, but this was no problem.
The apartment is in a lovely vibrant neighborhood with a lot of restaurants and close to the metro. Generally a good experience.

column1:
Sød vært, stor lejlighed med rigtig god beliggenhed.
Man skal være opmærksom på at der kan høres musik fra bar der ligger under lejlighed fredag og lørdag til kl. 2.00. Vi var fem venner uden børn, så det var ikke noget problem for os. Vi benyttede selv baren en aften, der er et godt sted at slutte aften af med en drink.
column5:
Sweet host, great apartment with really good location.
You should be aware that there can be heard the music from the bar located below the apartment on Friday and Saturday nights. 2.00. We were five friends without children, so it was no problem for us. We used even the bar one night, which is a good place to end the evening with a drink.

column1: À recommander :)
column5: To recommend :)

column1: Otroligt mysiga kvarter med många bra restauranger, nära t-bana, köpcentrum
column5: Incredibly cosy neighbourhood with many good restaurants, near subway, shopping centre

column1: Mycket charmigt och udda boende med perfekt läge och bra kommunikationer. Allt man behöver i kvarteret och mycket serviceminded värdinna.
column5: Very charming and quirky accommodation with perfect location and good transport links. Everything you need in the neighborhood and very friendly hostess.

column1: Stor, flott og stilig leilighet. Bra beliggenhet, med gode kommunikasjonsmuligheter til alle severdigheter i Paris. Også kort avstand til Gare de Nord. Perfekt for familie med små barn, eller flere par som reiser sammen. Hjelpfulle verter, som hadde svar på det vi lurte på. Anbefales.
column5: Great, great and stylish apartment. Good location, with good communication facilities to all the sights in Paris. Also a short distance to the Gare de Nord. Perfect for family with small children, or several couples traveling together. Helpful hosts, who had the answer to what we wondered. Recommended.

column1:
Lejligheden er lille, men rummer alt, hvad man skal bruge. Der var pænt og rent. Beliggenheden på venstre bred og tæt på Paris' store moské var god og central.
Da Marie Odile ikke kunne være til stede på tidspunktet for nøgleudlevering, havde hun sørget for, at vi kunne hente nøglen på en bar. Det fungerede fint.
Alt i alt en god oplevelse !
column5:
The apartment is small, but has everything what you need. It was clean and comfortable. The location on the left bank and close to Paris' great mosque was good and central.
As Marie Odile could not be present at the time of the handover of the keys, she had made sure that we could pick up the key at a bar. It worked just fine.
All in all a good experience !

column1: Hyggelig og charmerende lille lejlighed, alt var som det skulle være. Den hyggelige gaze ligger lige i midten af Paris, med gå- eller cykelafstand til alt. Vi kommer tilbage en anden gang.
column5: Cozy and charming little apartment, everything was as it should be. The cosy gauze is located right in the middle of Paris, with walking or cycling distance to everything. We come back a second time.

column1:
super beliggenhed - god information inden ankomst - men desværre lidt mangelfuld under opholdet.
Lidt for lille til 8 voksne - manglende skabsplads til 8 voksnes tasker og baggage -
column5:
super location - good information prior to arrival - but sadly a little deficient during the stay.
A little too small for 8 adults - a lack of cupboard space for 8 adults bags and luggage -

column1: Ju er super nem at komme i kontakt med. Alle forespørgsler blev hurtigt besvaret, og hun var meget fleksibel med både ankomst og afgang. Vi rejste med to små børn (4og1) og Ju skaffede både høj stol og babyseng. Lejligheden er super beliggende, selvom 4. sal er lidt højt. Kort gåtur til Metro, Rer og Luxembourg haven. Selve lejligheden er meget spartansk indrettet, men da den mest for os var overnatning var det rigtig fint. Kan til hver en tid anbefale Jus lejlighed.
column5: Ju is super easy to get in touch with. All queries were quickly answered, and she was very flexible with both arrival and departure. We traveled with two small children (4og1) and Ju got both high chair and baby bed. The apartment is super located, even though the 4. floor is a little high. Short walk to the Metro, the Rer and Luxembourg gardens. The apartment itself is very spartan furnished, but since the most for us was the accommodation, it was really fine. May at any time recommend Jus apartment.

column1: Studio fonctionnel et bien situer. Sejour agreable.
column5: Studio functional and well located. Residence pleasant.

column1:
Fantastisk velbeliggende lejlighed i 4. arrondissment/kvarteret Marais. Lejligheden lå bag stor låge placeret bagest i gåden, hvorfor de ingen natlig uro var. -Trods at cafelivet var lige uden for porten. Skønt! 
Vi ramte ugen med hedebølge, så uden aircon var det varmt - og dog, idet rummet/badet i kælderen gjorde, at det var OK.
Vi kan varmt anbefale denne airbnb bolig!
NB! Rejs med regionaltog 'B' direkte fra CDG til Chatelet, ca. EUR 8 pr. pers. Vælg udgangen 'Sortie Berger', drej til venstre og følg vejen ca. 1200 m.  indtil det bliver et T-kryds, drej til højre og I er fremme, efter få skridt <3
column5:
Fantastic well-located apartment in 4. arrondissment/the neighbourhood of the Marais. The apartment was behind the big door located at the back of the puzzle, why the no nocturnal turmoil was. -Despite that the cafelivet was just outside the gate. Yay! 
We hit the week with a heat wave, so without aircon it was hot and however, as the room/bath in the basement did, that it was OK.
We can highly recommend this airbnb accommodation!
NB! Travel with the regional train 'B' direct from CDG to Chatelet, ca. EUR 8 per. pers. Select the exit 'Sortie Berger', turn left and follow the road for approx. 1200 m. until it becomes a T-junction, turn right and, after a few steps <3

column1:
Lejligheden var fin og lå rigtig godt centralt. Der var god korrespondance og stor hjælpsomhed. Jeg mødte aldrig værten, men en søster til ham, der lejede lejligheden ud. 
Lejligheden var pæn og ren. Den indeholdt alt det vi havde brug for.
column5:
The apartment was fine and was really well centrally. There was good correspondence and the room is great. I never showed the host, but a sister to him, who rented the apartment out. 
The apartment was neat and clean. It contained everything we needed.

column1: Sehr sauber, tolle Betten, super Dusche, prima Kommunikation.
column5: Very clean, great beds, super shower, great communication.

column1: Super leilighet med alt du trenger. Flott beliggenhet og korte avstander til tog, metro og buss. Anbefales.
column5: Super apartment with everything you need. Great location and short distances to the train, metro and bus. Recommended.

column1:
Beliggenhed, beliggenhed, beliggenhed.
Denne lille lejlighed kan ikke ligge bedre placeret i Paris centrum. Vi har nydt hvert et øjeblik lige i nærheden af alt ting. Den er perfekt til to personer som vil opleve Paris.

Vi kunne sagtens finde på at komme tilbage en anden gang.
column5:
Location, location, location.
This little apartment could not be better located in Paris city centre. We have enjoyed every moment equally near all things. It is perfect for two people who want to experience Paris.

We could easily come back another time.

column1: Dejligt sted, nemt til metro :-)
column5: Nice place, easy to the metro :-)

column1: Tolle Unterkunft in perfekter Lage.
column5: Great accommodation in a perfect location.

column1:
100% anbefaling. Du bor lokalt men lige om hjørnet til Paris seværdigheder.
Fantastiske værter der hjælper med alt du behøver.
Lejligheden er tilmed hyggelig og der er alt man skal bruge.
column5:
100% recommendation. You live locally but just around the corner to the Paris sights.
Amazing hosts that helps with everything you need.
The apartment is also cosy and there is everything you need.

column1:
Min kæreste og jeg boede i Charles' lejlighed i fem dage/fire nætter. Lejligheden lå tre minutter fra metroen, og lå i et hyggeligt kvarter med mange restauranter. Charles var meget god til at fortælle om området, og svarede gerne på spørgsmål - mens vi boede der og inden!

Lejligheden er lille, men bekvem. Dejlig ren og pæn. Lejligheden ligger inde i et kompleks, så vi bemærkede ingen støj fra gaden i løbet af natten. Vil stærkt anbefale ham til andre.
column5:
My girlfriend and I stayed in Charles' apartment for five days/four nights. The apartment was three minutes from the metro, and was in a pleasant neighbourhood with many restaurants. Charles was very good to tell about the area and answered like of questions - while we lived there and within!

The apartment is small, but convenient. Nice clean and neat. The apartment is located inside a complex, so we noticed no noise from the street during the night. Will highly recommend him to others.

column1: Great for value
column5: Great for value

column1: Vores besøg hos Sophie var en rigtig god oplevelse. Sophie var meget hjælpsom med at guide os fra lufthavnen og til lejligheden (RER + METRO fungere upåklageligt) ligesom hun var fleksibel i forhold til indtjekning, vi ankom kl. 00.30. Lejligheden var som på billederne, rigtig fin, hyggelig, ren og havde fint plads til os tre voksne. Lejligheden er rigtig godt beliggende i området, med alle de fornødne bekvemmeligheder indenfor kort afstand og med metroen lige udenfor døren. Sophie var gennem hele ugen, rigtig hjælpsom og nem at komme i kontakt med. Alt i alt en super oplevelse, både Paris og lejligheden kan anbefales til alle, som ønsker en lille hyggelig base, for deres besøg i Paris.
column5: Our visit to Sophie's was a really good experience. Sophie was very helpful to guide us from the airport to the apartment (RER + METRO work flawlessly) and she was flexible for check-in, we arrived at. 00.30. The apartment was as in the pictures, really nice, cosy, clean and had nice space for us three adults. The apartment is really well located in the area, with all the necessary amenities within a short distance and with the metro right outside the door. Sophie was through the whole week, really helpful and easy to get in touch with. All in all a super experience, both Paris and the apartment can be recommended to all who want a nice little base for their visit in Paris.

column1: Familie på fire hadde et kjempefint opphold i denne flotte loftsleiligheten, sentralt i Paris og et par minutters gange til Eiffeltårnet. Det er kort vei til restauranter mv. Ligger i en rolig gate med god utsikt! Verten sørget for at vi ble tatt godt i mot ved ankomst. Vi kommer gjerne tilbake hit!
column5: Family of four had a terrific stay in this great loft-style apartment, located in Paris and a few minutes walk to the Eiffel tower. It is a short distance to restaurants etc. Located in a quiet street with a great view! The host ensured that we were well taken in upon arrival. We will be back here!

column1:
Min mand og jeg havde et skønt ophold! Det var altid let at komme i kontakt med Tamara. Det var hendes ven, Guillaume, der tog imod os; udleverede nøgle og viste os til rette. Han var meget venlig og vi følte os meget trygge og velkomne.
Lige uden for døren ligger det dejligste område i Paris - synes vi! Vi var vilde med caféerne og østersbarerne.
column5:
My husband and I had a wonderful stay! It was always easy to get in touch with Tamara. It was her friend, Guillaume, who rail against us; provided the key and showed us to the right. He was very friendly and we felt us very comfortable and welcome.
Just outside the door is the most beautiful area in Paris - we think! We were wild with cafés and østersbarerne.

column1:
Perfekt beliggenhed gode indkøbsmuligheder og cafeer, gå afstand til Notre Dame og tæt på de skønne gader i Marais 
Rigtig fin lejlighed og super sød vært, passede fint til 4 
Metro tæt på
Ville helt sikkert komme igen.
column5:
Perfect location, good shopping and cafes, walking distance to Notre Dame and close to the beautiful streets of the Marais 
Really nice apartment and super sweet host, ok for 4 
Metro close to
Would definitely come again.

column1:
En skøn hyggelig og lejlighed, i et hyggeligt gårdmiljø.
Rimelig centralt belliggenhed i forhold til mange spændende seværdigheder og nemt at komme til og fra med offentlig transport
Super ren lejlighed og der var endda så man kunne lave kaffe efter ankomst. :-)
Rigtig god kontakt og kommunikation med udlejer.
Kan kun anbefales og kommer gerne igen.
column5:
A wonderful cosy apartment, in a cozy courtyard.
Reasonably central location in relation to the many exciting sights and easy to get to and from with public transport
Super clean apartment and there was even how to make coffee after arrival. :-)
Really good contact and communication with the landlord.
Can only recommend and will gladly come again.

column1:
Vi havde en fantastisk tur til Paris.
Johanna's lejlighed ligger bare helt perfekt i hjertet af Paris. Alt fungerede perfekt, og Johanna svarer hurtigt, når man skriver til hende. Fuld service, og her er super rent og pænt. Louvre området er dejligt roligt og super centralt.
12 ud af 12 stjerner herfra
column5:
We had a fantastic trip to Paris.
Johanna's apartment is just perfect-in the heart of Paris. Everything worked perfectly, and Johanna responds quickly when you write to her. Full service, and here is super clean and neat. The Louvre area is nice and quiet and super central.
12 out of 12 stars from here

column1: Lejligheden ligger ved et dejligt torv med masser af liv, uden at være generende, samt flere restauranter at vælge mellem både på torvet, men også på gaderne lige omkring. Lejligheden passer fint til to for nogle få nætter, man skal dog være opmærksom på, at det er på 4. sal.
column5: The apartment is located at a nice square with lots of life, without having to be troublesome, as well as several restaurants to choose from both on the town square, but also on the streets just about. The apartment is suitable for two for a few nights, however, one should be aware that it is on the 4. floor.

column1: Lejligheden var en hotellejlighed og var som på billederne, det bedste var udsigten fra vinduet. Med vinduet åbnet, og de to stole foran, kunne man rigtigt fornemme der liv der var på torvet.
column5: The apartment was a hotel apartment, and was as in the pictures, the best was the view from the window. With the window opened and the two chairs in front, one could really sense that life there was on the square.

column1: Dejlig lejlighed, der er som beskrevet og med gode senge. Der er lidt støj fra gaden, men det er ok i forhold til beliggenheden. Vi kommer gerne igen.
column5: Lovely apartment, as described and with good beds. There is a little noise from the street, but it is ok in relation to the location. We will gladly come again.

column1: Lejligheden kan absolut anbefales
column5: The apartment can absolutely be recommended

column1:
很棒的一間公寓,什麼東西應有盡有:
1. 廚房的廚具以及日用品很齊全
2. 床鋪很好睡
3. 浴室乾淨以及有按摩浴缸可以用
4. 平板可以讓房間播放音樂增加情調
5. 靠近Châtelet 地鐵､RER站,交通方便
6. 樓下以及附近有許多餐廳可以享用也相當美味｡ 
7. Diana人很和善也願意幫忙房客｡像我們最後一天要離開公寓時也臨時願意讓我們待到下午四點再走｡
column5:
Great for an apartment,anything and everything:
1. Kitchen utensils and daily necessities are equipped
2. Beds nice to sleep
3. Bathroom clean and the whirlpool bath can be used
4. The plate can make the room play music to increase the mood
5. Close to Châtelet metro and RER station,the transportation is convenient
6. Downstairs and in the vicinity there are many restaurants you can enjoy is also quite delicious as well. 
7. Diana who is very kind and willing to help the tenant apartment. Like our last day to leave the apartment when the temporary is willing to let us stay until four in the afternoon and then go home.

column1: Vi havde super kommunikation med Helene - meget effektiv og nem overtagelse/aflevering af lejlighed. Beliggenhed i Marais er super, og der var ingen larm fra gaden, da lejligheden ligger ud til en hyggelig gård. Lejligheden er lille, men svarer til billederne og fungerede fint til vores behov (2 voksne og 2 børn). Alt i alt et fint ophold i Paris.
column5: We had great communication with Helene - very effective and easy take-over/handing over of the apartment. Location in the Marais is super, and there was no noise from the street, as the apartment is out to a nice farm. The apartment is small, but corresponds to the images and worked fine for our needs (2 adults and 2 children). All in all a fine stay in Paris.

column1: Helt eminent til en storbyweekend for en mor med to børn (på 9 og 11 år). Værten var fantastisk sød og imødekommende og gav alle de nødvendige oplysninger i forvejen. Han fulgte ligeledes op undervejs for at sikre at alt var okay. Beliggenheden er superfin centralt, tæt på supermarked/indkøb og metro for transport. Selvom det er centralt er der ingen gener af støj. Kan VARMT anbefales til en weekend eller kortere ophold for 2-3 personer.
column5: Absolutely excellent for a storbyweekend for a mother with two children (9 and 11 years). The host was fantastic sweet and welcoming and gave all the necessary information in advance. He came up along the way to ensure that everything was okay. The location is the superfine centrally located, close to supermarket/procurement and the metro for transportation. Even though it is central, there is no nuisance of noise. HIGHLY recommended for a weekend or a short stay for 2-3 people.

column1: Perfekt beligenhed, meget tæt på metro, supermarked,cafeer.
column5: Perfect location, very close to metro, supermarket,cafes.

column1: En skøn lejlighed med god beliggenhed ud til Seinen og med gode indkøbsmuligheder. Lejligheden ligger ydermere tæt på citybikes og de både, som transporterer en rundt i byen.
column5: A great apartment with good location next to the Seine river and excellent shopping. The apartment is moreover close to the city bikes and the boats, carrying a round in the city.

column1:
Lejligheden er rigtig fin til en famile med teenagerbørn. Der er plads nok, og selvom køkkenet er lille, så er der fin mulighed for at lave mad. 
Lejligheden ligger meget tæt på en metrostation og en del dagligvarebutikker i nærheden. 
Der er rent og varmt selv i februar måned. Selvom der er stille på vejen, så rådes lydfølsomme til at tage ørepropper med, da vinduerne ikke holder megen lyd ud og selvom bilerne kører langsomt larmer de på brostenene. Men der er ikke gennemkørende trafik og området er meget trygt og ungt.
column5:
The apartment is really nice for a family with teenagerbørn. There is enough space and although the kitchen is small, then there is the fine opportunity to cook. 
The apartment is located very close to a metro station and part grocery stores nearby. 
There is clean and warm even in the month of February. Even if there is quiet on the road, so be advised lydfølsomme to take earplugs with you, as the windows do not keep much sound out and even though the cars running slowly are noisy on the cobbles. But there is no through traffic and the area is very safe and young.

column1:
Pigalle 1 er stedet at bo i Montmartre!! Der er gang i gaden på den mest fantastiske måde, trods området mange sex shops, men de er kun med til at gøre stedet til det Montmartre, som alle bør opleve! Lidt længere oppe af gaden på Rue Lepic oser det af hyggelige butikker, cafeer og skønne restauranter! Skal jeg retur til Paris bliver det helt sikkert her igen ❤️ 
Lejligheden er lille, men helt perfekt til to! Og med alt hvad man behøver  For livet i Paris leves udendørs uanset ☀️
column5:
Pigalle 1 is the place to stay in Montmartre!! There is a walk in the street in the most amazing way, in spite of the area's many sex shops, but they are only in to make the place to the Montmartre, which everyone should experience! A little further up the street on Rue Lepic oozes of cosy shops, cafes and wonderful restaurants! Should I return to Paris it will surely be here again ❤️ 
The apartment is small, but absolutely perfect for two! And with everything you need For life in Paris is lived outdoors regardless ☀️

column1: Vi hadde et supert opphold i Sarah’s romslige og luftige leilighet. Perfekt med barn og Sarah var imøtekommende for våre behov. Leiligheten ligger kun 1 minutt fra inngang til Gambetta metrostasjon så det er veldig lett komme seg rundt. Det er livlige kaféer rett på hjørnet, og mange fine butikker i nabolaget. For barn kan spesielt anbefale La Girafe et la Lune, og parken med Square du Sergent Aurélie-Salel.
column5: We had a great stay in Sarah's spacious and airy apartment. Perfect with the kids and Sarah was attentive to our needs. The apartment is located just 1 minute from the entrance to the Gambetta metro station so it is very easy to get around. There are lively cafés right on the corner, and many fine shops in the neighborhood. Children can especially recommend La Girafe a la Lune, and the park with the Square you Sergent Aurélie-Salel.

column1: Hyggelig lejlighed med super beliggenhed midt i Paris. Levede fint op til beskrivelsen. Hurtig og god kommunikation med værten
column5: Cosy apartment with a super location in the heart of Paris. Lived fine up to the description. Fast and good communication with the host

column1: Ryddig og fint sted. Veldig sentralt, passer perfekt for en 3 dagers tur til Paris. God kommunikasjon med verten, alt i alt god opplevelse.
column5: Neat and nice place. Very centrally located, perfect fit for a 3 day trip to Paris. Good communication with host, all in all good experience.

column1: A recommander sans hésiter !
column5: Has recommend without hesitation !

column1: Skøn lille og hyggelig lejlighed, mit i Paris. Den ligger super godt med transport og gå afstand til det meste. Den var rigtig fin og dejligt indrettet. Michal var super flink og nem at kommunikere med :) kan klart anbefales!
column5: Estimate small and cozy apartment, my in Paris. It is very nice with shuttle service and walking distance to most things. It was really nice and lovely decorated. Michal was super nice and easy to communicate with :) highly recommended!

column1:
Mange meldinger fra verten i forkant, underveis og i etterkant. 
Svært fin leilighet, rent og super sentralt
column5:
Many messages from the host in advance, during and in the aftermath. 
Very nice apartment, clean and super centrally located

column1: Lejligheden ligger i et meget charmerende kvarter. Den er pænt og rent. Der var kun èn meget bred dyne, så i skal nok spørge på forhånd, hvis i vil have to dyner.
column5: The apartment is located in a very charming neighborhood. It is neat and clean. There was only one very broad quilt, so you must probably ask in advance if you will have two single duvets.

column1:
Fin lille 1-værelses lejlighed i skønne Montmartre. Rigtig fint område tæt på fine butikker, cafeer, supermarked og bagerier. Vi nød vores ophold til fulde. Ellen havde givet fin besked om hvordan vi kunne finde lejligheden, hvor og hvordan vi fik fat i nøglen osv.
Lejligheden er meget lille, men rigeligt stor til en forlænget weekend i Paris for 2 personer. Vi boede der fra fredag til mandag. 

Vi anbefaler gerne Ellens lejlighed til andre.
column5:
Nice little 1-room apartment in beautiful Montmartre. Really nice area, close to fine shops, cafes, supermarket and bakeries. We enjoyed our stay to the full. Ellen had given a fine message about how we could find the apartment, where, and how we got fat in the key, etc.
The apartment is very small, but plenty big for an extended weekend in Paris for 2 persons. We stayed there from Friday to Monday. 

We will gladly recommend ellen's apartment to the other.

column1: Fin lille lejlighed i pæn stand.
column5: Nice little apartment in neat condition.

column1: Generelt rigtig fin lejlighed! dejlig central beliggende og en fin størrelse  meget fleksibel i tjekning hvilket var super lækkert, da vi først ankom omkring midnat
column5: Generally really fine opportunity! nice centrally located and a nice size, very flexible in tjekning which was super delicious when we first arrived around midnight

column1:
Vi havde et perfekt ophold på en uge. Lejligheden er smart og hyggeligt indrettet. Der er alt hvad man skal bruge. Lejligheden ligger i en smal gård, men beliggenheden helt bagerst i gården og på 1. og 2. sal gør, at den er meget lys. Man kigger over på et stort grønt træ. 2. sal er øverste etage.
Udefra ser ejendommen slidt ud. men indenfor er alt super godt,  moderne og hyggeligt. Belleville er et multi etnisk miljø, med mennesker fra mange lande. Vi syntes det var farverigt og sjovt at opleve miljøet. Lejligheden er iøvrigt beliggende helt støjfri.
column5:
We had a perfect stay at a week. The apartment is smart and cosy furnished. There is everything you need. The apartment is located in a narrow yard, but it is just at the back of the courtyard and on the 1. and 2. floor make, is that it is very light. You look over at a large green tree. 2. floor is the top floor.
From the outside look site worn out. but within are all super nice, modern and cozy. Belleville is a multi ethnic environment, with people from many countries. We thought it was colorful and fun to experience the environment. The apartment is also located quite noiseless.

column1: Super praktisk lille lejlighed, i gå afstand til stort set alt, man kan fx. Sagtens gå til effieltårnet, så et super fint sted at overnatte hvis man er turist.
column5: Super practical small apartment, in walking distance to pretty much everything, you can. Well go to effieltårnet, so a super fine place to stay if you are tourist.

column1: Veldig bra sted, som overgikk forventingene våre. Sentralt, men stille. Rent og pent, behagelig og funksjonelt.
column5: Very good place, which exceeded their billing. Centrally located, but quiet. Clean, comfortable and functional.

column1: Beliggenhed tæt på restauranter (Spis på Edgar; lækker mad og betjening) og Metro var super. God kommunikation før vores ophold, og problemfri indtjekning. Desværre var der under vores ophold igangværende renovering af opgangen, der larmede og vækkede os tidlig hver morgen. Dette burde være oplyst ved booking eller være taget højde for i prisen. Lejligheden ser ud som på billederne, men er godt slidt flere steder. Sofa beskidt med pletter.
column5: Location close to restaurants (Eat at Edgar; delicious food and service) and the Metro was super. Good communication before our stay, and hassle-free check-in. Unfortunately there was during our stay the ongoing renovation of the entryway, which made noise and woke us early each morning. This should be informed by the booking or be taken into account in the price. The apartment looks as on the pictures, but is well worn in several places. Couch dirty with stains.

column1:
Super dejlig lejlighed med en perfekt beliggenhed i hjertet af Marais kvarteret. 
Hyggelig og moderniseret og alt fremstår flot.  Vi var familie på 5 personer og det passede fint med det yngste barn på sovesofaen.
Vi fik lov at checke ind 1 times tid før da rengøringen var færdig.
Restauranter, butikker, indkøb, seværdigheder indefor gå afstand.
column5:
Super nice apartment with a perfect location in the heart of the Marais district. 
A cosy and modernised and everything looks nice. We were family of 5 persons and it fit fine with the youngest child on the sofa bed.
We were allowed to check in 1 hour before when the cleaning was finished.
Restaurants, shops, shopping, attractions within walking distance.

column1:
Lejligheden er rigtigt flot og ligger dejligt i Paris, tæt ved attraktioner og mange hyggelige butikker og spisetider.
Vi har nydt vores ophold i Paris.
column5:
The apartment is really nice and is lovely in Paris, close to attractions and the many quaint shops and meal times.
We have enjoyed our stay in Paris.

column1: Little cold inside
column5: Little cold inside

column1: Gentile...
column5: Kind of...

column1: Lækker lejlighed i fedt område. Metroen ligger under 2 minutters gang. Thomas var meget hjælpsom og alt var klar da vi ankom.
column5: Delicious apartment in the fat area. The metro is within a 2 minute walk. Thomas was very helpful and everything was ready when we arrived.

column1: Lejligheden ligger i et dejligt roligt område i en hyggelig grøn smøge. Der er gode muligheder for både at købe lækre madvarer og spise ude i nærheden. Grønne områder og parker tæt på. Beatrice modtog os med nøgle og intro, mest på fransk. Metrostation 10 min. gang fra boligen. Alt i alt et fint udgangspunkt for at udforske Paris.
column5: The apartment is located in a lovely quiet area in a nice green alley. There are good opportunities to buy delicious food and eat out nearby. Green areas and parks close by. Beatrice received us with the key and the intro, most in French. Metro station 10 min. walk from the residence. All in all a fine base for exploring Paris.

column1:
Ren nydelse! Det eneste dårlige jeg kan sige om mit ophold er, at den lokale Carrefour Express havde lukket på søndag og helligdage.
Uovertruffen beliggenhed, roligt om natten (!) og en fantastisk udsigt. Badeværelse er mikroskopisk, men det er en båd fra 1938, så man kan ikke forvente det helt store. Der er elkedel og et meget lille køleskab, men ellers ingen køkkenfaciliteter. Rigeligt med restauranter og metrostationer indenfor gå-afstand.
Der er fransk morgenmad i styrhuset og værtinden er meget elskværdig.
Tag afsted. Der er ikke noget at betænke sig på!
column5:
Pure enjoyment! The only thing bad I can say about my stay is that the local Carrefour Express had closed on Sunday and public holidays.
Unbeatable location, quiet at night (!) and a great view. Bathroom is microscopic, but it is a boat from 1938, so you can't expect it to be quite big. There is a kettle and a very small refrigerator, but no kitchen facilities. Plenty of restaurants and metro stations within walking distance.
There are French breakfast in of the wheelhouse and the hostess is very gracious.
Take off. There is nothing to go wrong!

column1:
Det er en super dejlig lejlighed med en god beliggenhed tæt på Metro samt hyggelige spisesteder samt butikker . 
Helt sikkert et lejlighed vi vil bruge næste gang vi skal til Paris :-).
column5:
It is a super nice apartment with a good location close to the Metro as well as cosy eateries and shops . 
Definitely an apartment we will use next time we go to Paris :-).

column1: Super god beliggenhed, rent og pænt. Vi var 4 personer 2 voksne og 2 børn, uden problemer.
column5: Super good location, clean and neat. We were 4 persons, 2 adults and 2 children without any problems.

column1: Velfungerende lille pariserlejlighed med perfekt beliggenhed i ft attraktioner, seværdigheder og adgang til lufthavn. God kommunikation med Isabelle.
column5: Functioning of the small parisian apartment with perfect location in ft attractions, sights and access to the airport. Good communication with Isabelle.

column1: God oplevelse
column5: God oplevelse

column1:
kan anbefales til alle som vil prøve noget lidt anderledes.
lever fuldt op til beskrivelsen. beliggenheden er fantastisk. Offentlig transport (metro/RER) lige ved døren.Værten er venlig og hjælpsom.Kommer meget gerne tilbage igen.
column5:
can be recommended to all who want to try something a little different.
living fully up to the description. the location is great. Public transport (metro/RER) right at the door.The host is friendly and helpful.Comes very much like the back again.

column1: Dejligt rent og ryddeligt. Kaffe og vin som fin velkomst.
column5: Nice clean and tidy. Coffee and wine as a nice welcome.

column1:
Stunning View. 
Sleep with sparkling Eiffel Tower, Get up with Eiffel Tower at dawn. 

환상적인 에펠탑의 야경과 함께 잠들고, 아침이면 또 에펠탑을 바라보며 깨는 경험은 최고입니다. 
숙소도 매우 깨끗해서 내내 행복하고 즐거웠습니다.
column5:
Stunning View. 
Sleep with sparkling Eiffel Tower, Get up with the Eiffel Tower at dawn. 

Fantastic Eiffel Tower of night with sleep, in the morning or the Eiffel Tower and the waking experience is the best. 
The hostel is also very clean throughout, happy and joyful.

column1: Perfekt beliggenhed.
column5: Perfect beliggenhed.

column1: Alles super, danke Sandrine! :)
column5: Everything was great, thank you Sandrine! :)

column1: Annas lejlighed med terrasse var alt hvad vi var stillet i udsigt - og en del til! Fantastisk beliggenhed, suveræne faciliteter og en virkelig charmerende gammel pariserlejlighed. Perfekt til shopping, cafebesøg og i gåafstand til mange store turist attraktioner. Der er et ret intenst natteliv, hvor støjen fra gaden godt kan være ret påtrængende, men for os var det bare en del af oplevelsen af parisisk leben. Vi ville vælge Annas lejlighed igen med glæde og uden tøven.
column5: Anna's apartment was everything we were promised - and a part to! Great location, superb facilities and a really charming old parisian apartment. Perfect for shopping, cafebesøg and in walking distance to many major tourist attractions. There is a rather intense nightlife, where the noise from the street can be quite intrusive, but for us, it was just a part of the experience of the parisian leben. We would choose Anna's apartment again with pleasure and without hesitation.

column1:
Hurtig, præcis og venlig kommunikation. 
Stedet var præcis som beskrevet. Meget rent og i perfekt stand. Vi anbefaler med glæde Victors sted til andre og overvejer at komme igen.
column5:
Fast, accurate and friendly communication. 
The place was exactly as described. Very clean and in perfect condition. We will be happy to recommend Victor's place to others and considering to come again.

column1: Vi boede som par hos Radia, da Héloïse var på rejse. Vi har aldrig brugt Airbnb før og var lidt nervøse, men det var der absolut ingen grund til! Radia var den sødeste vært, der var ingen problemer på trods af meget sen ankomst og vi følte os generelt virkelig hjemme i lejligheden. Det er fantastisk at bo i en lejlighed frem for hotelværelse, fordi det føles mere som et hjem, hvor man kan slappe lidt af. Selve lejligheden er indrettet virkelig inspirerende med forskellige ting fra rejsedestinationer, hvilket skaber en enormt hyggelig stemning. Alt i alt har vi haft en ekstremt god tur, og vi er sikre på, at opholdet hos Radia var en stor grund hertil.
column5: We stayed as a couple at Radia, as Héloïse was on the trip. We have never used Airbnb before and was a little nervous, but there was absolutely no reason to! Radia was the sweetest host, there were no problems in spite of very late arrival, and we felt generally really at home in the apartment. It is great to stay in an apartment rather than hotel room, because it feels more like a home, where you can relax a little. The apartment itself is decorated really inspiring with different things from travel destinations, which creates a very cosy atmosphere. All in all, we have had an extremely good trip, and we are sure that staying with Radia was a big reason for this.

column1: Hyggelig lejlighed med god udnyttelse af kvadratmeterne i et meget levende og autentisk kvarter. Helt usædvanligt i Paris er den skønne terrasse med store planter! Tæt på metro og indkøb, men stadig rolig og med god mulighed for at slappe af efter en lang dag i storbyen. Værten er meget imødekommende og tilgængelig, han svarer hurtigt på henvendelser og er meget opmærksom på at gøre opholdet godt. Vores lille gruppe på 5 nød opholdet meget, og vi glæder os til at komme tilbage! Vi kan på det varmeste anbefale denne lejlighed til alle, der ønsker et hyggeligt og autentisk Parisisk udgangspunkt for storbyferien.
column5: Cosy apartment with good use of kvadratmeterne in a very lively and authentic neighbourhood. Quite unusual in Paris is the lovely terrace with large plants! Our small group of 5 enjoyed the stay very much and we look forward to coming back! We can warmly recommend this apartment to anyone who wants a cozy and authentic Parisian base for storbyferien.

Alt i alt var stedet rigtig godt og vi kunne godt finde på at vende 
tilbage :-D

One of the 4 beds was an air mattress, so for longer stays the apartment more for 3 people than 4.
All in all, the site was really good and we could well find to return 
back :-D

Good communication, very helpful and kind. 
The apartment was exactly as described. Very cozy and in a quiet apartment building.

Merete & Carlo :-)
